cobblemon.species.epochmachamp.desc: The addition of its two extra arms has somehow made it even more disoriented than it was previously. However, it hits harder as a result.
cobblemon.species.epochtauros.name: EpochTauros
cobblemon.species.epochtauros.desc: It is incredibly fast and strong. It can charge into walls with reckless abandon.
cobblemon.species.epochelectabuzz.name: EpochElectabuzz
cobblemon.species.epochelectabuzz.desc: It has no fear, and will willingly take on enemies much larger and stronger in size without flinching. Arguably, this can be seen as both a strength and a weakness.
cobblemon.species.epochmagmar.name: EpochMagmar
cobblemon.species.epochmagmar.desc: It can be found both on frozen tundra, glaciers and in frozen oceans roaming in isolation.
cobblemon.species.epochexeggcute.name: EpochExeggcute
cobblemon.species.epochexeggcute.desc: This Pokemon was created as a consequence of a nuclear fallout. It's not clear what it looked like prior to this event.
cobblemon.species.epochexeggutor.name: EpochExeggutor
cobblemon.species.epochexeggutor.desc: It is said that prolonged exposure to this Pokemon can cause illness due to the nuclear radiation it emanates.
cobblemon.species.epochgrimer.name: EpochGrimer
cobblemon.species.epochgrimer.desc: It is found deep in swampy areas. When you find yourself in sinking mud, it is most likely a Grimer holding onto you.
cobblemon.species.epochmuk.name: EpochMuk
cobblemon.species.epochmuk.desc: It is rumoured to guard swamps and appear in deep fog. The sound of its movements are often confused as wailing, giving it the title of Swamp Creature.
cobblemon.species.epochabra.name: EpochAbra
cobblemon.species.epochabra.desc: It meditates for most of the day. Most observers believe it to be asleep but its spirit has transcended to a plane of enlightenment.
cobblemon.species.epochkadabra.name: EpochKadabra
cobblemon.species.epochkadabra.desc: It trains its fists both through repetitive attacks against hard surfaces and also against ethereal forces as regular training.
cobblemon.species.epochalakazam.name: EpochAlakazam
cobblemon.species.epochalakazam.desc: Its Nunchakus are an extension of its arms. It has learned to use them seamlessly and flawlessly.
cobblemon.species.epochpsyduck.name: EpochPsyduck
cobblemon.species.epochpsyduck.desc: The gem on its head is capable of allowing it to see briefly into the future, which allows it to anticipate attacks.
cobblemon.species.epochgolduck.name: EpochGolduck
cobblemon.species.epochgolduck.desc: It has a soothing aura that it emanates that is capable of cleansing toxic environments.
cobblemon.species.epocheevee.name: EpochEevee
cobblemon.species.epocheevee.desc: This Pokemon was subjected to cruelty in life which has affected its unstable genetic makeup, allowing it to evolve into different variations.
cobblemon.species.epochvaporeon.name: EpochVaporeon
cobblemon.species.epochvaporeon.desc: It is a very shy Pokemon and when it spots humans, it is quick to retreat back into deep sands.
cobblemon.species.epochjolteon.name: EpochJolteon
cobblemon.species.epochjolteon.desc: The storm clouds that circle it are very unstable and it is still learning how to fully control and master the energy it produces.
cobblemon.species.epochflareon.name: EpochFlareon
cobblemon.species.epochflareon.desc: The drill on its tail is heavily rusted, which slows it down significantly. However, the drill is sharp and very corrosive which helps it defend itself.
cobblemon.species.epochmeowth.name: EpochMeowth
cobblemon.species.epochmeowth.desc: It likes to challenge other Meowths in its coalition to races on sandy dunes or open fields.
cobblemon.species.epochpersian.name: EpochPersian
cobblemon.species.epochpersian.desc: It is said that the spots on any Persian are always unique in size, shape and pattern.
cobblemon.species.epochrattata.name: EpochRattata
cobblemon.species.epochrattata.desc: The hairs on its back stand when it senses danger. As a result, their population are notoriously difficult to control.
cobblemon.species.epochraticate.name: EpochRaticate
cobblemon.species.epochraticate.desc: Contrary to popular belief, the eye on its tail is how it is able to see versus through its conventional eye sockets.
cobblemon.species.epochslowpoke.name: EpochSlowpoke
cobblemon.species.epochslowpoke.desc: This Pokemon likes to always have a reserve of honey on its tail so in case it is hungry, it can always taste some off the tail rather than trying to find more.
cobblemon.species.epochslowbro.name: EpochSlowbro
cobblemon.species.epochslowbro.desc: Its greediness has increased, and it now likes to have a beehive always within reach since its not enough to just have some honey on its tail as a Slowpoke.
cobblemon.species.epochoddish.name: EpochOddish
cobblemon.species.epochoddish.desc: During full moons, the leaves on their head will sparkle.
cobblemon.species.epochgloom.name: EpochGloom
cobblemon.species.epochgloom.desc: Throughout the lunar cycle, their scents grow progressively stronger and more pleasing.
cobblemon.species.epochvileplume.name: EpochVileplume
cobblemon.species.epochvileplume.desc: During the lunar cycle, pollen is spouted from the centre of its flower to spread and create more Oddish that will bloom by the next lunar cycle.
cobblemon.species.epochhorsea.name: EpochHorsea
cobblemon.species.epochhorsea.desc: They can use their tail fins to give them a quick burst of speed when they find themselves trapped in an aggressive sea current.
cobblemon.species.epochseadra.name: EpochSeadra
cobblemon.species.epochseadra.desc: In dark places, it can control the intensity of the lights on its fins and tails to provide added visibility.
cobblemon.species.epochvenonat.name: EpochVenonat
cobblemon.species.epochvenonat.desc: Their ability to camouflage easily has lead to them becoming a bit of a pest that are hard to exterminate. However, fire is still very useful against them.
cobblemon.species.epochvenomoth.name: EpochVenomoth
cobblemon.species.epochvenomoth.desc: They are considered a pest because they make a habit of eating tree leaves and then masquerading as part of the tree to hide from predators.
cobblemon.species.epochcaterpie.name: EpochCaterpie
cobblemon.species.epochcaterpie.desc: When it senses danger, its antenna will hum enabling it to seek out protection in advance.
cobblemon.species.epochmetapod.name: EpochMetapod
cobblemon.species.epochmetapod.desc: It is very difficult for this Pokemon to protect itself because its eyes glow. If it opens its eyes, it gives away its location to potential predators.
cobblemon.species.epochbutterfree.name: EpochButterfree
cobblemon.species.epochbutterfree.desc: The wing pattern on each of these Pokemon are said to be perfectly unique and never replicated across anyone else of its species.
cobblemon.species.epochmankey.name: EpochMankey
cobblemon.species.epochmankey.desc: It is exceptionally resilient because it is able to use its screeching noise offensively to drown out and annoy anyone that dare crosses its path.
cobblemon.species.epochprimeape.name: EpochPrimeape
cobblemon.species.epochprimeape.desc: A Primeape uses its screeching to get even with people or Pokemon that have previously annoyed it. Only when you have surrendered, will it relent.
cobblemon.species.epochparas.name: EpochParas
cobblemon.species.epochparas.desc: It spreads death and disease wherever it goes. If you see a Paras in a certain environment, it is already too late.
cobblemon.species.epochparasect.name: EpochParasect
cobblemon.species.epochparasect.desc: The mushroom is a measure of its life span. The more decayed it is, the older it is, and therefore the closer to death it is.
cobblemon.species.epochlapras.name: EpochLapras
cobblemon.species.epochlapras.desc: The volcanic formation on its back formed underwater because despite its typing, it is able to navigate safely in deep waters.
cobblemon.species.epochdiglett.name: EpochDiglett
cobblemon.species.epochdiglett.desc: It likes to keep its eyes closed to mask itself as an ordinary gravestone. When people let their guard down, it will spook them.
cobblemon.species.epochdugtrio.name: EpochDugtrio
cobblemon.species.epochdugtrio.desc: It is constantly watching over the graves of close friends and family that passed away and carries the graves around with them.
cobblemon.species.epochpidgey.name: EpochPidgey
cobblemon.species.epochpidgey.desc: It often falls asleep on trees and allows snow to collect. It is actually perfectly content to have the snow accumulate than shake it off when it awakens.
cobblemon.species.epochpidgeotto.name: EpochPidgeotto
cobblemon.species.epochpidgeotto.desc: The ice that forms on its wings can be sharpened and flung at targets like icy projectiles.
cobblemon.species.epochpidgeot.name: EpochPidgeot
cobblemon.species.epochpidgeot.desc: When a flock of Pidgeot gather and collectively flap their wings, they can summon a small localized snow storm.
cobblemon.species.epochchansey.name: EpochChansey
cobblemon.species.epochchansey.desc: The C.H.A.N.S.E.Y model 800 is the upgraded version of the H.A.P.P.I.N.Y 700 and provides enhanced services in addition to healing facilities.
cobblemon.species.epochtentacool.name: EpochTentacool
cobblemon.species.epochtentacool.desc: The starry pattern on its body copies the pattern of the stars in the night sky above it when it is swimming.
cobblemon.species.epochtentacruel.name: EpochTentacruel
cobblemon.species.epochtentacruel.desc: Its head looks suspiciously like a wizard hat leading some people to believe that it has some magical powers that it conceals.
cobblemon.species.epochgrowlithe.name: EpochGrowlithe
cobblemon.species.epochgrowlithe.desc: In various myths, it is said that Growlithe were stationed as guardians to areas of cosmic significance and the guardians of forbidden knowledge.
cobblemon.species.epocharcanine.name: EpochArcanine
cobblemon.species.epocharcanine.desc: In one fable, it is said that the ball Arcanine carries around represents a unique universe. Crushing the ball would be akin to crushing a universe.
cobblemon.species.epochpikachu.name: EpochPikachu
cobblemon.species.epochpikachu.desc: From its tail, it is able to amplify certain nearby sound waves. It uses it to raise the volume in its headphones.
cobblemon.species.epochraichu.name: EpochRaichu
cobblemon.species.epochraichu.desc: From its turntable, it can produce certain musical tracks if you request it.
cobblemon.species.epochgoldeen.name: EpochGoldeen
cobblemon.species.epochgoldeen.desc: This Goldeen is believed to have started multiplying in the sewers after it got exposed to some disposed of chemicals.
cobblemon.species.epochseaking.name: EpochSeaking
cobblemon.species.epochseaking.desc: It splashes around in the dirty water of sewer systems and is not even remotely disturbed by this. In fact, it could not be happier.
cobblemon.species.epochmagnemite.name: EpochMagnemite
cobblemon.species.epochmagnemite.desc: It is sent out by the primary Magnezone mothership as a small observer to study certain environments, take samples and return.
cobblemon.species.epochmagneton.name: EpochMagneton
cobblemon.species.epochmagneton.desc: It is capable of taking high-quality photography with its lenses which make it very useful for studying certain environments.
cobblemon.species.epochspearow.name: EpochSpearow
cobblemon.species.epochspearow.desc: It hunts in small flocks and will chatter among themselves to cooperate and signal to one another when they have found a source of food.
cobblemon.species.epochfearow.name: EpochFearow
cobblemon.species.epochfearow.desc: It hunts out at sea and in oceans. It will dive into the water from a distance to pick up a fish Pokemon such as an Arrokuda when it is hungry.
cobblemon.species.epochjigglypuff.name: EpochJigglypuff
cobblemon.species.epochjigglypuff.desc: When it gets angry, it huffs and puffs to make itself bigger to show it means business. Often though, many people do not take it seriously.
cobblemon.species.epochwigglytuff.name: EpochWigglytuff
cobblemon.species.epochwigglytuff.desc: This Pokemon has grown to such a size that it is able to blow bubbles of its own. This is one method it has to actually create more Igglybuffs.
cobblemon.species.epochditto.name: EpochDitto
cobblemon.species.epochditto.desc: A species that is the subject of intense study by researchers. Some say that it is matter that came from outer space.
cobblemon.species.epochcubone.name: EpochCubone
cobblemon.species.epochcubone.desc: It wields some of the surviving coral from the reefs it inhabits as a weapon to ward off foes.
cobblemon.species.epochmarowak.name: EpochMarowak
cobblemon.species.epochmarowak.desc: Its helmet allows it to breathe underwater. However, it's not known if the coral reefs it is often found in is its natural habitat or not.
cobblemon.species.epochhorseaone.name: EpochHorseaOne
cobblemon.species.epochhorseaone.desc: It is responsible for pollinating many flowers in local fields and forests. When they do so, you can hear a loud buzzing noise.
cobblemon.species.epochseadraone.name: EpochSeadraOne
cobblemon.species.epochseadraone.desc: They roam around in small swarms to appear more threatening. They are capable of applying some deadly stings to anyone that irritates them.
cobblemon.species.epochomanyte.name: EpochOmanyte
cobblemon.species.epochomanyte.desc: It can use its magical hat to perform tricks. It is also capable of stepping into the hat and disappearing but it is not clear where it goes or how it comes back.
cobblemon.species.epochomastar.name: EpochOmastar
cobblemon.species.epochomastar.desc: Its famous trick is to put Pokemon in the hat to make them disappear. It is not clear where the Pokemon goes or how it returns.
cobblemon.species.epochgrimerone.name: EpochGrimerOne
cobblemon.species.epochgrimerone.desc: This Pokemon appears in volcanically active areas. It can lob hot lava formed from its body from a distance to singe and immobilize enemies.
cobblemon.species.epochmukone.name: EpochMukOne
cobblemon.species.epochmukone.desc: When it opens its mouth to breathe, you can feel a large expulsion of hot air that will coat your entire body in sweat.
cobblemon.species.epochvulpix.name: EpochVulpix
cobblemon.species.epochvulpix.desc: The stars on its tails are all in the form of various constellations.
cobblemon.species.epochninetales.name: EpochNinetales
cobblemon.species.epochninetales.desc: The rings around its neck are always gently rotating on an axis. The rotation is what helps this Pokemon orient itself when hit and keep its balance.
cobblemon.species.epochmrmime.name: EpochMrmime
cobblemon.species.epochmrmime.desc: This Pokemon, along with Mime Jr. form small troupes to perform various circus acts to solicit donations from pedestrians in large urban centres.
cobblemon.species.epochvoltorbone.name: EpochVoltorbOne
cobblemon.species.epochvoltorbone.desc: It is the beginning of a small planet and is accreting matter to grow in size and density. It will eventually be able to generate its own gravitational force.
cobblemon.species.epochelectrodeone.name: EpochElectrodeOne
cobblemon.species.epochelectrodeone.desc: When it evolved, it triggered a chemical transformation which amplified its gravitational force, attracting small objects into orbit.
cobblemon.species.epochexeggcuteone.name: EpochExeggcuteOne
cobblemon.species.epochexeggcuteone.desc: This Pokemon is often confused for being ordinary scorching embers because it is so small. They are defenseless when singled out.
cobblemon.species.epochexeggutorone.name: EpochExeggutorOne
cobblemon.species.epochexeggutorone.desc: Its body is always scorching hot such that it is constantly spewing clouds of sulfuric gas from the volcano on its head.
cobblemon.species.epochdoduoone.name: EpochDoduoOne
cobblemon.species.epochdoduoone.desc: It will immerse itself up to its waist in water at most to hunt for fish. It usually does not like wading in further despite being a Water-type.
cobblemon.species.epochdodrioone.name: EpochDodrioOne
cobblemon.species.epochdodrioone.desc: It is very vain but very affectionate. If you pet it, you need to know exactly how or else it will jab you with one of its beaks.
cobblemon.species.epochmachopone.name: EpochMachopOne
cobblemon.species.epochmachopone.desc: This Pokemon is beginning to tap into its psychic potential. As a result, its stand is weakly formed and highly transparent.
cobblemon.species.epochmachokeone.name: EpochMachokeOne
cobblemon.species.epochmachokeone.desc: Its psychic capabilities have advanced, allowing it to manifest a more opaque stand but it still requires further meditation to fully ascend.
cobblemon.species.epochmachampone.name: EpochMachampOne
cobblemon.species.epochmachampone.desc: This Pokemon is so spiritually in-tune that it is able to channel a fully corporeal stand to demonstrate its combat prowess.
cobblemon.species.epochjynx.name: EpochJynx
cobblemon.species.epochjynx.desc: Its voice is able to reach very high notes effortlessly. However, it has learned to be conscious of when and where it sings this way, for fear of causing avalanches.
cobblemon.species.epochpoliwag.name: EpochPoliwag
cobblemon.species.epochpoliwag.desc: This Pokemon loves mud. If it is away from mud or water for too long however, its skin goes dry and cracks.
cobblemon.species.epochpoliwhirl.name: EpochPoliwhirl
cobblemon.species.epochpoliwhirl.desc: Poliwhirl are extremely territorial, and produce deep loud bellows to each other to signal their territory. However, they have a soft spot for Poliwag.
cobblemon.species.epochpoliwrath.name: EpochPoliwrath
cobblemon.species.epochpoliwrath.desc: These pokemon are a king of their local ecosytem. Even though they are known as kings, they will not hesitate to raze their territory during a fight with a rival.
cobblemon.species.epochhitmonlee.name: EpochHitmonlee
cobblemon.species.epochhitmonlee.desc: This Pokemon is a superhero that is capable of flight and also uses psychic attacks from afar.
cobblemon.species.epochhitmonchan.name: EpochHitmonchan
cobblemon.species.epochhitmonchan.desc: This Pokemon is a superhero that has super strength and moves quickly.
cobblemon.species.epochscyther.name: EpochScyther
cobblemon.species.epochscyther.desc: Its blades are made of pure light, and are able to slice through virtually anything. Unfortunately, because of this it has issues picking up food.
cobblemon.species.epochpinsir.name: EpochPinsir
cobblemon.species.epochpinsir.desc: This Pokemon exhibits such a strong degree of magnetism that the rocks that are encrusted in its body emit charged electricity.
cobblemon.species.epochgeodudeone.name: EpochGeodudeOne
cobblemon.species.epochgeodudeone.desc: A spirit has possessed and empowered this Geodude giving it spectral powers.
cobblemon.species.epochgravelerone.name: EpochGravelerOne
cobblemon.species.epochgravelerone.desc: This Pokemon emanates such strong spectral energy that it is able to use these ghostly powers to land attacks from afar.
cobblemon.species.epochgolemone.name: EpochGolemOne
cobblemon.species.epochgolemone.desc: Touching this Pokemon will send a chill through your bones because it is a way for it to gradually siphon your life essence without you noticing.
cobblemon.species.epochclefairy.name: EpochClefairy
cobblemon.species.epochclefairy.desc: When their wings flutter, they spread pixie dust around them. In sufficient quantities, this can allow a person to be able to fly.
cobblemon.species.epochclefable.name: EpochClefable
cobblemon.species.epochclefable.desc: It is said that if you manage to capture one, you can use the pixie dust it produces to make yourself exceptionally wealthy.
cobblemon.species.epochsnorlax.name: EpochSnorlax
cobblemon.species.epochsnorlax.desc: As it hibernates, it has honed its psychic powers to be able to retrieve objects from afar without resorting to have to get up and move.
cobblemon.species.epochmagnemiteone.name: EpochMagnemiteOne
cobblemon.species.epochmagnemiteone.desc: A T.Magnemite's core contains a variety of crystals, some of which are extremely valuable, leading it to being hunted to near extinction as a result.
cobblemon.species.epochmagnetonone.name: EpochMagnetonOne
cobblemon.species.epochmagnetonone.desc: T.Magneton form when 3 T.Magnemite psychically fuse together. The dominant one can be identified by having an extra crystal on its body.
cobblemon.species.epochporygon.name: EpochPorygon
cobblemon.species.epochporygon.desc: It has a malevolent nature and feeds off the software it sabotages. However, it quickly retreats on detecting anti-malware.
cobblemon.species.epochdratini.name: EpochDratini
cobblemon.species.epochdratini.desc: These Pokemon like to take naps on the highest clouds in the stratosphere.
cobblemon.species.epochdragonair.name: EpochDragonair
cobblemon.species.epochdragonair.desc: In certain fables, these Pokemon were considered to be favoured pets of some of the gods.
cobblemon.species.epochdragonite.name: EpochDragonite
cobblemon.species.epochdragonite.desc: In certain fables, these Pokemon were considered to be some of the emissaries of the heavens because they were blessed with godly speed.
cobblemon.species.epochkabutoone.name: EpochKabutoOne
cobblemon.species.epochkabutoone.desc: This Pokemon is thought to be a cybernetic predator from a distant planet. It crash landed several million years ago.
cobblemon.species.epochkabutopsone.name: EpochKabutopsOne
cobblemon.species.epochkabutopsone.desc: Its scythes are connected by a combination of some unknown energy, likely a technology that was founded on its home planet.
cobblemon.species.epochlaprasone.name: EpochLaprasOne
cobblemon.species.epochlaprasone.desc: This Pokemon has allegedly existed since prehistoric times. It towers over other Pokemon as it lumbers through the savannah at its own pace.
cobblemon.species.epochchikorita.name: EpochChikorita
cobblemon.species.epochchikorita.desc: It produces a lovely aroma whenever it is feeling happy.
cobblemon.species.epochbayleef.name: EpochBayleef
cobblemon.species.epochbayleef.desc: Its leaf necklace is valuable because it has curative properties. Poachers often hunt them to sell these necklaces in the black market.
cobblemon.species.epochmeganium.name: EpochMeganium
cobblemon.species.epochmeganium.desc: It draws in negative energy into its flower to help restore a damaged ecosystem. However, if it expends too much energy, the flower wilts too much.
cobblemon.species.epochcyndaquil.name: EpochCyndaquil
cobblemon.species.epochcyndaquil.desc: They are often found as rodents in factories or other metal-rich facilities. It is unclear how the gear managed to append to its body.
cobblemon.species.epochquilava.name: EpochQuilava
cobblemon.species.epochquilava.desc: It uses the gears on its body to calibrate its balance, stay grounded, and focus its attacks.
cobblemon.species.epochtyphlosion.name: EpochTyphlosion
cobblemon.species.epochtyphlosion.desc: It can remove the gear on its back and throw it a sort of boomerang or throwing weapon.
cobblemon.species.epochtotodile.name: EpochTotodile
cobblemon.species.epochtotodile.desc: It has no feeling of fear and often challenges foes much larger and faster than it without batting an eye, sometimes to its demise.
cobblemon.species.epochcroconaw.name: EpochCroconaw
cobblemon.species.epochcroconaw.desc: They are known for raiding in small groups so can be quite threatening when they assemble in small gangs to raid local towns.
cobblemon.species.epochferaligatr.name: EpochFeraligatr
cobblemon.species.epochferaligatr.desc: It adds a tattoo to its skin for every foe it takes out in combat to constantly bask in its combat superiority.
cobblemon.species.epochchikoritaone.name: EpochChikoritaOne
cobblemon.species.epochchikoritaone.desc: This Pokemon has electrical currents swirling from its antennae that it can channel and redirect in any direction it chooses.
cobblemon.species.epochbayleefone.name: EpochBayleefOne
cobblemon.species.epochbayleefone.desc: When it thunder storms, this Pokemon can use the electrical rod on its head to attract certain electrical attacks.
cobblemon.species.epochmeganiumone.name: EpochMeganiumOne
cobblemon.species.epochmeganiumone.desc: This Pokemon is able to redirect electrical attacks using the circular field around its neck or absorb it to empower itself.
cobblemon.species.epochcyndaquilone.name: EpochCyndaquilOne
cobblemon.species.epochcyndaquilone.desc: Because of this Pokemon's small stature, it tries to keep a low profile. If it is startled, the ice on its back glistens brightly.
cobblemon.species.epochquilavaone.name: EpochQuilavaOne
cobblemon.species.epochquilavaone.desc: It can curl into a ball such that it is able to present itself as a natural formation of ice crystals.
cobblemon.species.epochtyphlosionone.des: The crystal on its body is hardened to be almost as tough as diamonds.
cobblemon.species.epochtotodileone.name: EpochTotodileOne
cobblemon.species.epochtotodileone.desc: It is said that this Pokemon abounds in the underworld and its fire is from an ethereal plane.
cobblemon.species.epochcroconawone.name: EpochCroconawOne
cobblemon.species.epochcroconawone.desc: It is unclear if the flame on its back is really fire, or a malicious force that has manifested.
cobblemon.species.epochferaligatrone.des: When the fire on its body flares, you can distinctly hear wailing noises.
cobblemon.species.epochsteelix.name: EpochSteelix
cobblemon.species.epochsteelix.desc: It has mastered the power of the ice around it that it can materialize large ice projectiles and launch them at its foes.
cobblemon.species.epochslugma.name: EpochSlugma
cobblemon.species.epochslugma.desc: It is a species of Pokémon that lives and feeds in areas full of toxic waste. It can ooze into multiple several autonomous parts, albeit slowly.
cobblemon.species.epochmagcargo.name: EpochMagcargo
cobblemon.species.epochmagcargo.desc: The shell on its back is made of discarded material that it has absorbed into its skin while feeding. Its greatest threat is its ability to multiply.
cobblemon.species.epochnatu.name: EpochNatu
cobblemon.species.epochnatu.desc: Aerial Tactical Unit, Model N, or N-ATU. is used by espionage and military for small surveillance and reconnaissance missions.
cobblemon.species.epochxatu.name: EpochXatu
cobblemon.species.epochxatu.desc: Far deadlier than Model N, Model X-ATU is an offensive drone, capable of carrying multiple payloads used for destroying remote bases from a distance.
cobblemon.species.epochspinarak.name: EpochSpinarak
cobblemon.species.epochspinarak.desc: It can spin elaborate webs with different pictures in the webs. It uses these pictures to attract prey where it traps them and then allows them to be consumed.
cobblemon.species.epochariados.name: EpochAriados
cobblemon.species.epochariados.desc: Its most terrifying quality is its ability to vanish into darkness and surprise its foe by sinking its poisonous fangs into its target.
cobblemon.species.epochstantler.name: EpochStantler
cobblemon.species.epochstantler.desc: Various berries form a key element of a Stantler's diet. They enjoy them so much that their antlers grow some of their own during the autumn season.
cobblemon.species.epochledyba.name: EpochLedyba
cobblemon.species.epochledyba.desc: Due to their small size and bug-like appearance, they are often used by spy agencies to remotely observe targets or persons of interest.
cobblemon.species.epochledian.name: EpochLedian
cobblemon.species.epochledian.desc: When discovered, they can beat its wings to emit a high-frequency screeching noise to deafen and distract to allow it enough time to escape.
cobblemon.species.epochgligar.name: EpochGligar
cobblemon.species.epochgligar.desc: It can enter into a state of perfect stillness that it can fool people into thinking it is really a statue.
cobblemon.species.epochsudowoodo.name: EpochSudowoodo
cobblemon.species.epochsudowoodo.desc: It masquerades as a cactus and its thorns can pierce skin with just the smallest poke.
cobblemon.species.epochhoothoot.name: EpochHoothoot
cobblemon.species.epochhoothoot.desc: Found most often in wintry climates, it keeps itself warm with its lunar aura it emits rather than its feathers.
cobblemon.species.epochnoctowl.name: EpochNoctowl
cobblemon.species.epochnoctowl.desc: It uses its psychic powers to replicate the auroras that can be seen in northern areas of the Orion Region.
cobblemon.species.epochelekid.name: EpochElekid
cobblemon.species.epochelekid.desc: Its antennae hum when a predator is nearby. Its natural inclination is to fight the predator rather than flee.
cobblemon.species.epochmagby.name: EpochMagby
cobblemon.species.epochmagby.desc: It can often be found swimming about near glaciers and melting ice caps. It is able to dive deep into the ocean floor.
cobblemon.species.epochlarvitar.name: EpochLarvitar
cobblemon.species.epochlarvitar.desc: It is frequently posted as sentries around high-security zones. It uses a mix of antennae and sonar signals to reveal hidden enemies.
cobblemon.species.epochpupitar.name: EpochPupitar
cobblemon.species.epochpupitar.desc: When it gets angry, it starts to overheat. Its inventor anticipated the need to create several exhaust vents to provide it ample avenues to let off heat.
cobblemon.species.epochtyranitar.name: EpochTyranitar
cobblemon.species.epochtyranitar.desc: It moves slowly and finds it difficult to navigate due to its reinforced steel plating. Its shielding is almost impenetrable.
cobblemon.species.epochmareep.name: EpochMareep
cobblemon.species.epochmareep.desc: Its wool actually makes it weigh less overall eventually allowing it to become airborne.
cobblemon.species.epochflaaffy.name: EpochFlaaffy
cobblemon.species.epochflaaffy.desc: Its wool is made of cotton candy. It is said that if you eat some, it will give you wings.
cobblemon.species.epochampharos.name: EpochAmpharos
cobblemon.species.epochampharos.desc: Its wings are also made of cotton candy, and will often give passengers some of them to cheer them up.
cobblemon.species.epochheracross.name: EpochHeracross
cobblemon.species.epochheracross.desc: During mating season, the more shapelier one's ball of dung is, the more impressive it is to potential mates.
cobblemon.species.epochteddiursa.name: EpochTeddiursa
cobblemon.species.epochteddiursa.desc: The degree of transparency in its body follows the lunar cycle. During full moons, it is fully corporeal while during new moons, it is fully ethereal.
cobblemon.species.epochursaring.name: EpochUrsaring
cobblemon.species.epochursaring.desc: It is said that when this Pokemon passes away, its body rejoins the cosmos as a new star.
cobblemon.species.epochespeon.name: EpochEspeon
cobblemon.species.epochespeon.desc: Its tail is drenched in highly corrosive poison, and it is unable to control when to poison anyone that touches it, rendering it untouchable to many.
cobblemon.species.epochumbreon.name: EpochUmbreon
cobblemon.species.epochumbreon.desc: It has been trained as a vigilante and seeks out justice for those that have been subjected to cruelty or misfortune at the hands of others.
cobblemon.species.epochaipom.name: EpochAipom
cobblemon.species.epochaipom.desc: Despite the appearance of being asleep, its psychic powers allow it to behave and function perfectly normally.
cobblemon.species.epochslowking.name: EpochSlowking
cobblemon.species.epochslowking.desc: The bees that inhabit the hive on its head have actually crowned this Pokemon as their royalty. An added benefit is that it always has honey within reach.
cobblemon.species.epochbellossom.name: EpochBellossom
cobblemon.species.epochbellossom.desc: During the lunar cycle, they come out at night to dance in groups and sing in harmony as a sort of ritual to the moon.
cobblemon.species.epochsunkern.name: EpochSunkern
cobblemon.species.epochsunkern.desc: It is a toss-up whether the Sunkern will sprout and grow into a Sunflora or whether the fire it emits will consume it.
cobblemon.species.epochsunflora.name: EpochSunflora
cobblemon.species.epochsunflora.desc: It has matured to be able to control the flame it emits, to prevent it from consuming itself.
cobblemon.species.epochkingdra.name: EpochKingdra
cobblemon.species.epochkingdra.desc: The light emitted by their tail fins change based on the temperature of the water in which they are swimming.
cobblemon.species.epochchinchou.name: EpochChinchou
cobblemon.species.epochchinchou.desc: It is found in the darkest waters even if they are not very deep. The light source they emit are often helpful to other species within the ecosystem.
cobblemon.species.epochlanturn.name: EpochLanturn
cobblemon.species.epochlanturn.desc: This Pokémon is often found in deep waters due to its size. They emit light sources as a means of finding food at the bottom of the body of water they inhabit.
cobblemon.species.epochmarill.name: EpochMarill
cobblemon.species.epochmarill.desc: As it has continued to be punched, its seams have started to come undone that the material it is made from has started to poke through.
cobblemon.species.epochazumarill.name: EpochAzumarill
cobblemon.species.epochazumarill.desc: It has become fed up with taking hits from others and is now ready to return in kind. The hits it has taken has made it stronger.
cobblemon.species.epochdunsparce.name: EpochDunsparce
cobblemon.species.epochdunsparce.desc: Its strategy is to perpetually find hosts, infest them, and siphon energy to strengthen itself and then move onto the next host and continue the cycle.
cobblemon.species.epochcorsola.name: EpochCorsola
cobblemon.species.epochcorsola.desc: The waste that humans create eventually end up making its way to oceans and open seas, where the marine life such as Corsola have to pay the price.
cobblemon.species.epochmantine.name: EpochMantine
cobblemon.species.epochmantine.desc: The faster it swims, the more electrical current it gathers. It can then channel the electrical current it has accumulated and shoot it like a projectile.
cobblemon.species.epochmurkrow.name: EpochMurkrow
cobblemon.species.epochmurkrow.desc: It is not clear where it found the leaf that it constantly chews on, but if you attempt to take it from the Murkrow, it will peck you relentlessly.
cobblemon.species.epochblissey.name: EpochBlissey
cobblemon.species.epochblissey.desc: The inventor of the B.L.I.S.S.E.Y allegedly installed a Terminator mode but its not clear how to trigger this mode.
cobblemon.species.epochpichu.name: EpochPichu
cobblemon.species.epochpichu.desc: It often gets lost because it is too busy listening to its music to take note of its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.epochigglybuff.name: EpochIgglybuff
cobblemon.species.epochigglybuff.desc: This Pokemon can manifest wherever water can be found... from the depths of the ocean, to a kitchen sink. They are very small in size so almost unnoticeable.
cobblemon.species.epochswinub.name: EpochSwinub
cobblemon.species.epochswinub.desc: Rubbing its fur first can make you give off static electricity.
cobblemon.species.epochpiloswine.name: EpochPiloswine
cobblemon.species.epochpiloswine.desc: Its fur is exceptionally warm and are often found in rocky areas where they graze on small grassy patches.
cobblemon.species.epochphanpy.name: EpochPhanpy
cobblemon.species.epochphanpy.desc: This Pokemon likes to curl into a ball and toboggan down snowy hills in races against others of its herd.
cobblemon.species.epochdonphan.name: EpochDonphan
cobblemon.species.epochdonphan.desc: Their woolly coat is highly sought after in the fashion world, but this has driven them to the point of near extinction because of irresponsible poachers.
cobblemon.species.epochsmeargle.name: EpochSmeargle
cobblemon.species.epochsmeargle.desc: It is often found in alleyways or urban centres experimenting with different art styles. It is considered a nuisance by local authorities.
cobblemon.species.epochslugmaone.name: EpochSlugmaOne
cobblemon.species.epochslugmaone.desc: This Pokemon is very small and found along the sea floor or in small ponds. It will suck up dead algae that have fallen to the bottom of the sea floor as food.
cobblemon.species.epochmagcargoone.name: EpochMagcargoOne
cobblemon.species.epochmagcargoone.desc: Apparently, the slime that this Pokemon oozes can create some serious hallucinations. People often use it as an inexpensive way of getting high.
cobblemon.species.epochstantlerone.name: EpochStantlerOne
cobblemon.species.epochstantlerone.desc: It is constantly channeling an electrical current between the two nodes on its head, even when it is asleep.
cobblemon.species.epochsmoochum.name: EpochSmoochum
cobblemon.species.epochsmoochum.desc: Its voice cracks easily when it tries to reach high notes. It is still training its voice but it has a long way to go.
cobblemon.species.epochyanma.name: EpochYanma
cobblemon.species.epochyanma.desc: You know you can find them when you hear a loud, persistent buzzing noise in swampy areas.
cobblemon.species.epochyanmaone.name: EpochYanmaOne
cobblemon.species.epochyanmaone.desc: This Pokemon is made of a fine aluminum alloy. If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.
cobblemon.species.epochremoraid.name: EpochRemoraid
cobblemon.species.epochremoraid.desc: This Pokemon can zip around in water because it is able to use the electrical energy it generates to give it a speed boost.
cobblemon.species.epochoctillery.name: EpochOctillery
cobblemon.species.epochoctillery.desc: This Pokemon is able to latch on to prey and use its electrically charged tentacles to electrocute its prey into submission.
cobblemon.species.epochmisdreavus.name: EpochMisdreavus
cobblemon.species.epochmisdreavus.desc: This Pokemon is able to sing heavenly choirs. Once you have heard its refrains, you feel more pure.
cobblemon.species.epochpolitoed.name: EpochPolitoed
cobblemon.species.epochpolitoed.desc: Politoed wields the legendary sword, Masamune. It seeks to avenge its fallen comrade by defeating Lucario.
cobblemon.species.epochtyrogue.name: EpochTyrogue
cobblemon.species.epochtyrogue.desc: This Pokemon is said to be the alter-ego and secret identity of a famous superhero...
cobblemon.species.epochhitmontop.name: EpochHitmontop
cobblemon.species.epochhitmontop.desc: This Pokemon is a superhero that has the ability to throw bolts of lightning with a bow.
cobblemon.species.epochscizor.name: EpochScizor
cobblemon.species.epochscizor.desc: Developed in an underground lab, this Pokemon has offensive power, but development was rushed as it is prone to overheating.
cobblemon.species.epochmurkrowone.name: EpochMurkrowOne
cobblemon.species.epochmurkrowone.desc: They are often used as familiars to wizards so they pick up a fair bit of magical skill by themselves from their wizard masters.
cobblemon.species.epochcleffa.name: EpochCleffa
cobblemon.species.epochcleffa.desc: They are very small and often confused with ordinary butterflies. They are responsible for casting certain enchantments in forests.
cobblemon.species.epochhoundour.name: EpochHoundour
cobblemon.species.epochhoundour.desc: It was a noble animal in life, and the best friend that humans can have. What? Can you not see its halo?
cobblemon.species.epochhoundoom.name: EpochHoundoom
cobblemon.species.epochhoundoom.desc: It is said that man's best friend will meet you in heaven when it passes on. It's actually quite a tragic story.
cobblemon.species.epochsneasel.name: EpochSneasel
cobblemon.species.epochsneasel.desc: A Sneasel adorns its face with face painting in hunting parties to appear more threatening. In groups, they can quickly surround and overwhelm their prey.
cobblemon.species.epochmiltank.name: EpochMiltank
cobblemon.species.epochmiltank.desc: It is often raised by farmers to produce highly nutritious milk. It sometimes has a bad habit of grazing on the wreath that grows on its neck.
cobblemon.species.epochswinubone.name: EpochSwinubOne
cobblemon.species.epochswinubone.desc: If you must pet this Pokemon, it prefers that the leaves on its head are scratched versus being rubbed on its belly.
cobblemon.species.epochpiloswineone.name: EpochPiloswineOne
cobblemon.species.epochpiloswineone.desc: When grazing, it can keep perfectly still that it is often mistaken as a hedge or a small bush.
cobblemon.species.epochporygon2.name: EpochPorygon2
cobblemon.species.epochporygon2.desc: Once it is able to access a computer, it can quickly spread across other connected systems. It lies in wait to sabotage at the right moment.
cobblemon.species.epochwooper.name: EpochWooper
cobblemon.species.epochwooper.desc: This Pokemon is viewed as a lucky charm. It tends to play near geysers and can sense when they are about to erupt.
cobblemon.species.epochquagsire.name: EpochQuagsire
cobblemon.species.epochquagsire.desc: This Pokemon is viewed as very wise in folk tales, but in reality, it actually has very low intelligence.
cobblemon.species.epochdelibird.name: EpochDelibird
cobblemon.species.epochdelibird.desc: The log that you commonly find them sleeping on is actually their tail. Despite their size they can swing it very adeptly in battle.
cobblemon.species.epochhoppip.name: EpochHoppip
cobblemon.species.epochhoppip.desc: When it blows around in the wind, it is able to attract and collect snowflakes to its body eventually creating a small trail.
cobblemon.species.epochskiploom.name: EpochSkiploom
cobblemon.species.epochskiploom.desc: When the snowflakes it attracts accumulates in size, Skiploom are able to make them almost orbit around its body when it chimes.
cobblemon.species.epochjumpluff.name: EpochJumpluff
cobblemon.species.epochjumpluff.desc: During particularly fierce winter storms, when the wind blows, it is able to channel that breeze into a pleasant melody.
cobblemon.species.epochkingdraone.name: EpochKingdraOne
cobblemon.species.epochkingdraone.desc: When it flaps its wings, it is able to pollinate an entire field of flowers all at once, as such they are often used to repair damage ecosystems.
cobblemon.species.epochpineco.name: EpochPineco
cobblemon.species.epochpineco.desc: Miners need to be careful not to hit a Pineco as precious ores and gems are often found encrusted in the rocky surface of its skin.
cobblemon.species.epochforretress.name: EpochForretress
cobblemon.species.epochforretress.desc: When you see a collection of precious minerals encrusted in the surface of the cave, it is a tell-tale sign that it is really a Forretress.
cobblemon.species.epochhoothootone.name: EpochHoothootOne
cobblemon.species.epochhoothootone.desc: It is able to tilt its head 270 degrees. It uses this as a means of being able to scan its full surroundings.
cobblemon.species.epochnoctowlone.name: EpochNoctowlOne
cobblemon.species.epochnoctowlone.desc: Its eyes are trained to be able to easily see through snow storms and strong blizzards.
cobblemon.species.epochhoppipone.name: EpochHoppipOne
cobblemon.species.epochhoppipone.desc: Due to its small stature, a light gust is usually enough to blow it away.
cobblemon.species.epochskiploomone.name: EpochSkiploomOne
cobblemon.species.epochskiploomone.desc: When it is eating, the lights on its antenna flicker periodically.
cobblemon.species.epochjumpluffone.name: EpochJumpluffOne
cobblemon.species.epochjumpluffone.desc: It is able to produce its own light source significant enough that it does not need to chase other lights like other moth Pokemon do.
cobblemon.species.epochskarmory.name: EpochSkarmory
cobblemon.species.epochskarmory.desc: A Pokémon that has wings made of jagged rocks. While it is unable to fly, these wings give it an aerodynamic boost, allowing it to run very fast.
cobblemon.species.epochsentret.name: EpochSentret
cobblemon.species.epochsentret.desc: It stalks the roadway where it was killed in hopes of exacting its vengeance on the motorist that took its life.
cobblemon.species.epochfurret.name: EpochFurret
cobblemon.species.epochfurret.desc: It is decaying such that it exhibits a foul odour and has managed to attract flies that constantly hover around it.
cobblemon.species.epochcrobat.name: EpochCrobat
cobblemon.species.epochcrobat.desc: The edges of its wings are as sharp as steel and when it dives headfirst after reaching maximum velocity, it is capable of slicing its target clean in half.
cobblemon.species.epochtreecko.name: EpochTreecko
cobblemon.species.epochtreecko.desc: It is able to lay perfectly still for hours and blend into the environment. It lies in wait until its prey steps upon its trap and then handily disposes of its foe.
cobblemon.species.epochgrovyle.name: EpochGrovyle
cobblemon.species.epochgrovyle.desc: It has a long tongue that it uses to quickly swallow up smaller insects and has the ability to fan the spikes on its body out at predators.
cobblemon.species.epochsceptile.name: EpochSceptile
cobblemon.species.epochsceptile.desc: It is able to shimmer its tail in a rhythmic pattern to distract foes. During the night time, its compound eyes allow it to increase its vision range.
cobblemon.species.epochmudkip.name: EpochMudkip
cobblemon.species.epochmudkip.desc: The surface of its skin is exceptionally hot and unstable. It periodically gives off bursts of energy so it is not recommended to pet it.
cobblemon.species.epochmarshtomp.name: EpochMarshtomp
cobblemon.species.epochmarshtomp.desc: The flares that come off the surface of its head resemble ears but it is actually just a very unstable part of its body that is constantly combusting.
cobblemon.species.epochswampert.name: EpochSwampert
cobblemon.species.epochswampert.desc: There are massive bursts of energy that are constantly flaring on this its skin, which makes it very irritable and very aggressive.
cobblemon.species.epochmudkipone.name: EpochMudkipOne
cobblemon.species.epochmudkipone.desc: It has very precious crystals encrusted in its skin. As it is the weakest of its evolutionary line, poachers often hunt these Pokemon first.
cobblemon.species.epochmarshtompone.name: EpochMarshtompOne
cobblemon.species.epochmarshtompone.desc: When deep in a cave, if you see a light where you don not know where its source is coming from, it is likely from a T.Marshtomp.
cobblemon.species.epochswampertone.name: EpochSwampertOne
cobblemon.species.epochswampertone.desc: It can send a barrage of jagged crystals at its enemies if sent into a rage.
cobblemon.species.epochwailmer.name: EpochWailmer
cobblemon.species.epochwailmer.desc: It was young and defenseless when it was killed by poachers. Now it roams the seas, always crying out in anguish as it relives its pain.
cobblemon.species.epochwailord.name: EpochWailord
cobblemon.species.epochwailord.desc: Its body has started to decompose, exuding a foul odour which betrays its ability to hunt down the poachers that killed it and seek vengeance.
cobblemon.species.epochnosepass.name: EpochNosepass
cobblemon.species.epochnosepass.desc: It travels in small hunting parties and use shrill voices to signal when it finds trouble. They mutter to each other in unintelligible growls.
cobblemon.species.epochgulpin.name: EpochGulpin
cobblemon.species.epochgulpin.desc: This Pokémon's small stature and colour allows it to camoflage in desert environments to protect itself from predators.
cobblemon.species.epochswalot.name: EpochSwalot
cobblemon.species.epochswalot.desc: It is much larger than it appears. That is because it can disperse and consume the sand around it to grow in mass.
cobblemon.species.epochbaltoy.name: EpochBaltoy
cobblemon.species.epochbaltoy.desc: It is jointly powered by both an electrical current and its psychic potential. It emanates an aura of psychic prowess.
cobblemon.species.epochclaydol.name: EpochClaydol
cobblemon.species.epochclaydol.desc: Because it is able to detach itself using its psychic powers, but still control its limbs, it is able to mitigate damage to it and use surprise attacks.
cobblemon.species.epochlunatone.name: EpochLunatone
cobblemon.species.epochlunatone.desc: It is said to have come from a comet that breached the Earth's atmosphere. It emits a powerful frozen aura when it senses danger.
cobblemon.species.epochsolrock.name: EpochSolrock
cobblemon.species.epochsolrock.desc: It was formed in the heart of a volcano. It emanates a flame aura that can scorch anyone that wanders nearby.
cobblemon.species.epochshroomish.name: EpochShroomish
cobblemon.species.epochshroomish.desc: It was used in civil wars and planted in the jungle where rebels would hide. Due to its unsuspecting appearance, many rebels would step on them and set off the mine.
cobblemon.species.epochbreloom.name: EpochBreloom
cobblemon.species.epochbreloom.desc: It is frequently used as security because when intruders are identified, it emits a loud screeching noise.
cobblemon.species.epochcarvanha.name: EpochCarvanha
cobblemon.species.epochcarvanha.desc: It is capable of breaking the speed of sound quite easily. It is able to dodge and evade enemy missiles easily.
cobblemon.species.epochsharpedo.name: EpochSharpedo
cobblemon.species.epochsharpedo.desc: It is capable of close combat or attacking from afar. It depends on the commander's purpose and whether the Pokemon is expendable or not.
cobblemon.species.epochsnorunt.name: EpochSnorunt
cobblemon.species.epochsnorunt.desc: It is found in large numbers in tombs and crypts. They will often remain motionless and then mass attack grave robbers.
cobblemon.species.epochglalie.name: EpochGlalie
cobblemon.species.epochglalie.desc: It gets incredibly agitated when it is confused for a rock.
cobblemon.species.epochsableye.name: EpochSableye
cobblemon.species.epochsableye.desc: It lives in volcanic environments. The hotter the environment, the more at home it feels.
cobblemon.species.epochswablu.name: EpochSwablu
cobblemon.species.epochswablu.desc: After flying through sulfuric clouds, it slowly became infected with them, which has made it sluggish when flying.
cobblemon.species.epochaltaria.name: EpochAltaria
cobblemon.species.epochaltaria.desc: It is a mystery whether it is the cause of the pollution or just happens to have absorbed the pollution within its habitat.
cobblemon.species.epochduskull.name: EpochDuskull
cobblemon.species.epochduskull.desc: The flame that burns in its soul is enough to absorb the life force of anyone that wanders too close to it.
cobblemon.species.epochdusclops.name: EpochDusclops
cobblemon.species.epochdusclops.desc: It is said that anyone that manages to touch its eye will be maimed with third degree burns.
cobblemon.species.epocharon.name: EpochAron
cobblemon.species.epocharon.desc: It is capable of burrowing deep underground and building large, sprawling nests where they breed and can quickly spread.
cobblemon.species.epochlairon.name: EpochLairon
cobblemon.species.epochlairon.desc: It works co-operatively in well-defined colonies with each unit reprising a unique role towards the construction, defense or sustainment of the colony.
cobblemon.species.epochaggron.name: EpochAggron
cobblemon.species.epochaggron.desc: When the previous lair king passes on, two Lairons fight each other to assert dominance. The winner evolves and becomes king of the lair.
cobblemon.species.epochwurmple.name: EpochWurmple
cobblemon.species.epochwurmple.desc: It is able to telepathically sense small insects that it can feed on making its ability to hunt for prey very easy.
cobblemon.species.epochsilcoon.name: EpochSilcoon
cobblemon.species.epochsilcoon.desc: While it is in the cocoon stage, it uses its budding psychic powers to camouflage itself from predators.
cobblemon.species.epochbeautifly.name: EpochBeautifly
cobblemon.species.epochbeautifly.desc: It spreads colourful dust all about from its wings and can use its psychic powers to form dazzling imagery to impress potential mates.
cobblemon.species.epochwurmpleone.name: EpochWurmpleOne
cobblemon.species.epochwurmpleone.desc: Its carapace allows it to shelter from cold temperatures so it is often found in snowy forests and tundras.
cobblemon.species.epochcascoon.name: EpochCascoon
cobblemon.species.epochcascoon.desc: During its cocoon stage, one of its strategies is to stay perfectly still to blend into snow and avoid predators until it evolves.
cobblemon.species.epochdustox.name: EpochDustox
cobblemon.species.epochdustox.desc: It flutters its wings to scatter snowflakes when attacked to blind its foe and make its escape.
cobblemon.species.epochfeebas.name: EpochFeebas
cobblemon.species.epochfeebas.desc: Although unattractive and unpopular, its marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.
cobblemon.species.epochmilotic.name: EpochMilotic
cobblemon.species.epochmilotic.desc: Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokémon of all.
cobblemon.species.epochseedot.name: EpochSeedot
cobblemon.species.epochseedot.desc: They hunt in small groups as their small stature allows them to go unnoticed until it is too late when they are able to quickly outnumber their prey.
cobblemon.species.epochnuzleaf.name: EpochNuzleaf
cobblemon.species.epochnuzleaf.desc: The torch it holds is precious to it. When it evolves from a Seedot, it finds and bonds with a torch and treats it as an extension of its body.
cobblemon.species.epochshiftry.name: EpochShiftry
cobblemon.species.epochshiftry.desc: It is feared by rangers because an upset Shiftry is able to create bushfires simply by fiercely fanning its leaf arms together.
cobblemon.species.epochralts.name: EpochRalts
cobblemon.species.epochralts.desc: It tries to keep to itself and stays in secluded environments away from other people because of trust issues.
cobblemon.species.epochkirlia.name: EpochKirlia
cobblemon.species.epochkirlia.desc: It can channel its negative emotions into its attacks adding a level of intensity that would otherwise not be present.
cobblemon.species.epochgardevoir.name: EpochGardevoir
cobblemon.species.epochgardevoir.desc: It has managed to overcome its insecurities and triumph over those who attempted to suppress or belittle it when it was in its earlier stages.
cobblemon.species.epochnumel.name: EpochNumel
cobblemon.species.epochnumel.desc: When it is happy, it can trigger a fountain of steam to come out from the pool on its back.
cobblemon.species.epochcamerupt.name: EpochCamerupt
cobblemon.species.epochcamerupt.desc: Due to the reservoir on its back, it is able to endure for long periods without water. Consequently, it is often used as a beast of burden.
cobblemon.species.epochazurill.name: EpochAzurill
cobblemon.species.epochazurill.desc: It is surprisingly resilient and can take a lot of punishment because of the foam material it is made from.
cobblemon.species.epochpoochyena.name: EpochPoochyena
cobblemon.species.epochpoochyena.desc: It is a scavenger on tundras and open snowy fields. Its fur blends well into its environment that it seemingly shows up out of no where because of its agility.
cobblemon.species.epochmightyena.name: EpochMightyena
cobblemon.species.epochmightyena.desc: It acts as an alpha for a pack of other smaller Poochyena. It can coordinate and direct small hunting groups to close in on weaker prey like Stantler.
cobblemon.species.epochabsol.name: EpochAbsol
cobblemon.species.epochabsol.desc: Its speed is unparalleled, that rumours have begun to swirl that it is actually a favoured pet or messenger of the Gods.
cobblemon.species.epochbeldum.name: EpochBeldum
cobblemon.species.epochbeldum.desc: It is said to be an alien inhabiting an interstellar object that crash landed in the Orion Region.
cobblemon.species.epochmetang.name: EpochMetang
cobblemon.species.epochmetang.desc: It was sent to the Orion Region to adapt, evolve and study the local population. It transmits knowledge to its interstellar owner seamlessly.
cobblemon.species.epochmetagross.name: EpochMetagross
cobblemon.species.epochmetagross.desc: As it has studied its surroundings, it has gradually adapted its form into a format that has a 98.6% chance of success in battle.
cobblemon.species.epochmeditite.name: EpochMeditite
cobblemon.species.epochmeditite.desc: It is found in mountainous areas as it believes that by enduring harsh climates and adversity, it can find true salvation and inner peace.
cobblemon.species.epochmedicham.name: EpochMedicham
cobblemon.species.epochmedicham.desc: Its dedication to a balanced diet, meditation, and sacrifice has allowed it to manifest power in the metaphysical realm.
cobblemon.species.epochnincada.name: EpochNincada
cobblemon.species.epochnincada.desc: It harbours two conflicting energies deep within its body, that are in constant battle with one another, vying for escape.
cobblemon.species.epochninjask.name: EpochNinjask
cobblemon.species.epochninjask.desc: It represents a demonic energy that was condemned to Nincada's shell. Following its evolution, it was able to manifest in its true form.
cobblemon.species.epochshedinja.name: EpochShedinja
cobblemon.species.epochshedinja.desc: It represents the vacant shell of the Nincada that was left behind following the release of the cursed energy within it that eventually became a Ninjask.
cobblemon.species.epochlileep.name: EpochLileep
cobblemon.species.epochlileep.desc: This Pokémon can be restored from a fossil. It is said that the centrifugal force it was able to generate allowed it to become airborne.
cobblemon.species.epochcradily.name: EpochCradily
cobblemon.species.epochcradily.desc: When it is in danger, it is able to use the gale force winds it can create to blow away potential predators, discouraging them from chasing it.
cobblemon.species.epochcacnea.name: EpochCacnea
cobblemon.species.epochcacnea.desc: There is a story for small children that says that Cacnea came to life when a child gave it a carrot for a nose.
cobblemon.species.epochcacturne.name: EpochCacturne
cobblemon.species.epochcacturne.desc: It is constantly at risk of turning into a lifeless object if the carrot is removed from its nose, so it is very protective of it.
cobblemon.species.epochtaillow.name: EpochTaillow
cobblemon.species.epochtaillow.desc: They are considered pests by many urban dwellers as they often perch themselves on the rooftops or balconies of tall urban buildings.
cobblemon.species.epochswellow.name: EpochSwellow
cobblemon.species.epochswellow.desc: It is able to produce a laugh that resembles a cackle. It often harasses urban dwellers and then will retreat back to their perches on tall buildings.
cobblemon.species.epochspheal.name: EpochSpheal
cobblemon.species.epochspheal.desc: This Pokémon's body is covered in blubber and is impressively round. Despite its tuft of hair, it's faster for Spheal to roll around than walk.
cobblemon.species.epochsealeo.name: EpochSealeo
cobblemon.species.epochsealeo.desc: This Pokémon enjoys having its mane brushed and will happily clap when you play with its ears.
cobblemon.species.epochwalrein.name: EpochWalrein
cobblemon.species.epochwalrein.desc: Walrein's tusks are incredibly valued by poachers. However, they are very aggressive and poachers do not find the hunt for these Pokemon's tusks easy.
cobblemon.species.epochsurskit.name: EpochSurskit
cobblemon.species.epochsurskit.desc: It is often found hovering around ponds and large reeds so that it can surprise other water-dwelling Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochmasquerain.name: EpochMasquerain
cobblemon.species.epochmasquerain.desc: In the absence of any strong winds, it flies closely to the surface of water to create shimmers that travel throughout the body of water.
cobblemon.species.epochwingull.name: EpochWingull
cobblemon.species.epochwingull.desc: It frequents beaches and steals food from vacationers. Allegedly, they have a cove somewhere where they hoard all of their finds.
cobblemon.species.epochpelipper.name: EpochPelipper
cobblemon.species.epochpelipper.desc: It often travels with groups of Wingull as their quasi-leader. They are highly organized and can order the Wingulls to attack in unison.
cobblemon.species.epochelectrike.name: EpochElectrike
cobblemon.species.epochelectrike.desc: It wears a skull of an animal it scavenged as a sort of trophy to protect itself. No one has actually seen what it looks like under the skull.
cobblemon.species.epochmanectric.name: EpochManectric
cobblemon.species.epochmanectric.desc: When it evolved, the skull it scavenged as an Electrike became a part of its features, that they can no longer be independently removed.
cobblemon.species.epochtorkoal.name: EpochTorkoal
cobblemon.species.epochtorkoal.desc: Despite being a storm cloud, it is often found hovering around high altitude environments such as mountainous regions.
cobblemon.species.epochroselia.name: EpochRoselia
cobblemon.species.epochroselia.desc: It can execute moves and dances with eloquence that invokes confidence and inspiration among those privileged to watch it fight.
cobblemon.species.epochabsolone.name: EpochAbsolOne
cobblemon.species.epochabsolone.desc: Rumour has it that this Pokemon is able to see the future and uses it for combat superiority.
cobblemon.species.epochsableyeone.name: EpochSableyeOne
cobblemon.species.epochsableyeone.desc: This Pokémon scrounges on dead algae on the sea floor or in dark underwater caves because it is incapable of hunting well for itself.
cobblemon.species.epochswabluone.name: EpochSwabluOne
cobblemon.species.epochswabluone.desc: When these Pokemon giggle, it will create a nearby thunderclap, so whatever you do, do not tickle them!
cobblemon.species.epochaltariaone.name: EpochAltariaOne
cobblemon.species.epochaltariaone.desc: These Altaria fly into stormy clouds to attract lightning as a means of healing themselves and boosting their own power.
cobblemon.species.epochsurskitone.name: EpochSurskitOne
cobblemon.species.epochsurskitone.desc: It masks itself as a seed of a larger fruit but it is actually a scavenger that likes to eat a lot of that fruit.
cobblemon.species.epochmasquerainone.des: The leaves on its wings remain as an autumn colour, regardless of the season.
cobblemon.species.epochclamperl.name: EpochClamperl
cobblemon.species.epochclamperl.desc: This Pokemon is in a perpetual state of fear that it has sealed itself off in a psychic bubble. It is terrified of bugs and of the darkness in particular.
cobblemon.species.epochhuntail.name: EpochHuntail
cobblemon.species.epochhuntail.desc: This Pokemon lives in the abyssal depths of the ocean; put your hand too close to its mouth and you risk losing it.
cobblemon.species.epochgorebyss.name: EpochGorebyss
cobblemon.species.epochgorebyss.desc: This pokemon lives in vast schools consisting of thousands of members. It is the common prey of Wailmer and Wailord.
cobblemon.species.epochskittyone.name: EpochSkittyOne
cobblemon.species.epochskittyone.desc: A T. Skitty is very protective of the weed on its tail. It is rumoured that if a strong breeze blows it away, the Skitty will also perish.
cobblemon.species.epochdelcattyone.name: EpochDelcattyOne
cobblemon.species.epochdelcattyone.desc: While the weed always remains aesthetically pleasing, larger ones can start to slow down and cause back problems for certain older T. Delcatties.
cobblemon.species.epochnumelone.name: EpochNumelOne
cobblemon.species.epochnumelone.desc: Its breath can crystallize the air around it into snowflakes.
cobblemon.species.epochcameruptone.name: EpochCameruptOne
cobblemon.species.epochcameruptone.desc: The mountain on its back is able to create small localized snow squalls that make it snow around it.
cobblemon.species.epochzigzagoon.name: EpochZigzagoon
cobblemon.species.epochzigzagoon.desc: Zigzagoons are ordinarily not strong enough to hunt by themselves and instead feast on what is discarded by stronger predators in their habitat.
cobblemon.species.epochlinoone.name: EpochLinoone
cobblemon.species.epochlinoone.desc: The spots that form on its skin are from its poor dietary choices it made as a Zigzagoon.
cobblemon.species.epochtrapinch.name: EpochTrapinch
cobblemon.species.epochtrapinch.desc: It allows the small snow structure on its nose act as a trap. When potential prey approach, it will quickly snap at them.
cobblemon.species.epochvibrava.name: EpochVibrava
cobblemon.species.epochvibrava.desc: It frequently comes out in the early morning to feast on the bugs and other small critters that come out from the snow.
cobblemon.species.epochflygon.name: EpochFlygon
cobblemon.species.epochflygon.desc: This Pokémon hides in the heart of blizzards it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.
cobblemon.species.epochshuppet.name: EpochShuppet
cobblemon.species.epochshuppet.desc: This Pokemon is used to cheer up sick children in hospitals, however, many children have developed a fear of them instead.
cobblemon.species.epochbanette.name: EpochBanette
cobblemon.species.epochbanette.desc: This Pokemon is used to produce entertainment for entitled royalty. It harbours a seething hatred for the court in which it performs.
cobblemon.species.epochwhismur.name: EpochWhismur
cobblemon.species.epochwhismur.desc: It just enjoys vibing. Nothing and no one will stop it from having a good time.
cobblemon.species.epochloudred.name: EpochLoudred
cobblemon.species.epochloudred.desc: This Pokemon is the life of the party. It can drop a sick beat and has better moves than most humans.
cobblemon.species.epochexploud.name: EpochExploud
cobblemon.species.epochexploud.desc: This Pokemon likes to constantly yell 'Turn down for what?!' for some reason.
cobblemon.species.epochcorphish.name: EpochCorphish
cobblemon.species.epochcorphish.desc: It congregates along beaches and show off by crushing progressively larger rocks in its pincers to attract potential mates.
cobblemon.species.epochcrawdaunt.name: EpochCrawdaunt
cobblemon.species.epochcrawdaunt.desc: It often groups in small bands along seashores and coves. In large enough groups, they are used to raid local fishing villages.
cobblemon.species.epochanorith.name: EpochAnorith
cobblemon.species.epochanorith.desc: Despite their small stature, the venom from its pincers were said to be able to incapacitate much larger predators.
cobblemon.species.epocharmaldo.name: EpochArmaldo
cobblemon.species.epocharmaldo.desc: In prehistoric times, Armaldo would use the boulders on their back to provide them with shelter from the scorching sun.
cobblemon.species.epochbagon.name: EpochBagon
cobblemon.species.epochbagon.desc: This Pokemon is a playful creature by nature, but it needs to be reined in because it can inadvertently start large fires if it gets up to too much trouble.
cobblemon.species.epochshelgon.name: EpochShelgon
cobblemon.species.epochshelgon.desc: The molten shell on its body should not be allowed to cool otherwise it will become significantly weighed down and immobilize it under the weight.
cobblemon.species.epochsalamence.name: EpochSalamence
cobblemon.species.epochsalamence.desc: It is rumoured that this is not even its final form, and it can transform into a much more fearsome multi-headed creature.
cobblemon.species.epochnosepassone.name: EpochNosepassOne
cobblemon.species.epochnosepassone.desc: It is often used as a portable light source but its stubby legs means it often needs to be carried around since it can't usually keep up with walking speed.
cobblemon.species.epochslakoth.name: EpochSlakoth
cobblemon.species.epochslakoth.desc: This Pokemon is said to hibernate throughout the year. It's not clear how this is possible.
cobblemon.species.epochvigoroth.name: EpochVigoroth
cobblemon.species.epochvigoroth.desc: When this Pokemon was first fed a Chople Berry, it said in response fam, this berry tastes low key sus af tho fr ong
cobblemon.species.epochslaking.name: EpochSlaking
cobblemon.species.epochslaking.desc: This Pokemon is quick to anger when it is awoken from its sleep or hungry. Many dare not to disturb it.
cobblemon.species.epochchimecho.name: EpochChimecho
cobblemon.species.epochchimecho.desc: It emits its electrical field whenever it meets a stranger to protect itself. It will only lower the field when it trusts that person.
cobblemon.species.epochroseliaone.name: EpochRoseliaOne
cobblemon.species.epochroseliaone.desc: The thorns on this Pokemon can cause very deep gashes. Even experienced florists need to be very careful when handling this Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochlotad.name: EpochLotad
cobblemon.species.epochlotad.desc: This Pokémon lives in deserts and masquerades as an ordinary cactus to hide from predators while is is still young.
cobblemon.species.epochlombre.name: EpochLombre
cobblemon.species.epochlombre.desc: This Pokemon thrives in intense sunlight. It retains fresh water so lost wanderers in the desert will typically ask it for water when they are thirsty.
cobblemon.species.epochludicolo.name: EpochLudicolo
cobblemon.species.epochludicolo.desc: This Pokemon can launch its barbs in a volley at an enemy when annoyed. Its happy-go-lucky attitude should not be taken for granted.
cobblemon.species.epochfeebasone.name: EpochFeebasOne
cobblemon.species.epochfeebasone.desc: This Pokemon enjoys frolicking in hot lava, as a result, its population has grown significantly because it has no natural predators in this habitat.
cobblemon.species.epochmiloticone.name: EpochMiloticOne
cobblemon.species.epochmiloticone.desc: This Pokemon tends to attract lava to its skin that will rapidly cool and slow it down when it sleeps, so it tends to only take quick naps.
cobblemon.species.epochskitty.name: EpochSkitty
cobblemon.species.epochskitty.desc: An evil spirit that was being hunted quickly possessed a nearby Skitty due to the latter being a relatively easy target.
cobblemon.species.epochdelcatty.name: EpochDelcatty
cobblemon.species.epochdelcatty.desc: When the Skitty that was possessed by an evil spirit evolved, this made the latent spirit stronger and more demonic.
cobblemon.species.epochturtwig.name: EpochTurtwig
cobblemon.species.epochturtwig.desc: The volcanic formation on its back is relatively immature so the embers that are still hardening are very hot and occasionally smoke.
cobblemon.species.epochgrotle.name: EpochGrotle
cobblemon.species.epochgrotle.desc: The volcanic formation on its back has hardened but there are small vents that have created that allow the built in heat to periodically escape.
cobblemon.species.epochtorterra.name: EpochTorterra
cobblemon.species.epochtorterra.desc: It is recommended to keep a short distance away as the volcanic formation on its back periodically releases short bouts of lava and smoke.
cobblemon.species.epochchimchar.name: EpochChimchar
cobblemon.species.epochchimchar.desc: Because of its size and speed, it can dash very quickly that it almost appears to be teleporting from one place to another.
cobblemon.species.epochmonferno.name: EpochMonferno
cobblemon.species.epochmonferno.desc: Due to its speed, it is able to create illusions of itself that can encircle and confuse a foe.
cobblemon.species.epochinfernape.name: EpochInfernape
cobblemon.species.epochinfernape.desc: It uses its bo staff to enable it to land multiple blows on its foe. When the foe comes to retaliate, it is able to zap away.
cobblemon.species.epochpiplup.name: EpochPiplup
cobblemon.species.epochpiplup.desc: It is not very good at walking and falls over easily. When it falls behind its group, it needs to quickly waddle to catch up.
cobblemon.species.epochprinplup.name: EpochPrinplup
cobblemon.species.epochprinplup.desc: They are strong divers and often hunt for small fish Pokemon in freezing waters.
cobblemon.species.epochempoleon.name: EpochEmpoleon
cobblemon.species.epochempoleon.desc: It is the leader of a small colony of Piplup and Prinplup. Each colony usually only has one male Empoleon as the king and one female as the queen.
cobblemon.species.epochprobopass.name: EpochProbopass
cobblemon.species.epochprobopass.desc: It is seen as a spiritual elder within its local tribe because its psychic potential allows it to command the respect and obedience of its compatriots.
cobblemon.species.epochtangrowth.name: EpochTangrowth
cobblemon.species.epochtangrowth.desc: After constantly being tossed around in the harsh desert winds, it has grown in mass and can sometimes found to be holding water.
cobblemon.species.epochfinneon.name: EpochFinneon
cobblemon.species.epochfinneon.desc: Depending on the temperature of the water it swims in, the colour of its body and fins will change accordingly.
cobblemon.species.epochlumineon.name: EpochLumineon
cobblemon.species.epochlumineon.desc: It changes the colour of the eye design that it has on its sides to attract mates. This pattern can also be used to blind pursuing predators.
cobblemon.species.epochgliscor.name: EpochGliscor
cobblemon.species.epochgliscor.desc: Late at night, they are known to congregate on rooftops, but do not count on seeing them move during the daytime.
cobblemon.species.epochdrifloon.name: EpochDrifloon
cobblemon.species.epochdrifloon.desc: The fact that it is filled with helium makes it very lightweight and prone to fly off into the wind unless restrained down to the ground.
cobblemon.species.epochdrifblim.name: EpochDrifblim
cobblemon.species.epochdrifblim.desc: The hot air that is used to power it and help it move can burn a person if they get too close.
cobblemon.species.epochbonsly.name: EpochBonsly
cobblemon.species.epochbonsly.desc: It can be found near other cacti as a flower growing in an otherwise desolate environment.
cobblemon.species.epochelectivire.name: EpochElectivire
cobblemon.species.epochelectivire.desc: It will fight any foe as every fight, regardless of the outcome, is a learning moment that it uses to get stronger.
cobblemon.species.epochmagmortar.name: EpochMagmortar
cobblemon.species.epochmagmortar.desc: It likes to sink ice breaker ships by blasting them with solid chunks of ice. It has caused millions in damages to local governments.
cobblemon.species.epochhippopotas.name: EpochHippopotas
cobblemon.species.epochhippopotas.desc: It is able to jump into puddles and rapidly absorb the water up. For this reason, they are used frequently to clean up spills.
cobblemon.species.epochhippowdon.name: EpochHippowdon
cobblemon.species.epochhippowdon.desc: The tree on its back renders its ability to hide from predators moot, so it has learned to defend itself by being very aggressive.
cobblemon.species.epochbronzor.name: EpochBronzor
cobblemon.species.epochbronzor.desc: It was once used to guard sacred temples and ruins. Over time, the effects of weather have worn away at it and vines have grown over it.
cobblemon.species.epochbronzong.name: EpochBronzong
cobblemon.species.epochbronzong.desc: Some say this Pokemon was once an idol that early civilizations prayed to so it would bring rain and crops would be allowed to grow.
cobblemon.species.epochdusknoir.name: EpochDusknoir
cobblemon.species.epochdusknoir.desc: It is capable of basking its entire body in flame and recklessly charging the enemy.
cobblemon.species.epochleafeon.name: EpochLeafeon
cobblemon.species.epochleafeon.desc: Its wing-like membrane is sticky, allowing it to fly through the air and catch smaller insects in them for it to feed on.
cobblemon.species.epochglaceon.name: EpochGlaceon
cobblemon.species.epochglaceon.desc: It adorns itself in gems in a futile attempt to deceive trainers into loving it. This however has led to it being hunted for its valuable minerals.
cobblemon.species.epochshellos.name: EpochShellos
cobblemon.species.epochshellos.desc: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodon.name: EpochGastrodon
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodon.desc: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?
cobblemon.species.epochshellosone.name: EpochShellosOne
cobblemon.species.epochshellosone.desc: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodonone.name: EpochGastrodonOne
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodonone.desc: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?
cobblemon.species.epochshellostwo.name: EpochShellosTwo
cobblemon.species.epochshellostwo.desc: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodontwo.name: EpochGastrodonTwo
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodontwo.desc: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?
cobblemon.species.epochshellosthree.name: EpochShellosThree
cobblemon.species.epochshellosthree.desc: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodonthree.de: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?

cobblemon.species.epochshellosfour.desc: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodonfour.des: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?

cobblemon.species.epochshellosfive.desc: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodonfive.des: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?
cobblemon.species.epochshellossix.name: EpochShellosSix
cobblemon.species.epochshellossix.desc: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodonsix.name: EpochGastrodonSix
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodonsix.desc: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?
cobblemon.species.epochshellosseven.name: EpochShellosSeven
cobblemon.species.epochshellosseven.desc: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodonseven.de: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?
cobblemon.species.epochshelloseight.name: EpochShellosEight
cobblemon.species.epochshelloseight.desc: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodoneight.de: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?
cobblemon.species.epochshellosnine.name: EpochShellosNine
cobblemon.species.epochshellosnine.desc: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodonnine.des: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?
cobblemon.species.epochshellosten.name: EpochShellosTen
cobblemon.species.epochshellosten.desc: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodonten.name: EpochGastrodonTen
