cobblemon.species.epochgastrodonten.desc: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?
cobblemon.species.epochshelloseleven.des: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodoneleven.d: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?
cobblemon.species.epochambipom.name: EpochAmbipom
cobblemon.species.epochambipom.desc: It is rumoured that due to its psychic powers being constantly engaged, experienced Ambipoms are able to reach a transcendent state.
cobblemon.species.epochstarly.name: EpochStarly
cobblemon.species.epochstarly.desc: When they sing in small bands while perched on tree branches, they can improvise off one another to create various pleasing harmonies.
cobblemon.species.epochstaravia.name: EpochStaravia
cobblemon.species.epochstaravia.desc: They often vie among one another to create the best solo performance or improvisation to attract potential mates.
cobblemon.species.epochstaraptor.name: EpochStaraptor
cobblemon.species.epochstaraptor.desc: It acts as a conductor for many Starly and often train them to learn how to create pleasing melodies with their combination of chirps.
cobblemon.species.epochkricketot.name: EpochKricketot
cobblemon.species.epochkricketot.desc: During the evening, they will put on concerts for other wild Pokemon in the habitat.
cobblemon.species.epochkricketune.name: EpochKricketune
cobblemon.species.epochkricketune.desc: It is adamant about having the best musical performance so will not hesitate to throw out unruly members for insubordination or being off-key.
cobblemon.species.epochstunky.name: EpochStunky
cobblemon.species.epochstunky.desc: If the foul-smelling liquid it sprays gets on you, there is no salvaging or cleaning your outfit, and it may as well be incinerated.
cobblemon.species.epochskuntank.name: EpochSkuntank
cobblemon.species.epochskuntank.desc: Law enforcement often use the vile-smelling toxic spray this Pokemon produces to disperse crowds, particularly environmental protesters.
cobblemon.species.epochcroagunk.name: EpochCroagunk
cobblemon.species.epochcroagunk.desc: Rumour has it that if you lick one, you can achieve a trance-like high but you might also contract an incurable disease.
cobblemon.species.epochtoxicroak.name: EpochToxicroak
cobblemon.species.epochtoxicroak.desc: Squeezing one of the poisonous sacs on its skin can cause it to explode, which could trigger a corrosive reaction.
cobblemon.species.epochyanmega.name: EpochYanmega
cobblemon.species.epochyanmega.desc: This Pokemon is able to drain other enemy Pokemon of its life essence if it is able to successfully make contact and bite them.
cobblemon.species.epochskorupi.name: EpochSkorupi
cobblemon.species.epochskorupi.desc: It buries into the sand awaiting potential prey and when they are exactly above, will jump out and sting them to immobilize and disable their target.
cobblemon.species.epochdrapion.name: EpochDrapion
cobblemon.species.epochdrapion.desc: It is able to wallop any prey with a swing of the pincers or grip and crush them like boulders.
cobblemon.species.epochspiritomb.name: EpochSpiritomb
cobblemon.species.epochspiritomb.desc: It is incredibly dense and has accumulated a lot of mass that results in certain objects falling into an orbit around it.
cobblemon.species.epochcherubi.name: EpochCherubi
cobblemon.species.epochcherubi.desc: Contrary to popular belief, it actually thrives in freezing environments and being covered in snow or frost actually helps it grow faster.
cobblemon.species.epochcherrim.name: EpochCherrim
cobblemon.species.epochcherrim.desc: While it is perfectly content to sit in warmth with its leaves closed in on itself, it flourishes in hail storms and will actually transform.
cobblemon.species.epochmantyke.name: EpochMantyke
cobblemon.species.epochmantyke.desc: When hunting for prey, they like to swim quickly and create small electrically charged whirlpools that will shock anything caught within it.
cobblemon.species.epochhappiny.name: EpochHappiny
cobblemon.species.epochhappiny.desc: The H.A.P.P.I.N.Y model 700 was invented to provide its owner with expedient access to healing facilities while travelling.
cobblemon.species.epochmagnezone.name: EpochMagnezone
cobblemon.species.epochmagnezone.desc: When it has found a planet worth studying, it will instruct smaller Magnemite and Magnetons to surveil and relay information back to it.
cobblemon.species.epochshinx.name: EpochShinx
cobblemon.species.epochshinx.desc: It is unable to use its wings to fly long distances quite yet, but they are able to float in the air for short periods by flapping them fiercely.
cobblemon.species.epochluxio.name: EpochLuxio
cobblemon.species.epochluxio.desc: Because its wings are not fully developed, it relies on its speed and toxic fangs to protect itself from would-be predators.
cobblemon.species.epochluxray.name: EpochLuxray
cobblemon.species.epochluxray.desc: Their wings are strong and fully developed so they can fly large distances with a single flap. Their toxic fangs are similarly exceptionally deadly.
cobblemon.species.epochmamoswine.name: EpochMamoswine
cobblemon.species.epochmamoswine.desc: Because of the charges on its fur, its tusks are always sparking with a degree of residual static electricity as the charges seek out a way to escape.
cobblemon.species.epochbuneary.name: EpochBuneary
cobblemon.species.epochbuneary.desc: This little bunny is headed for stardom! It practices every day until it perfects its technique, which then allows it to evolve into a real star.
cobblemon.species.epochlopunny.name: EpochLopunny
cobblemon.species.epochlopunny.desc: This Pokemon is very competitive by nature. Do not try to steal its thunder as they become enraged very easily!
cobblemon.species.epochbuizel.name: EpochBuizel
cobblemon.species.epochbuizel.desc: This Pokemon is able to use the small turbine on its tail to quickly wade through polluted waters and cleanse them of impurities.
cobblemon.species.epochfloatzel.name: EpochFloatzel
cobblemon.species.epochfloatzel.desc: Designed to help filter out pollution from water, the blue sphere at the centre of its stomach turns to brown when its filter is full and requires emptying.
cobblemon.species.epochbudew.name: EpochBudew
cobblemon.species.epochbudew.desc: This Pokémon is reluctant to fight, and when confronted, it would rather run away quickly than get its outfit dirty.
cobblemon.species.epochroserade.name: EpochRoserade
cobblemon.species.epochroserade.desc: This Pokemon prefers to conceal its identity and prefers to pose with its face covered as much as possible.
cobblemon.species.epochgible.name: EpochGible
cobblemon.species.epochgible.desc: When travelers complain about a spectral force or report hearing growling noises or some sort of sinister aura, it was likely that of a Gible.
cobblemon.species.epochgabite.name: EpochGabite
cobblemon.species.epochgabite.desc: It has a range of possible habitats because it is the manifestation of a sinister force or aura and wherever that can be found, a Gabite likely will manifest.
cobblemon.species.epochgarchomp.name: EpochGarchomp
cobblemon.species.epochgarchomp.desc: Some people report that based on recollections of their nightmares, a Garchomp was in the distance observing the subject suffer before they awaken.
cobblemon.species.epochmimejr.name: EpochMimejr
cobblemon.species.epochmimejr.desc: It busks on the side streets of large urban centres. The irony is that it is mute despite being a Sound type.
cobblemon.species.epochshieldon.name: EpochShieldon
cobblemon.species.epochshieldon.desc: Its head is said to be made of an ancient crystal that is as hard as steel.
cobblemon.species.epochbastiodon.name: EpochBastiodon
cobblemon.species.epochbastiodon.desc: Despite its unfortunate typing, the crystal wall on its head is able to be used to break almost any other naturally formed surface.
cobblemon.species.epochsnover.name: EpochSnover
cobblemon.species.epochsnover.desc: It is often mistaken for a smaller palm tree. Attempting to take the berries that it grows will result in it swiftly biting your fingers off.
cobblemon.species.epochabomasnow.name: EpochAbomasnow
cobblemon.species.epochabomasnow.desc: The long leaves it grows can provide comfortable shade against the harshest sun. They are often found on beaches and desert oases alike.
cobblemon.species.epochgibleone.name: EpochGibleOne
cobblemon.species.epochgibleone.desc: T.Gibles are able to speed through the water faster than most other Pokemon at its level.
cobblemon.species.epochgabiteone.name: EpochGabiteOne
cobblemon.species.epochgabiteone.desc: T.Gabites are able to perform various tricks and often included as part of circus troupes for aquatic stunts.
cobblemon.species.epochgarchompone.name: EpochGarchompOne
cobblemon.species.epochgarchompone.desc: When a T.Garchomp is chasing prey, it is able to charge through rocks and cleanly cut them in half because of their jagged fins.
cobblemon.species.epochyanmegaone.name: EpochYanmegaOne
cobblemon.species.epochyanmegaone.desc: This Pokémon is able to beat its wings quickly that it can create sound waves with such force that can actually knock back a person.
cobblemon.species.epochmismagius.name: EpochMismagius
cobblemon.species.epochmismagius.desc: It is said that this Pokemon is able to sing certain songs that have healing properties and can cure certain diseases.
cobblemon.species.epochriolu.name: EpochRiolu
cobblemon.species.epochriolu.desc: This Pokemon trains daily in honing its power in the mystic arts. It is thought that Riolu first appeared after falling from a wormhole to another dimension.
cobblemon.species.epochlucario.name: EpochLucario
cobblemon.species.epochlucario.desc: Lucario is from a civilisation of the distant past where magic was commonplace. It practices its dark arts with no mercy for others.
cobblemon.species.epochcranidos.name: EpochCranidos
cobblemon.species.epochcranidos.desc: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.
cobblemon.species.epochrampardos.name: EpochRampardos
cobblemon.species.epochrampardos.desc: Its skull is as hard as iron. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.
cobblemon.species.epochhonchkrow.name: EpochHonchkrow
cobblemon.species.epochhonchkrow.desc: It likes to perch itself on tall buildings and observe passerbys. When it is feeling extra menacing, it likes to squawk, spit and harass certain passerbys.
cobblemon.species.epochhonchkrowone.name: EpochHonchkrowOne
cobblemon.species.epochhonchkrowone.desc: They have become adept at magic all by themselves that they are now wizard masters themselves and willing to take on apprentices.
cobblemon.species.epochbidoof.name: EpochBidoof
cobblemon.species.epochbidoof.desc: It likes to build small structures on water using logs, tree branches, and leaves.
cobblemon.species.epochbibarel.name: EpochBibarel
cobblemon.species.epochbibarel.desc: If you tickle the male species, it will drop a bunch of the shiny things it has collected. If you tickle the female, the baby in its pouch will likely bite you.
cobblemon.species.epochcarnivine.name: EpochCarnivine
cobblemon.species.epochcarnivine.desc: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.
cobblemon.species.epochmunchlax.name: EpochMunchlax
cobblemon.species.epochmunchlax.desc: Its fur is very thick that despite living in very cold habitats, it doesn't feel cold.
cobblemon.species.epochprobopassone.name: EpochProbopassOne
cobblemon.species.epochprobopassone.desc: Using its cable arms, it is capable of plugging itself into electrical appliances to recharge them.
cobblemon.species.epochmamoswineone.name: EpochMamoswineOne
cobblemon.species.epochmamoswineone.desc: This Pokemon will often bash its head against larger trees in an effort to knock down the fruits that grow on them.
cobblemon.species.epochchingling.name: EpochChingling
cobblemon.species.epochchingling.desc: It emits a small electromagnetic charge that can cause signal disturbances to nearby electrical devices.
cobblemon.species.epochmagnezoneone.name: EpochMagnezoneOne
cobblemon.species.epochmagnezoneone.desc: T.Magnezone act as colony protectors of smaller T.Magnemites. They will often attempt to blind any attackers with violent beams of light.
cobblemon.species.epochbudewone.name: EpochBudewOne
cobblemon.species.epochbudewone.desc: This Pokémon attempts to stay hidden or tries to camouflage itself near densely populated trees until it is ready to bloom as that is when it evolves.
cobblemon.species.epochroseradeone.name: EpochRoseradeOne
cobblemon.species.epochroseradeone.desc: This Pokemon exudes an entrancing aroma that can cause a number of side effects ranging from lulling targets to sleep or causing seizures!
cobblemon.species.epochporygonz.name: EpochPorygonz
cobblemon.species.epochporygonz.desc: Its ability to distort and corrupt data allows it to warp spacetime around itself, causing glitches in the fabric of reality.
cobblemon.species.epochfroslass.name: EpochFroslass
cobblemon.species.epochfroslass.desc: It hovers around tombs and crypts in search of any visitors, hoping to drain its soul and add the corpse to the graveyard.
cobblemon.species.epochgallade.name: EpochGallade
cobblemon.species.epochgallade.desc: Keen to seek out vengeance on those who harmed it during its earlier stages, it has become very focused and unforgiving on seeking its revenge.
cobblemon.species.epochweavile.name: EpochWeavile
cobblemon.species.epochweavile.desc: Scientists are able to evaluate the age of a subject Weavile simply by assessing the length of its branches.
cobblemon.species.epochsnivy.name: EpochSnivy
cobblemon.species.epochsnivy.desc: This friendly spirit wants nothing but to reach afterlife. It poses no threat whatsoever.
cobblemon.species.epochservine.name: EpochServine
cobblemon.species.epochservine.desc: People over the centuries have grown afraid for naught of this Pokemon. It is slowly, but surely losing its friendly demeanor.
cobblemon.species.epochserperior.name: EpochSerperior
cobblemon.species.epochserperior.desc: This enraged Pokemon is sick and tired of people causing harm to its species, so now it reacts violently to anything that approaches its kin.
cobblemon.species.epochtepig.name: EpochTepig
cobblemon.species.epochtepig.desc: This Pokemon couldn't be happier than when it's frolicking in a puddle of mud.
cobblemon.species.epochpignite.name: EpochPignite
cobblemon.species.epochpignite.desc: This Pokemon loves cannonballing into large pools of mud. It attempts to curl up and make as big a splash as it can right after a rainfall.
cobblemon.species.epochemboar.name: EpochEmboar
cobblemon.species.epochemboar.desc: This Pokemon has jagged rocks that are encrusted into its skin around its torso. It can take these jagged rocks and fling them at enemies.
cobblemon.species.epochsolosis.name: EpochSolosis
cobblemon.species.epochsolosis.desc: They do not like light and are found in dark waters. They use their remote psychic ability to find food to sustain itself.
cobblemon.species.epochduosion.name: EpochDuosion
cobblemon.species.epochduosion.desc: It exhibited significant psychic potential when it was just a single-celled organism. Imagine the power it possesses now that it has evolved.
cobblemon.species.epochreuniclus.name: EpochReuniclus
cobblemon.species.epochreuniclus.desc: These Pokemon are capable of bending water to its will and forming fantastic water sculptures with its mind.
cobblemon.species.epochrufflet.name: EpochRufflet
cobblemon.species.epochrufflet.desc: It is just learning to spit fire. As it matures, the fire becomes hotter and more intense.
cobblemon.species.epochbraviary.name: EpochBraviary
cobblemon.species.epochbraviary.desc: When they are reaching the end of its life, this Pokemon will fly away to be reborn into an egg in isolation. No one has seen this to confirm though.
cobblemon.species.epochtympole.name: EpochTympole
cobblemon.species.epochtympole.desc: It has spent too much time near the water's edge such that it has started to grow mushrooms.
cobblemon.species.epochpalpitoad.name: EpochPalpitoad
cobblemon.species.epochpalpitoad.desc: As it started to migrate further inland into swamp areas, mushrooms began to grow on its damp body and has now become inseparable from its skin.
cobblemon.species.epochseismitoad.name: EpochSeismitoad
cobblemon.species.epochseismitoad.desc: The mushrooms have become so prevalent and grown in potency that simply touching them can render a person incapacitated.
cobblemon.species.epochzorua.name: EpochZorua
cobblemon.species.epochzorua.desc: They are very loyal creatures and can hunt in small packs. Due to their loyalty, they are subservient to the alpha of each pack.
cobblemon.species.epochzoroark.name: EpochZoroark
cobblemon.species.epochzoroark.desc: The strongest and fastest hunter becomes the alpha and then eventually evolves into the Zoroark leader of the pack.
cobblemon.species.epochducklett.name: EpochDucklett
cobblemon.species.epochducklett.desc: It is said that its feathers bring good luck. It honks several times if it is happy similar to a dog wagging its tail.
cobblemon.species.epochswanna.name: EpochSwanna
cobblemon.species.epochswanna.desc: It is endangered because its feathers allegedly grant you a wish, but only if it gives you the feather of its own volition.
cobblemon.species.epochgolett.name: EpochGolett
cobblemon.species.epochgolett.desc: These Pokémon are thought to have come to the Orion Region through a meteorite from outer space as evidenced by their extra-terrestrial colour.
cobblemon.species.epochgolurk.name: EpochGolurk
cobblemon.species.epochgolurk.desc: It is said that their cores are time capsules and if anyone opens them, they could unlock secrets that were stored there by a destroyed civilization.
cobblemon.species.epochlarvesta.name: EpochLarvesta
cobblemon.species.epochlarvesta.desc: You can often find this Pokemon nibbling on electric wires to siphon the electrical current within as food.
cobblemon.species.epochvolcarona.name: EpochVolcarona
cobblemon.species.epochvolcarona.desc: When it flaps its wings furiously, it can send electrical currents through the air which it uses to hunt down and chase its prey.
cobblemon.species.epochroggenrola.name: EpochRoggenrola
cobblemon.species.epochroggenrola.desc: Each one that forms is said to have come from massive glaciers that existed several hundred years ago.
cobblemon.species.epochboldore.name: EpochBoldore
cobblemon.species.epochboldore.desc: Due to the ongoing climate crisis, parts of icebergs that have since melted and separated away turn into Boldores.
cobblemon.species.epochgigalith.name: EpochGigalith
cobblemon.species.epochgigalith.desc: Many inattentive sailors have come to their doom when their ships have collided with these Pokemon out on the frozen seas.
cobblemon.species.epochlillipup.name: EpochLillipup
cobblemon.species.epochlillipup.desc: Left to fend for itself, its vital spirit and resilience allowed it to survive but it lacks trust in humans after initially being abandoned.
cobblemon.species.epochherdier.name: EpochHerdier
cobblemon.species.epochherdier.desc: Forced to survive on its own, it has submitted fully to its feral instinct and can be difficult to tame.
cobblemon.species.epochstoutland.name: EpochStoutland
cobblemon.species.epochstoutland.desc: The spirit of a Stoutland that passed away after abuse and starvation. Even death will not give this Pokemon peace and rest.
cobblemon.species.epochminccino.name: EpochMinccino
cobblemon.species.epochminccino.desc: After this Minccino was abused during its life, its spirit has come back and taken up a doll as its host in hopes of finding a better owner.
cobblemon.species.epochcinccino.name: EpochCinccino
cobblemon.species.epochcinccino.desc: This Cinccino uses any random buttons it can find to cover up its eye because it still thinks it is alive and needs to conceal its abuse.
cobblemon.species.epochdruddigon.name: EpochDruddigon
cobblemon.species.epochdruddigon.desc: It has forgone its ability to fly in exchange for developing jagged spikes on its back and as such, now largely resides in dark caves.
cobblemon.species.epochwoobat.name: EpochWoobat
cobblemon.species.epochwoobat.desc: Its fangs are extra sharp to enable this Pokemon to pierce the skin of its target and drain its blood quickly.
cobblemon.species.epochswoobat.name: EpochSwoobat
cobblemon.species.epochswoobat.desc: It is very sensitive to light. Some say that it does not produce a reflection, but most people say that is just a myth.
cobblemon.species.epochtimburr.name: EpochTimburr
cobblemon.species.epochtimburr.desc: The stuff of nightmares; this Pokemon has affixed a blunt instrument on the end of its slab of wood to use as a weapon.
cobblemon.species.epochgurdurr.name: EpochGurdurr
cobblemon.species.epochgurdurr.desc: It changes its makeup to match the same as what was worn by its last victim.
cobblemon.species.epochconkeldurr.name: EpochConkeldurr
cobblemon.species.epochconkeldurr.desc: This Pokémon was part of the circus and abused by the circus master. The trails of blood on its columns are of the deceased circus master.
cobblemon.species.epochlitwick.name: EpochLitwick
cobblemon.species.epochlitwick.desc: When a Litwick possesses a lightbulb, it is said that it drains its power more rapidly to heal itself.
cobblemon.species.epochlampent.name: EpochLampent
cobblemon.species.epochlampent.desc: It possesses street lights and pranks municipal workers into thinking the lamp light has fused. It then scares the workers when they come to repair them.
cobblemon.species.epochchandelure.name: EpochChandelure
cobblemon.species.epochchandelure.desc: The spirit possessed a chandelier and now pranks people by turning on and off rapidly to create a more menacing atmosphere.
cobblemon.species.epochvanillite.name: EpochVanillite
cobblemon.species.epochvanillite.desc: Whether this Pokemon was created from raw toxic waste found in dumping grounds or was already there is a mystery.
cobblemon.species.epochvanillish.name: EpochVanillish
cobblemon.species.epochvanillish.desc: It's unknown where exactly the Pokemon ends and the trail of sludge begins. There is a suspicion that it varies from one to another.
cobblemon.species.epochvanilluxe.name: EpochVanilluxe
cobblemon.species.epochvanilluxe.desc: The suspicion is that the mass of toxic waste belonging to this Pokemon is much larger than originally believed.
cobblemon.species.epochjoltik.name: EpochJoltik
cobblemon.species.epochjoltik.desc: It is said these Pokemon don't actually appear in real life but are mere instances of your worst nightmares manifesting in reality.
cobblemon.species.epochgalvantula.name: EpochGalvantula
cobblemon.species.epochgalvantula.desc: This creature represents one's deepest and darkest fears made real. Its stinger can lull people into a deep sleep where it feasts on their sanity.
cobblemon.species.epochcubchoo.name: EpochCubchoo
cobblemon.species.epochcubchoo.desc: It is in constant competition with Slowpoke for honey and other shiny things. Its cuteness allows it to dodge consequences from its theft.
cobblemon.species.epochbeartic.name: EpochBeartic
cobblemon.species.epochbeartic.desc: It is very irritable when it is awoken from sleep. It can go on rampages when it is hungry.
cobblemon.species.epochvenipede.name: EpochVenipede
cobblemon.species.epochvenipede.desc: A Venipede happened upon a meteorite that had special powers thereby giving it extraterrestrial powers.
cobblemon.species.epochwhirlipede.name: EpochWhirlipede
cobblemon.species.epochwhirlipede.desc: The meteorite that it discovered has enabled it to move things with its mind. The rock is now more in control of the host body than the original Whirlipede.
cobblemon.species.epochscolipede.name: EpochScolipede
cobblemon.species.epochscolipede.desc: The original meteorite that controlled this Pokemon becomes simultaneously aware and is able to act in unison with other Scolipedes.
cobblemon.species.epochdeerling.name: EpochDeerling
cobblemon.species.epochdeerling.desc: Its flames flare up when it is either in distress or very happy, making it difficult to properly understand and care for.
cobblemon.species.epochsawsbuck.name: EpochSawsbuck
cobblemon.species.epochsawsbuck.desc: Its footsteps can easily start a fire, which make it a serious danger to forest habitats where it is most prevalent.
cobblemon.species.epochtynamo.name: EpochTynamo
cobblemon.species.epochtynamo.desc: Due to its weak, undeveloped form, it only surfaces for food, preferring to stay underground for as long as it can because it cannot defend itself well.
cobblemon.species.epocheelektrik.name: EpochEelektrik
cobblemon.species.epocheelektrik.desc: These Pokémon come out of their burrows to feed on smaller bugs and insects within caves and sandy dunes.
cobblemon.species.epocheelektross.name: EpochEelektross
cobblemon.species.epocheelektross.desc: It is rumoured that some of the largest Eelektrosses have jaws that can open so large that they can consume an entire fridge in one gulp.
cobblemon.species.epochbasculin.name: EpochBasculin
cobblemon.species.epochbasculin.desc: They can be very damaging to sensitive ecosystems because they are able to devour a lot of the available food supply very quickly.
cobblemon.species.epochpidove.name: EpochPidove
cobblemon.species.epochpidove.desc: Where people go, these Pokémon follow. They do not like to be left alone and forms bonds with other pokemon very easily.
cobblemon.species.epochtranquill.name: EpochTranquill
cobblemon.species.epochtranquill.desc: A protective bunch, it rushes to aid its injured allies no matter what danger surrounds it.
cobblemon.species.epochunfezant.name: EpochUnfezant
cobblemon.species.epochunfezant.desc: Through the use of their psychic abilities, they can sense when an ally or owner is in danger and teleport them to safety.
cobblemon.species.epochdwebble.name: EpochDwebble
cobblemon.species.epochdwebble.desc: It collects various small articles found on the sea floor to append to its shell as a means of showing off.
cobblemon.species.epochcrustle.name: EpochCrustle
cobblemon.species.epochcrustle.desc: When a Crustle finds its soul mate, it exchanges its most prized article on its shell as a token of its commitment.
cobblemon.species.epochdurant.name: EpochDurant
cobblemon.species.epochdurant.desc: They are instrumental in volcanic environments as they act in cohesion to steer the flow of lava away around like beavers with water.
cobblemon.species.epochmeloetta.name: EpochMeloetta
cobblemon.species.epochmeloetta.desc: It is a famous Pokemon known for its perfect pitch and ability to sing captivating melodies that get stuck in people's heads.
cobblemon.species.epochdeino.name: EpochDeino
cobblemon.species.epochdeino.desc: It harbours a deep psychic energy that you can see emitting from the spike on its head.
cobblemon.species.epochzweilous.name: EpochZweilous
cobblemon.species.epochzweilous.desc: Their psychic power has allowed it to telepathically have two floating heads however the heads cannot drift too far away from its body.
cobblemon.species.epochhydreigon.name: EpochHydreigon
cobblemon.species.epochhydreigon.desc: Its psychic powers allows it to create a shield around its smaller heads and instruct them to go out in smaller, scouting missions.
cobblemon.species.epochyamask.name: EpochYamask
cobblemon.species.epochyamask.desc: It rhythmically pounds away at its drum in a consistent pattern. It is not clear what the rhythm relates to or what it means.
cobblemon.species.epochcofagrigus.name: EpochCofagrigus
cobblemon.species.epochcofagrigus.desc: It continues to drum a steady rhythm to provide a form of encouragement to its ally in battle. It sometimes does it for entertainment purposes.
cobblemon.species.epochthroh.name: EpochThroh
cobblemon.species.epochthroh.desc: This golem is magically enchanted to provide it with a level of hardiness that far exceeds many other golem Pokemon creations.
cobblemon.species.epochsawk.name: EpochSawk
cobblemon.species.epochsawk.desc: An old fable says that this golem was brought to life through the wish of an ill child, so it came to life to help them battle the disease they were facing.
cobblemon.species.epochsandile.name: EpochSandile
cobblemon.species.epochsandile.desc: It likes attacking seafaring vessels and raiding them of food and other treasures. They are often found congregating in coves or islands.
cobblemon.species.epochkrokorok.name: EpochKrokorok
cobblemon.species.epochkrokorok.desc: It leads small raiding groups in the ocean to attack ships and other marine vessels. They are very aggressive if confronted.
cobblemon.species.epochkrookodile.name: EpochKrookodile
cobblemon.species.epochkrookodile.desc: This Pokémon lets its minions do the dirty work of raiding marine vessels. It prefers to stay behind and await the spoils.
cobblemon.species.epochpatrat.name: EpochPatrat
cobblemon.species.epochpatrat.desc: This Pokemon always seems to be hearing things that its hair is always standing on end. It is unclear if this is the result of their psychic powers or their paranoia.
cobblemon.species.epochwatchog.name: EpochWatchog
cobblemon.species.epochwatchog.desc: They are often used as security guards because they have an enhanced sense of hearing that allows them to detect the faintest noise or disruption.
cobblemon.species.epochgothita.name: EpochGothita
cobblemon.species.epochgothita.desc: This Pokemon is very nimble and agile. It is able to pull off weird gymnastic stunts because of its small stature and flexibility.
cobblemon.species.epochgothorita.name: EpochGothorita
cobblemon.species.epochgothorita.desc: This Pokemon likes to pull pranks on people. Its laugh is intoxicating and able to readily disable a foe.
cobblemon.species.epochgothitelle.name: EpochGothitelle
cobblemon.species.epochgothitelle.desc: This Pokemon enjoys using various clown-themed gag weapons such as an oversized mallet, explosives and even has immunity to certain toxins.
cobblemon.species.epochvullaby.name: EpochVullaby
cobblemon.species.epochvullaby.desc: It does not matter that a Vullaby may have hatched many months ago, it still carries the egg shell that it was born in around as pants.
cobblemon.species.epochmandibuzz.name: EpochMandibuzz
cobblemon.species.epochmandibuzz.desc: They circle around dying Pokemon in rough terrain. When the Pokemon finally dies, the Mandibuzz are first to help themselves to the remains.
cobblemon.species.epochferroseed.name: EpochFerroseed
cobblemon.species.epochferroseed.desc: It camouflages well into its surroundings. It uses its beautiful flowers to attract prey and will then bring them down through a volley of thorns.
cobblemon.species.epochferrothorn.name: EpochFerrothorn
cobblemon.species.epochferrothorn.desc: It subtly uses the flowers on its head to attract certain prey. When the prey close in, it can jump up and consume them in a single gulp.
cobblemon.species.epochgothitaone.name: EpochGothitaOne
cobblemon.species.epochgothitaone.desc: When it is angered, it will hiss and shoot petrifying gazes at the subject of their anger to temporarily immobilize them.
cobblemon.species.epochgothoritaone.name: EpochGothoritaOne
cobblemon.species.epochgothoritaone.desc: The rattling sound its tail produces will often intensify when it finds prey, betraying its ability to hunt effectively.
cobblemon.species.epochgothitelleone.des: It spits venomous fluid at its enemies that can corrode and slow down their foe. If it makes eye contact with you, it could also turn you to stone.
cobblemon.species.epochpurrloin.name: EpochPurrloin
cobblemon.species.epochpurrloin.desc: Some say that if you cross its path, you will be doomed to bad luck for a day. However, its halo suggests otherwise.
cobblemon.species.epochliepard.name: EpochLiepard
cobblemon.species.epochliepard.desc: This Pokemon is very limber and climb high elevations with ease. Its fur reflects the night sky.
cobblemon.species.epochtrubbish.name: EpochTrubbish
cobblemon.species.epochtrubbish.desc: Have you ever thrown away your batteries in the garbage instead of recycling properly? Well guess what, you’re to blame for the rise of these nasty Trubbish!
cobblemon.species.epochgarbodor.name: EpochGarbodor
cobblemon.species.epochgarbodor.desc: This Pokémon eats electrical waste. For this reason, much of its body exhibits a persistent electrical current that hovers around it.
cobblemon.species.epochklink.name: EpochKlink
cobblemon.species.epochklink.desc: This Pokemon has an internal clock that allows it to keep time so you do not need to carry around a watch or check your phone to confirm the time.
cobblemon.species.epochklang.name: EpochKlang
cobblemon.species.epochklang.desc: It is able to synchronize its attacks based on the internal clock that allows it to amplify its damage.
cobblemon.species.epochklinklang.name: EpochKlinklang
cobblemon.species.epochklinklang.desc: When it is perfectly synchronized, the bells on Klinklang will ring to let you know.
cobblemon.species.epochdarumaka.name: EpochDarumaka
cobblemon.species.epochdarumaka.desc: It is known for starting noisy riots in the jungle whether it be from pounding its chest or screeching from the treetops.
cobblemon.species.epochdarmanitan.name: EpochDarmanitan
cobblemon.species.epochdarmanitan.desc: It is known for getting into screeching matches with the Primeape family. Get ear protection and take cover when you see this happen.
cobblemon.species.epochroggenrolaone.des: This Pokemon moves by using its built in static energy to propel it in the direction it wants to go.
cobblemon.species.epochboldoreone.name: EpochBoldoreOne
cobblemon.species.epochboldoreone.desc: Its energy is dangerously unstable and it periodically gives off charged electrical novas that can fry electrical appliances.
cobblemon.species.epochgigalithone.name: EpochGigalithOne
cobblemon.species.epochgigalithone.desc: This Pokemon carries so much latent energy that it is able to seamlessly connect multiple rocks together through an electrical current.
cobblemon.species.epochvanilliteone.name: EpochVanilliteOne
cobblemon.species.epochvanilliteone.desc: Its body can get so hot that sometimes, simple water is rendered ineffective against it and will just evaporate on contact.
cobblemon.species.epochvanillishone.name: EpochVanillishOne
cobblemon.species.epochvanillishone.desc: The top of its head is constantly erupting and spewing out hot lava. Maintaining a safe distance from it is strongly advised.
cobblemon.species.epochvanilluxeone.name: EpochVanilluxeOne
cobblemon.species.epochvanilluxeone.desc: One of its heads spews only sulfur whereas the other spews lava. They are constantly competing with one another to see which substance is produced most.
cobblemon.species.epocharchen.name: EpochArchen
cobblemon.species.epocharchen.desc: This Pokémon was successfully restored from a fossil. It was said that its wing flaps could cause thunder claps in ancient times.
cobblemon.species.epocharcheops.name: EpochArcheops
cobblemon.species.epocharcheops.desc: Its feathers carry a significant amount of static electricity. In sufficient quantities, these feathers can be used to create chain lightning.
cobblemon.species.epochtirtouga.name: EpochTirtouga
cobblemon.species.epochtirtouga.desc: Its shell is nigh impenetrable, but its underbelly is vulnerable. If flipped over, this Pokemon will flail about trying to reposition itself.
cobblemon.species.epochcarracosta.name: EpochCarracosta
cobblemon.species.epochcarracosta.desc: This Pokemon is extremely defensive, being able to take explosions head-on without a scratch. A downside of this is that it struggles with mobility.
cobblemon.species.epochmunna.name: EpochMunna
cobblemon.species.epochmunna.desc: This Pokemon needs regular security updates uploaded every Tuesday to ensure that it is protected against viruses on the Internet.
cobblemon.species.epochmusharna.name: EpochMusharna
cobblemon.species.epochmusharna.desc: This Pokemon is reaching terminal failure and its hard drive is now regularly crashing due to a virus infection.
cobblemon.species.epochdrilbur.name: EpochDrilbur
cobblemon.species.epochdrilbur.desc: While it is blind, it uses sonic waves to find its way and navigate through caves and deep tunnels.
cobblemon.species.epochexcadrill.name: EpochExcadrill
cobblemon.species.epochexcadrill.desc: As it uses sound waves when digging, its spines help shield it from danger in case the sound waves it sends out misleads it.
cobblemon.species.epochdrilburone.name: EpochDrilburOne
cobblemon.species.epochdrilburone.desc: When light beams bounce off this Pokemon, it can produce and warp the colours into colourful displays.
cobblemon.species.epochexcadrillone.name: EpochExcadrillOne
cobblemon.species.epochexcadrillone.desc: It uses the crystals on its head and arms to help it dig through caves. They are capable of emitting their own light to help it navigate.
cobblemon.species.epochsolosisone.name: EpochSolosisOne
cobblemon.species.epochsolosisone.desc: They are small parasites from interstellar space. They lie in wait underground until they can evolve.
cobblemon.species.epochduosionone.name: EpochDuosionOne
cobblemon.species.epochduosionone.desc: When it has siphoned enough energy from its surroundings, it evolves and migrates to continue its parasitic lifecycle.
cobblemon.species.epochreuniclusone.name: EpochReuniclusOne
cobblemon.species.epochreuniclusone.desc: It is actually an interstellar parasite that consume the resources from the planet and then summarily migrate onto the next world.
cobblemon.species.epochsewaddle.name: EpochSewaddle
cobblemon.species.epochsewaddle.desc: It observes from a distance and studies its foes. When it is ready, it will adapt and change its form to perfectly replicate its enemy.
cobblemon.species.epochswadloon.name: EpochSwadloon
cobblemon.species.epochswadloon.desc: Dark energies swirl beneath the cowl of its robe, undetectable by most. It harbours sinister energy from a galaxy far far away.
cobblemon.species.epochleavanny.name: EpochLeavanny
cobblemon.species.epochleavanny.desc: Its arm blades are composed completely of laser energy. They are raised from youth to become adept warriors.
cobblemon.species.epochtimburrone.name: EpochTimburrOne
cobblemon.species.epochtimburrone.desc: It is small and stupid. It often bashes its head against tree trunks for amusement.
cobblemon.species.epochgurdurrone.name: EpochGurdurrOne
cobblemon.species.epochgurdurrone.desc: They are big and bulky because of constantly carrying around large logs of wood. They are able to effortlessly bench press the log.
cobblemon.species.epochconkeldurrone.des: It is very lovable but it must be taught to restrain its affection because it doesn't realize that squeezing a person between its logs can kill them.
cobblemon.species.epochlarvestaone.name: EpochLarvestaOne
cobblemon.species.epochlarvestaone.desc: It is said to be a Pokemon from a different galaxy altogether, and it actually managed to travel here by opening a wormhole.
cobblemon.species.epochvolcaronaone.name: EpochVolcaronaOne
cobblemon.species.epochvolcaronaone.desc: Rumour has it that its wings each provide a snapshot of a nearby galaxy, and every pair of wings on a T.Volcarona are a unique part of the universe.
cobblemon.species.epochfrillish.name: EpochFrillish
cobblemon.species.epochfrillish.desc: They are very mischievous Pokemon because they often like to expel their spores when people wander by to infect them with a poison or paralyzing agent.
cobblemon.species.epochjellicent.name: EpochJellicent
cobblemon.species.epochjellicent.desc: The gunk that accumulates under its mushroom head mix with the Pokemon's natural spores to make it extremely poisonous. It should be handled with care.
cobblemon.species.epochblitzle.name: EpochBlitzle
cobblemon.species.epochblitzle.desc: Blitzle's fur is freeing and lightweight, allowing them to have an extra aerodynamic boost and reach incredible speeds when running.
cobblemon.species.epochzebstrika.name: EpochZebstrika
cobblemon.species.epochzebstrika.desc: Its mane is soft and highly coveted by poachers. However, poachers have been unsuccessful in being able to catch it because of how fast it is.
cobblemon.species.epochemolga.name: EpochEmolga
cobblemon.species.epochemolga.desc: They are very naughty Pokemon and enjoy nosediving from steep heights and swarming lost travellers and hikers.
cobblemon.species.epochelgyem.name: EpochElgyem
cobblemon.species.epochelgyem.desc: This Pokémon is supposed to represent a soldier sent by an advanced civilization to study a species and evaluate them to eventually become a subservient colony.
cobblemon.species.epochbeheeyem.name: EpochBeheeyem
cobblemon.species.epochbeheeyem.desc: The eye on its head is supposed to act as a one-way camera that allows its masters from another planet to surveil and study the Orion Region.
cobblemon.species.epochscraggy.name: EpochScraggy
cobblemon.species.epochscraggy.desc: This Pokemon often inhabits the urban centres and hideaway areas. It is often sharing its mix tape with others in hopes of catching its big break.
cobblemon.species.epochscrafty.name: EpochScrafty
cobblemon.species.epochscrafty.desc: This Pokemon has been recognized for its skill in hip-hop that it adorns itself in the best looking urban streetwear there is to be found.
cobblemon.species.epochfennekin.name: EpochFennekin
cobblemon.species.epochfennekin.desc: This little Pokemon has a plethora of potential hidden inside of it. However, it does not know yet whether to use it selflessly or not...
cobblemon.species.epochbraixen.name: EpochBraixen
cobblemon.species.epochbraixen.desc: After undergoing rigorous training, this Pokemon is able to talk to the dead using any reflective surface, albeit for a short period of time.
cobblemon.species.epochdelphox.name: EpochDelphox
cobblemon.species.epochdelphox.desc: This ancient Pokemon is thought to be only a myth. It stores so much power inside its glass orb it is said it can communicate with the underworld freely.
cobblemon.species.epochchespin.name: EpochChespin
cobblemon.species.epochchespin.desc: It burrows deep in the ground of caves. It will emerge when it needs to find food.
cobblemon.species.epochquilladin.name: EpochQuilladin
cobblemon.species.epochquilladin.desc: It uses the crystals on its back as a light source to help it navigate through dark areas.
cobblemon.species.epochchesnaught.name: EpochChesnaught
cobblemon.species.epochchesnaught.desc: If one of its crystals are taken away without permission, it can go into a rampage that can cause nearby tremors.
cobblemon.species.epochfroakie.name: EpochFroakie
cobblemon.species.epochfroakie.desc: When it thunder storms, this Pokemon attracts lightning and is not remotely fazed by it. In fact, it quite enjoys it!
cobblemon.species.epochfrogadier.name: EpochFrogadier
cobblemon.species.epochfrogadier.desc: When this Pokemon hops, it gives off small sparks. It is very quick when it does dash around that can make it look like the ground is lit up with an electrical current.
cobblemon.species.epochgreninja.name: EpochGreninja
cobblemon.species.epochgreninja.desc: This Pokemon is able to materialize and throw lightning bolts from a distance.
cobblemon.species.epochfletchling.name: EpochFletchling
cobblemon.species.epochfletchling.desc: As a small immature bird, it has not yet learned to control its built-in electricity and will sometimes periodically shock itself as it learns.
cobblemon.species.epochfletchinder.name: EpochFletchinder
cobblemon.species.epochfletchinder.desc: It is very territorial and can be reckless as it matures. As a young upstart, its ability to use electricity has made it impulsive and overconfident.
cobblemon.species.epochtalonflame.name: EpochTalonflame
cobblemon.species.epochtalonflame.desc: Its favoured techniques is to charge itself up with electricity and dive into an enemy. The damage it deals is far more significant than the damage it sustains.
cobblemon.species.epochbergmite.name: EpochBergmite
cobblemon.species.epochbergmite.desc: It is made of extra jagged rock so when it launches itself in full-body tackles at its enemy, it can pierce and significantly damage them.
cobblemon.species.epochavalugg.name: EpochAvalugg
cobblemon.species.epochavalugg.desc: Because it was formed in the earth's core, it has no trouble navigating because of its built-in magnetism.
cobblemon.species.epochamaura.name: EpochAmaura
cobblemon.species.epochamaura.desc: It accompanies people that are lost in nightmares back to safety and away from danger. It uses its abilities to shield sleeping people from evil forces.
cobblemon.species.epochaurorus.name: EpochAurorus
cobblemon.species.epochaurorus.desc: Apparently, it is able to walk seamlessly between the waking world and the dream realm. Anyone seeing it while fast asleep will have good luck for a year.
cobblemon.species.epochskrelp.name: EpochSkrelp
cobblemon.species.epochskrelp.desc: It is able to change its pigment colour to camouflage within beds of seaweed so that it is able to easily harvest and feed on algae on the sea floor.
cobblemon.species.epochdragalge.name: EpochDragalge
cobblemon.species.epochdragalge.desc: Its fins are made of seaweed so it is very limber and much faster. However, as a result, it is far more susceptible to physical damage.
cobblemon.species.epochlitleo.name: EpochLitleo
cobblemon.species.epochlitleo.desc: From an early age, they are able to hunt on the snowy plains. Their fur allows them to blend into the snow making them excellent predators.
cobblemon.species.epochpyroar.name: EpochPyroar
cobblemon.species.epochpyroar.desc: A pride of Pyroars typically consist of one alpha male and several females. They are nomadic and frequently migrate across snowy plains in search of food.
cobblemon.species.epochskiddo.name: EpochSkiddo
cobblemon.species.epochskiddo.desc: It is very territorial and typically battles others in its herd from a young age, to sharpen its horn and assert dominance among its peers.
cobblemon.species.epochgogoat.name: EpochGogoat
cobblemon.species.epochgogoat.desc: They have developed techniques to headbutt mountains and walls to toughen their horns and are very adept at scaling mountains.
cobblemon.species.epochswirlix.name: EpochSwirlix
cobblemon.species.epochswirlix.desc: It is lightweight and easily blown around by a strong breeze. It enjoys travelling in small packs so that they can bounce off one another in strong winds.
cobblemon.species.epochslurpuff.name: EpochSlurpuff
cobblemon.species.epochslurpuff.desc: It is said that the feathers from its wings grant wishes, so they are highly sought after Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochsylveon.name: EpochSylveon
cobblemon.species.epochsylveon.desc: Its rage is so palpable that the colour of its ribbons change colour to replicate the state of its emotion. It is almost impossible to soothe.
cobblemon.species.epochnoibat.name: EpochNoibat
cobblemon.species.epochnoibat.desc: They emit high-pitched screeches as a means of stunning and disabling their foe in combat.
cobblemon.species.epochnoivern.name: EpochNoivern
cobblemon.species.epochnoivern.desc: If their deafening sound waves are not enough to stop an enemy in its tracks, their jagged tails can also be used defensively as a last resort.
cobblemon.species.epochspritzee.name: EpochSpritzee
cobblemon.species.epochspritzee.desc: It has an array of various poisons and salves at its disposal that it can use to either cure or infect its enemies.
cobblemon.species.epocharomatisse.name: EpochAromatisse
cobblemon.species.epocharomatisse.desc: It has been known to dabble in a variety of unethical and unsupported experiments in search of crafting the most deadly poison.
cobblemon.species.epochfurfrou.name: EpochFurfrou
cobblemon.species.epochfurfrou.desc: These Pokemon are rumoured to be representations of various weather systems in the form of a Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochhonedge.name: EpochHonedge
cobblemon.species.epochhonedge.desc: It appears in multiple different weapon formats within the Orion region to allow its owner the flexibility in case they are not skilled in one specific weapon.
cobblemon.species.epochhonedgeone.name: EpochHonedgeOne
cobblemon.species.epochhonedgeone.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a bow in tune with nature.
cobblemon.species.epochhonedgetwo.name: EpochHonedgeTwo
cobblemon.species.epochhonedgetwo.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a blazing axe.
cobblemon.species.epochhonedgethree.name: EpochHonedgeThree
cobblemon.species.epochhonedgethree.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a charged mace.
cobblemon.species.epochdoublade.name: EpochDoublade
cobblemon.species.epochdoublade.desc: The different weapon formats it appears in is dependent on the inherent skill level of the person wielding them.
cobblemon.species.epochdoubladeone.name: EpochDoubladeOne
cobblemon.species.epochdoubladeone.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a bow in tune with nature.
cobblemon.species.epochdoubladetwo.name: EpochDoubladeTwo
cobblemon.species.epochdoubladetwo.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a blazing axe.
cobblemon.species.epochdoubladethree.des: This Pokemon masquerades as a charged mace.
cobblemon.species.epochaegislash.name: EpochAegislash
cobblemon.species.epochaegislash.desc: Only the most skilled weapon masters will ever see an Aegislash in its true form as it is dependent on their proficiency in the use of the specific weapon.
cobblemon.species.epochaegislashone.name: EpochAegislashOne
cobblemon.species.epochaegislashone.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a bow in tune with nature.
cobblemon.species.epochaegislashtwo.name: EpochAegislashTwo
cobblemon.species.epochaegislashtwo.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a blazing axe.
cobblemon.species.epochaegislashthree.de: This Pokemon masquerades as a charged mace.
cobblemon.species.epochespurr.name: EpochEspurr
cobblemon.species.epochespurr.desc: A malicious spirit has possessed this poor Espurr. If it refuses any commands, the spirit will hurt it, compelling it into obedience.
cobblemon.species.epochmeowstic.name: EpochMeowstic
cobblemon.species.epochmeowstic.desc: When it evolved, it submitted itself entirely to the spirit that had possessed it. It is unclear if it retained any semblance of its free will.
cobblemon.species.epochklefki.name: EpochKlefki
cobblemon.species.epochklefki.desc: It is a traditional Pokemon that is endowed with a number of protective charms and enchantments that help it shield their owner from evil spirits.
cobblemon.species.epochtyrunt.name: EpochTyrunt
cobblemon.species.epochtyrunt.desc: Despite its body being freezing cold to the touch, it is unclear how it is able to simultaneously have flames burning perpetually.
cobblemon.species.epochtyrantrum.name: EpochTyrantrum
cobblemon.species.epochtyrantrum.desc: Its flames burn with a violent passion but the snow that has collected on its back never seems to melt. It is unclear how this is possible.
cobblemon.species.epochspritzeeone.name: EpochSpritzeeOne
cobblemon.species.epochspritzeeone.desc: It likes to carry around a lot of gold and shiny objects, although it's not clear how it does this given its small size.
cobblemon.species.epocharomatisseone.des: When it finds gold, it eats it, making its body larger. However, it is not clear if it is actually eating it or storing it as it is able to retrieve the gold at any time?
cobblemon.species.epochcarbink.name: EpochCarbink
cobblemon.species.epochcarbink.desc: Despite its small size, it is incredibly dense, exhibiting a gravitational force that it is able to attract small particles of rocks and mud to orbit around it.
cobblemon.species.epochgoomy.name: EpochGoomy
cobblemon.species.epochgoomy.desc: These Pokemon appear in many different flavours: sour apple, cherry, blue razz, lemon, orange and grape. Can you collect them all?
cobblemon.species.epochsliggoo.name: EpochSliggoo
cobblemon.species.epochsliggoo.desc: This Pokemon is very sticky and will decompose if it stays under the sun for too long.
cobblemon.species.epochgoodra.name: EpochGoodra
cobblemon.species.epochgoodra.desc: Every step it takes leaves a small part of itself behind. Not to worry because it quickly regenerates itself.
cobblemon.species.epochbinacle.name: EpochBinacle
cobblemon.species.epochbinacle.desc: Its latent psychic power allows it to levitate a number of rocks and sediment around it as a way to show off.
cobblemon.species.epochbarbaracle.name: EpochBarbaracle
cobblemon.species.epochbarbaracle.desc: It has reached a level of psychic mastery that it is capable of attacking from afar and anticipating enemy attacks because it has seen into the future.
cobblemon.species.epochphantump.name: EpochPhantump
cobblemon.species.epochphantump.desc: When this Pokemon was first seen burning, it was said to be a message from a god.
cobblemon.species.epochtrevenant.name: EpochTrevenant
cobblemon.species.epochtrevenant.desc: This Pokemon is able to spontaneously start burning and suppress the flames at will.
cobblemon.species.epochhelioptile.name: EpochHelioptile
cobblemon.species.epochhelioptile.desc: The small snakes on this Pokemon's head are an extension of its body. Their fangs seep venom and the poison can paralyze a foe ten times its size.
cobblemon.species.epochheliolisk.name: EpochHeliolisk
cobblemon.species.epochheliolisk.desc: The snakes on this Pokemon's head are capable of turning their target to stone, significantly lowering their speed, making hunting easy.
cobblemon.species.epochdedenne.name: EpochDedenne
cobblemon.species.epochdedenne.desc: Poking this Pokemon in different places elicits different squeals. It is a toy that is highly coveted by small children, but very annoying for parents.
cobblemon.species.epochflabebe.name: EpochFlabebe
cobblemon.species.epochflabebe.desc: This Pokemon has made a sort of nest in a coral bed and gotten very attached to it but it can walk away at any time.
cobblemon.species.epochfloette.name: EpochFloette
cobblemon.species.epochfloette.desc: This Pokemon carries around a part of its coral bed around with it wherever it goes.
cobblemon.species.epochflorges.name: EpochFlorges
cobblemon.species.epochflorges.desc: This Pokemon is rooted in place, so it prefers to not move around often as it is very onerous to move its entire coral bed around with it.
cobblemon.species.epochhoopa.name: EpochHoopa
cobblemon.species.epochhoopa.desc: This Pokemon will often prank people and then use its magic to disappear before being caught.
cobblemon.species.epochrowlet.name: EpochRowlet
cobblemon.species.epochrowlet.desc: The flames around its neck are a method it uses to keep itself warm.
cobblemon.species.epochdartrix.name: EpochDartrix
cobblemon.species.epochdartrix.desc: It is very particular about making the flames flare exactly evenly around its body as it is a way of showing off.
cobblemon.species.epochdecidueye.name: EpochDecidueye
cobblemon.species.epochdecidueye.desc: When shooting its arrows, it will light them with the flame on its head and then shoot them at opponents.
cobblemon.species.epochlitten.name: EpochLitten
cobblemon.species.epochlitten.desc: The scarf that is tied around its eyes is to help it enhance its other senses, making it a more adept fighter.
cobblemon.species.epochtorracat.name: EpochTorracat
cobblemon.species.epochtorracat.desc: Its scarf has amplified its other senses and has gives foes the false sense of comfort that they are fighting a foe with a handicap.
cobblemon.species.epochincineroar.name: EpochIncineroar
cobblemon.species.epochincineroar.desc: The time it spent meditating and honing its senses has unlocked an enhanced supernatural vision that allows it to easily spot the weak points of its foes.
cobblemon.species.epochpopplio.name: EpochPopplio
cobblemon.species.epochpopplio.desc: Its collar is made from petals. The colour of the collar is said to change with the seasons.
cobblemon.species.epochbrionne.name: EpochBrionne
cobblemon.species.epochbrionne.desc: Its mere presence is said to have restorative properties and can cleanse toxins out of the air.
cobblemon.species.epochprimarina.name: EpochPrimarina
cobblemon.species.epochprimarina.desc: It is said that as it grows older, the petals of the rose on its head will begin to wilt. When the final petal falls, this Pokemon passes away.
cobblemon.species.epochmorelull.name: EpochMorelull
cobblemon.species.epochmorelull.desc: Its illuminating ability mixed with volcanic ash infected it, making its skin poisonous to the touch.
cobblemon.species.epochshiinotic.name: EpochShiinotic
cobblemon.species.epochshiinotic.desc: These kinds of Shiinotic truly live a miserable existence as they constantly cough up ash.
cobblemon.species.epochsandygast.name: EpochSandygast
cobblemon.species.epochsandygast.desc: The toque is the closest thing it has to a friend because when it tries to befriend children, they run away in fear.
cobblemon.species.epochpalossand.name: EpochPalossand
cobblemon.species.epochpalossand.desc: It disguises itself as a snow castle in hopes of attracting children to play with it. When they get close enough, it will consume them.
cobblemon.species.epochmareanie.name: EpochMareanie
cobblemon.species.epochmareanie.desc: This deceitful Pokemon pretends to be nothing more than a shrub to catch its prey off-guard. It oozes one of the most lethal poisons in the world.
cobblemon.species.epochtoxapex.name: EpochToxapex
cobblemon.species.epochtoxapex.desc: Riddled with malice and anger, this Pokemon tries to cause as much pain as possible to its foes using its potent venom.
cobblemon.species.epochdewpider.name: EpochDewpider
cobblemon.species.epochdewpider.desc: It flickers when it is upset or emotional. It will turn the light it emits off when it is in danger so predators cannot pursue it.
cobblemon.species.epocharaquanid.name: EpochAraquanid
cobblemon.species.epocharaquanid.desc: It moves around with noisy clacking sounds because its legs do not allow it to retain much gracefulness or be able to sneak up on people.
cobblemon.species.epochcutiefly.name: EpochCutiefly
cobblemon.species.epochcutiefly.desc: It is so small that it is sometimes hard to see them. However, they are very quick and difficult to hit unless you have a specialized swatter.
cobblemon.species.epochribombee.name: EpochRibombee
cobblemon.species.epochribombee.desc: It hovers around dirty, urban areas most often. One of its favourite locations is the Orion Landfill.
cobblemon.species.epochpikipek.name: EpochPikipek
cobblemon.species.epochpikipek.desc: They are very messy birds and will frequently make nests in the roofs of hotels or resorts where numerous tourists frequent.
cobblemon.species.epochtrumbeak.name: EpochTrumbeak
cobblemon.species.epochtrumbeak.desc: A vile nuisance, these Pokemon like to pick on unsuspecting tourists by carpet bombing their vehicles while they are relaxing on the beach.
cobblemon.species.epochtoucannon.name: EpochToucannon
cobblemon.species.epochtoucannon.desc: They are typically very aggressive and will outright steal food out of unsuspecting tourists’ hands and then mock you after outsmarting you.
cobblemon.species.epochstufful.name: EpochStufful
cobblemon.species.epochstufful.desc: This Pokemon has haunted a carelessly discarded stuffed animal and enjoys scaring ungrateful or bratty children.
cobblemon.species.epochbewear.name: EpochBewear
cobblemon.species.epochbewear.desc: Parts of its body that were hanging together have torn further at its seams, revealing part of the ghost that possesses it.
cobblemon.species.epochbounsweet.name: EpochBounsweet
cobblemon.species.epochbounsweet.desc: It represents a perfect balance with good and evil. However, the forces are constantly at war with one another.
cobblemon.species.epochsteenee.name: EpochSteenee
cobblemon.species.epochsteenee.desc: Steenee represents the folk saying of 'Within every bit of light, there is darkness; Within every bit of darkness there is light.'
cobblemon.species.epochtsareena.name: EpochTsareena
cobblemon.species.epochtsareena.desc: A folk tale says that Tsareena was actually an angel that was cast out of heaven by the Gods for attempting to lead a rebellion.
cobblemon.species.epochbounsweetone.name: EpochBounsweetOne
cobblemon.species.epochbounsweetone.desc: The flowers on its head secrete a noxious smelling liquid that can cause a variety of destabilizing effects from sleep to paralysis.
cobblemon.species.epochsteeneeone.name: EpochSteeneeOne
cobblemon.species.epochsteeneeone.desc: Its spikes can be launched like projectiles and are often used to break down obstacles or tree branches that have fruits.
cobblemon.species.epochtsareenaone.name: EpochTsareenaOne
cobblemon.species.epochtsareenaone.desc: This Pokemon can remain perfectly still and pretend to be an innocuous flower. When its prey approaches, it can surprise it with its flower's large grip.
cobblemon.species.epochdewpiderone.name: EpochDewpiderOne
cobblemon.species.epochdewpiderone.desc: It has eyes covering its entire body, which enables it to have a full 360-degree field of vision.
cobblemon.species.epocharaquanidone.name: EpochAraquanidOne
cobblemon.species.epocharaquanidone.desc: When it chitters, it is able to further intimidate and scare its foe because it is able to project its voice so it makes it seem like there are more nearby.
cobblemon.species.epochmimikyu.name: EpochMimikyu
cobblemon.species.epochmimikyu.desc: Rumours have claimed that this is not a disguise of Munchlax at all, but the Mimikyu has actually possessed it altogether.
cobblemon.species.epochjangmoo.name: EpochJangmoo
cobblemon.species.epochjangmoo.desc: This Pokemon keeps a sword safely sheathed away near its tail that it can use as a weapon.
cobblemon.species.epochhakamoo.name: EpochHakamoo
cobblemon.species.epochhakamoo.desc: This Pokemon is an adept warrior that it is able to use its sword, its tail, or its claws as weapons, all with equal proficiency.
cobblemon.species.epochkommoo.name: EpochKommoo
cobblemon.species.epochkommoo.desc: This Pokemon adorns itself with a headress that reflects its triumphs in combat. The longer its headress, the more fearsome it is.
cobblemon.species.epochdhelmise.name: EpochDhelmise
cobblemon.species.epochdhelmise.desc: This Pokemon has managed to infest a manmade satellite and use it as a host body to travel quickly throughout outer space.
cobblemon.species.epochmudbray.name: EpochMudbray
cobblemon.species.epochmudbray.desc: This Pokemon is often used to teach children how to ride horse Pokemon because they are smaller and easier to climb on.
cobblemon.species.epochmudsdale.name: EpochMudsdale
cobblemon.species.epochmudsdale.desc: This Pokemon are groomed to be race horses or for beauty competitions because their braids are some of the most beautiful of any other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochsalandit.name: EpochSalandit
cobblemon.species.epochsalandit.desc: It is able to dim the fluorescent sacs on its skin to conceal itself from predators in deep sea and underwater caves.
cobblemon.species.epochsalazzle.name: EpochSalazzle
cobblemon.species.epochsalazzle.desc: It is able to leap and surprise attack a foe, and electrocute its prey using those sacs on its skin.
cobblemon.species.epochwimpod.name: EpochWimpod
cobblemon.species.epochwimpod.desc: It scurries around leaving a trail of poison as it passes. People should be careful of where they step as it can burn through the soles of their shoes.
cobblemon.species.epochgolisopod.name: EpochGolisopod
cobblemon.species.epochgolisopod.desc: It has evolved and become far more intimidating that the prey has now become the predator.
cobblemon.species.epochcomfey.name: EpochComfey
cobblemon.species.epochcomfey.desc: Comfey like collecting a variety of sea shells and other knick knacks on the beach. Thus, it often has conflicts with Crustles for the most alluring of objects.
cobblemon.species.epochsobble.name: EpochSobble
cobblemon.species.epochsobble.desc: During thunderstorms, this Pokemon will play its flute to soothe nearby Pokemon that get upset from the thunderstorms.
cobblemon.species.epochdrizzile.name: EpochDrizzile
cobblemon.species.epochdrizzile.desc: This Pokemon is looking for its big break, in the hope that someone will recognize its musical ability.
cobblemon.species.epochinteleon.name: EpochInteleon
cobblemon.species.epochinteleon.desc: There is a fable that this Pokemon used its flute to attract Rattata away from a town for a fee. When the town did not pay, it lured the children of the town away.
cobblemon.species.epochrookidee.name: EpochRookidee
cobblemon.species.epochrookidee.desc: It is said that whenever you see one of these, a thunder storm is close behind.
cobblemon.species.epochcorvisquire.name: EpochCorvisquire
cobblemon.species.epochcorvisquire.desc: It flaps its wings to create small sparks to scare off potential predators and intimidate others.
cobblemon.species.epochcorviknight.name: EpochCorviknight
cobblemon.species.epochcorviknight.desc: In older times, a Corviknight was seen as a harbinger of thunderstorms and chaotic weather systems.
cobblemon.species.epochyamper.name: EpochYamper
cobblemon.species.epochyamper.desc: This Pokemon has earned the nickname of Man's best friend because it is the most faithful Pokemon. Many humans have domesticated it for this reason.
cobblemon.species.epochboltund.name: EpochBoltund
cobblemon.species.epochboltund.desc: Its favourite pastime is playing fetch with its owner. It is also very intelligent so can learn a lot of tricks.
cobblemon.species.epochimpidimp.name: EpochImpidimp
cobblemon.species.epochimpidimp.desc: It likes playing in pools of mud so it finds itself right at home in swamps or damp forested areas.
cobblemon.species.epochmorgrem.name: EpochMorgrem
cobblemon.species.epochmorgrem.desc: As it ages, it gets a very bad case of skin acne and greasy hair. It attempts to use mud to mask these imperfections and insecurities.
cobblemon.species.epochgrimmsnarl.name: EpochGrimmsnarl
cobblemon.species.epochgrimmsnarl.desc: They often live under bridges so they can accost travelers into giving them food or money in exchange for safe passage across the bridge.
cobblemon.species.epochimpidimpone.name: EpochImpidimpOne
cobblemon.species.epochimpidimpone.desc: It is rumoured to have spawned in the fires of the underworld and has somehow made its way to the mortal plane.
cobblemon.species.epochmorgremone.name: EpochMorgremOne
cobblemon.species.epochmorgremone.desc: It is very protective of the embers in its hand. It is rumoured that it is actually the soul it received from making a bargain with a greedy human.
cobblemon.species.epochgrimmsnarlone.des: They are rumoured to be the torturers of evil people when they make their way to the underworld. They enjoy using fire in their punishments.
cobblemon.species.epochgossifleur.name: EpochGossifleur
cobblemon.species.epochgossifleur.desc: The presence of it in a field is a forewarning of eventual rot and decay coming to the area.
cobblemon.species.epocheldegoss.name: EpochEldegoss
cobblemon.species.epocheldegoss.desc: It thrives in decaying or rotting environments. Whenever it is in such environments, the cotton on its head actually grows bigger.
cobblemon.species.epochsilicobra.name: EpochSilicobra
cobblemon.species.epochsilicobra.desc: Certain bustlers have managed to train Silicobras to perform tricks with its buoy as a form of entertainment.
cobblemon.species.epochsandaconda.name: EpochSandaconda
cobblemon.species.epochsandaconda.desc: While initially it appears that this Pokemon is in distress from being trapped in a buoy, it actually seems to like it.
cobblemon.species.epochsinistea.name: EpochSinistea
cobblemon.species.epochsinistea.desc: The wine that it has isn't actually poisonous... it just is if you've had too much.
cobblemon.species.epochpolteageist.name: EpochPolteageist
cobblemon.species.epochpolteageist.desc: Polteageist has definitely had too much to drink. It doesn't ever let go of its bottle as it's very attached to it.
cobblemon.species.epochskwovet.name: EpochSkwovet
cobblemon.species.epochskwovet.desc: It often perches itself on frozen over trees to nibble on the fruits or leaves that have frozen over.
cobblemon.species.epochgreedent.name: EpochGreedent
cobblemon.species.epochgreedent.desc: It hibernates in summer and emerges during winter. It prefers colder environments where it can easily find frozen food.
cobblemon.species.epochtoxel.name: EpochToxel
cobblemon.species.epochtoxel.desc: It lazes about for most of the day. It often uses a nearby branch to scratch itself rather than using its own hands.
cobblemon.species.epochtoxtricity.name: EpochToxtricity
cobblemon.species.epochtoxtricity.desc: This Pokemon is willing to challenge any Pokemon, even those much bigger to put on a spectacle. Are you not entertained?
cobblemon.species.epochapplin.name: EpochApplin
cobblemon.species.epochapplin.desc: It would ordinarily be able to roll around quite easily, however it is very noisy in doing so because the clamp gets dragged along with it.
cobblemon.species.epochflapple.name: EpochFlapple
cobblemon.species.epochflapple.desc: It is able to organize and mobilize other Pokemon towards a cause with little effort. Consequently, it was chained down because it is known to raise riots.
cobblemon.species.epochappletun.name: EpochAppletun
cobblemon.species.epochappletun.desc: It is the brute force that is able to take a lot of hits. It acts as a sort of enforcer to threaten other Pokemon that annoy their leader.
cobblemon.species.epochwooloo.name: EpochWooloo
cobblemon.species.epochwooloo.desc: Its wool, if it can even be called that, is made of hardened boulders. The rocks are almost impenetrable.
cobblemon.species.epochdubwool.name: EpochDubwool
cobblemon.species.epochdubwool.desc: When this Pokemon is angry, it starts charging without control. The unfortunate victim of a hit will likely be permanently maimed.
cobblemon.species.epochwoolooone.name: EpochWoolooOne
cobblemon.species.epochwoolooone.desc: They are regularly farmed as the bushes on these Pokemon are constantly bearing berries and fruits.
cobblemon.species.epochdubwoolone.name: EpochDubwoolOne
cobblemon.species.epochdubwoolone.desc: To diversify the type of berries it grows, a Dubwool will ram into trees that grow those kind until they fall into their bush, which they then learn to grow themselves.
cobblemon.species.epocharrokuda.name: EpochArrokuda
cobblemon.species.epocharrokuda.desc: This Pokemon is bitter tasting and any unfortunate bird Pokemon that ends up eating it will have to contend with a bad stomach ache that follows shortly after.
cobblemon.species.epochbarraskewda.name: EpochBarraskewda
cobblemon.species.epochbarraskewda.desc: The aura that this Pokemon emanates serves as a bit of a warning to any bird Pokemon that fancies it a delicious snack.
cobblemon.species.epochfalinks.name: EpochFalinks
cobblemon.species.epochfalinks.desc: The six of these Pokemon are somehow able to ignore gravity. Consequently, they tether themselves to prevent floating off into space.
cobblemon.species.epochindeedee.name: EpochIndeedee
cobblemon.species.epochindeedee.desc: It is a creature that has been banished to isolated areas such as swamps and sewers. Apparently, simply touching it can result in catching a virulent plague.
cobblemon.species.epochpincurchin.name: EpochPincurchin
cobblemon.species.epochpincurchin.desc: They are soft to the touch, and and make a screeching sound when squeezed. Strangely, they are used to play the national anthem of a far off country.
cobblemon.species.epochrolycoly.name: EpochRolycoly
cobblemon.species.epochrolycoly.desc: Valuable minerals, gems and precious stones can be found in the rubble of its body.
cobblemon.species.epochcarkol.name: EpochCarkol
cobblemon.species.epochcarkol.desc: This Pokemon enjoys adding various precious minerals to its pile that it engages in drilling of its own.
cobblemon.species.epochcoalossal.name: EpochCoalossal
cobblemon.species.epochcoalossal.desc: This Pokemon is often used by mining companies to accumulate stone and minerals and for its ability to sense other precious ores which improves yields.
cobblemon.species.epochdreepy.name: EpochDreepy
cobblemon.species.epochdreepy.desc: This Pokemon has very small vents so it is unable to travel very long distances but more so sputters along the way.
cobblemon.species.epochdrakloak.name: EpochDrakloak
cobblemon.species.epochdrakloak.desc: Rather than seeking out immense speed, Drakloaks much prefer to perform tricks in the air and create various pictures in the cloud trails they form.
cobblemon.species.epochdragapult.name: EpochDragapult
cobblemon.species.epochdragapult.desc: It draws in air from the vents on its head and expells it outward, creating a cloud trail that envelops its body while propelling it forwards.
cobblemon.species.epochstonjourner.name: EpochStonjourner
cobblemon.species.epochstonjourner.desc: It is constantly playing music from its loud speakers. It can be very obnoxious and disruptive for this reason.
cobblemon.species.epochsnom.name: EpochSnom
cobblemon.species.epochsnom.desc: Due to its small stature, it hides under rocks to avoid detection. If it is found, it uses its adorable appearance to convince predators to spare it.
cobblemon.species.epochfrosmoth.name: EpochFrosmoth
cobblemon.species.epochfrosmoth.desc: There is a fairytale about an old claymaker that fashioned this Frosmoth, and it was brought to life because of a wish he made during a shooting star.
cobblemon.species.epochcramorant.name: EpochCramorant
cobblemon.species.epochcramorant.desc: This Pokemon can drill into trees to find small bugs in the cores of trees. They have an annoying habit of starting their pecking very early in the morning.
cobblemon.species.epochsizzlipede.name: EpochSizzlipede
cobblemon.species.epochsizzlipede.desc: Despite its small stature, it is feared by many predators because if it's going down, it will use its poison to take its predator down with it.
cobblemon.species.epochcentiskorch.name: EpochCentiskorch
cobblemon.species.epochcentiskorch.desc: When confronted by a predator, it is able to move all of its legs to make it seem more imposing. If that doesn't work, it will resort to its poison.
cobblemon.species.epochmilcery.name: EpochMilcery
cobblemon.species.epochmilcery.desc: This Pokémon is the toxic residue that manifests near locations rich in fossil fuels. Its body is very hot to the touch.
cobblemon.species.epochalcremie.name: EpochAlcremie
cobblemon.species.epochalcremie.desc: This Pokemon typically loiters near oil drilling locations as it feeds on the tailings produced from mining activities to gradually become larger.
cobblemon.species.epochclobbopus.name: EpochClobbopus
cobblemon.species.epochclobbopus.desc: This Pokemon's tentacles are so strong that many other foes do not dare try to challenge it for food when hunting.
cobblemon.species.epochgrapploct.name: EpochGrapploct
cobblemon.species.epochgrapploct.desc: This Pokemon lives deep in the ocean. With its tentacles, it has been able to crush smaller ships and bring them down to the sea floor.
cobblemon.species.epochcufant.name: EpochCufant
cobblemon.species.epochcufant.desc: This Pokemon is too lazy to reach for fruit in trees despite its long trunk so it instead uses its psychic powers to telepathically retrieve the fruit.
cobblemon.species.epochcopperajah.name: EpochCopperajah
cobblemon.species.epochcopperajah.desc: In marital ceremonies among island tribes, this Pokemon often carries the bride and groom up and down the aisle.
cobblemon.species.epochhatenna.name: EpochHatenna
cobblemon.species.epochhatenna.desc: This Pokemon is known for living an isolated life in locations far away from civilization. For that reason, it is often misunderstood.
cobblemon.species.epochhattrem.name: EpochHattrem
cobblemon.species.epochhattrem.desc: This Pokemon is known for being able to sing haunting songs or cast spells that can inflict terror on their target rendering them immobile.
cobblemon.species.epochhatterene.name: EpochHatterene
cobblemon.species.epochhatterene.desc: This Pokemon's knowledge of the arcane arts dips into forbidden magic. It was cast out from society for practicing the dark arts.
cobblemon.species.epocheternatus.name: EpochEternatus
cobblemon.species.epocheternatus.desc: A Pokemon that passed away a long time ago. It was revived through the collection of its various bones that were scattered across the region.
cobblemon.species.epochmrrime.name: EpochMrrime
cobblemon.species.epochmrrime.desc: It uses its prop walking cane and prop hat to really elevate its act to the next level because it is no longer confined to just using its hands and feet.
cobblemon.species.epochcursola.name: EpochCursola
cobblemon.species.epochcursola.desc: It is unable to easily move away and free itself from garbage that accumulates on its surface. It is consequently forced to suffer.
cobblemon.species.epochobstagoon.name: EpochObstagoon
cobblemon.species.epochobstagoon.desc: It has finally become strong enough to mobilize a pack of Zigzagoons and Linoones. It acts as a type of alpha to lead their pack.
cobblemon.species.epochursaluna.name: EpochUrsaluna
cobblemon.species.epochursaluna.desc: It is able to shift from a corporeal form to ethereal form at will, which it uses to its advantage for hunting.
cobblemon.species.epochwyrdeer.name: EpochWyrdeer
cobblemon.species.epochwyrdeer.desc: Despite the appearance of frost accumulating on its leaves, the berries it grows on its bushes are highly nutritious and sought after by berry enthusiasts.
cobblemon.species.epochwyrdeerone.name: EpochWyrdeerOne
cobblemon.species.epochwyrdeerone.desc: It is often found on mountains or similar high elevation areas during thunderstorms because it enjoys attracting lightning with its antlers.
cobblemon.species.epochsneasler.name: EpochSneasler
cobblemon.species.epochsneasler.desc: This Pokemon is distrusting of outsiders. It is viewed as the tribal warrior leader that directs other Weaviles and Sneasels in battle.
cobblemon.species.epochbasculegion.name: EpochBasculegion
cobblemon.species.epochbasculegion.desc: This Pokemon is able to blend into the water that the ripples it creates are indistinguishable from wind blowing across the water.
cobblemon.species.epochfuecoco.name: EpochFuecoco
cobblemon.species.epochfuecoco.desc: It tends to sleep on land at night, but will hunt for fish in ponds and rivers within jungles, swamps and desert oases.
cobblemon.species.epochcrocalor.name: EpochCrocalor
cobblemon.species.epochcrocalor.desc: It often curls up into a ball to pretend to be a rock to attract unsuspecting bugs. It can then quickly spring into action to surprise its meal.
cobblemon.species.epochskeledirge.name: EpochSkeledirge
cobblemon.species.epochskeledirge.desc: Its tail often betrays its ability to surprise its prey, thus it prefers to hunt in rivers where it won't be spotted until it's too late.
cobblemon.species.epochwattrel.name: EpochWattrel
cobblemon.species.epochwattrel.desc: It is very fast and is able to launch sharpened projectiles from its wings to maim its prey and close the distance on them quickly so they cannot escape.
cobblemon.species.epochkilowattrel.name: EpochKilowattrel
cobblemon.species.epochkilowattrel.desc: It is an endangered Pokemon but it has found refuge by nesting atop tall mountains in cold climates to discourage intruders from attacking its young.
