cobblemon.species.epochfinizen.name: EpochFinizen
cobblemon.species.epochfinizen.desc: Its curiosity often leads it to wander easily as it follows ships before it realizes that it has been separated from the rest of its pod.
cobblemon.species.epochpalafin.name: EpochPalafin
cobblemon.species.epochpalafin.desc: It is often used by sailors to scout ahead and use its horn to help break down large ice formations to help assist ships navigate past hazardous areas.
cobblemon.species.epochpawmi.name: EpochPawmi
cobblemon.species.epochpawmi.desc: It is normally very reserved and doesn't like strangers, but when it warms up to a person, it will become one of its best friends.
cobblemon.species.epochpawmo.name: EpochPawmo
cobblemon.species.epochpawmo.desc: It is very skittish and loud noises tend to scare it easily. It tries to be brave but it often will run in fear.
cobblemon.species.epochpawmot.name: EpochPawmot
cobblemon.species.epochpawmot.desc: Petting this Pokemon on its tuft of hair is the best way to show it affection. It does not like being pet on its tail so avoid that at all costs.
cobblemon.species.epochtinkatink.name: EpochTinkatink
cobblemon.species.epochtinkatink.desc: It likes to make various sculptures using the bones it collects. It's unclear where it finds all these bones to begin with.
cobblemon.species.epochtinkatuff.name: EpochTinkatuff
cobblemon.species.epochtinkatuff.desc: It hunts in small parties for dragons. Individually, they are not very threatening, but in a small band, they can outnumber and overwhelm a foe.
cobblemon.species.epochtinkaton.name: EpochTinkaton
cobblemon.species.epochtinkaton.desc: It swings around the skeleton of an ancient dragon. Some say the skeleton itself is sentient.
cobblemon.species.epochgimmighoul.name: EpochGimmighoul
cobblemon.species.epochgimmighoul.desc: This Pokemon lives inside a mound of soil. As it grows, it collects more soil to build its mound.
cobblemon.species.epochgholdengo.name: EpochGholdengo
cobblemon.species.epochgholdengo.desc: It is made up of a number of Gimmighoul that live in a mound together. They work together in unison to both attack and defend the colony.
cobblemon.species.epochdudunsparce.name: EpochDudunsparce
cobblemon.species.epochdudunsparce.desc: While it has evolved and developed a longer body, if it finds a suitable host, it will not hesitate to abandon this carapace in favour of the new host body.
cobblemon.species.epochannihilape.name: EpochAnnihilape
cobblemon.species.epochannihilape.desc: It has become unstable and frayed from its relentless screeching. Its persistence is one of its most admirable but also most despised qualities.
cobblemon.species.epochdipplin.name: EpochDipplin
cobblemon.species.epochdipplin.desc: It will find crafty ways to escape its sentence, not limited to digging holes, or corroding away the steel bars that imprison it.
cobblemon.species.epochshelmet.name: EpochShelmet
cobblemon.species.epochshelmet.desc: This Pokemon was the favoured pet of pharaohs in times past. When the pharaoh was mummified, this Pokemon was embalmed and taken with them to the afterlife.
cobblemon.species.epochaccelgor.name: EpochAccelgor
cobblemon.species.epochaccelgor.desc: The bandages around this Pokemon are slowly unraveling, exposing the deeply decayed corpse that is wrapped within.
cobblemon.species.epochkarrablast.name: EpochKarrablast
cobblemon.species.epochkarrablast.desc: This Pokemon adorns itself with a spiked plating before it goes into battle. Despite its small stature, it is very brave.
cobblemon.species.epochescavalier.name: EpochEscavalier
cobblemon.species.epochescavalier.desc: This Pokemon was recognized for its leadership in battle. It can rally other soldiers into battle.
cobblemon.species.epochfoongus.name: EpochFoongus
cobblemon.species.epochfoongus.desc: It camouflages itself well in hot spring areas and badlands, and becomes irrationally upset when it is tripped over.
cobblemon.species.epochamoonguss.name: EpochAmoonguss
cobblemon.species.epochamoonguss.desc: It is quick to anger and will blast out heat and sulfur. The other vents are smaller Foongus that have grown but not yet evolved.
cobblemon.species.epochsmoliv.name: EpochSmoliv
cobblemon.species.epochsmoliv.desc: It floats in small schools at the bottom of the sea. It is able to use the gem on its head to emit a bright flash to scare away predators.
cobblemon.species.epochdolliv.name: EpochDolliv
cobblemon.species.epochdolliv.desc: It tends to cluster near shipwrecks as it likes to salvage the treasures aboard for its own crown.
cobblemon.species.epocharboliva.name: EpochArboliva
cobblemon.species.epocharboliva.desc: When cornered, it has the ability to spray a toxic fluid or use its psychic powers to disable a predator.
cobblemon.species.epochgrowlitheone.name: EpochGrowlitheOne
cobblemon.species.epochgrowlitheone.desc: It respects only the strongest trainers, making it an absolute menace to raise for even the most iron-willed trainers.
cobblemon.species.epocharcanineone.name: EpochArcanineOne
cobblemon.species.epocharcanineone.desc: It has a distinctive mane pattern and twisting, crown-like horns. Some view it as a type of deity from the void.
cobblemon.species.epochduraludon.name: EpochDuraludon
cobblemon.species.epochduraludon.desc: This Pokemon has enigmatic origins, but was thought to have been worshipped by desert nomads as a ray of light that turned to stone as it descended.
cobblemon.species.epocharchaludon.name: EpochArchaludon
cobblemon.species.epocharchaludon.desc: It is capable of storing substantially more solar energy than its predecessor; however, attempts to siphon energy from the runes have proven fruitless.
cobblemon.species.epochfrigibax.name: EpochFrigibax
cobblemon.species.epochfrigibax.desc: It is highly aggressive and charges trespassers but its stubby feet often means it will trip and fall over before making contact.
cobblemon.species.epocharctibax.name: EpochArctibax
cobblemon.species.epocharctibax.desc: They are far more bull-headed and plow into prey at high speeds, with sufficient force to break bones and shatter rocks.
cobblemon.species.epochbaxcalibur.name: EpochBaxcalibur
cobblemon.species.epochbaxcalibur.desc: They can collapse caves with a swing of their club tails. The more refined and large their sail is, the more attractive they are to mates.
cobblemon.species.epochcharcadet.name: EpochCharcadet
cobblemon.species.epochcharcadet.desc: This hyperactive Pokemon craves battles, willing to face opponents even 10 times its size.
cobblemon.species.epocharmarouge.name: EpochArmarouge
cobblemon.species.epocharmarouge.desc: A mystic power has elevated it to heights it could only once dream of. It relishes the battles that now await it.
cobblemon.species.epochceruledge.name: EpochCeruledge
cobblemon.species.epochceruledge.desc: Its nature has become focused as it has cooled its attention. The icy blades it bears remain pure despite how merciless it is.
cobblemon.species.epochaudino.name: EpochAudino
cobblemon.species.epochaudino.desc: This pokemon has a strange crown on its head which is theorized to have a dark, symbiotic relationship with it, and gives it orders.
cobblemon.species.epochbergmiteone.name: EpochBergmiteOne
cobblemon.species.epochbergmiteone.desc: They make wonderful seats for children, but if they get excited, they can run around your house and knock other furniture over.
cobblemon.species.epochavaluggone.name: EpochAvaluggOne
cobblemon.species.epochavaluggone.desc: It is a perfect table, with space for six to sit comfortably and dine on its massive, wooden hide!
cobblemon.species.epochaxew.name: EpochAxew
cobblemon.species.epochaxew.desc: Its mace tail is exceptionally heavy, and a simple swing of it can shatter bones.
cobblemon.species.epochfraxure.name: EpochFraxure
cobblemon.species.epochfraxure.desc: It is found in mountainous regions. It typically stalks cliffs and will pounce on unwitting prey from above and impale them with its tail.
cobblemon.species.epochhaxorus.name: EpochHaxorus
cobblemon.species.epochhaxorus.desc: The armor it has developed is equivalent to heavy iron plates. Its spikes can rend flesh with ease.
cobblemon.species.epochbarboach.name: EpochBarboach
cobblemon.species.epochbarboach.desc: This Pokemon used to be a bug-type Pokemon that lived underground, however after being exposed to toxic waste, it is now highly radioactive.
cobblemon.species.epochwhiscash.name: EpochWhiscash
cobblemon.species.epochwhiscash.desc: The significant radioactive energy emitted by this Pokemon has deformed it. It now crawls about in agony.
cobblemon.species.epochtadbulb.name: EpochTadbulb
cobblemon.species.epochtadbulb.desc: This pokemon hails from the spirit realm to play tricks on the living, though it doesn't accomplish much due to its limited size.
cobblemon.species.epochbellibolt.name: EpochBellibolt
cobblemon.species.epochbellibolt.desc: After being exposed to the cold, it grows in size and adorns itself in mittens and earmuffs. It loves giving hugs to share its warmth.
cobblemon.species.epochbellsprout.name: EpochBellsprout
cobblemon.species.epochbellsprout.desc: It is rotting away but is very vindictive and will destroy everything around it in a vengeance before it dies.
cobblemon.species.epochweepinbell.name: EpochWeepinbell
cobblemon.species.epochweepinbell.desc: It screams in agony as it rots away. The sound of its suffering is enough to terrorize those around it.
cobblemon.species.epochvictreebel.name: EpochVictreebel
cobblemon.species.epochvictreebel.desc: It is withering away and attempts to consume as much it can find in hopes of extending its life in vain.
cobblemon.species.epochpawniard.name: EpochPawniard
cobblemon.species.epochpawniard.desc: It enjoys getting into small skirmishes with other Pokemon to hone its skills as a novice before it's called into a real fight.
cobblemon.species.epochbisharp.name: EpochBisharp
cobblemon.species.epochbisharp.desc: It is very particular about keeping its helmet and belt clean. It is viewed as a symbol of discipline.
cobblemon.species.epochkingambit.name: EpochKingambit
cobblemon.species.epochkingambit.desc: It earns more tassels with every one of its victories. Conversely however, it must lose one of its tassels when it loses.
cobblemon.species.epochsquirtle.name: EpochSquirtle
cobblemon.species.epochsquirtle.desc: Initially, people were concerned to find this Pokemon in hazardous areas, but taking it away would just upset it.
cobblemon.species.epochwartortle.name: EpochWartortle
cobblemon.species.epochwartortle.desc: It is found frolicking near industrial areas and toxic pools. It likes to test itself by seeing how far it can launch sludge.
cobblemon.species.epochblastoise.name: EpochBlastoise
cobblemon.species.epochblastoise.desc: It has flawless dexterity and can launch toxic waste at its opponent from a fleeing foe and pick them off with ease.
cobblemon.species.epochtorchic.name: EpochTorchic
cobblemon.species.epochtorchic.desc: They are often found nesting in high cliffs. The clouds on their body help them land on their feet if they fall out of the nest.
cobblemon.species.epochcombusken.name: EpochCombusken
cobblemon.species.epochcombusken.desc: Their sharp claws allow them to scale cliffs easily, while their developing clouds allow them to glide from cliff tops to ambush prey.
cobblemon.species.epochblaziken.name: EpochBlaziken
cobblemon.species.epochblaziken.desc: They are fiercely protective of their young, feeding them and ensuring they are returned to their nests safely every time they fall out.
cobblemon.species.epochblipbug.name: EpochBlipbug
cobblemon.species.epochblipbug.desc: A Pokemon with a durable rope feel and design, perfect for dog Pokemon to chew on to let off some steam.
cobblemon.species.epochdottler.name: EpochDottler
cobblemon.species.epochdottler.desc: Customers love how much fun it is to kick and throw around. It is a great toy to entertain dog Pokemon by playing ball or long chases around the yard.
cobblemon.species.epochorbeetle.name: EpochOrbeetle
cobblemon.species.epochorbeetle.desc: It soars through the air but has no control over its own direction so your dog Pokemon will have a wonderful time chasing it around fields.
cobblemon.species.epochblitzleone.name: EpochBlitzleOne
cobblemon.species.epochblitzleone.desc: This pokemon is still young and quite hyper, only resting when completely exhausted. This can sometimes leave them vulnerable if not careful.
cobblemon.species.epochzebstrikaone.name: EpochZebstrikaOne
cobblemon.species.epochzebstrikaone.desc: It hides in the mountains, isolated from all other than its own herd. Its horns can act as a light source for lost travelers.
cobblemon.species.epochbombirdier.name: EpochBombirdier
cobblemon.species.epochbombirdier.desc: These pokemon have poor eyesight because of the flower obstructing their vision, so they stay perfectly still in order to catch bugs.
cobblemon.species.epochbouffalant.name: EpochBouffalant
cobblemon.species.epochbouffalant.desc: Its mane is said to reflect the night sky; however, the constellation Taurus shines more brightly which is why it is known as the Taurus Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochbramblin.name: EpochBramblin
cobblemon.species.epochbramblin.desc: It is often confused as an inanimate coral bed, which it finds incredibly annoying. It dislikes scuba divers that try to touch it.
cobblemon.species.epochbrambleghast.name: EpochBrambleghast
cobblemon.species.epochbrambleghast.desc: Other underwater Pokemon will often attempt to feed on it thinking it is a coral bed, but it will impale them with its coral thorns.
cobblemon.species.epochbronzorone.name: EpochBronzorOne
cobblemon.species.epochbronzorone.desc: It is said to be cursed and you can hear the faint whispers of souls trapped within it if you listen closely.
cobblemon.species.epochbronzongone.name: EpochBronzongOne
cobblemon.species.epochbronzongone.desc: Fables say that if you see one, it is a harbinger of great misfortune that will soon befall you.
cobblemon.species.epochbruxish.name: EpochBruxish
cobblemon.species.epochbruxish.desc: These Pokemon roam the ocean hunting prey. They are pretty friendly to humans and have inspired cosmetics in some regions.
cobblemon.species.epochbunnelby.name: EpochBunnelby
cobblemon.species.epochbunnelby.desc: They are commonly viewed as a nuisance as they will frequently raid and steal supplies from small desert towns.
cobblemon.species.epochdiggersby.name: EpochDiggersby
cobblemon.species.epochdiggersby.desc: It has put aside its days of small crimes and theft to become an upstanding citizen of the law.
cobblemon.species.epochburmy.name: EpochBurmy
cobblemon.species.epochburmy.desc: This Pokemon is a little insecure about its appearance, so it cloaks itself in crystal-laced mud to make itself prettier.
cobblemon.species.epochwormadam.name: EpochWormadam
cobblemon.species.epochwormadam.desc: This Pokemon became nice and cozy in the crystal burrow it made for itself, that it hardened around it preventing it from metamorphosizing into Mothim.
cobblemon.species.epochmothim.name: EpochMothim
cobblemon.species.epochmothim.desc: As it clings to cave walls, it is actually responsible for the glow in some caves rather than crystals.
cobblemon.species.epochcacneaone.name: EpochCacneaOne
cobblemon.species.epochcacneaone.desc: It was horribly deformed after a fire severely burned the ecosystem around it, but it was able to adapt.
cobblemon.species.epochcacturneone.name: EpochCacturneOne
cobblemon.species.epochcacturneone.desc: You should be aware when you see it in lush forests, because it simply means that it hasn't yet caused a wildfire.
cobblemon.species.epochcapsakid.name: EpochCapsakid
cobblemon.species.epochcapsakid.desc: Its saliva is highly acidic but also uniquely sour to taste. It can convert that acid to electrical energy using a special organ in its brain.
cobblemon.species.epochscovillain.name: EpochScovillain
cobblemon.species.epochscovillain.desc: Scovillain's heads work in tandem when hunting, with the lemon head paralyzing prey with shocks while the Lime head douses them in acid.
cobblemon.species.epochcetoddle.name: EpochCetoddle
cobblemon.species.epochcetoddle.desc: It likes to compete with others within its pod for who can leap the furthest out of the water and make the biggest splash.
cobblemon.species.epochcetitan.name: EpochCetitan
cobblemon.species.epochcetitan.desc: This Pokemon's horn is made out of a rare mineral, making them the unfortunate subject of poachers.
cobblemon.species.epochcetoddleone.name: EpochCetoddleOne
cobblemon.species.epochcetoddleone.desc: They like eating space debris and expel energy when they're finished eating, making them very useful to space agencies.
cobblemon.species.epochcetitanone.name: EpochCetitanOne
cobblemon.species.epochcetitanone.desc: They drift through space feeding on space debris and material, collecting it into their mouths and converting it into pure energy.
cobblemon.species.epochcharmanderone.des: It has 151 unique ommatidia, which allows it to see exceptionally well at night. It is an excellent predator despite its small stature.
cobblemon.species.epochcharmeleonone.des: It has begun to grow wings and a small horn on its head. The horn will fall off when it evolves, but for now it needs the defensive utility.
cobblemon.species.epochcharizardone.name: EpochCharizardOne
cobblemon.species.epochcharizardone.desc: Its webbed wings leave behind a slick substance that tips off possible prey about its presence. It is often detected too late though.
cobblemon.species.epochgrubbin.name: EpochGrubbin
cobblemon.species.epochgrubbin.desc: It uses its rail-like mandibles to focus light from its bulb into bursts capable of melting rock, which it then eats.
cobblemon.species.epochcharjabug.name: EpochCharjabug
cobblemon.species.epochcharjabug.desc: You know a Charjabug is around when your appliances do not work, as it has been feeding off the electrical current that powers them.
cobblemon.species.epochvikavolt.name: EpochVikavolt
cobblemon.species.epochvikavolt.desc: It primarily subsists on solar energy, but on occasion will melt and eat sources of metal to maintain its physical body.
cobblemon.species.epochchewtle.name: EpochChewtle
cobblemon.species.epochchewtle.desc: This Pokemon is often used in ground combat to support infantry in wars because of the tough spikes and armor built into their shells.
cobblemon.species.epochdrednaw.name: EpochDrednaw
cobblemon.species.epochdrednaw.desc: This Pokemon is often used in wars as they are capable of sieging enemy fortresses from a distance.
cobblemon.species.epochscorbunny.name: EpochScorbunny
cobblemon.species.epochscorbunny.desc: This cute Pokemon is created when a birthday wish is made. The sound of the bell they roll on helps them concentrate.
cobblemon.species.epochraboot.name: EpochRaboot
cobblemon.species.epochraboot.desc: Their psychic ability has grown stronger since their previous evolution, allowing them to float the bells in the air while juggling them.
cobblemon.species.epochcinderace.name: EpochCinderace
cobblemon.species.epochcinderace.desc: A strong bond with their trainer allows them to unlock their full psychic potential. If there is a bad bond, this pokemon will then cease to exist.
cobblemon.species.epochclodsire.name: EpochClodsire
cobblemon.species.epochclodsire.desc: This Pokemon is very devious; it uses its adorable facade to lure others into hugging it before it skewers them with its poisonous barbs.
cobblemon.species.epochshellder.name: EpochShellder
cobblemon.species.epochshellder.desc: It is the servant of a fallen God that is rumoured to be imprisoned deep in the sea.
cobblemon.species.epochcloyster.name: EpochCloyster
cobblemon.species.epochcloyster.desc: It is so grotesque that merely looking at it is said to drive people insane if they don't die first.
cobblemon.species.epochcombee.name: EpochCombee
cobblemon.species.epochcombee.desc: Combee Droids often buzz around in small groups, eventually causing them to magnetically attach to one another.
cobblemon.species.epochvespiquen.name: EpochVespiquen
cobblemon.species.epochvespiquen.desc: The heat that the Vespiquen droid emits from its vents can burn metal rods in under 10 seconds.
cobblemon.species.epochrookideeone.name: EpochRookideeOne
cobblemon.species.epochrookideeone.desc: It picks away at the teeth of fallen Pokemon and adds them to the necklace it wears around its chest.
cobblemon.species.epochcorvisquireone.de: The skull it has donned helps conceal a deep scar that it incurred when fighting over scraps of food.
cobblemon.species.epochcorviknightone.de: It is said that the T.Corviknight that wears the largest skull is the most experienced combatant of the entire murder of crows that it leads.
cobblemon.species.epochcottonee.name: EpochCottonee
cobblemon.species.epochcottonee.desc: It has amassed a large collection of dust and sand from being blown around by strong desert winds.
cobblemon.species.epochwhimsicott.name: EpochWhimsicott
cobblemon.species.epochwhimsicott.desc: Due to its light weight, it often causes small sandstorms whenever it gets blown off its feet by strong winds.
cobblemon.species.epochcottoneeone.name: EpochCottoneeOne
cobblemon.species.epochcottoneeone.desc: T.Cottonee’s horns produce a small static shocks. It tries to appear threatening, but its shocks only tickle, infuriating it more.
cobblemon.species.epochwhimsicottone.des: They float around on air currents, absorbing the sun into their fluff to create electricity, allowing them to shock predators.
cobblemon.species.epochcryogonal.name: EpochCryogonal
cobblemon.species.epochcryogonal.desc: It is a fire spirit that is found roaming mountainous regions, as well as deep within volcanoes.
cobblemon.species.epochcyclizar.name: EpochCyclizar
cobblemon.species.epochcyclizar.desc: An ecological minded approach to naval defense, Cyclizar's armaments and propeller are steam-powered and it swallows water to replenish its engine.
cobblemon.species.epochrowletone.name: EpochRowletOne
cobblemon.species.epochrowletone.desc: It appears in the midst of storms to bolster its electrical powers. It can bombard opponents with a barrage of fast kicks.
cobblemon.species.epochdartrixone.name: EpochDartrixOne
cobblemon.species.epochdartrixone.desc: It has a more reserved disposition. It will shock you if you attempt to touch its headpiece.
cobblemon.species.epochdecidueyeone.name: EpochDecidueyeOne
cobblemon.species.epochdecidueyeone.desc: It struggles to contain its overwhelming electrical power within itself. It prefers to strike at opponents with electrically charged talons.
cobblemon.species.epochoshawott.name: EpochOshawott
cobblemon.species.epochoshawott.desc: They dream of working in construction and live in cities to learn from humans. They even have little toy hammers they cherish with their life.
cobblemon.species.epochdewott.name: EpochDewott
cobblemon.species.epochdewott.desc: It has equipped a toolbelt that carries a new hammer alongside a number of other useful tools that it has crafted itself.
cobblemon.species.epochsamurott.name: EpochSamurott
cobblemon.species.epochsamurott.desc: They protect their works with utmost ferocity, using their expert planning and craftiness to aid them in battle. They are often sought after by architects.
cobblemon.species.epochdondozo.name: EpochDondozo
cobblemon.species.epochdondozo.desc: It has a metallic plating that allows it to endure diving into the high pressure depths of the sea.
cobblemon.species.epochphanpyone.name: EpochPhanpyOne
cobblemon.species.epochphanpyone.desc: It is playful and quick to befriend humans. Some say that it is one of the most intelligent aquatic species in the ocean.
cobblemon.species.epochdonphanone.name: EpochDonphanOne
cobblemon.species.epochdonphanone.desc: Due to its sharp intelligence, it is able to sense danger and swim away quickly when threatened, but it can hold its own if forced into battle.
cobblemon.species.epochdrampa.name: EpochDrampa
cobblemon.species.epochdrampa.desc: When a person has a restful sleep full of good dreams, it is said that this pokemon has chosen to rest nearby. It seldom reveals itself.
cobblemon.species.epochduskullone.name: EpochDuskullOne
cobblemon.species.epochduskullone.desc: It is the restless spirit of a Pokemon that passed away while on board a ship that sank into the sea.
cobblemon.species.epochdusclopsone.name: EpochDusclopsOne
cobblemon.species.epochdusclopsone.desc: It roams trenches and shipwrecks hoping to trap others at the bottom of the sea using its chains.
cobblemon.species.epochdusknoirone.name: EpochDusknoirOne
cobblemon.species.epochdusknoirone.desc: It uses its anchor to knock an enemy out and drag it down to the bottom of the sea so it can drown it.
cobblemon.species.epocheiscue.name: EpochEiscue
cobblemon.species.epocheiscue.desc: It wears a TV on its head as a way to broadcast propaganda. If the TV is destroyed, it loses its ability to confuse people watching it.
cobblemon.species.epochfarfetchd.name: EpochFarfetchd
cobblemon.species.epochfarfetchd.desc: It dispenses swift justice with the expert command of its trusty lasso. The deserts it inhabits are safer because of its presence.
cobblemon.species.epochsirfetchd.name: EpochSirfetchd
cobblemon.species.epochsirfetchd.desc: It can now do lasso tricks effortlessly around its giant cranium. Alongside other Diggersby, it is able to reign in Drapions and raiding Feraligatrs.
cobblemon.species.epochflamigo.name: EpochFlamigo
cobblemon.species.epochflamigo.desc: This pokemon is often seen floating near beaches or pools. They can hop around on land but children often learn to swim with them by their side.
cobblemon.species.epochsprigatito.name: EpochSprigatito
cobblemon.species.epochsprigatito.desc: It stole its master's wand and refuses to let go of it because it gives it magical abilities.
cobblemon.species.epochfloragato.name: EpochFloragato
cobblemon.species.epochfloragato.desc: This Pokemon is working on improving the range of magical spells it can cast. It is still inexperienced but confident.
cobblemon.species.epochmeowscarada.name: EpochMeowscarada
cobblemon.species.epochmeowscarada.desc: A skilled wizard, well versed in the magical arts. It is able to cast an array of magical spells and enchantments.
cobblemon.species.epochfomantis.name: EpochFomantis
cobblemon.species.epochfomantis.desc: Its antennae are very sensitive and are used to sense predators. They will scurry away at the slightest sound of danger.
cobblemon.species.epochlurantis.name: EpochLurantis
cobblemon.species.epochlurantis.desc: This predator uses clicking sound waves and its antennae to hone in and pursue their target when hunting.
cobblemon.species.epochraltsone.name: EpochRaltsOne
cobblemon.species.epochraltsone.desc: It is mostly reliant on its evolutions for protection. Though in a pinch it can emit a high pitched flute noise from its tail to stun enemies.
cobblemon.species.epochkirliaone.name: EpochKirliaOne
cobblemon.species.epochkirliaone.desc: It can entrance enemies using its flute or its psychic prowess, being able to lull Pokemon to sleep or disable them.
cobblemon.species.epochgardevoirone.name: EpochGardevoirOne
cobblemon.species.epochgardevoirone.desc: It is a master flutist such that its sound attacks can be very painful to hear. It uses this skill to protect its young or disable foes.
cobblemon.species.epochgalladeone.name: EpochGalladeOne
cobblemon.species.epochgalladeone.desc: It lost its flute abilities in exchange for potent venom. It is very aggressive and has forgone its tendency to protect its young like T.Gardevoir.
cobblemon.species.epochglameow.name: EpochGlameow
cobblemon.species.epochglameow.desc: These Pokémon are often found in tar pits and other toxic pools, being common on mines, presumably as a form of protection against predators.
cobblemon.species.epochpurugly.name: EpochPurugly
cobblemon.species.epochpurugly.desc: One of the apex predators of the region, they pierce prey with their tar-filled frozen fangs, which can incapacitate prey quickly from poison.
cobblemon.species.epochglimmet.name: EpochGlimmet
cobblemon.species.epochglimmet.desc: It is an invasive plant from outer space. It is frail but spry, since it can uproot itself and flee when in danger.
cobblemon.species.epochglimmora.name: EpochGlimmora
cobblemon.species.epochglimmora.desc: It uses its vines to latch onto your face and will rapidly poison you or horribly maim you.
cobblemon.species.epochskiddoone.name: EpochSkiddoOne
cobblemon.species.epochskiddoone.desc: They are capable of flight and are very lightweight. They often touch down on mountain peaks to take naps.
cobblemon.species.epochgogoatone.name: EpochGogoatOne
cobblemon.species.epochgogoatone.desc: When T.Gogoats engage in aerial battles with one another, they can cause storms down below.
cobblemon.species.epochgolettone.name: EpochGolettOne
cobblemon.species.epochgolettone.desc: The embers within its central core are constantly burning. Therefore, it doesn't require any time to warm itself up.
cobblemon.species.epochgolurkone.name: EpochGolurkOne
cobblemon.species.epochgolurkone.desc: Simply walking past this Pokemon's furnace is enough to cause third degree burns. Extreme caution around it is advised.
cobblemon.species.epochpumpkaboo.name: EpochPumpkaboo
cobblemon.species.epochpumpkaboo.desc: When you smash rocks, it is said that a Pumpkaboo will eventually come together from the smashed pebbles that are left behind.
cobblemon.species.epochgourgeist.name: EpochGourgeist
cobblemon.species.epochgourgeist.desc: It has become inseparable from the rocks that it evolved from and it now carries them around wherever it goes.
cobblemon.species.epochsnubbull.name: EpochSnubbull
cobblemon.species.epochsnubbull.desc: It is often found on the same ship raiding crews led by Krookodiles. They value their small daggers like treasure.
cobblemon.species.epochgranbull.name: EpochGranbull
cobblemon.species.epochgranbull.desc: They are seen as the muscle on raiding crews because their intelligence certainly isn't their strong suit!
cobblemon.species.epochgreavard.name: EpochGreavard
cobblemon.species.epochgreavard.desc: It gives off the most rank odour imaginable. This is to be expected because it enjoys frolicking in sewers and landfills.
cobblemon.species.epochhoundstone.name: EpochHoundstone
cobblemon.species.epochhoundstone.desc: It's unclear whether the liquid that gathers near its feet is its... you know, do we need to fill the rest of this out?
cobblemon.species.epochgrookey.name: EpochGrookey
cobblemon.species.epochgrookey.desc: This Pokemon is part of a small, remote tribe found deep in the jungle. They are given small wands by their elders to learn to cast magic.
cobblemon.species.epochthwackey.name: EpochThwackey
cobblemon.species.epochthwackey.desc: They use their magic to enter trances that give them bursts of strength and enchant their bone wands to become melee weapons.
cobblemon.species.epochrillaboom.name: EpochRillaboom
cobblemon.species.epochrillaboom.desc: It uses its staff to channel its psychic prowess and further enhance its physical strength.
cobblemon.species.epochturtwigone.name: EpochTurtwigOne
cobblemon.species.epochturtwigone.desc: The clouds that cover its mouth and shell are actually hollow, meaning they can absorb rain very well.
cobblemon.species.epochgrotleone.name: EpochGrotleOne
cobblemon.species.epochgrotleone.desc: The clouds on its shell gave way to absorbing spirits for sustenance, however it can also provide a shelter for those spirits.
cobblemon.species.epochtorterraone.name: EpochTorterraOne
cobblemon.species.epochtorterraone.desc: The structure on its shell acts as a beacon for the gathering of evil spirits, which it then purifies and use as fuel.
cobblemon.species.epochtreeckoone.name: EpochTreeckoOne
cobblemon.species.epochtreeckoone.desc: It was entrusted with a gear, though it's not clear what power this gear holds. It is found in areas of historical significance or otherworldly places.
cobblemon.species.epochgrovyleone.name: EpochGrovyleOne
cobblemon.species.epochgrovyleone.desc: It uses the gear for temporal attacks. Any attempts to steal the gear will result in you being transported to a different timeline.
cobblemon.species.epochsceptileone.name: EpochSceptileOne
cobblemon.species.epochsceptileone.desc: They are expert users of time gears and use them effortlessly to support their attacks in an almost artful manner.
cobblemon.species.epochspoink.name: EpochSpoink
cobblemon.species.epochspoink.desc: They carry around special orbs as they are integral to their life force. If the orb is taken from them, they will perish soon afterwards.
cobblemon.species.epochgrumpig.name: EpochGrumpig
cobblemon.species.epochgrumpig.desc: The orbs they coveted have now infused into their bellies and applified their abiltities and emotions. These forms are always angry.
cobblemon.species.epochmakuhita.name: EpochMakuhita
cobblemon.species.epochmakuhita.desc: It is often used in factories for its immense strength to lift heavy loads and move things around with its built-in wheels.
cobblemon.species.epochhariyama.name: EpochHariyama
cobblemon.species.epochhariyama.desc: It has many civil and military applications. For example, its built in lasers help it scan packaged items, assess weight and neutralize threats.
cobblemon.species.epochhawlucha.name: EpochHawlucha
cobblemon.species.epochhawlucha.desc: This Pokemon became cursed after playing a trick on the wrong person. It now puts curses on other people out of resentment.
cobblemon.species.epochheatmor.name: EpochHeatmor
cobblemon.species.epochheatmor.desc: Its cannon is powered by a superheated electrical charge. It roams sewer and urban areas to exterminate pests.
cobblemon.species.epochhydrapple.name: EpochHydrapple
cobblemon.species.epochhydrapple.desc: When it escaped its prison sentence, it was able to find other escaped prisoners and started congregating together.
cobblemon.species.epochigglybuffone.name: EpochIgglybuffOne
cobblemon.species.epochigglybuffone.desc: It is known for its short temper. When angry, it will sling hot stones using its prehensile tail, but in their haste, can be highly inaccurate.
cobblemon.species.epochjigglypuffone.des: It is capable of heating its tail to melt the rocks that it hurls. They compete with others from their tribe to see who can launch rocks the farthest.
cobblemon.species.epochwigglytuffone.des: It can hurl superheated boulders that decimate the battlefield. Natives originally believed they were demons trespassing in the sacred domain.
cobblemon.species.epochinkay.name: EpochInkay
cobblemon.species.epochinkay.desc: It is the favoured pet of a fallen God. They circle in swarms and flay their victims with their tentacles before they siphon their life away.
cobblemon.species.epochmalamar.name: EpochMalamar
cobblemon.species.epochmalamar.desc: It is able to telepathically project the sound of whispers and maniacal laughing into the mind of its victim, causing them to go insane.
cobblemon.species.epochklawf.name: EpochKlawf
cobblemon.species.epochklawf.desc: Its extra pincers aren't actually controlled by this Pokemon and just follow it around, acting of their own volition.
cobblemon.species.epochkomala.name: EpochKomala
cobblemon.species.epochkomala.desc: This Pokemon rolls up various objects to turn into astral bodies into its sticky ball. It will even ride these small planetoids.
cobblemon.species.epochkomalaone.name: EpochKomalaOne
cobblemon.species.epochkomalaone.desc: It is a nasty creature that hides in trees. It drops heavy objects on unsuspecting prey.
cobblemon.species.epochlickitung.name: EpochLickitung
cobblemon.species.epochlickitung.desc: It is an old legend that this creature took shelter in a haunted area and a spirit possessed it for its own use.
cobblemon.species.epochlickilicky.name: EpochLickilicky
cobblemon.species.epochlickilicky.desc: It loves to harvest spiritual power by eating or licking certain items, or even living beings that have strong spiritual energy.
cobblemon.species.epochpetilil.name: EpochPetilil
cobblemon.species.epochpetilil.desc: Its giggle is infectious and can cause anyone that hears it to burst into an uncontrollable fit of laughter.
cobblemon.species.epochlilligant.name: EpochLilligant
cobblemon.species.epochlilligant.desc: It is unable to hide well, because it glows brightly in the dark. It helps people that get lost within forests to find their way out.
cobblemon.species.epochlitleoone.name: EpochLitleoOne
cobblemon.species.epochlitleoone.desc: It is playful and energetic. It gets made fun of by other Pokemon for its weight though so it dives deep into the water to hide when it's embarrassed.
cobblemon.species.epochpyroarone.name: EpochPyroarOne
cobblemon.species.epochpyroarone.desc: It has embraced its weight that it was previously ashamed of as a Litleo. It prefers to groom its beard while basking under the hot sun.
cobblemon.species.epochnymble.name: EpochNymble
cobblemon.species.epochnymble.desc: It's uncertain if they are found in raging wildfires, or were the cause. They spread flames to their surroundings not realizing the damage they cause.
cobblemon.species.epochlokix.name: EpochLokix
cobblemon.species.epochlokix.desc: Its primary thruster allows it to keep up with fighter jets, while their secondary thrusters can be used to provide speed or help with turning.
cobblemon.species.epochrockruff.name: EpochRockruff
cobblemon.species.epochrockruff.desc: It was a companion to astronauts heading into space, to help them cope with the loneliness of the void without their typical Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochlycanroc.name: EpochLycanroc
cobblemon.species.epochlycanroc.desc: Its somewhat scrawny appearance is due to adaptations to a low-gravity environment. Its playful disposition has not been diminished though.
cobblemon.species.epochmaschiff.name: EpochMaschiff
cobblemon.species.epochmaschiff.desc: These pokemon love to guard random things. As helpful as that may seem, it can actually be problematic.
cobblemon.species.epochmabosstiff.name: EpochMabosstiff
cobblemon.species.epochmabosstiff.desc: Myths say that this Pokemon was lulled to sleep by a traveler trying to pass onto the underworld to rescue his wife's spirit.
cobblemon.species.epochmaractus.name: EpochMaractus
cobblemon.species.epochmaractus.desc: This robotic Pokemon was infected with a virus, causing it to abandon their original programming. It hunts down other robots to fix or refuel itself.
cobblemon.species.epochtandemaus.name: EpochTandemaus
cobblemon.species.epochtandemaus.desc: They absorb as much sand as they leave behind; they get blown away by strong winds but re-emerge when the winds die down.
cobblemon.species.epochmaushold.name: EpochMaushold
cobblemon.species.epochmaushold.desc: They absorb sand at an accelerated rate, generating baby Tandemaus precursors that will break off in pairs when they reach a sufficient size.
cobblemon.species.epochtandemausone.name: EpochTandemausOne
cobblemon.species.epochtandemausone.desc: They love waking up early in the morning to go for hikes in icy mountains. They make a point to stay well hydrated.
cobblemon.species.epochmausholdone.name: EpochMausholdOne
cobblemon.species.epochmausholdone.desc: They have instilled an appreciation for mountain climbing into their young at a very early age. Their little ones now join them on hikes.
cobblemon.species.epochmienfoo.name: EpochMienfoo
cobblemon.species.epochmienfoo.desc: It is made of pure fire. Every one of its attacks follows a unique movement reminiscent of dancing.
cobblemon.species.epochmienshao.name: EpochMienshao
cobblemon.species.epochmienshao.desc: Fables say it is said to be the Pokemon that first brought fire to the Orion Region. It is viewed as a minor deity.
cobblemon.species.epochmimejrone.name: EpochMimejrOne
cobblemon.species.epochmimejrone.desc: A sinister force controls this Pokemon's actions. It is unable to break free and knows it has been imprisoned.
cobblemon.species.epochmrmimeone.name: EpochMrmimeOne
cobblemon.species.epochmrmimeone.desc: It realizes it is being toyed with and is nothing but a means to an end. It awaits the day it can exact its vengeance against its master.
cobblemon.species.epochmrrimeone.name: EpochMrrimeOne
cobblemon.species.epochmrrimeone.desc: It has broken free from its trappings. It is unclear what it did with the puppetmaster that used to control it.
cobblemon.species.epochmimikyuone.name: EpochMimikyuOne
cobblemon.species.epochmimikyuone.desc: It tried to imitate a famous mascot by amassing a a pile of garbage to put together a flimsy imitation. It's up to you to decide on if it was successful.
cobblemon.species.epochminior.name: EpochMinior
cobblemon.species.epochminior.desc: It has crash landed into the ground and assimilated features of its surroundings. It has a very dense, iron core.
cobblemon.species.epochminiorone.name: EpochMiniorOne
cobblemon.species.epochminiorone.desc: These interstellar probes were sent out into the vastness of space in the hope of contacting alien life. It's unclear whether they were successful or not.
cobblemon.species.epochminun.name: EpochMinun
cobblemon.species.epochminun.desc: Despite its small body, it can be pretty sturdy. Its body is solid enough to smash through rocks but it is still very agile.
cobblemon.species.epochplusle.name: EpochPlusle
cobblemon.species.epochplusle.desc: Its body is rather light, enabling them to be fast. They use smoke to block an enemy's vision so they can hunt for food.
cobblemon.species.epochmudbrayone.name: EpochMudbrayOne
cobblemon.species.epochmudbrayone.desc: These Pokemon have a habit of setting things ablaze when distressed. They are kept in fireplaces but can often burn houses to the ground if left unattended.
cobblemon.species.epochmudsdaleone.name: EpochMudsdaleOne
cobblemon.species.epochmudsdaleone.desc: During times of great war, these Pokemon were used to break through castle walls. Many of those inside would face the wrath of searing flame and stomping hooves.
cobblemon.species.epochnacli.name: EpochNacli
cobblemon.species.epochnacli.desc: It is very protective of its candle. Annoying children chase it trying to blow it out.
cobblemon.species.epochnaclstack.name: EpochNaclstack
cobblemon.species.epochnaclstack.desc: The berries it has on its icing are delicious. It is able to somehow grow them naturally.
cobblemon.species.epochgarganacl.name: EpochGarganacl
cobblemon.species.epochgarganacl.desc: It is very particular about staying upright so that it doesn't upset the candle that has been precisely baked into its body.
cobblemon.species.epochnaclione.name: EpochNacliOne
cobblemon.species.epochnaclione.desc: It is a common misconception that mining this Pokemon's ore harms it, but it's actually a very soothing process and allows them to grow more.
cobblemon.species.epochnaclstackone.name: EpochNaclstackOne
cobblemon.species.epochnaclstackone.desc: Many blacksmiths have used this Pokémon throughout their careers. Allegedly, they are able to remember every weapon they’ve helped craft.
cobblemon.species.epochgarganaclone.name: EpochGarganaclOne
cobblemon.species.epochgarganaclone.desc: They were instrumental in the creation of some of the most well-known weapons throughout history. They are able to  wield them effortlessly.
cobblemon.species.epochnickit.name: EpochNickit
cobblemon.species.epochnickit.desc: It is rumoured that if you see one walking around, you are actually dreaming, because these Pokemon never manifest in the physical plane.
cobblemon.species.epochthievul.name: EpochThievul
cobblemon.species.epochthievul.desc: Despite its endearing appearance, it is actually very vicious and can drain the life force of sleeping targets, leaving them comatose.
cobblemon.species.epochonixone.name: EpochOnixOne
cobblemon.species.epochonixone.desc: They wander the cosmos looking for cosmic energy to consume, with anything that dares stop it also being devoured in the chaos.
cobblemon.species.epochsteelixone.name: EpochSteelixOne
cobblemon.species.epochsteelixone.desc: It has consumed the essence of various cosmic life forms, having lost its sanity from the various conflicting energies contained within its body.
cobblemon.species.epochoranguru.name: EpochOranguru
cobblemon.species.epochoranguru.desc: It is able to detect celestial bodies even in daylight or when obfuscated through light pollution with its powerful telescope.
cobblemon.species.epochoricorio.name: EpochOricorio
cobblemon.species.epochoricorio.desc: It adapts its appearance based on the genre of music it listens to. So much for 'I'm into the music, not the uniform.'
cobblemon.species.epochorthworm.name: EpochOrthworm
cobblemon.species.epochorthworm.desc: They circle high up in icy mountains. They like to pick on Skiddo that have wandered away from their herd, by swooping down from up high and eating them.
cobblemon.species.epochqwilfish.name: EpochQwilfish
cobblemon.species.epochqwilfish.desc: It often roots itself down near desert oases so that it can catch unsuspecting people in search of relief.
cobblemon.species.epochoverqwil.name: EpochOverqwil
cobblemon.species.epochoverqwil.desc: It buries itself deep beneath sand so only a small portion of it is visible. It can then surprise attack anything looking to eat it.
cobblemon.species.epochpachirisu.name: EpochPachirisu
cobblemon.species.epochpachirisu.desc: It stores berries within various tree hollows that it can always retreat to if predators destroy its existing home.
cobblemon.species.epochpancham.name: EpochPancham
cobblemon.species.epochpancham.desc: It always has a small throwing weapon close within reach. It is able to pick off enemies from a distance with projectiles.
cobblemon.species.epochpangoro.name: EpochPangoro
cobblemon.species.epochpangoro.desc: It belongs to a secret clan of assassins. It is rumoured that the mask on its front is a tattoo of its clan.
cobblemon.species.epochpanpour.name: EpochPanpour
cobblemon.species.epochpanpour.desc: These Pokemon are blind, and rely on their big ears to track down prey. However, their big tails weigh them down, giving their presence away.
cobblemon.species.epochsimipour.name: EpochSimipour
cobblemon.species.epochsimipour.desc: This Pokemon is able to stay perfectly still to lull prey into a false sense of security before they use their mace tail to pulverize them.
cobblemon.species.epochpansage.name: EpochPansage
cobblemon.species.epochpansage.desc: These little monkeys carry around a small weight to train whenever they get the chance, hoping one day to become a well known fighter.
cobblemon.species.epochsimisage.name: EpochSimisage
cobblemon.species.epochsimisage.desc: Despite its slender look, it easily throw a bus about half the length of a football field. It uses any excuse to show off its power.
cobblemon.species.epochpansear.name: EpochPansear
cobblemon.species.epochpansear.desc: These fluffy little monkeys are excellent climbers, and like to hang around mountains, hoping to hitch a ride on clouds.
cobblemon.species.epochsimisear.name: EpochSimisear
cobblemon.species.epochsimisear.desc: Though it has grown bigger and heavier, the extra clouds on its body lighten it up to still allow it to ride clouds with ease.
cobblemon.species.epochparasone.name: EpochParasOne
cobblemon.species.epochparasone.desc: It makes its home at the bottom of the sea floor. It likes to eat smaller bugs and plankton and move together in small colonies.
cobblemon.species.epochparasectone.name: EpochParasectOne
cobblemon.species.epochparasectone.desc: It becomes exceptionally irate when people attempt to touch its venom-tipped tentacles, because they can incapacitate an enemy.
cobblemon.species.epochpassimian.name: EpochPassimian
cobblemon.species.epochpassimian.desc: This Pokemon's eyes reflect the mystical patterns that the orb it carries shows from gazing into it for so long.
cobblemon.species.epochperrserker.name: EpochPerrserker
cobblemon.species.epochperrserker.desc: It was transported to a colder climate as a Meowth. It then adapted and evolved so can lacerate opponents with icy claws that conduct electricity.
cobblemon.species.epochphantumpone.name: EpochPhantumpOne
cobblemon.species.epochphantumpone.desc: Despite its small stature, this Pokemon is said to be hundreds of years old as it was trapped inside a magic lamp.
cobblemon.species.epochtrevenantone.name: EpochTrevenantOne
cobblemon.species.epochtrevenantone.desc: This Pokemon is rumoured to be a mischievous spirit that escaped from its magic prison and now seeks vengeance on its jailers.
cobblemon.species.epochpichuone.name: EpochPichuOne
cobblemon.species.epochpichuone.desc: This mouse pokemon is constantly training against others similar in size to itself. It hops around in its large boxing glove tail as protection.
cobblemon.species.epochpikachuone.name: EpochPikachuOne
cobblemon.species.epochpikachuone.desc: Having outgrown its glove, it now uses it to hold itself up to get a height advantage. Its new ears allow it to bounce off the ground and glide.
cobblemon.species.epochraichuone.name: EpochRaichuOne
cobblemon.species.epochraichuone.desc: It is gigantic and challenges heavyweights like Tyranitar and Slaking. It refrains from challenging smaller foes to avoid utterly crushing them.
cobblemon.species.epochpoltchageist.name: EpochPoltchageist
cobblemon.species.epochpoltchageist.desc: It is seen as a bit of a nuisance to local authorities because it uses its brush to vandalize public property.
cobblemon.species.epochsinistcha.name: EpochSinistcha
cobblemon.species.epochsinistcha.desc: It is a skilled artist and many people applaud the colourful pictures it can draw with its trusty brush.
cobblemon.species.epochpoltchageistone.d: It is incredibly volatile. It needs to be very careful when walking around as if it shakes too hard, a chemical reaction can go off inside it.
cobblemon.species.epochsinistchaone.name: EpochSinistchaOne
cobblemon.species.epochsinistchaone.desc: People dare not touch it directly because it's unclear whether the liquid that it bathes in is safe or not.
cobblemon.species.epochponytaone.name: EpochPonytaOne
cobblemon.species.epochponytaone.desc: It is fabled to be a shape-shifting spirit that appears in the form of a horse Pokemon. It is very affectionate despite what myths claim.
cobblemon.species.epochrapidashone.name: EpochRapidashOne
cobblemon.species.epochrapidashone.desc: It is able to run as quickly on water as on land, and is also capable of swimming as quickly on the sea floor.
cobblemon.species.epochquaxly.name: EpochQuaxly
cobblemon.species.epochquaxly.desc: It is full of pride and swagger. It finds any reason to show off its lack of lyrical skill, creating a sort of cacophony when it attempts to rap.
cobblemon.species.epochquaxwell.name: EpochQuaxwell
cobblemon.species.epochquaxwell.desc: Its ego has grown in proportion to its musical talent. When two of these Pokemon happen upon each other, the resulting rap battles are known to shatter windows.
cobblemon.species.epochquaquaval.name: EpochQuaquaval
cobblemon.species.epochquaquaval.desc: It has the sickest beats around. No one can escape a roasting, so it attracts hordes of adoring fans and other aspiring rappers.
cobblemon.species.epochrelicanth.name: EpochRelicanth
cobblemon.species.epochrelicanth.desc: These pokemon will fiercely bite and smash into anything that moves in the water. In rare cases, large schools have been known to sink boats.
cobblemon.species.epochrhyhorn.name: EpochRhyhorn
cobblemon.species.epochrhyhorn.desc: It is found deep in the ocean and emerges during thunderstorms. It is said to be a harbinger of destruction.
cobblemon.species.epochrhydon.name: EpochRhydon
cobblemon.species.epochrhydon.desc: It towers in size and enjoys causing havoc wherever it goes. It often goes on rampages when it is hungry.
cobblemon.species.epochrhyperior.name: EpochRhyperior
cobblemon.species.epochrhyperior.desc: With a lazy swing of its tail, it can topple concrete buildings while its roar is able to cause severe auditory damage.
cobblemon.species.epochrotom.name: EpochRotom
cobblemon.species.epochrotom.desc: Restless spirits of greedy individuals and unsuspecting thieves are condemened to become these Pokemon, forever guarding their hoard.
cobblemon.species.epochrunerigus.name: EpochRunerigus
cobblemon.species.epochrunerigus.desc: It is said that it starts drumming when it lays eyes upon a person that shall die soon, but it has yet to be explicitly proven.
cobblemon.species.epochsandshrew.name: EpochSandshrew
cobblemon.species.epochsandshrew.desc: When it is scared, it will curl into a ball and camouflage in with the bushes.
cobblemon.species.epochsandslash.name: EpochSandslash
cobblemon.species.epochsandslash.desc: The leaves on its back are razor sharp and will cut any attacker deeply.
cobblemon.species.epochscytherone.name: EpochScytherOne
cobblemon.species.epochscytherone.desc: These mischievous critters shoot electricity from their mandibles. They are used in power plants for the immense amount of electricity they produce.
cobblemon.species.epochscizorone.name: EpochScizorOne
cobblemon.species.epochscizorone.desc: They are able to control electricity more easily and with more precision. They are able to discharge safely through their orificies unlike T.Scythers.
cobblemon.species.epochsphealone.name: EpochSphealOne
cobblemon.species.epochsphealone.desc: This Pokémon is used by parents to play lullabies to young children so they can get some sleep. Many children also use it as an emotional support plushie.
cobblemon.species.epochsealeoone.name: EpochSealeoOne
cobblemon.species.epochsealeoone.desc: When this Pokemon is happy, the signal on its back will emit a bright pink. Conversely, it will also light up when it is hungry.
cobblemon.species.epochwalreinone.name: EpochWalreinOne
cobblemon.species.epochwalreinone.desc: This Pokémon has a plushy mode when it can be squeezed, and a second mode where its 'fur' is made of reinforced steel and almost impenetrable.
cobblemon.species.epochseviper.name: EpochSeviper
cobblemon.species.epochseviper.desc: Despite its frightening appearance, it is actually quite affectionate. It likes to associate itself with goths and punk rock/ metal bands.
cobblemon.species.epochshuckle.name: EpochShuckle
cobblemon.species.epochshuckle.desc: Its small stature makes it very brittle but it burns up when entering orbit and can create a massive impact on entry.
cobblemon.species.epochsigilyph.name: EpochSigilyph
cobblemon.species.epochsigilyph.desc: Some people claim this Pokemon is not real, and is just a figment of their imagination they saw while travelling through the scorching desert.
cobblemon.species.epochsneaselone.name: EpochSneaselOne
cobblemon.species.epochsneaselone.desc: Its life choices determine their evolution; mischievous, mean-spirited evolve into T.Sneasler, while pure-hearted ones evolve into T.Weavile.
cobblemon.species.epochweavileone.name: EpochWeavileOne
cobblemon.species.epochweavileone.desc: Its fire acts as a form of propulsion in flight, and it metes out divine justice to evildoers such as T.Sneaslers.
cobblemon.species.epochsneaslerone.name: EpochSneaslerOne
cobblemon.species.epochsneaslerone.desc: It seeks out power and will take whatever sinister means it needs to, to emerge victorious. It despises sanctimonious Pokemon such as T.Weaviles.
cobblemon.species.epochtarountula.name: EpochTarountula
cobblemon.species.epochtarountula.desc: Because of its small size, it often uses the snowball on its back to conceal itself from Pidgeotto that might try to swoop in and eat them.
cobblemon.species.epochspidops.name: EpochSpidops
cobblemon.species.epochspidops.desc: It is able to retract into its snowball to shield itself from attacks. It can also use it to gain speed when rolling downhill.
cobblemon.species.epochspinda.name: EpochSpinda
cobblemon.species.epochspinda.desc: It roams around old buildings and historic sites and is always singing a melancholic tune.
cobblemon.species.epochspiritombone.name: EpochSpiritombOne
cobblemon.species.epochspiritombone.desc: These pokemon love to get into television networks and TVs to broadcast fake media in hopes of causing panic and outrage for fun.
cobblemon.species.epochsquawkabilly.name: EpochSquawkabilly
cobblemon.species.epochsquawkabilly.desc: These bird brained bots are used as security. They will rev up their engines and emit a loud screeching when detecting intruders.
cobblemon.species.epochstunfisk.name: EpochStunfisk
cobblemon.species.epochstunfisk.desc: This creature mimics an infamous cushion that makes an amusing sound when it is sat on. It will bite you when you happen to fall for this trap.
cobblemon.species.epochtangelaone.name: EpochTangelaOne
cobblemon.species.epochtangelaone.desc: The strands of spaghetti that make up its body are seemingly endless. It doesn't mind letting people eat it because it never runs out.
cobblemon.species.epochtangrowthone.name: EpochTangrowthOne
cobblemon.species.epochtangrowthone.desc: It has a nice kick to it because of the bolognese topping. Add some shredded cheese to it, and your meal is complete!
cobblemon.species.epochtatsugiri.name: EpochTatsugiri
cobblemon.species.epochtatsugiri.desc: It relies on Dondozo while it dives into the sea because it otherwise would not be able to withstand the high pressure.
cobblemon.species.epochteddiursaone.name: EpochTeddiursaOne
cobblemon.species.epochteddiursaone.desc: It was thought to have died and been preserved in the icy caverns it calls home. It is passive but drawn to humans out of curiosity.
cobblemon.species.epochursaringone.name: EpochUrsaringOne
cobblemon.species.epochursaringone.desc: Its decay has spread, including its remaining good eye. It is prone to temper tantrums, reacting aggressively to any noise in its immediate vicinity.
cobblemon.species.epochursalunaone.name: EpochUrsalunaOne
cobblemon.species.epochursalunaone.desc: Its arm blades are capable of cleaving through permafrost and can lacerate its foes, leaving them highly susceptible to being infected by its decay.
cobblemon.species.epochtoedscool.name: EpochToedscool
cobblemon.species.epochtoedscool.desc: Originally created as a sustainable source of light in electricity-scarce areas, it was discontinued after its behavior proved too rambunctious.
cobblemon.species.epochtoedscruel.name: EpochToedscruel
cobblemon.species.epochtoedscruel.desc: It was a success relative to its predecessor due to its measured temperament, aesthetically pleasing form, albeit less efficient.
cobblemon.species.epochtogedemaru.name: EpochTogedemaru
cobblemon.species.epochtogedemaru.desc: It is said it lies in wait deep in the sea, sound asleep to bait predators. Its explosion can be heard even all the way from the surface.
cobblemon.species.epochtogepi.name: EpochTogepi
cobblemon.species.epochtogepi.desc: It is not clear whether it actually has wings or whether they are just webbed hands and fins.
cobblemon.species.epochtogetic.name: EpochTogetic
cobblemon.species.epochtogetic.desc: They travel in small colonies as they enjoy being able to whiz by quickly, flocking around and confusing people within cave networks.
cobblemon.species.epochtogekiss.name: EpochTogekiss
cobblemon.species.epochtogekiss.desc: Contrary to popular belief, you are able to feed these Pokemon after midnight and not cause any unintended consequences.
cobblemon.species.epochtropius.name: EpochTropius
cobblemon.species.epochtropius.desc: It was slain by poachers and cannot find rest so it roams the deep waters of oceans crying out in anguish, until it can find peace.
cobblemon.species.epochturtonator.name: EpochTurtonator
cobblemon.species.epochturtonator.desc: These pokemon tend to float around in swamps and lakes to blend in and drag whatever is on the shoreline into the water when they are close enough.
cobblemon.species.epochtyruntone.name: EpochTyruntOne
cobblemon.species.epochtyruntone.desc: All theories seemed to suggest this Pokemon was a carnivore when it lived in prehistoric times, yet it grows an entire wreath of fruits around its neck.
cobblemon.species.epochtyrantrumone.name: EpochTyrantrumOne
cobblemon.species.epochtyrantrumone.desc: It grows a variety of tropical fruits on its neck yet it doesn't like any of them as it is a voracious carnivore.
cobblemon.species.epochunown.name: EpochUnown
cobblemon.species.epochunown.desc: This Pokemon has been found etched into the walls of various temples and ruins. Pressing on them emits a pleasing sound.
cobblemon.species.epochillumise.name: EpochIllumise
cobblemon.species.epochillumise.desc: They followed human miners into the depths, unearthing a terrible disease, causing their eyes to turn orange and sprout crystals from their exoskeleton.
cobblemon.species.epochvolbeat.name: EpochVolbeat
cobblemon.species.epochvolbeat.desc: The sunlight mutated the disease it contracted from Illumise, causing bulbous sacs of disease to grow out of their skin.
cobblemon.species.epochwishiwashi.name: EpochWishiwashi
cobblemon.species.epochwishiwashi.desc: Creatures rumored to be made from corrupted essences. When enough group up, they can form a terrifying beast.
cobblemon.species.epochwynaut.name: EpochWynaut
cobblemon.species.epochwynaut.desc: It secretly loathes how dispensable it is considered... it has been building a grudge that brews deep within its body.
cobblemon.species.epochwobbuffet.name: EpochWobbuffet
cobblemon.species.epochwobbuffet.desc: Deep within its fluffy exterior, it has been brewing a grudge that threatens to burst forth from its seams.
cobblemon.species.epochwiglett.name: EpochWiglett
cobblemon.species.epochwiglett.desc: These small steel worms are known to latch onto prey and cause nasty bites. The little probes floating around them shoot lasers.
cobblemon.species.epochwugtrio.name: EpochWugtrio
cobblemon.species.epochwugtrio.desc: A horde of these have allied together to destroy. They burrow through tunnels and strike, leaving only bones behind.
cobblemon.species.epochzoruaone.name: EpochZoruaOne
cobblemon.species.epochzoruaone.desc: It emits purifying light strong enough to drive away other Ghost-types, leaving it a shy, lonely, and sad Pokemon that is afraid to open itself to others.
cobblemon.species.epochzoroarkone.name: EpochZoroarkOne
cobblemon.species.epochzoroarkone.desc: Its claws of holy light are strong enough to burn away the strongest of curses and drive away the most entrenched of ghosts.
cobblemon.species.galaxeon.name: Galaxeon
cobblemon.species.galaxeon.desc: The spatial pattern on its body periodically changes to copy galaxies in the night sky.
cobblemon.species.prismeon.name: Prismeon
cobblemon.species.prismeon.desc: It is able to produce light and colour shows at festivals because of its ability to manipulate the full light spectrum.
cobblemon.species.octaveon.name: Octaveon
cobblemon.species.octaveon.desc: When it grooms itself, it is actually adjusting its tuning to make sure that it is never off-key.
cobblemon.species.arovee.name: Arovee
cobblemon.species.arovee.desc: An artificial Pokémon built to assist in exploration. It's easily configurable to fit different situations. If its operator runs into danger, it will transport them to a safe area.
cobblemon.species.dinari.name: Dinari
cobblemon.species.taltael.name: Taltael
cobblemon.species.taltael.desc: It stores seeds and berries in its tail feathers. Though it prefers to run, it will stand its ground and fiercely attack with powerful tail swipes if cornered.
cobblemon.species.picant.name: Picant
cobblemon.species.surveilant.name: Surveilant
cobblemon.species.surveilant.desc: Using a string of silk, it hangs from the branches of trees claimed by Hellantern, staking out for potential threats. These trees are considered extremely dangerous to trespass near.
cobblemon.species.hellantern.name: Hellantern
cobblemon.species.hellantern.desc: It aggressively defends its nest in great swarms. A Hellantern taking charge will fling its foe directly into the swarm with its tusked mandibles, where it's then savaged by countless red-hot bites.
cobblemon.species.glizyrup.name: Glizyrup
cobblemon.species.glizyrup.desc: It surrounds its eyes with a kind of sap that hardens into an amber-like lens. This protects its eyes from the wind as it glides from treetops with its winged legs.
cobblemon.species.pekohmu.name: Pekohmu
cobblemon.species.pekohmu.desc: It uses electrical pulses to search for delicious roots and tubers in the ground. The tail conceals several sharp bristles that can inflict a strong electric shock.
cobblemon.species.razaury.name: Razaury
cobblemon.species.therislash.name: Therislash
cobblemon.species.therislash.desc: Normally docile, its claws are typically used to shear the vegetation it eats, but whatever upsets it will be shredded to ribbons in a single strike. It can easily be placated by the taste of honey.
cobblemon.species.brainibash.name: Brainibash
cobblemon.species.brainibash.desc: They compete in battles of both strength and wit. When they clash their heads together, they create a psychic field that absorbs the impact.
cobblemon.species.brainiache.name: Brainiache
cobblemon.species.brainiache.desc: Although intelligent, it has a devious mind. It's said that it can destroy things from afar just by thinking hard enough.
cobblemon.species.seigoni.name: Seigoni
cobblemon.species.seigoni.desc: When it sheds one of its spiked cones, it will continue to carry it like a club. It clears out excess plant life from its territory by smashing and uprooting it with its cone.
cobblemon.species.seigoxic.name: Seigoxic
cobblemon.species.seigoxic.desc: A mind-affecting toxin accumulates in its whole body, but is most potent in the cone. Seigoxic's frightening adornment largely appears to be a warning display.
cobblemon.species.seanodont.name: Seanodont
cobblemon.species.seanodont.desc: It lays empty eggs filled with water, then flings them at its foes with its broad tail.
cobblemon.species.chillaxo.name: Chillaxo
cobblemon.species.chillaxo.desc: It creates an ice barrier around its body to store rations for later. If the barrier is broken, it hurriedly gathers up as much of its food as it can hold and runs away.
cobblemon.species.kulapack.name: Kulapack
cobblemon.species.kulapack.desc: In addition to storing lots of food, the icy backpack it wears also keeps its body cool and moist, letting it make excursions into hotter, drier lands.
cobblemon.species.shroolumn.name: Shroolumn
cobblemon.species.shroolumn.desc: It is the tallest of the mushroom Pokémon. It thrives in damp environments, growing massive from ample nutrients in the soil that it siphons out with its tentacles.
cobblemon.species.fishereel.name: Fishereel
cobblemon.species.fishereel.desc: It's not a great swimmer, so it fishes on the water's edge. When it dips its head into the water, it does so to attract prey with its fish-like guise.
cobblemon.species.mander.name: Mander
cobblemon.species.mander.desc: Sometimes, what could be mistaken for a person in the corner of your eye is actually a Mander sneaking around. Using its antenna, it casts an illusion to completely hide itself when spotted.
cobblemon.species.umander.name: Umander
cobblemon.species.umander.desc: Attempts to photograph Umander come out blurry due to its psychic emanations. It mimics human mannerisms, then attacks with disorienting pulses from its fingertips and antenna.
cobblemon.species.trilobrite.name: Trilobrite
cobblemon.species.trilobrite.desc: Using the gem on its forehead to light the way, dark caves are no problem for Trilobrite. They slowly work to clear blocked cave entrances by eating away at fallen boulders.
cobblemon.species.delvalite.name: Delvalite
cobblemon.species.delvalite.desc: Forceful swings of its head are enough to mine through solid rock. If the cave ceiling should collapse, it will simply burrow its way out of the rubble, protected by its armor.
cobblemon.species.lumarva.name: Lumarva
cobblemon.species.lumarva.desc: They live in groups that use coordinated flashes of light to confuse predators that would eat them. The glowing bulb on the end of its tail is highly nutritious and said to heighten the senses.
cobblemon.species.glowpa.name: Glowpa
cobblemon.species.glowpa.desc: It dangles from the ceiling using a strand of its prized glowing silk. When threatened, it dims its glow and flails incessantly in the dark, battering any attackers.
cobblemon.species.cryoptera.name: Cryoptera
cobblemon.species.paluducki.name: Paluducki
cobblemon.species.hydrosaur.name: Hydrosaur
cobblemon.species.hydrosaur.desc: It lives around lush riverbanks, diving in search of water plants to eat. After surfacing, bubbles spray from the spouts on its tail; thus, rubber bath toys are commonly made in its image.
cobblemon.species.shredpole.name: Shredpole
cobblemon.species.shredpole.desc: Sound reflects off of its metallic forehead and becomes amplified. When they rhythmically flail on land, it looks as if they are dancing, but they're actually preparing a powerful combined attack by reflecting their calls against each other.
cobblemon.species.oblitoad.name: Oblitoad
cobblemon.species.oblitoad.desc: Its rumbling croaking can bring water to a boil. After using its call to forcibly evict all other life from a pond it has claimed, it will try to eat whatever's left.
cobblemon.species.snagmire.name: Snagmire
cobblemon.species.snagmire.desc: The mud packed on its fists conceals sharpened branches that it uses to attack with. It will engulf logs and even entire standing trees to incorporate the material into its body.
cobblemon.species.stricycle.name: Stricycle
cobblemon.species.mimentron.name: Mimentron
cobblemon.species.mimentron.desc: It builds up static electricity by running. The brightly-colored trail of afterimages it leaves behind can electrocute anything that touches it.
cobblemon.species.ovimourn.name: Ovimourn
cobblemon.species.funeraptor.name: Funeraptor
cobblemon.species.funeraptor.desc: Once considered a bad omen by parents, it is actually a fierce protector of eggs and children. Should it find an egg that's failed to hatch, it will brood it in its fire, causing it to hatch into an Ovimourn.
cobblemon.species.varaquake.name: Varaquake
cobblemon.species.rexinder.name: Rexinder
cobblemon.species.tarboraze.name: Tarboraze
cobblemon.species.tarboraze.desc: A close relative of Tyrantrum, but from a different continent. In its desert habitat, it reigns supreme, shedding excess heat in the form of raging blue flames.
cobblemon.species.toraiking.name: Toraiking
cobblemon.species.toraiking.desc: A close relative of Tyrantrum, but from a different continent. In its desert habitat, it reigns supreme, shedding excess heat in the form of raging blue flames.
cobblemon.species.toraiqueen.name: Toraiqueen
cobblemon.species.toraiqueen.desc: A close relative of Tyrantrum, but from a different continent. In its desert habitat, it reigns supreme, shedding excess heat in the form of raging blue flames.
cobblemon.species.oloraudio.name: Oloraudio
cobblemon.species.oloraudio.desc: Its booming call is amplified by the resonating chamber on its forehead. The glowing, shifting stripe along its sides resembles a wavelength of audio. This stripe distorts whenever it's making loud sounds.
cobblemon.species.dauspector.name: Dauspector
cobblemon.species.dauspector.desc: It dunks its head in water and uses its teeth to comb out nuggets of valuable metals. Gold is its preferred meal and forms the brilliant golden color of its wing membranes.
cobblemon.species.miniclod.name: Miniclod
cobblemon.species.miniclod.desc: It can fully conceal itself in a cloud of sand in mere seconds. In spite of its tiny size, its tenacious will to survive will eventually pay off.
cobblemon.species.sauropot.name: Sauropot
cobblemon.species.stratopod.name: Stratopod
cobblemon.species.stratopod.desc: It's so tall that clouds accumulate around its colossal neck alone. In the arid regions it calls home, the beginning of the wet season is heralded by the arrival of many Stratopod herds.
cobblemon.species.twintuff.name: Twintuff
cobblemon.species.rocktile.name: Rocktile
cobblemon.species.graplarock.name: Graplarock
cobblemon.species.graplarock.desc: It flings and smashes heavy boulders to rubble to show off the strength of its rock-arms. Graplarock can utilize a variety of brutal grabs, swings and throws to take down its opponents.
cobblemon.species.oxygryph.name: Oxygryph
cobblemon.species.oxygryph.desc: Three pairs of wings give it unparalleled maneuverability in the air. Because it's so light, it can freely leap between clouds as if they were completely solid.
cobblemon.species.gorgonox.name: Gorgonox
cobblemon.species.gorgonox.desc: Three pairs of wings give it unparalleled maneuverability in the air. Because it's so light, it can freely leap between clouds as if they were completely solid.
cobblemon.species.sharpunk.name: Sharpunk
cobblemon.species.spurocious.name: Spurocious
cobblemon.species.spurocious.desc: It's largely lost the rowdy nature it had as a Sharpunk, replaced with a ruthless focus. When it smells something that's been injured, it will track it down and finish it off with its sharp claws and quills.
cobblemon.species.terraform.name: Terraform
cobblemon.species.terraform.desc: Its body is made of a pH-neutral soil. It changes its features and attributes to acclimate to the conditions of the surrounding environment.
cobblemon.species.battletail.name: Battletail
cobblemon.species.battanker.name: Battanker
cobblemon.species.battanker.desc: Naturally territorial, it fends off intruders with ground strikes and powerful tail swipes. If it misses, the fist-clubs pivot to strike the target with certainty.
cobblemon.species.tropichomp.name: Tropichomp
cobblemon.species.tropichomp.desc: Dendrago's silly appearance belies an incredibly calm and patient nature. In spite of its large size, it's extremely easy to miss standing amidst the thick rainforest foliage.
cobblemon.species.dendrago.name: Dendrago
cobblemon.species.dendrago.desc: Dendrago's silly appearance belies an incredibly calm and patient nature. In spite of its large size, it's extremely easy to miss standing amidst the thick rainforest foliage.
cobblemon.species.booade.name: Booade
cobblemon.species.fauxnidon.name: Fauxnidon
cobblemon.species.fauxnidon.desc: Its exterior is actually a hollow disguise made from rubber it extracts from trees. No one knows what Fauxnidon's true body looks like.
cobblemon.species.pikoral.name: Pikoral
cobblemon.species.pikoral.desc: It's teamed up with a kind of stinging coral. The coral allows it to hide among the reef, as well as attack predators when it's in danger.
cobblemon.species.crestoral.name: Crestoral
cobblemon.species.crestoral.desc: The male and female of this species can be distinguished by their horn arrangement. During courtship, the two will gently lock horns and nuzzle.
cobblemon.species.hungrebe.name: Hungrebe
cobblemon.species.hungrebe.desc: On land, all it can do is slide on its belly. However, it's capable of performing acrobatic movements in its underwater habitat.
cobblemon.species.lungrebe.name: Lungrebe
cobblemon.species.lungrebe.desc: Its hidden dragon energy awakened and restored its flight capabilities. It whips up fearsome waterspouts to funnel entire schools of fish to the surface, which it then devours with great haste.
cobblemon.species.punshell.name: Punshell
cobblemon.species.whammonite.name: Whammonite
cobblemon.species.whammonite.desc: Whammonite constantly spar to further toughen their prized, rock-hard shells. If it realizes it's losing, it will squirt ink at its opponent's eyes to turn the tables.
cobblemon.species.elesmoduct.name: Elesmoduct
cobblemon.species.elesmoduct.desc: It's rarely seen due to its deep-diving lifestyle. The electricity in its neck intensifies when it's close to finding prey hiding in the seabed, focusing into its jaws to allow it to deliver a deadly, paralyzing bite.
cobblemon.species.fossoul.name: Fossoul
cobblemon.species.fossoul.desc: The residual spirit energy inside the bones gave life to the rocky matrix around it. It bounds around on the two leg-like points as if it were in zero-gravity.
cobblemon.species.soulhofen.name: Soulhofen
cobblemon.species.shaelseum.name: Shaelseum
cobblemon.species.stunge.name: Stunge
cobblemon.species.stunge.desc: At the slightest hint of danger, it expunges all of the stored liquid in its body, causing its venomous spines to shoot outward in all directions.
cobblemon.species.bristilt.name: Bristilt
cobblemon.species.bristilt.desc: Its frill can fold up or down, allowing it to point its spikes in any direction. Water freely passes through the frill while keeping out pollutants, which are absorbed to give the spikes their potent toxin.
cobblemon.species.clawryde.name: Clawryde
cobblemon.species.clawryde.desc: Once mistaken for a plant, the wooden 'body' is just a piece of flotsam it's attached itself to. It inflicts fierce, whip-like lashes with its fronded heads.
cobblemon.species.tullabaloo.name: Tullabaloo
cobblemon.species.tullabaloo.desc: It was thought that just looking at it was enough to leave a person in a confused stupor, but it's really caused by accidentally breathing in the gas that it uses to float.
cobblemon.species.drambam.name: Drambam
cobblemon.species.drambam.desc: An inelegant swimmer with few remarkable qualities that has nonetheless captivated all those lucky to witness it. When it opens its jawless mouth, it takes in water and filters out the edible bits.
cobblemon.species.takoyuki.name: Takoyuki
cobblemon.species.squicecone.name: Squicecone
cobblemon.species.dangoceras.name: Dangoceras
cobblemon.species.dangoceras.desc: Its icy shell moved from its head to its tentacles to allow room for its three brains to grow, heightening its mental prowess to incredible degrees at the cost of its mobility.
cobblemon.species.tenkoi.name: Tenkoi
cobblemon.species.tenchondri.name: Tenchondri
cobblemon.species.tenchondri.desc: It feeds on lost souls, detected with its sensitive nose. If you find yourself besieged by one, throw a handful of pepper at it, and it will sneeze, sending it back where it came from.
cobblemon.species.gustwee.name: Gustwee
cobblemon.species.gustwee.desc: They fly in great numbers with incredible coordination. Sometimes, what might be mistaken for a cloud is actually a massive flock of Gustwee.
cobblemon.species.elegyre.name: Elegyre
cobblemon.species.elegyre.desc: It uses its beak as a dowsing rod in search of clean water. It's regarded as a herald of calm seas, as entire flocks of Elegyre can divert away heavy storms with their wingbeats.
cobblemon.species.palagaia.name: Palagaia
cobblemon.species.palagaia.desc: Powerful swipes from its tail can easily fell a tree. In ancient times, its fossils had been used to forge weapons and armor.
cobblemon.species.ginkorale.name: Ginkorale
cobblemon.species.pachibrik.name: Pachibrik
cobblemon.species.pachibrik.desc: By forming and shoveling blocks of ice with its nose, it diligently builds sturdy barriers to protect its herd.
cobblemon.species.pachicorn.name: Pachicorn
cobblemon.species.pachicorn.desc: It plows snow to repair the ice covering its broad nose. Most of its apparent 'fur' is actually just snow piled up onto its thin feather coat; it keeps warm just fine primarily from its sheer size.
cobblemon.species.onsentient.name: Onsentient
cobblemon.species.onsentient.desc: Entire hot springs are often formed by a troop of Onsentient hibernating in the mountains. It has a jolly personality, and gladly allows others to enjoy the warm, clean water it produces.
cobblemon.species.stegairy.name: Stegairy
