cobblemon.species.meekat.desc: Theorized to have migrated from a faraway region, Meekats will usually keep the tallest of the mob outside the den for lookout. This Pokémon produces weak electric currents, but when many of them are together they can deliver a big shock.
cobblemon.species.kilokatta.name: Kilokatta
cobblemon.species.kilokatta.desc: Theorized to have migrated from a faraway region, Kilokatta's body is like a lightning rod. They gather around the entrance of their dens to bask and gather electricity. During rainy seasons, they must be avoided at all cost.
cobblemon.species.sproutle.name: Sproutle
cobblemon.species.sproutle.desc: Sproutle were originally just regular pots that were filled with leftover soil that was used to host Beani, enchanting it and thusly bringing Sproutle to life. These small pots love to find seeds to put into their head to see what they bloom into.
cobblemon.species.dyramic.name: Dyramic
cobblemon.species.dyramic.desc: Fierce defenders of gardens across all of Fliga, Dyramic will halt any would-be tramplers with it's awesome strength. Somewhat selfishly, however, Dyramic will often battle others of it's kind for a beautiful flower to plant in it's vase shell.
cobblemon.species.porscythe.name: Porscythe
cobblemon.species.porscythe.desc: Porposcythe swim in the ocean at high speeds, using this to their advantage. Using their cunning but cruel intellect, they slash through prey or incoming threats using their blade-like mouth.
cobblemon.species.krakacobra.name: Krakacobra
cobblemon.species.krakacobra.desc: Krakacobra contain high-energy plasma within its translucent body, which it shoots out when slithering at high speeds. It creates a thundercloud on its head that zaps anything that dares to attack it.
cobblemon.species.fairywoo.name: Fairywoo
cobblemon.species.fairywoo.desc: Fairywoo are incredibly small, and are often found zipping around the smell of sugary flowers. They have an incredibly hard time sitting still, and when they do, it is usually for the explicit purpose of attracting mates with a beautiful song and dance.
cobblemon.species.avalossianslakoth.name: AvalossianSlakoth
cobblemon.species.avalossianvigoroth.des: Avalossian Vigoroth are just as energetic as their cousins in the Hoenn region, though due to their odd diet of poisonous fruits and berries, they appear more sluggish. Along with their stumbling gait, they possess a potent anger paired with a sluggish brain.
cobblemon.species.therierrrm.name: Therierrrm
cobblemon.species.therierrrm.desc: Therierrrm is theorized to have evolved as a result of an actively detrimental diet fully degrading it's intelligence. Therierrrm have incredibly strong arms, capable of digging deep holes or throwing objects long distances.
cobblemon.species.fomen.name: Fomen
cobblemon.species.spirix.name: Spirix
cobblemon.species.spirix.desc: Spirix can discern a person's motives from simply observing them. When faced with evil, they will vanish away from the person's sight.
cobblemon.species.impuglist.name: Impuglist
cobblemon.species.tarturough.name: Tarturough
cobblemon.species.tarturough.desc: Tarturough's fleshy body can often be seen physically pulsing as they prepare for battle. When enraged, their massive arms begin to pump with an infernal blood, empowering them to slice through bone with the force of their swings alone.
cobblemon.species.avalossianvanillite.de: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
cobblemon.species.avalossianvanillish.de: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
cobblemon.species.vanillurgy.name: Vanillurgy
cobblemon.species.vanillurgy.desc: Vanillurgy's melty cream evolved into a flavor far more intense than Unovan Vanilluxe's, described as 'agonizingly sweet'. This delicious mind-tyrant like to use their intense psychic ability to trick people into enjoying it's presence and taste.
cobblemon.species.repteptile.name: Repteptile
cobblemon.species.uroshella.name: Uroshella
cobblemon.species.avalossianparaudio.des: It is highly sensitive to sound and can perfectly replicate any sound it hears, even human speech. It loves to hear fast, rhythmic music.
cobblemon.species.paralsetto.name: Paralsetto
cobblemon.species.paralsetto.desc: Paralsetto are isolationists who prefer the cold winds of barren snowfields. They often are searching for the perfect gust of wind to create a beautiful melody with its harp tail vibrations.
cobblemon.species.avalossianqwilfish.des: Qwilfish suck in water to shoot out toxic quills when feeling threatened, though unfortunately their body shape that enables this is cumbersome for swimming. Avalossian Qwilfish have a different lip color than typical breeds.
cobblemon.species.barbray.name: Barbray
cobblemon.species.barbray.desc: Barbray are an evolution exclusive to the breed of Qwilfish found in Fliga. Their toxins are amplified ten-fold, and they no longer need to inflate to fire the needles that hold it. Barbray are fiercely territorial, using their fierce appearance to ward away would-be predators.
cobblemon.species.alternatron.name: Alternatron
cobblemon.species.mousprite.name: Mousprite
cobblemon.species.mousprite.desc: Mousprite were originally created when a digital avatar gained sentience. They love to learn, and depending on what they discover in both the real world and on the internet, will develop different temperaments.
cobblemon.species.mouscalibur.name: Mouscalibur
cobblemon.species.mouscalibur.desc: Mouscalibur are valiant defenders of both trainers both physical and digital. When it sees people bullying others online, it will personally track them down and destroy the device they most favor.
cobblemon.species.mouszerker.name: Mouszerker
cobblemon.species.mouszerker.desc: Mouszerkers are brutal fighters, driven mad by their fostered hatred of the digital world. They are fierce rivals of Mouscalibur, and will often challenge them to duels.
cobblemon.species.snowtus.name: Snowtus
cobblemon.species.snowtus.desc: Drifting down along the river from the snowy regions, few Snowtus could survive reaching the Western coast of Fliga, and even fewer could return to where they came from in order to evolve.
cobblemon.species.nerimbe.name: Nerimbe
cobblemon.species.avalossianduskull.name: AvalossianDuskull
cobblemon.species.bowvine.name: Bowvine
cobblemon.species.stingpin.name: Stingpin
cobblemon.species.stingpin.desc: Stingpin use their tails as a powerful sabers, which they aim towards the heart of their enemy if they should feel threatened. They are known to be incredibly selfish and envious of other Pokémon, and sometimes even humans. Stingpin will often meet with Honchkrow to trade stolen goods.
cobblemon.species.slith.name: Slith
cobblemon.species.amalgin.name: Amalgin
cobblemon.species.chimericon.name: Chimericon
cobblemon.species.growlain.name: Growlain
cobblemon.species.growlain.desc: A legendary beast of the Ancient Kingdom. Was referred to as the 'Warrior', and was cursed to grow bones as heavy armor to inhibit it's brutality. This failed, however, and now Growlian seeks an opponent strong enough to give it its eternal slumber.
cobblemon.species.morgous.name: Morgous
cobblemon.species.morgous.desc: In a time long past, Morgous was a friend to one of the most powerful Pokémon in Fliga, created as a companion. However, when Morgous grew jealous of its creator, it swore it would attain it's power through any means necessary. It's love of curses has corrupted it's body.
cobblemon.species.marvelisk.name: Marvelisk
cobblemon.species.calligraphis.name: Calligraphis
cobblemon.species.calligraphis.desc: Codename: UB-025 Inkstroke. One of the Ultra Beasts. Its body can fit into any gap, even if the gap is down to the molecular level. Despite this, it's body possess volume like any other living creature.
cobblemon.species.andracarina.name: Andracarina
cobblemon.species.andracarina.desc: Codename: UB-026 Nebula. One of the Ultra Beasts. Inside its cloudy body is a gigantic cloud of colorful yet highly corrosive gas. It leaves trails of shrivelled plants in it's wake.
cobblemon.species.hullk.name: Hullk
cobblemon.species.hullk.desc: Codename: UB-027 Titan. A member of an Ultra Beast family. It's flames that burn from it's presumed mouth never peter out, even in rain. It can emit such a bright light that it can give the illusion of a sunrise at midnight.
cobblemon.species.julimese.name: Julimese
cobblemon.species.julimese.desc: Codename: UB-028 Twin. A member of an Ultra Beast family. It's said that if it were to be separated from its twin body for long enough, it would erupt into a burst so destructive it'd be enough to erase matter.
cobblemon.species.newcleaur.name: Newcleaur
cobblemon.species.newcleaur.desc: Codename: UB-29 Destruction. A member of an Ultra Beast, it's said that it's in a perpetual state of anger that's only stopped by fainting. When aggravated enough, it's believed that being near it distorts time and space itself.
cobblemon.species.chilormangur.name: Chilormangur
cobblemon.species.chilormangur.desc: Codename: UB-30 Leviathan. An Ultra Beast from a far off dimension, this colossal insect was nurtured in an environment built for seemingly endless mutation. Its large tendrils are capable of injecting a harsh mutagenic poison into its victims.
cobblemon.species.operlogica.name: Operlogica
cobblemon.species.operlogica.desc: Codename: UB-31 Computer. A member of the Ultra Beast family, this metal monstrosity is almost completely man-made, save for a small biological substance that seems to rest at it's core. Operlogica is marked as extremely dangerous, as it comes with a rouge's gallery of armaments' to dispose of it's enemies.
cobblemon.species.wushenli.name: Wushenli
cobblemon.species.wushenli.desc: Codename: UB-32 Lion. A member of the Ultra Beast family. Operated by what appears to be colossal humanoid constructs, Wushenli is empowered by an otherworldly spirit that can channel three different elements.
cobblemon.species.armiransceptile.name: ArmiranSceptile
cobblemon.species.armiransceptile.desc: It recides by itself, and is extremely competitive. This Pokemon disintergrates trees and plants.
cobblemon.species.armiranfroakie.name: ArmiranFroakie
cobblemon.species.armiranfroakie.desc: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate smoke. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.armiranfrogadier.name: ArmiranFrogadier
cobblemon.species.armiranfrogadier.desc: It can disappear within moments. Now you see it, now you don't.
cobblemon.species.armirangreninja.name: ArmiranGreninja
cobblemon.species.armirangreninja.desc: It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements.
cobblemon.species.armiranswellow.name: ArmiranSwellow
cobblemon.species.armiranswellow.desc: It can induce thunderstorms to create attacks. It often targets fishing ships to steal food from netting.
cobblemon.species.sandridger.name: Sandridger
cobblemon.species.sandridger.desc: It uses its large metal claws to defend against predators and dig large dens in the ground.
cobblemon.species.alolansandridger.name: AlolanSandridger
cobblemon.species.alolansandridger.desc: It uses its large metal claws to defend against predators and dig large dens in the ground.
cobblemon.species.armirangrowlithe.name: ArmiranGrowlithe
cobblemon.species.armirangrowlithe.desc: Growlithe adapted extremely quickly to its new environment thanks to its excellent sense of smell.
cobblemon.species.armiranarcanine.name: ArmiranArcanine
cobblemon.species.armiranarcanine.desc: This fleet-footed Pokemon is said to run over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. Supposedly, it can also run on water.
cobblemon.species.armiranroggenrola.name: ArmiranRoggenrola
cobblemon.species.armiranroggenrola.desc: They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.
cobblemon.species.armiranboldore.name: ArmiranBoldore
cobblemon.species.armiranboldore.desc: When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left to right.
cobblemon.species.armirangigalith.name: ArmiranGigalith
cobblemon.species.armirangigalith.desc: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.
cobblemon.species.armiranhippopotas.name: ArmiranHippopotas
cobblemon.species.armiranhippopotas.desc: It enshrouds itself with water to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy being dry.
cobblemon.species.armiranhippowdon.name: ArmiranHippowdon
cobblemon.species.armiranhippowdon.desc: It blasts internally stored water from ports on its body to create a towering whirlpool for attack.
cobblemon.species.armirantyranitar.name: ArmiranTyranitar
cobblemon.species.armirantyranitar.desc: A Tyranitar is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. It roams in volcanic areas seeking new opponents to fight.
cobblemon.species.armirangarchomp.name: ArmiranGarchomp
cobblemon.species.armirangarchomp.desc: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
cobblemon.species.albat.name: Albat
cobblemon.species.albat.desc: Albat is short tempered and often throws tantrums when it doesnt get its way. Its downy fur protects it from harsh weather.
cobblemon.species.gremleaf.name: Gremleaf
cobblemon.species.gremleaf.desc: Little to nothing seems to peek a Gremleaf's curiosity, it goes about its days caring about less and less. Nevertheless, this Pokemon is known for prancing around the jungle floor, flapping wildly to confuse and startle predators while dancing rhythmically to entertain others- all with a completely dull poker face.
cobblemon.species.tropifox.name: Tropifox
cobblemon.species.tropifox.desc: Tropifox are known as a sort of guardian warrior that protects Pokemon and nature from those who seek to harm it. Their scruff fur is naturally white, but they rub the juices from their favorite fruit as natural protection against parasites. Because of this, they have a very pleasant tropical fruit smell.
cobblemon.species.kindlet.name: Kindlet
cobblemon.species.kindlet.desc: Despite their usual timidness and general fragility, Kindlet are very curious and often stray from their herds when their mind is left to wander.
cobblemon.species.occultlet.name: Occultlet
cobblemon.species.occultlet.desc: Occultlet naturally produces a pattern that resembled flayed meat. This is to deter predators away, as they perceive the Pokemon to already be a corpse. They are said to posses innate supernatural powers, and their bones are used in several pagan rituals and religious practices.
cobblemon.species.dambattoir.name: Dambattoir
cobblemon.species.dambattoir.desc: Dambattoir's flame is always lit throughout its lifetime, even after death the fire will still burn for weeks as a sign of its lingering soul. It is also said that the flame will shrink if something disastrous happens in the Pokemon's life, such as the loss of a loved one.
cobblemon.species.barbay.name: Barbay
cobblemon.species.barbay.desc: Barbay spend most of their time in the safety of seaweed forests with other Barbay. They play fight with each other with their long noses, and even eventually learn to use this skill to hunt minor prey.
cobblemon.species.makrabla.name: Makrabla
cobblemon.species.makrabla.desc: Makrabla love nothing more then picking fights on lesser Pokemon. They tend to keep in groups, and even start gangs and alliances to keep others away from their territory.
cobblemon.species.barrakoba.name: Barrakoba
cobblemon.species.barrakoba.desc: Barrakoba are known to plunder fishing boats of their catches and gang up to sink ships that stray to close to their territories. Barrakoba strive to always be on top of their groups, they often get into violent sword fights with one another to show dominance in their clique and raise up the pecking order.
cobblemon.species.whoopwing.name: Whoopwing
cobblemon.species.whoopwing.desc: Whoopwing are often found clumped together in thick flocks, sometimes blocking roadways and filling towns with a cacophony of squawks. Tourist often catch and bring Whoopwing back to their home region and unwillingly introduce them to its environment, making them common appearances in my unusual corners of the world.
cobblemon.species.miamacaw.name: Miamacaw
cobblemon.species.miamacaw.desc: Miamacaw love to spread joy and are famous across the world because they are often featured as the main events in parades and other celebratory events. They can be taught to sing and repeat words and phrases, trainers often find their Miamacaw repeating entire songs that that they've left on near them.
cobblemon.species.spectipilla.name: Spectipilla
cobblemon.species.spectipilla.desc: Spectipilla are very curious and intelligent Pokemon with an insatiable appetite to learn new things, they are even able to learn to read several human languages. Spectipilla have very poor eyesight, but they are able to use their concave lens-like antenna to see the world around them.
cobblemon.species.chrystalis.name: Chrystalis
cobblemon.species.chrystalis.desc: Pupentre live high up in the trees of thick canopies and reflect light in a wide variety of colors, resembling a chandelier. Their lights will attract prey for them to eat, and also confuse predators that might want to eat them.
cobblemon.species.crysteavenly.name: Crysteavenly
cobblemon.species.crysteavenly.desc: Crysteavenly use their shimmering wings to alter light in subtle ways that allow them to hypnotize their prey. Each Chrysteavenly has a one-of-a-kind pattern on its wings, it is said that the seemingly random sequence of colors is actually a code containing their unique personalities and emotions.
cobblemon.species.umbrub.name: Umbrub
cobblemon.species.umbrub.desc: Umbrub eggs are laid inside stuffed animals so they have a nutritious meal upon hatching
cobblemon.species.trepinject.name: Trepinject
cobblemon.species.trepinject.desc: Trepinject hunt and terrorize stuffed animals, they use them as hosts to lay their eggs in
cobblemon.species.rascage.name: Rascage
cobblemon.species.rascage.desc: Rascage are easily startled and especially clumsy Pokemon, if it feels threatened it will shoot quills that not only shock its enemies with electricity but also inject them with venom. It stores its electricity in its fuzzy cheeks which is released from the quills on its back.
cobblemon.species.puglup.name: Puglup
cobblemon.species.puglup.desc: Puglup are extremely energetic and excitable Pokemon, and are favorable for young trainers who love being active. Puglup often roughhouse a little too hard, but luckily their thick and durable skulls give them extra protection.
cobblemon.species.brusbime.name: Brusbime
cobblemon.species.brusbime.desc: Busbime are extremely competitive and coordinated Pokemon that have been known to master Human sports for as long people have developed and played them. They are favored in the sporting community and have made it as mascots for various football teams and sports beverages.
cobblemon.species.munchkitty.name: Munchkitty
cobblemon.species.munchkitty.desc: Munchkitty's portly body combined with its short legs results in a very clumsy Pokemon that often trips over itself or its fluffy tail.
cobblemon.species.pompurr.name: Pompurr
cobblemon.species.pompurr.desc: Pompurr are very energetic Pokemon and love nothing more then to cheer on trainers and other Pokemon. They use their long whiskers for a variety of activities, including using the tufts of fur at the end as pompoms or as powerful whips during battles.
cobblemon.species.kicsqueak.name: Kicsqueak
cobblemon.species.kicsqueak.desc: Kicsqueak have incredibly powerful legs that allow them to jump over 10 meters horizontally with a single kick- which comes in handy for quick getaways when they are confronted by predators.
cobblemon.species.aggroroo.name: Aggroroo
cobblemon.species.aggroroo.desc: The Kick of an Aggroroo can result in multiple fractures and broken bones, and the knockback alone can send you flying off several meters. It's best to avoid these Pokemon in general, as they are very aggressive and petty Pokemon that attack those that annoy them even slightly.
cobblemon.species.sweetilt.name: Sweetilt
cobblemon.species.sweetilt.desc: Sweetilt's fragile body makes them easy prey, so they hide among sugarcane stalks for most of the day. They are able to produce a very sweet, sugary juice
cobblemon.species.stiltotem.name: Stiltotem
cobblemon.species.stiltotem.desc: Stiltotem latch onto tall sugarcane stalks and use them to walk high above others, keeping watchful eyes on the ground below. Native people used this Pokemon to watch over crop fields and villages over night, keeping thieves or predatory Pokemon away.
cobblemon.species.calypstar.name: Calypstar
cobblemon.species.calypstar.desc: As Calypstar grow, their durable and colorful shells start losing pigment and decalcifies, causing them to become brittle and dull in color. Their discarded shells make very popular souvenirs, a Calypstar shell is so iconic to the region that Qamor's coin currencies contain the depiction of Calypstar's titular star.
cobblemon.species.velverette.name: Velverette
cobblemon.species.velverette.desc: Velverette become easily envious of other Pokemon, no matter how petty and insignificant their desire may be.
cobblemon.species.spinister.name: Spinister
cobblemon.species.spinister.desc: Spinister are oddly compassionate towards young and baby Pokemon, they even often care for those that they have recently orphaned- but once they reach of age Spinister has no qualms dining the child they raised.
cobblemon.species.capsudier.name: Capsudier
cobblemon.species.capsudier.desc: Capsudier act as natural protectors for the environment against pollution. These Pokemon are obsessed with making collections, and they always go out of their way top pick out shiny objects that they find floating in the water which usually happens to be pieces of litter haphazardly thrown in the ocean.
cobblemon.species.nerachi.name: Nerachi
cobblemon.species.nerachi.desc: Nerachi are kind, slow swimming Pokemon who have taken it upon themselves to protect coral reefs and the Pokemon who call it home. They collect garbage and litter and keep it in their shells, which turns the trash into beautiful pearls.
cobblemon.species.castide.name: Castide
cobblemon.species.castide.desc: Castide are sociable Pokemon that travel in large schools with other Castide and miscellaneous fish Pokemon. They are popular Pokemon to keep as pets considering they're cute demeanor, friendly nature, and colorfull patterns.
cobblemon.species.miragill.name: Miragill
cobblemon.species.miragill.desc: Miragill are very pompous, flashy Pokemon. They swim through the coral reefs showing off the color pallets of their vivid fins. But when they aren't comparing who's fin colors are more saturated, they are fighting tooth and nail- sometimes to the death.
cobblemon.species.ciguapo.name: Ciguapo
cobblemon.species.ciguapo.desc: Ciguapo are actually quite timid towards humans and prefer to remain hidden, however they bond quickly with woman and feminine trainers. They especially love to play with trainers with long hair, and they appear to have an eye for women's hairstyles and fashion.
cobblemon.species.sombruja.name: Sombruja
cobblemon.species.sombruja.desc: Sombruja have long, braided hair that it often use as weaposn to whip opponents and prey. Although considered top predators with an immense skill for stealthy kills, these Pokemon are actually incredibly timid yet curious, they often silently follow trainers traversing through their jungle homes, careful not to alarm suspicion.
cobblemon.species.decibelle.name: Decibelle
cobblemon.species.decibelle.desc: Decibelle are very musically gifted pokemon. They learn to play new songs very quickly, and master any instruments with ease.
cobblemon.species.ampt.name: Ampt
cobblemon.species.ampt.desc: Ampt love nothing more then attention and playing cool, but they are constantly causing trouble and act extremely rebellious on and off the stage. They are always trying to think of new ways to do things that go against the norm and starting anarchy.
cobblemon.species.konsert.name: Konsert
cobblemon.species.konsert.desc: Konsert have reached the highest potential of musical ability. These Pokemon absolutely live for theatrics and turn everything into a huge show and often flex their advanced guitar skills to make other Pokemon and people swoon. Konsert's natural instrument- its voice- has an astounding amount of vocal ranges and frequencies.
cobblemon.species.brewpod.name: Brewpod
cobblemon.species.brewpod.desc: Brewpod helped teach the Native Qamoran people how to cultivate the land and harvest a special bean that, when cultivated and prepared in specific ways, could produce a drink as potent as coffee or a food as rich as chocolate.
cobblemon.species.mochrema.name: Mochrema
cobblemon.species.mochrema.desc: Mochrema has a constant stream of foamy substance seeping out of pours in its skin around its head and neck. Its head is partially hollow, and a supply of dark, sweet sap is stored on top. One sip of the sap was said to be a cure all- from depression to headaches to severe illnesses. Scientific research concluded that that's not entirely true, but it still tastes great nonetheless.
cobblemon.species.xolito.name: Xolito
cobblemon.species.xolito.desc: Certain Xolito were selectively bred specifically so they could not evolve. Despite being kept mostly as pets, most Xolito are still very feisty and continue to have a warrior's heart beat within them, they will not pass up an opportunity to battle and will valiantly protect their loved ones from even the most fiercest foes.
cobblemon.species.coyohete.name: Coyohete
cobblemon.species.coyohete.desc: The dazzling coat of Coyohete shine bright and fiery in the cold nights of their desert home. When they reach their top speeds, brilliant sparks and embers erupt from its tail which it uses to coordinate it's fellow pack members. Coyohete hunt in packs at night, and are notorious for attacking pets and any weaker pokemon they can find.
cobblemon.species.culponi.name: Culponi
cobblemon.species.culponi.desc: Culponi are very rowdy Pokemon who love to cause mischief and mayhem. They love to rob people for supposedly no other reason then the thrill of stealing. Their tail hair naturally braids together to form lassos, which it uses to catch and contain it's current victims of its pranks.
cobblemon.species.bronconvict.name: Bronconvict
cobblemon.species.bronconvict.desc: Bronconvict are very mellow Pokemon who feel embarrassed by the wild antics of their pre-evolution. These are hardworking Pokemon who no longer feel the need to steal or cause mayhem, instead they are content with tilling fields and aiding farmers. Their rope-like tails are made with extremely durable fibers, and can be used for a multitude of activities.
cobblemon.species.qamorantyrogue.name: QamoranTyrogue
cobblemon.species.qamorantyrogue.desc: In Qamor, Tyrouge are much more attracted to the musical and dancing scene of the region. They would rather solve their problems via dance battle rather than with an actual battle.
cobblemon.species.qamoranhitmonlee.name: QamoranHitmonlee
cobblemon.species.qamoranhitmonlee.desc: Hitmonlee's legs freely contract and stretch. Using these springlike legs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle, it rubs down its legs and loosens the muscles to overcome fatigue.
cobblemon.species.qamoranhitmonchan.name: QamoranHitmonchan
cobblemon.species.qamoranhitmonchan.desc: Extremely vivacious and energetic, Qamoran Hitmonchan love getting others pumped and energized, they almost never stop moving to the music playing in their head. Due to their focus on rhythmic dancing for exercise, these Pokemon are very hearty and able to take a punch- as well as able to move quickly to avoid attacks. Tyrogue who have an affinity for the aerobics and 90's pop style of music will evolve into this stage.
cobblemon.species.qamoranhitmontop.name: QamoranHitmontop
cobblemon.species.aqube.name: Aqube
cobblemon.species.wapolyp.name: Wapolyp
cobblemon.species.seasnug.name: Seasnug
cobblemon.species.seasnug.desc: When a large amount of these Pokemon move out of an area abruptly, it is said to be a sign of a disaster that is soon to come.
cobblemon.species.clairbuoyant.name: Clairbuoyant
cobblemon.species.clairbuoyant.desc: Clairbuoyant are able to hypnotize Pokemon by moving their bodies in mysterious ways. Maritime legends say that Clairbuoyant would often mesmerize onlooking sailors to jump overboard.
cobblemon.species.pudgey.name: Pudgey
cobblemon.species.pudgey.desc: Pudgey mimic the appearance of Pidgey because their lazy parents- who don't want to raise them- instead lay their eggs in Pidgeot nests. Newly hatched Pudgey will hog all of the food from its nest-mates, often starving its 'siblings' in the process. Once the Pokemon has mooched all the food from it's host nest and feels satisfied, it will evolve.
cobblemon.species.flappetite.name: Flappetite
cobblemon.species.flappetite.desc: Flappetite is never satisfied and always want to feed more. It threatens passing by pokemon and trainers into giving it all their food. There are rumors of trainers going into the forest and running into a Flappetite, and- after having nothing to offer it- getting gobbled up whole!
cobblemon.species.cavacreep.name: Cavacreep
cobblemon.species.cavacreep.desc: Cavacreep disguise themselves as ripe delicious fruit to trick passing by Pokemon and people into trying to eat them, and at the last second jumping out and attacking them. These pokemon are incredibly tricky and mischievous, and are known to fall from the high trees above on top of any passerby below or even placing their fruit peals in strategic locations to make people slip.
cobblemon.species.qamoranpsyduck.name: QamoranPsyduck
cobblemon.species.qamoranpsyduck.desc: Psyduck is hopelessly dimwitted and rely on the pity of others to survive as well as their impeccable dumb luck.
cobblemon.species.gobbledyduck.name: Gobbledyduck
cobblemon.species.gobbledyduck.desc: Gobbledyduck flying in the air is a bizarre sight to see, its long neck whips around in the air as it flies backwards in any which direction.
cobblemon.species.virchia.name: Virchia
cobblemon.species.virchia.desc: It is generally known to be very friendly in its early days, and will seek out injured Pokemon to help even if it puts itself in danger.
cobblemon.species.impetal.name: Impetal
cobblemon.species.impetal.desc: Impetal has an insatiable craving to consume and cannibalize other fairy type Pokemon. It traps fairy type Pokemon using its cunning skills to lead them to their doom.
cobblemon.species.numby.name: Numby
cobblemon.species.numby.desc: Numby's source of power come from the yellow orb on its forehead which contains an oddly large concentration of static electricity within.. Numby like to collect socks and are known to steal them from laundromats.
cobblemon.species.munsun.name: Munsun
cobblemon.species.munsun.desc: Munsun are often seen as symbols of childishness and whimsy, despite their constant pouty face. The orb they carry around is the source of their power, without it they would not be able to generate electricity or create cloud platforms. As they gain experience, their orb grows in size and power.
cobblemon.species.thermoni.name: Thermoni
cobblemon.species.thermoni.desc: Thermoni live high up in the atmosphere and lounge around in the highest mountains of Qamor. They are incredibly aggressive and territorial and tend to get into vicious fights with one another to display dominance. Thermoni channel their immense electric power through their orbs, it also helps them concentrate and keep calm. If they were to lose their orb they would succumb to an intense straight of anger until the orb is back in their possession.
cobblemon.species.peritwinkle.name: Peritwinkle
cobblemon.species.peritwinkle.desc: It produces a soft and gentle light said to bring pleasant dreams and a full nights sleep, children often use it as a night light.
cobblemon.species.keclekid.name: Keclekid
cobblemon.species.keclekid.desc: Keclekid's body will involuntarily change color depending on its current mood. As this Pokemon develops, it associates colors with specific emotional responses so trainers have to be weary of minor color choices in even their wardrobe to keep it comfortable.
cobblemon.species.paposy.name: Paposy
cobblemon.species.paposy.desc: Paposy live around shallow and still water of the jungles and rain-forests they call home. They are said to smell very pleasantly, domesticated Paposy also happen to be great helpers in gardens.
cobblemon.species.ancaleana.name: Ancaleana
cobblemon.species.ancaleana.desc: Ancaleana live in thick rain forests and other humid areas, one might catch a glimpse of their gorgeous wings flying in the canopy above. Their heads and wings are crested with vibrant flowers which they use to attract a mate or companions.
cobblemon.species.belublebug.name: Belublebug
cobblemon.species.belublebug.desc: Once a Belublebug finds its soulmate, the two are paired for life and never leave each other's sides. They have difficulty flying alone due to their weak wings, but two together are able to support their collective weight.
cobblemon.species.norsery.name: Norsery
cobblemon.species.forflush.name: Forflush
cobblemon.species.forflush.desc: Forflush spend most of their life in a confused yet relaxed state due to the gasses that they release often at times of extreme stress. Not only can the gasses ward off predators and is completely harmless to this pokemon, but it also acts as a sort of stress reliever to them.
cobblemon.species.sycelium.name: Sycelium
cobblemon.species.sycelium.desc: Sycelium are covered with odd with odd tumor-like lumps filled with a peculiar amount of neurological activity that are even capable of sending signals to other parts of the Sycelium’s body. Sycelium are known to act conflicted or confused, as if battling the commands of its multiple minds.
cobblemon.species.cerecybim.name: Cerecybim
cobblemon.species.cerecybim.desc: Each Cerecybin has a collection of fully functional brains peppered throughout its body, working in a sort of hive mind where they work with each other and share their thoughts throughout the whole cluster. Cerecybin's gas is toxic, and breathing in too much is said to cause mutations in an organism's body.
cobblemon.species.somberscribe.name: Somberscribe
cobblemon.species.somberscribe.desc: Somberscribe secrete a thick, ink-like substance from their bodies that are said to have sinister properties. Scriptures and tomes written with a Sombercribe’s ink are said to be cursed, and will bring misfortune to those who wrote and read it.
cobblemon.species.qamoranseel.name: QamoranSeel
cobblemon.species.qamoranseel.desc: In the Qamor Region, Seel have adapted to living in the warm, humid wetlands to the east. Their diet now mostly composes of sea grass, and they are such slow swimmers that they often get themselves covered in moss and algae.
cobblemon.species.qamorandewgong.name: QamoranDewgong
cobblemon.species.qamorandewgong.desc: Dewgong in the Qamor region are able to alter the humidity of the air around them to remain comfortable- they prefer the air being very thick and damp. They are an endangered species due to the historical carelessness of Humans.
cobblemon.species.grimgrin.name: Grimgrin
cobblemon.species.grimgrin.desc: Grimgrin are known for large, unblinking eyes and unsettling smile. They tend to stare down anyone who goes near them, with the same unmoving and unwavering expression.
cobblemon.species.gibboor.name: Gibboor
cobblemon.species.gibboor.desc: Due to their flexibility and astounding reflexes, Gibboor able to contort its body in odd and sometime unsettling angles in order to see in any directions.
cobblemon.species.grimandrill.name: Grimandrill
cobblemon.species.grimandrill.desc: Grimandril stalk their prey for hours, silently staring them down from behind thickets of trees and bushes. The more agitated they become, the bigger the smile gets. This Pokemon's cry is known to sound uncannily human-like.
cobblemon.species.pappybara.name: Pappybara
cobblemon.species.pappybara.desc: Pappybara always have litters of 3, and will often adopt different species of Pokemon into its family.
cobblemon.species.popondot.name: Popondot
cobblemon.species.refereef.name: Refereef
cobblemon.species.semiphrawn.name: Semiphrawn
cobblemon.species.crabanner.name: Crabanner
cobblemon.species.snipspawn.name: Snipspawn
cobblemon.species.snipspawn.desc: Locals say that Snipspawn literally tastes like vomit however you try preparing it, as a result they have very little predators and are usually avoided by fishermen.
cobblemon.species.bogbile.name: Bogbile
cobblemon.species.tottapotta.name: Tottapotta
cobblemon.species.tottapotta.desc: Chamot find abandoned clay pots to protect themselves from the harsh environment. During ancient times, tribesmen would often adorn their Chamot's pots with gold and silver embellishments.
cobblemon.species.terradobe.name: Terradobe
cobblemon.species.terradobe.desc: Terradobe carry complete ecosystems on their back, many different types poke Pokemon will often use it as shelter. Terradobe are considered protective spirits of Qamoran ruins.
cobblemon.species.magmead.name: Magmead
cobblemon.species.magmead.desc: Magmead live in cavernous colonies that stretch sometimes miles beneath the sandy surface. They can go days and days without eating as long as their elastic abdomen is filled with a sweet, honey-like substance they produce to ration food.
cobblemon.species.nectarmite.name: Nectarmite
cobblemon.species.nectarmite.desc: Nectarmite work diligently in their nests keeping out dangerous Pokemon, attacking intruders, and caring for their young. They cling to ceilings so when an unsuspecting foe walks by they can usher a sneak attack from above. They are able to absorb and add an organism's energy directly into their sap reserve.
cobblemon.species.disgaze.name: Disgaze
cobblemon.species.disgaze.desc: Disgaze trick and catch prey by swinging it's spider-like tail high in the air, baiting bird-Pokemon to swoop down while striking them at the last second.
cobblemon.species.hissteric.name: Hissteric
cobblemon.species.hissteric.desc: Hissteric no longer use their tails purely as a defense mechanism, now they use it to entertain themselves by startling others and laughing at their misfortune. Their TRUE defense mechanism is comedy.
cobblemon.species.dashkite.name: Dashkite
cobblemon.species.dashkite.desc: Dashkite are easily startled Pokemon and difficult to catch because they often run in the opposite direction when confronted by trainers
cobblemon.species.zipstream.name: Zipstream
cobblemon.species.zipstream.desc: Zipstream love to race one another and determine which of their flock is the fastest. Their competitions often leave strong dust storms in their wakes.
cobblemon.species.cassowatt.name: Cassowatt
cobblemon.species.cassowatt.desc: Cassowatt's aerodynamic shape allows it to easily reach incredible speeds, race car manufacturers have used its morphology for designing the fastest cars in the world.
cobblemon.species.qamoranrabsca.name: QamoranRabsca
cobblemon.species.qamoranrabsca.desc: Recover Normal Memento Dark Weather Ball Normal Cosmic Power Psychic
cobblemon.species.spooksew.name: Spooksew
cobblemon.species.spooksew.desc: Planchelt are said to be the souls of children who misused their toys and tortured harmless creatures, cursed to live in a the body of a raggedy little ball of fluff. They are actually quite cheerful Pokemon, and enjoy playing with one another and collecting trinkets.
cobblemon.species.effigeam.name: Effigeam
cobblemon.species.effigeam.desc: Effigeam are very empathetic Pokemon that feel the emotions of those around them, and often make others feel their emotions. When their friends gets seriously injured, they would offer up their own stuffing or felt and insist on patching them back up.
cobblemon.species.hollowhusk.name: Hollowhusk
cobblemon.species.hollowhusk.desc: Hollohusk come into existence when the child-like docile spirit from its preevolutions are released from the Pokemon's body, leaving behind only sinister emotions and evil energy. They are known for being pretty sadistic, and enjoy torturing other Pokemon for reasons unknown.
cobblemon.species.planchelt.name: Planchelt
cobblemon.species.planchelt.desc: Planchelt are said to be the souls of children who misused their toys and tortured harmless creatures, cursed to live in a the body of a raggedy little ball of fluff. They are actually quite cheerful Pokemon, and enjoy playing with one another and collecting trinkets.
cobblemon.species.rubee.name: Rubee
cobblemon.species.rubee.desc: Rubee are mischievous Pokemon primarily found living inside factories, and love playing around mechanical parts and sometimes messing them up.
cobblemon.species.beimota.name: Beimota
cobblemon.species.beimota.desc: Beimota love playing pranks on unsuspecting factory workers, which range from simple stuff like misplacing their tools to shocking them full of electricity. They have a strange mental connection with technology, and can somehow communicate with and through electronics.
cobblemon.species.qamorantangrowth.name: QamoranTangrowth
cobblemon.species.qamorantangela.name: QamoranTangela
cobblemon.species.servolt.name: Servolt
cobblemon.species.servolt.desc: Servolt are very strong willed and won't give up a fight easily. They spend most of their time swatting and preying on smaller Pokemon, practicing their hunting skill.
cobblemon.species.joulereign.name: Joulereign
cobblemon.species.joulereign.desc: Joulereign Move with immense speed that leave a trail of static electricity in its wake. They are characterized by their ebony black, rich fur that they constantly groom and their shimmering diamond-shaped spots throughout its body.
cobblemon.species.qamorancubchoo.name: QamoranCubchoo
cobblemon.species.qamoranbeartic.name: QamoranBeartic
cobblemon.species.chkachuru.name: Chkachuru
cobblemon.species.chkachuru.desc: Ch’kicha were benevolent spirits that started playing the musical instruments after they were amazed by the tribesmen's musical abilities. When this Pokemon sleeps, it reverts back into a lifeless maraca.
cobblemon.species.parumpum.name: Parumpum
cobblemon.species.parumpum.desc: During battles of tribes, native Qamorans would always take Parumpum out to help sync the warriors with one another, and pump them up for the fight.
cobblemon.species.dokudurru.name: Dokudurru
cobblemon.species.dokudurru.desc: Dokuduru are able to play rhythms in certain frequencies that effect creatures and entities on another plane of existence, ancient Qamorans would use their skill to dispel evil and malevolent spirits from the mortal coil.
cobblemon.species.cragato.name: Cragato
cobblemon.species.resistreak.name: Resistreak
cobblemon.species.chiticonch.name: Chiticonch
cobblemon.species.harperyl.name: Harperyl
cobblemon.species.brinbait.name: Brinbait
cobblemon.species.aleglarlure.name: Aleglarlure
cobblemon.species.blubuoy.name: Blubuoy
cobblemon.species.albacross.name: Albacross
cobblemon.species.curbludgeon.name: Curbludgeon
cobblemon.species.qamoranspoink.name: QamoranSpoink
cobblemon.species.qamoranspoink.desc: Spoink use their hard, spikey tail to bash their enemies. They stick together in packs and gang up on weaker Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.qamorangrumpig.name: QamoranGrumpig
cobblemon.species.qamorangrumpig.desc: Grumpig act like admins to Spoink, making them do the hard work as they nap lazily on beaches. But even they have to report to their Boss when it calls for them.
cobblemon.species.qamorankoffing.name: QamoranKoffing
cobblemon.species.qamorankoffing.desc: When introduced to Qamor Koffing migrated to deep ocean trenches were they now feast off of hydrothermal vents.
cobblemon.species.qamoranweezing.name: QamoranWeezing
cobblemon.species.qamoranweezing.desc: Weezing formed a symbiotic relationship with deep-sea worm Pokemon that help it filter toxins and hazards out of its bloodstream, as well as offering protection by weaponizing Weezing's toxic clouds in a more efficient manner.
cobblemon.species.grumpork.name: Grumpork
cobblemon.species.grumpork.desc: Evo Hammer ThrowSTAB Fighting - Circle ThrowSTAB Fighting - Bulk Up Fighting - Splash Normal - Storm ThrowSTAB Fighting - Rock SmashSTAB Fighting - Odor Sleuth  Normal - Torment  Dark - Wood Hammer Grass - Hammer ThrowSTAB Fighting - Hammer ArmSTAB Fighting - Rock Throw Rock 7 Rock SmashSTAB Fighting 10 Odor Sleuth  Normal 14 Knock BackSTAB Fighting 15 Psych Up Normal 18 Revenge STAB Fighting 21 Magic Coat  Psychic 26 Zen Headbutt Psychic 29 Power Gem Rock 35 Rest Psychic 35 Snore  Normal 42 Body Press STAB Fighting 46 Payback  Dark 52 Close CombatSTAB Fighting 60 Bounce Flying
cobblemon.species.glamglob.name: Glamglob
cobblemon.species.glamglob.desc: Glamglob Grotesque Form are used to living under immense ocean pressure, so when its removed from these situations it will completely dissociate with itself and flop into a flimsy and slimy mess loosing almost all of it's psychic potential and ability.
cobblemon.species.lilpaca.name: Lilpaca
cobblemon.species.lilpaca.desc: Lilpaca mostly eat rocks and minerals for nutrients. As a result of this diet, their body naturally produces turquoise colored rocks that help protect them against harm.
cobblemon.species.pacalpine.name: Pacalpine
cobblemon.species.pacalpine.desc: Indigenous groups domesticated Pacalpine to harvest their insulating wool to create fabrics and textiles while their durable stones are used to create ornate turquoise jewelry.
cobblemon.species.chillichoya.name: Chillichoya
cobblemon.species.qamoransandygast.name: QamoranSandygast
cobblemon.species.saguartic.name: Saguartic
cobblemon.species.palosstone.name: Palosstone
cobblemon.species.mightiro.name: Mightiro
cobblemon.species.mightiro.desc: Mightiro are always on the hunt for adventure. They often seek out dangerous situations to enact their heroic fantasies. A Mightiro's sword is said to have been crafted by beams of solid sunlight that fell to the ground.
cobblemon.species.encantomb.name: Encantomb
cobblemon.species.encantomb.desc: Mightiro who have fallen in battle rise up as an Encantomb. Encantomb's body is constructed from surrounding material around it such as dirt, bone, or chalk.
cobblemon.species.gorsylum.name: Gorsylum
cobblemon.species.gorsylum.desc: Gorsylum constantly wail in despair, longing for sunlight despite being deathly harmed by it. Gorsylum will crumble into dust and ash when defeated in battle, but simply plunging its sword into the ground will bring it back from the surrounding debris.
cobblemon.species.frodent.name: Frodent
cobblemon.species.frodent.desc: Frodent live in the frozen forests and hide among winter shrubbery. They are very receptive and willing to try new things.
cobblemon.species.bunbrisk.name: Bunbrisk
cobblemon.species.bunbrisk.desc: Feudal Bunbrisk Feudal Form move swiftly through wintery forests. This form evolves from Frodent who face new challenges and enemies head on.
cobblemon.species.wintweasel.name: Wintweasel
cobblemon.species.wintweasel.desc: Feudal Wintweasel are easy-going and prefer harvesting winter vegetables, but are also ready to draw their blade at a moment’s notice.
cobblemon.species.madrursa.name: Madrursa
cobblemon.species.madrursa.desc: Madrursa is a mysterious Pokemon that brings blizzards wherever it goes. It stays away from others in fear of endangering them in its brutal snow storms.
cobblemon.species.nordirk.name: Nordirk
cobblemon.species.nordirk.desc: Nordirk carve intricate tunnel systems inside of glaciers, collecting blue ice back to their dens to be crafted into weapons and armor.
cobblemon.species.vikice.name: Vikice
cobblemon.species.valkryce.name: Valkryce
cobblemon.species.selkreeper.name: Selkreeper
cobblemon.species.qamorancombee.name: QamoranCombee
cobblemon.species.vespidron.name: Vespidron
cobblemon.species.cryometry.name: Cryometry
cobblemon.species.cryometry.desc: Ice crystals from the first snow of winter form these Pokemon. They seek others of its kind to form long links to trap victims.
cobblemon.species.frijolop.name: Frijolop
cobblemon.species.crickochet.name: Crickochet
cobblemon.species.exeon.name: EXEon
cobblemon.species.ayreianspearow.name: AyreianSpearow
cobblemon.species.ayreianspearow.desc: Populates more in grassy area than cold ones for unknown reasons. It leaves shards of ice wherever it sleeps.
cobblemon.species.ayreianfearow.name: AyreianFearow
cobblemon.species.ayreianfearow.desc: A curious organ inside its abdomen allows it to mantain very cold temperatures no matter where it lives. When its life would be in peril, it incases itself in ice.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvenonat.name: AyreianVenonat
cobblemon.species.ayreianvenonat.desc: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats bugs. It is attracted by light at night.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandoduo.name: AyreianDoduo
cobblemon.species.ayreiandoduo.desc: It mimics a snowman to evade predators. Unfortunately, this usually only works on children.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhitmonlee.name: AyreianHitmonlee
cobblemon.species.ayreianhitmonlee.desc: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhitmonchan.name: AyreianHitmonchan
cobblemon.species.ayreianhitmonchan.desc: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.
cobblemon.species.ayreianjynx.name: AyreianJynx
cobblemon.species.ayreianjynx.desc: Behind the unassuming face lies a cold set of teeth, which it uses to catch prey. It can levitate for a short while using a weird power.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansnorlax.name: AyreianSnorlax
cobblemon.species.ayreiansnorlax.desc: For some reason, this Pokemon believes it is the king of the mountain, yet the only thing it does all day is sleep.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandratini.name: AyreianDratini
cobblemon.species.ayreiandratini.desc: The first instance of Dratini sightings where under a meteor shower, so it is theorized that it came from space.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandragonair.name: AyreianDragonair
cobblemon.species.ayreiandragonair.desc: Dragonair passively stores high amounts of energy in its armor, which is released all at once when its about to evolve.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandragonite.name: AyreianDragonite
cobblemon.species.ayreiandragonite.desc: On par with legendary Pokemon, most humans spend their entire life not even knowing about their existence. The energy generated by them is otherwordly.
cobblemon.species.ayreianlapras.name: AyreianLapras
cobblemon.species.ayreianlapras.desc: Even its existance is a myth, as little sightings have been documented after the war. Rumor has it that it only appears to trainers worth its time.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvulpix.name: AyreianVulpix
cobblemon.species.ayreianvulpix.desc: It burrows in the various dunes of the desert it lives in, and pounces on prey at the opportune moment. It can go without water for weeks.
cobblemon.species.ayreianninetales.name: AyreianNinetales
cobblemon.species.ayreianninetales.desc: It can harness the power of deceased desert dwellers to enhance its own attacks. It ambushes prey in the sandstorms it creates.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvulpixone.name: AyreianVulpixOne
cobblemon.species.ayreianvulpixone.desc: It hunts for fish Pokemon in small ponds by controlling the water stream and lifting it upwards.
cobblemon.species.ayreianninetalesone.de: It sings in a mellow tone to summon powerful tides. Originally an Alolan Ninetales, scientists raised it in a swamp and its metabolism drastically changed.
cobblemon.species.ayreianbulbasaur.name: AyreianBulbasaur
cobblemon.species.ayreianbulbasaur.desc: From birth, a sticky paste that it produces forms peculiar patterns on its body. Every Bulbasaur has a slightly different formation.
cobblemon.species.ayreianivysaur.name: AyreianIvysaur
cobblemon.species.ayreianivysaur.desc: It burrows itself in sand, then waits for a prey to get closer, which is then showered by a substance similar to glue, blocking its escape.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvenusaur.name: AyreianVenusaur
cobblemon.species.ayreianvenusaur.desc: The clay-like substance it secretes is used as a super glue to patch up its den. It carries other Bulbasaur and Ivysaur in its vase.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancharmander.name: AyreianCharmander
cobblemon.species.ayreiancharmander.desc: The shiny gem on its chest is the very lifeforce of the Pokemon. In the past, poaching severely reduced this Pokemon's population.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancharmeleon.name: AyreianCharmeleon
cobblemon.species.ayreiancharmeleon.desc: Very impatient for its evolution, it feeds on the purest gems in the caves it lives in. While docile, it is quick to anger.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancharizard.name: AyreianCharizard
cobblemon.species.ayreiancharizard.desc: Usually docile, it becomes incredibly aggressive during mating season. The hand-like appendages on its back allow it to excavate dens inside sturdy gems.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansquirtle.name: AyreianSquirtle
cobblemon.species.ayreiansquirtle.desc: While underdeveloped, its tail has enough power to smash aside large boulders.
cobblemon.species.ayreianwartortle.name: AyreianWartortle
cobblemon.species.ayreianwartortle.desc: It takes great care of its golden horns, symbol of its pride. The shinier those horns are, the more respect a Wartortle gets in its colony.
cobblemon.species.ayreianblastoise.name: AyreianBlastoise
cobblemon.species.ayreianblastoise.desc: It uses its tail as a swinging mace, blowing away anything that comes too close. It then delivers the final blow with its prized horns.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancaterpie.name: AyreianCaterpie
cobblemon.species.ayreiancaterpie.desc: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmetapod.name: AyreianMetapod
cobblemon.species.ayreianmetapod.desc: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
cobblemon.species.ayreianbutterfree.name: AyreianButterfree
cobblemon.species.ayreianbutterfree.desc: It uses its wings to stun it's prey for an easy catch.
cobblemon.species.ayreianrattata.name: AyreianRattata
cobblemon.species.ayreianrattata.desc: The rock formation on its tail has hindered is quick movement, but allowed it to deliver heavy damage to it's enemies
cobblemon.species.ayreianraticate.name: AyreianRaticate
cobblemon.species.ayreianraticate.desc: The webs on its hind legs enable it to cross rivers. It searches wide areas for food.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidgey.name: AyreianPidgey
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidgey.desc: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidgeotto.name: AyreianPidgeotto
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidgeotto.desc: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokemon will fiercely peck at any intruder.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidgeot.name: AyreianPidgeot
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidgeot.desc: It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to intimidate enemies. It races through the skies at Mach-2 speed.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandiglett.name: AyreianDiglett
cobblemon.species.ayreiandiglett.desc: It sits in one location, only bothering those who try to pass directly through it.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandugtrio.name: AyreianDugtrio
cobblemon.species.ayreiandugtrio.desc: It sits in one location, only bothering those who try to pass directly through it.
cobblemon.species.ayreianabra.name: AyreianAbra
cobblemon.species.ayreianabra.desc: It meditates 18 hours a day to sharpen its senses. That said, they aren't very skilled.
cobblemon.species.ayreiankadabra.name: AyreianKadabra
cobblemon.species.ayreiankadabra.desc: More active than its previous form, it stimulates its muscles by running up and down the mountains it lives in.
cobblemon.species.ayreianalakazam.name: AyreianAlakazam
cobblemon.species.ayreianalakazam.desc: Quicker than it looks, it hides in the shade waiting for the perfect moment to strike. Its high intelligence allows it to remember every fighting style.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangrimer.name: AyreianGrimer
cobblemon.species.ayreiangrimer.desc: Appears in filthy areas. It thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmuk.name: AyreianMuk
cobblemon.species.ayreianmuk.desc: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangastly.name: AyreianGastly
cobblemon.species.ayreiangastly.desc: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhaunter.name: AyreianHaunter
cobblemon.species.ayreianhaunter.desc: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangengar.name: AyreianGengar
cobblemon.species.ayreiangengar.desc: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar's doing.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvoltorb.name: AyreianVoltorb
cobblemon.species.ayreianvoltorb.desc: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Poke Ball, it has zapped many people.
cobblemon.species.ayreianelectrode.name: AyreianElectrode
cobblemon.species.ayreianelectrode.desc: It stores an overflowing amount of electric energy inside its body. Even a small shock makes it explode.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpinsir.name: AyreianPinsir
cobblemon.species.ayreianpinsir.desc: Its powerful carapace, harder than diamond, lets it shake off even tank shells. The leader of the pack has the most scars on its iron mantle.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantogepi.name: AyreianTogepi
cobblemon.species.ayreiantogepi.desc: This rare bird Pokemon hatches at the top of the coldest peaks, as its fire burns bright even at negative temperatures.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantogetic.name: AyreianTogetic
cobblemon.species.ayreiantogetic.desc: Its highly curious, but its incapability of flying holds it back from exploring new places. Its fire burns bright when its happy.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhoppip.name: AyreianHoppip
cobblemon.species.ayreianhoppip.desc: The eye motifs on its wings have similar properties to hypnotizing devices. It feeds off of dreams.
cobblemon.species.ayreianskiploom.name: AyreianSkiploom
cobblemon.species.ayreianskiploom.desc: The 'planteye' on top of its head releases a somniferous powder. This property is used in narcotics.
cobblemon.species.ayreianjumpluff.name: AyreianJumpluff
cobblemon.species.ayreianjumpluff.desc: By flashing bright lights from its limbs, it causes powerful headaches that eventually knock out its opponents. It flies lowly in the night, hunting for people's dreams.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmantine.name: AyreianMantine
cobblemon.species.ayreianmantine.desc: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can jump out above the waves and glide for over 300 feet.
cobblemon.species.ayreianphanpy.name: AyreianPhanpy
cobblemon.species.ayreianphanpy.desc: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandonphan.name: AyreianDonphan
cobblemon.species.ayreiandonphan.desc: An internal organ transmutes the outside moisture into warm water, which acts as a substitute to its blood in extremely cold temperatures.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhitmontop.name: AyreianHitmontop
cobblemon.species.ayreianhitmontop.desc: The energy of the Shiny Stone enlightened this Pokemon to never before seen levels of serenity. It is almost impossible to distract.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansmoochum.name: AyreianSmoochum
cobblemon.species.ayreiansmoochum.desc: It waltzes around kissing anyone that it comes into contact with, while leaving nasty injuries that look like leech bites.
cobblemon.species.ayreianchikorita.name: AyreianChikorita
cobblemon.species.ayreianchikorita.desc: Said to have gone extinct shortly after the war, a few specimen have been found in the natural caves of Citrine Jungle.
cobblemon.species.ayreianbayleef.name: AyreianBayleef
cobblemon.species.ayreianbayleef.desc: The many buds decorating this Pokemon's neck are a fashion icon in a faraway region. Records found after the war imply that this Pokemon may have originated from that land.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmeganium.name: AyreianMeganium
cobblemon.species.ayreianmeganium.desc: These incredibly rare Pokemon form natural shrines in the secluded jungles they live in, adorning them with the pink leaves of its tail.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancyndaquil.name: AyreianCyndaquil
cobblemon.species.ayreiancyndaquil.desc: It flares flames from its back to protect itself. The fire burns vigorously if the Pokemon is angry. When it is tired, it sputters with incomplete combustion.
cobblemon.species.ayreianquilava.name: AyreianQuilava
cobblemon.species.ayreianquilava.desc: It intimidates foes with intense gusts of flames and superheated air. Its quick nimbleness lets it dodge attacks even while scorching an enemy.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantyphlosion.name: AyreianTyphlosion
cobblemon.species.ayreiantyphlosion.desc: In the wild, humans are highly advised to stay clear of these Pokemon. They hunt other predators and take their skull upon victory.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantotodile.name: AyreianTotodile
cobblemon.species.ayreiantotodile.desc: Its powerful, well-developed jaws are capable of crushing anything. Even its Trainer must be careful.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancroconaw.name: AyreianCroconaw
cobblemon.species.ayreiancroconaw.desc: Once it bites down, it won't let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.
cobblemon.species.ayreianferaligatr.name: AyreianFeraligatr
cobblemon.species.ayreianferaligatr.desc: This Pokemon lives to fight, it does not hold personal grudges, it just wants to destroy everything in its path.
cobblemon.species.ayreianspinarak.name: AyreianSpinarak
cobblemon.species.ayreianspinarak.desc: It can blast a blinding light from its back to scare away predators.
cobblemon.species.ayreianariados.name: AyreianAriados
cobblemon.species.ayreianariados.desc: It can blast a blinding light from its back to scare away predators.
cobblemon.species.ayreianstantler.name: AyreianStantler
cobblemon.species.ayreianstantler.desc: The flames that burn on it's back are similar to Ponyta's, in the sense that they wont burn you if it trusts you.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantreecko.name: AyreianTreecko
cobblemon.species.ayreiantreecko.desc: Quite skittish, its diet primarily consists of twigs and leaves. It mimetizes with the environment to escape danger.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangrovyle.name: AyreianGrovyle
cobblemon.species.ayreiangrovyle.desc: The sheer power gained from evolution changed this Pokemon's metabolism, as it now behaves like an ambush predator.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansceptile.name: AyreianSceptile
cobblemon.species.ayreiansceptile.desc: It can adapt to any and all environments, sitting at the top of the food chain. Because of this, they are an invasive species in most areas of the world.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantorchic.name: AyreianTorchic
cobblemon.species.ayreiantorchic.desc: Their immense ghostly energy allows them to summon additional limbs for a short time, but their inexperience makes them quite clumsy.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancombusken.name: AyreianCombusken
cobblemon.species.ayreiancombusken.desc: They blend in seemlessly with the shadows, which enable an easy ambush. When ignored, they will sometimes attack their own trainer.
cobblemon.species.ayreianblaziken.name: AyreianBlaziken
cobblemon.species.ayreianblaziken.desc: Wild and unpredictable, their legs kick the life out of their opponents. The floating limbs disappear if they stray too far from the main body.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmudkip.name: AyreianMudkip
cobblemon.species.ayreianmudkip.desc: These Mudkips can be found sleeping soundly under frozen lakes. Their tails connect to the ice above, allowing them to sense vibrations from threats above.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmarshtomp.name: AyreianMarshtomp
cobblemon.species.ayreianmarshtomp.desc: Their icy blankets support their sleeping bodies and provide a shelter for small fish Pokemon. Unfortunately if they wander to close to its snoring mouth they may become a midnight snack.
cobblemon.species.ayreianswampert.name: AyreianSwampert
cobblemon.species.ayreianswampert.desc: Its hibernation can preserve itself for years past the typical life span of a Pokemon its size.
cobblemon.species.ayreianzigzagoon.name: AyreianZigzagoon
cobblemon.species.ayreianzigzagoon.desc: It marks its territory by rubbing its bristly fur on trees. This variety of Zigzagoon is friendlier and calmer than the kind native to Galar.
cobblemon.species.ayreianlinoone.name: AyreianLinoone
cobblemon.species.ayreianlinoone.desc: It uses its explosive speed and razor-sharp claws to bring down prey. Running along winding paths is not its strong suit.
cobblemon.species.ayreianralts.name: AyreianRalts
cobblemon.species.ayreianralts.desc: Its black plumage is said to bring misfortune to others near it.
cobblemon.species.ayreiankirlia.name: AyreianKirlia
cobblemon.species.ayreiankirlia.desc: It uses wind currents to dance about in the night sky, even while hunting.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangardevoir.name: AyreianGardevoir
cobblemon.species.ayreiangardevoir.desc: It has a latent power to read minds. A folktale tells that, long ago, this Pokemon and its 'mirrored image' served a malicious king.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantropius.name: AyreianTropius
cobblemon.species.ayreiantropius.desc: The bunch of fruit around its neck, while delicious, is fiercely guarded by Tropius. They nest in the secluded depths of jungles.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansnorunt.name: AyreianSnorunt
cobblemon.species.ayreiansnorunt.desc: It attaches itself to the ceiling of volcanic caves to absorb heat, which it then releases to fly around.
cobblemon.species.ayreianglalie.name: AyreianGlalie
cobblemon.species.ayreianglalie.desc: It can shoot concentrated energy waves from its horns. Its fire burns with a bright blue when it's enraged.
cobblemon.species.ayreiannosepass.name: AyreianNosepass
cobblemon.species.ayreiannosepass.desc: Its magnetic nose consistently faces north. Travelers check Nosepass to get their bearings.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaron.name: AyreianAron
cobblemon.species.ayreianaron.desc: When Aron evolves, it leaves behind molten pebbles. In ancient times, people would collect Aron's shed rocks to warm themselves.
cobblemon.species.ayreianlairon.name: AyreianLairon
cobblemon.species.ayreianlairon.desc: During territorial disputes, Lairon emits high amounts of steam. Close inspection of their magma armor reveals scratches and dents.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaggron.name: AyreianAggron
cobblemon.species.ayreianaggron.desc: The temperature inside Aggron's core can be compared to that of an industrial furnace. When threatened, it blows molten rock out of the pores on its back.
cobblemon.species.ayreianroselia.name: AyreianRoselia
cobblemon.species.ayreianroselia.desc: It will fire rapid strikes from the toxic flowers on its hands if it feels threatened.
cobblemon.species.ayreiannumel.name: AyreianNumel
cobblemon.species.ayreiannumel.desc: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancamerupt.name: AyreianCamerupt
cobblemon.species.ayreiancamerupt.desc: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantrapinch.name: AyreianTrapinch
cobblemon.species.ayreiantrapinch.desc: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvibrava.name: AyreianVibrava
cobblemon.species.ayreianvibrava.desc: The loss in power during this phase has changed Vibrava's metabolism, now only feeding on plants. They are very skittish and will most likely flee when threatened.
cobblemon.species.ayreianflygon.name: AyreianFlygon
cobblemon.species.ayreianflygon.desc: The loss in power during this phase has changed Vibrava's metabolism, now only feeding on plants. They are very skittish and will most likely flee when threatened.
cobblemon.species.ayreianswablu.name: AyreianSwablu
cobblemon.species.ayreianswablu.desc: While cute and seemingly docile, it angers really quickly. They nest in areas most often hit by thunderstorms.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaltaria.name: AyreianAltaria
cobblemon.species.ayreianaltaria.desc: Only seen during thunderstorms, they brave the dark skies uncontested in both ferocity and boldness.
cobblemon.species.ayreianlunatone.name: AyreianLunatone
cobblemon.species.ayreianlunatone.desc: Different types of music can be heard coming from it, depending on the mood it's in.
cobblemon.species.ayreianrelicanth.name: AyreianRelicanth
cobblemon.species.ayreianrelicanth.desc: Said to be an incredibly old species gone extinct, a few specimen have begun appearing near the shores of Ayrei. They look lifeless at a glance.
cobblemon.species.ayreianabsol.name: AyreianAbsol
cobblemon.species.ayreianabsol.desc: Records released to the public just after the war state that Absol instinctively punished those that would bring harm to the forests near the conflict.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpachirisu.name: AyreianPachirisu
cobblemon.species.ayreianpachirisu.desc: The two sides of Pachirisu are a perfect parallel to each other. While the pale one barely looks alive, the other is hyperactive and dangerous.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmunchlax.name: AyreianMunchlax
cobblemon.species.ayreianmunchlax.desc: It feels immense joy from harassing others. You'll often find them in the wild, throwing rocks or snow at people and Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.ayreianriolu.name: AyreianRiolu
cobblemon.species.ayreianriolu.desc: Still new to the concept of Cyberspace, this Pokemon is the bioproduct of superfluous files from Lucario.
cobblemon.species.ayreianlucario.name: AyreianLucario
cobblemon.species.ayreianlucario.desc: By controlling the virtual realm, it can mess with its opponent's data values. However, a virus may find its way inside Lucario when its guard is down.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmantyke.name: AyreianMantyke
cobblemon.species.ayreianmantyke.desc: It burrows underground and shocks it's enemy from below as a surprise attack.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangallade.name: AyreianGallade
cobblemon.species.ayreiangallade.desc: With its latent powers, it can force anyone to do its bidding. A folktale tells that, long ago, this Pokemon and its 'mirrored image' served a malicious king.
cobblemon.species.ayreianshinx.name: AyreianShinx
cobblemon.species.ayreianshinx.desc: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.
cobblemon.species.ayreianluxio.name: AyreianLuxio
cobblemon.species.ayreianluxio.desc: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
cobblemon.species.ayreianluxray.name: AyreianLuxray
cobblemon.species.ayreianluxray.desc: When in danger, the pattern on its forehead shines brightly. Its retractable claws are overcharged with high voltage electricity.
cobblemon.species.ayreianbudew.name: AyreianBudew
cobblemon.species.ayreianbudew.desc: Rarely seen in the wild, these pokemon remain particularly buried to gain nutrients. What looks like a mask is in reality a hardened shell that gives its soft body protection. When panicked it releases a spore that reduces agression, but can be very poisonous.
cobblemon.species.ayreianroserade.name: AyreianRoserade
cobblemon.species.ayreianroserade.desc: The poison in its right hand is quick acting. The poison in its left hand is slow acting. Both are life threatening.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandrifloon.name: AyreianDrifloon
cobblemon.species.ayreiandrifloon.desc: They are very fond of people and the positivity they can express. They are often found parading large festivals and parties.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandrifblim.name: AyreianDrifblim
cobblemon.species.ayreiandrifblim.desc: This Pokemon always radiates with bright colors. Lost travelers or adventurers who follow it always find their way home.
cobblemon.species.ayreianfroslass.name: AyreianFroslass
cobblemon.species.ayreianfroslass.desc: It can be seen regularly taking command of others. However, it prefers to work with its likeminded counterpart.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansnivy.name: AyreianSnivy
cobblemon.species.ayreiansnivy.desc: When they're in good health, the liquid metal they cover themselves with doesn't stick to surfaces.
cobblemon.species.ayreianservine.name: AyreianServine
cobblemon.species.ayreianservine.desc: The liquid metal its body is made of is so dense that its an incredibly heavy Pokemon, despite its minute size.
cobblemon.species.ayreianserperior.name: AyreianSerperior
cobblemon.species.ayreianserperior.desc: Its body is made up by more than 85% of liquid metal. To protect itself, it slowly exhales a noxious gas, even while sleeping.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantepig.name: AyreianTepig
cobblemon.species.ayreiantepig.desc: It can be seen sleeping soundly in lava lakes. A sick Tepig can be dangerous, as it will drool the accumulated magma from its nostrils.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpignite.name: AyreianPignite
cobblemon.species.ayreianpignite.desc: Completely different from its pre-evolution, this pokemon is savage and unruly. It stores high quantities of magma to prepare for evolution.
cobblemon.species.ayreianemboar.name: AyreianEmboar
cobblemon.species.ayreianemboar.desc: The metal shackles all over its body contain the otherwise unbridled fire energy of its core. Long ago, an Emboar with broken shackles made scorched earth of a metropolis.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidove.name: AyreianPidove
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidove.desc: It snobs other Pokemon, even shoving them aside when there's food nearby. Due to its small size, most of the time it's sent running with its tail between its legs.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantranquill.name: AyreianTranquill
cobblemon.species.ayreiantranquill.desc: Adored by old ladies, they are often found in videos online due to their grumpy nature. Seeing one in the wild is a rare sight.
cobblemon.species.ayreianunfezant.name: AyreianUnfezant
cobblemon.species.ayreianunfezant.desc: In the past, the commanding presence of Unfezant was enough to make entire civilizations bow to it. Those that stood in its way were showered by powerful toxins.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansandile.name: AyreianSandile
cobblemon.species.ayreiansandile.desc: Sandile is small, but its legs and lower body are powerful. Pushing snow aside as it goes, Sandile moves through the tundra as if it's swimming.
cobblemon.species.ayreiankrokorok.name: AyreianKrokorok
cobblemon.species.ayreiankrokorok.desc: Although this Pokémon has specialized eyes that allow it to see well in water, Krokorok aren't adept swimmers.
cobblemon.species.ayreiankrookodile.name: AyreianKrookodile
cobblemon.species.ayreiankrookodile.desc: This PokÃ©mon is known as the Bully of the Tundra. Krookodile's mighty jaws can bite through permafrost with ease.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaxew.name: AyreianAxew
cobblemon.species.ayreianaxew.desc: They play with each other by knocking their large tusks together. Their tusks break sometimes, but they grow back so quickly that it isn't a concern.
cobblemon.species.ayreianfraxure.name: AyreianFraxure
cobblemon.species.ayreianfraxure.desc: Fraxure uses it's blade like tusks to cut down anyone who threatens it's territory, and unlike it's predecessor, their tusks can grow back.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhaxorus.name: AyreianHaxorus
cobblemon.species.ayreianhaxorus.desc: With it's nearly indestructable blade like tusks, this Pokemon is able to take nearly any opponent head on without consequence.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandruddigon.name: AyreianDruddigon
cobblemon.species.ayreiandruddigon.desc: Devious and opportunistic, it flies through Cyberspace in search of vulnerable files to infect. Unreliable sources say that they were made by a group of hackers that opposed the war.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantimburr.name: AyreianTimburr
cobblemon.species.ayreiantimburr.desc: Timburr seem to love the idea of building homes out of wood, but lose their mind at the site of steel.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangurdurr.name: AyreianGurdurr
cobblemon.species.ayreiangurdurr.desc: It carries around a giant log for hours upon hours without rest.
cobblemon.species.ayreianconkeldurr.name: AyreianConkeldurr
cobblemon.species.ayreianconkeldurr.desc: Concrete mixed by Conkeldurr is much more durable than normal concrete, even when the compositions of the two materials are the same.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandeerling.name: AyreianDeerling
cobblemon.species.ayreiandeerling.desc: At night, their horns glow with light, allowing them to communicate with other members of the herd. They are believed to have near-human intelligence.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansawsbuck.name: AyreianSawsbuck
cobblemon.species.ayreiansawsbuck.desc: These Sawsbuck grow more powerful the more knowledge they acquire, signified by the glow of their antlers. The ones with the most luminous antlers are the leaders of the herd.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvenipede.name: AyreianVenipede
cobblemon.species.ayreianvenipede.desc: Known to be territorial, they gnaw at mineral deposits and use them as fuel for their electricity.
cobblemon.species.ayreianwhirlipede.name: AyreianWhirlipede
cobblemon.species.ayreianwhirlipede.desc: They're wild and ill-tempered, but when properly trained can provide electricity to an entire neighborhood.
cobblemon.species.ayreianscolipede.name: AyreianScolipede
cobblemon.species.ayreianscolipede.desc: When threatened, Scolipede can amplify its livewires and produce enough electricity to bask an entire city in flourescent light.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandwebble.name: AyreianDwebble
cobblemon.species.ayreiandwebble.desc: The plant on top of its back secretes a sticky substance similar to glue, which is why sometimes Dwebble will have items attached to it, like Heart Scales.
cobblemon.species.ayreianarchen.name: AyreianArchen
cobblemon.species.ayreianarchen.desc: While its weight prevents it from flying, it can jump up to 30 feet in the air.
cobblemon.species.ayreianarcheops.name: AyreianArcheops
cobblemon.species.ayreianarcheops.desc: Scientists believe this was the true form of Archeops, millions of years ago. Its legs are powerful enough to overturn a truck, but it is still unable to fly.
cobblemon.species.ayreianminccino.name: AyreianMinccino
cobblemon.species.ayreianminccino.desc: The way it brushes away grime with its tail can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancinccino.name: AyreianCinccino
cobblemon.species.ayreiancinccino.desc: Its body secretes oil that this Pokemon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won't tolerate even a speck of the stuff.
cobblemon.species.ayreianducklett.name: AyreianDucklett
cobblemon.species.ayreianducklett.desc: They're always seen either dancing or sleeping if not soaring gracefully through the air.
cobblemon.species.ayreianswanna.name: AyreianSwanna
