cobblemon.species.pinonkey.name: Pinonkey
cobblemon.species.donkeyata.name: Donkeyata
cobblemon.species.fiestaur.name: Fiestaur
cobblemon.species.taratinder.name: Taratinder
cobblemon.species.taratinder.desc: By dragging its paws along the patches on its abdomen, it sparks fire. The flames are weak, so it uses them as a distraction as it runs away.
cobblemon.species.tarantorch.name: Tarantorch
cobblemon.species.tarantorch.desc: It ignites the hairs on its abdomen before throwing them like projectiles. It may end up bald after an arduous battle, but the hairs grow back.
cobblemon.species.charantula.name: Charantula
cobblemon.species.charantula.desc: Its hairs are covered in microscopic barbs, anchoring them in the target as they burn. If all else fails, flames erupt from its six knees to burn everything to the ground.
cobblemon.species.seamian.name: Seamian
cobblemon.species.mermonkey.name: Mermonkey
cobblemon.species.panseidon.name: Panseidon
cobblemon.species.cowet.name: Cowet
cobblemon.species.moistox.name: Moistox
cobblemon.species.buffaloam.name: Buffaloam
cobblemon.species.glaby.name: Glaby
cobblemon.species.glaby.desc: Colonies live in complex underground tunnels, behaving much like Durant or Termini. It has no eyes, relying entirely on its antennae-like whiskers
cobblemon.species.glaboar.name: Glaboar
cobblemon.species.glaboar.desc: There is only one in each colony, resting at the heart of the colony’s labyrinthine nest. Although powerful, it relies on its legion of children and commands them with chemical signals.
cobblemon.species.weevoll.name: Weevoll
cobblemon.species.bollweave.name: Bollweave
cobblemon.species.beegan.name: Beegan
cobblemon.species.beegarden.name: Beegarden
cobblemon.species.hikoon.name: Hikoon
cobblemon.species.emoth.name: Emoth
cobblemon.species.houndworm.name: Houndworm
cobblemon.species.houndworm.desc: It constructs a disguise out of fur, keeping its head inside and pretending to be a puppy pokemon. It reveals its true self to those who are kind to it.
cobblemon.species.wearwolf.name: Wearwolf
cobblemon.species.wearwolf.desc: It seeks revenge on all those who betrayed its trust as a Houndworm. It has vowed never to leave its disguise, which it has made to reflect its tortured soul.
cobblemon.species.fursoot.name: Fursoot
cobblemon.species.fursoot.desc: Dust gets trapped in its fur, making it bad for trainers with allergies. It closes its false mouth to hide when scared.
cobblemon.species.lousidogg.name: Lousidogg
cobblemon.species.gooeyduck.name: Gooeyduck
cobblemon.species.gooeyduck.desc: It squeezes its body with its shell to squirt out water at high speed. If it runs out of water, it will only be able to squeak. Many beachgoers think the sound is cute, to Gooeyduck’s distress.
cobblemon.species.gooeygoose.name: Gooeygoose
cobblemon.species.gooeygoose.desc: As its shell is too small to offer much defense, it inflates its body to release a loud and powerful honk. Rivals face off with concert-like duels that few others can stand listening to.
cobblemon.species.poofly.name: Poofly
cobblemon.species.beelobuzz.name: Beelobuzz
cobblemon.species.beelobuzz.desc: An obnoxious pest that relentlessly pursues the smell of blood to feed on. When they begin to swarm, you had better take shelter before you’re covered in itchy bite marks.
cobblemon.species.spitsen.name: Spitsen
cobblemon.species.spitsen.desc: When it sees something new, it licks it thoroughly. It also licks things it has already seen. Its analytical skills make it valuable in areas covered with snow.
cobblemon.species.salimute.name: Salimute
cobblemon.species.salimute.desc: Loyal and hardworking, it can pull a sled for a full day without tiring. Its drool creates a path on the ground that will lead you back to civilization if you follow it.
cobblemon.species.slobbernard.name: Slobbernard
cobblemon.species.slobbernard.desc: Despite its large size, it is gentle and sweet. Inside the container of ice it carries are items to aid travelers on snowy mountains. It has saved countless lives.
cobblemon.species.burroworm.name: Burroworm
cobblemon.species.burroworm.desc: The soil it carries around varies based on where it was born. It spins to confuse predators while escaping underground.
cobblemon.species.bingus.name: Bingus
cobblemon.species.bingus.desc: A common garden pest, it uses its horn for self defense.
cobblemon.species.crungus.name: Crungus
cobblemon.species.crungus.desc: It disguises itself as a bird pokemon’s nest by covering itself in twigs.
cobblemon.species.sphingus.name: Sphingus
cobblemon.species.sphingus.desc: Often mistaken for a bird pokemon, it is a powerful and agile flier that can reach supersonic speeds.
cobblemon.species.grubolt.name: Grubolt
cobblemon.species.grubolt.desc: Its soft body makes it vulnerable, so its mother prepares a chamber for it to feed in.
cobblemon.species.zapupa.name: Zapupa
cobblemon.species.zapupa.desc: It lures other pokemon in using the bright glow of its body, only to shock and paralyze them.
cobblemon.species.buzzkill.name: Buzzkill
cobblemon.species.buzzkill.desc: It uses the electric stingers concealed in its wrists to strike with perfect accuracy. It is the mortal enemy of Waruphosa.
cobblemon.species.mayflown.name: Mayflown
cobblemon.species.mayflown.desc: They emerge in the millions every spring, becoming an ample food source for many fish pokemon. Although small and frail, its tenacious life force is not to be underestimated.
cobblemon.species.bleech.name: Bleech
cobblemon.species.bleech.desc: When it smells blood, it swims over and clamps on with its mouth. Even a professional sumo wrestler cannot remove it until it has finished feeding.
cobblemon.species.hiruleech.name: Hiruleech
cobblemon.species.hiruleech.desc: It emerges from the swamp at night to search for fresh blood. Because it has no bones, it can squeeze under doors without difficulty.
cobblemon.species.lumini.name: Lumini
cobblemon.species.lumini.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.lampupa.name: Lampupa
cobblemon.species.lampupa.desc: Most pupating Pokemon make an effort to hide themselves or have defense mechanisms. Lampupa, however, dangles on a silk rope upside-down and shines like a lightbulb. As it turns out, it uses its light as a form of communication. Additionally, most predators in cave systems don’t react well to a sudden flash of light to their eyes.
cobblemon.species.glowyrm.name: Glowyrm
cobblemon.species.glowyrm.desc: Glowyrm is the final evolution of Lumini, a predator that runs swiftly and catches its enemies off guard. Because they use their lights to attract both prey and mates, they tend to be quite hostile.
cobblemon.species.decompost.name: Decompost
cobblemon.species.decompost.desc: It breaks down garbage inside its body to create fertile soil. Some say it is the spirit of a farmer who couldn't leave their land.
cobblemon.species.gorgompost.name: Gorgompost
cobblemon.species.gorgompost.desc: It has grown resentful of people disrespecting the land it cultivates. If it catches polluters, they become returned to the earth.
cobblemon.species.flamingoop.name: Flamingoop
cobblemon.species.flamingoop.desc: It flocks in pools of boiling acid to avoid predators. The color of its flames changes based on chemicals it accumulates from its diet.
cobblemon.species.beddybug.name: Beddybug
cobblemon.species.beddybug.desc: Don’t be fooled- if you let one sleep in your bed, you’ll never get it to leave. It will drain energy from within your dreams, ensuring you never have a restful night again.
cobblemon.species.honeyjou.name: Honeyjou
cobblemon.species.glutthoney.name: Glutthoney
cobblemon.species.mintooth.name: Mintooth
cobblemon.species.mintooth.desc: It polishes its large stony tooth to keep it in top shape. It gives presents to those who take excellent care of their own teeth.
cobblemon.species.icypod.name: Icypod
cobblemon.species.isoberg.name: Isoberg
cobblemon.species.rumpork.name: Rumpork
cobblemon.species.porkupid.name: Porkupid
cobblemon.species.brickabrack.name: Brickabrack
cobblemon.species.brickwald.name: Brickwald
cobblemon.species.brickozuna.name: Brickozuna
cobblemon.species.toadsgool.name: Toadsgool
cobblemon.species.acrology.name: Acrology
cobblemon.species.astropheles.name: Astropheles
cobblemon.species.tarankey.name: Tarankey
cobblemon.species.tarankong.name: Tarankong
cobblemon.species.plagior.name: Plagior
cobblemon.species.plagior.desc: A parasite that takes control of its host’s body from within, leaving only once it finds its next host. It secretes toxins to prevent the host from fighting back as it slowly eats their soul.
cobblemon.species.beeball.name: Beeball
cobblemon.species.beemason.name: Beemason
cobblemon.species.beebegone.name: Beebegone
cobblemon.species.sparkete.name: Sparkete
cobblemon.species.plasmakate.name: Plasmakate
cobblemon.species.plasmagician.name: Plasmagician
cobblemon.species.balloony.name: Balloony
cobblemon.species.balloony.desc: Balloony, the Balloon Pokemon. It generates an electric charge by rubbing against objects. Without this, it cannot fly and will lay on the ground deflated.
cobblemon.species.derangible.name: Derangible
cobblemon.species.derangible.desc: It floats through the clouds, guided by electrical circuits in the atmosphere. The gas in its float becomes supercharged when it absorbs lightning.
cobblemon.species.dadrone.name: Dadrone
cobblemon.species.dadrone.desc: Its four wings give it supreme mobility in the air, allowing it to fly in all directions with equal prowess. It is the natural enemy of Balloony.
cobblemon.species.airlantic.name: Airlantic
cobblemon.species.airlantic.desc: It saps electricity from Derangible and Jelightning to harness for itself. At full power, it can fly around the world in only 14 hours.
cobblemon.species.chumbas.name: Chumbas
cobblemon.species.chumbas.desc: It seeks its ancestral seas to spawn, but its poor sense of direction leads it all over the world, even to isolated ponds that are miles inland. The flavor of its meat varies on the waters it grew up in.
cobblemon.species.chunderbolt.name: Chunderbolt
cobblemon.species.chunderbolt.desc: Having found its way to its ancestral spawning ground, it has grown powerful and confident. It swims at a break-neck pace, stunning those around it
cobblemon.species.bogchamp.name: Bogchamp
cobblemon.species.bogchamp.desc: Having found its way to its ancestral spawning grounds, it has grown relaxed and complacent. Fishermen who try to catch it often feel as if they’re being taunted by it.
cobblemon.species.marisite.name: Marisite
cobblemon.species.marisite.desc: By living within the mouth of a Chumbas, it gets free food. In exchange, it guides the Chumbas away from danger.
cobblemon.species.marrowite.name: Marrowite
cobblemon.species.marrowite.desc: It mourns the Chumbas it could not keep safe. Forced to fend for itself, it slashes at everything that gets near it with its six bladed arms
cobblemon.species.barrelsite.name: Barrelsite
cobblemon.species.barrelsite.desc: A new evolution was triggered when Marisite navigated Chumbas into the abyss to avoid predators. The two have unified their minds, living peacefully in the ocean depths. It emits beams of light to confuse would-be attackers.
cobblemon.species.squorm.name: Squorm
cobblemon.species.squorm.desc: It lives inside the shells of larger pokemon like Cloyster exchange for fighting off predators. It’s not very good at it, but it’s fun to have around.
cobblemon.species.ragrand.name: Ragrand
cobblemon.species.ragrand.desc: Although its bristles shine like a rainbow, they are poisonous to the touch. It gets caught in fishing nets while looking for Wishiwashi to eat.
cobblemon.species.bobbilisk.name: Bobbilisk
cobblemon.species.bobbilisk.desc: It stays underground with only its antennae exposed to detect prey. Nicknamed the “Gyarados Hunter”, it unveils its venomous jaws before it strikes.
cobblemon.species.boggeyman.name: Boggeyman
cobblemon.species.boggeyman.desc: Local legends say it was once a human who now haunts the lake where they drowned. It acts violently towards anyone who enters its territory, rising from the muck to scare them off. It treats a discarded mask as if it were its face, but will replace it if it gets damaged.
cobblemon.species.shockter.name: Shockter
cobblemon.species.shockter.desc: It uses its special “Heart Monitor” organ to read electrical signals inside the body. Its high intellect allows it to learn medicine with ease, and even read and write human languages. However, its penmanship is atrocious.
cobblemon.species.surgeon.name: Surgeon
cobblemon.species.belfry.name: Belfry
cobblemon.species.belfry.desc: It appears near clocktowers at night, moving through the air in perfect silence. Its call, like a child’s scream, often startles people who wander into its territory.
cobblemon.species.strigori.name: Strigori
cobblemon.species.strigori.desc: It resides in abandoned buildings like old castles, where no one can disturb its brooding. It shields itself from the light with its cape-like wings.
cobblemon.species.demontor.name: Demontor
cobblemon.species.demontor.desc: It casts illusions that entrance its prey with their deepest desires, allowing it to feed without a struggle. Those whose life it has drained become its minions.
cobblemon.species.rotegg.name: Rotegg
cobblemon.species.rotegg.desc: Old stories say any pokemon egg can become a Rotegg if neglected or treated with ill intent. Its rancid odor gets stronger as it approaches evolution.
cobblemon.species.fowlest.name: Fowlest
cobblemon.species.fowlest.desc: Although it may seem sickly with its frequent coughing, it is actually preparing to spit out acid that can dissolve stone. It attacks anyone who stares at it for too long.
cobblemon.species.krakatori.name: Krakatori
cobblemon.species.nematon.name: Nematon
cobblemon.species.nematon.desc: It thrives in dirty water where it can absorb nutrients through its skin. It hates being dry and actively avoids the sun.
cobblemon.species.helminthon.name: Helminthon
cobblemon.species.helminthon.desc: Unable to form legs from its mass, it prefers to remain stationary in sewers. This usually causes sanitation issues.
cobblemon.species.capaciton.name: Capaciton
cobblemon.species.capaciton.desc: It stores water within its shell, allowing it to stay hydrated on the go. However, It is now too heavy to actually move.
cobblemon.species.trematon.name: Trematon
cobblemon.species.trematon.desc: When toxic waste was dumped in a certain area, Helminthon adapted and became this pokemon. Because it feeds on pollution, it has been used in hazardous material cleanup.
cobblemon.species.cylily.name: Cylily
cobblemon.species.tamanily.name: Tamanily
cobblemon.species.verdanteater.name: Verdanteater
cobblemon.species.rowbug.name: Rowbug
cobblemon.species.bugboat.name: Bugboat
cobblemon.species.scaround.name: Scaround
cobblemon.species.scaround.desc: It focuses the sun’s light into its antlers to create dazzling beams. An ancient kingdom revered it for its beauty, considering it a symbol of their nobility.
cobblemon.species.scaroyal.name: Scaroyal
cobblemon.species.scaroyal.desc: It focuses the sun’s light into its antlers to create dazzling beams. An ancient kingdom revered it for its beauty, considering it a symbol of their nobility.
cobblemon.species.scarazor.name: Scarazor
cobblemon.species.scarazor.desc: Vainly prideful of its black, intricately-patterned shell. When it finishes slashing and goring its enemies, it fusses over how dirty its horns have become.
cobblemon.species.gremtrail.name: Gremtrail
cobblemon.species.gremtrail.desc: It sprays noxious fumes while flying, leaving behind cloud-like trails in the sky. If it tries to spell messages with its trails, it will get dizzy and crash
cobblemon.species.araphosa.name: Araphosa
cobblemon.species.araphosa.desc: Friendly and soft to the touch, it is a popular low-energy pet for children in some regions. Even people who typically hate bug pokemon will begrudgingly see its appeal.
cobblemon.species.zaraphosa.name: Zaraphosa
cobblemon.species.zaraphosa.desc: It makes its nest underground as it is too bulky and awkward to climb trees. It fires the hair on its back like needles, and may end up with bald spots until it grows back in.
cobblemon.species.waruphosa.name: Waruphosa
cobblemon.species.waruphosa.desc: It uses its brutish strength to coerce other bug pokemon to do its bidding. Anyone who disputes the territory it claims for itself is crushed without mercy.
cobblemon.species.aviculor.name: Aviculor
cobblemon.species.aviculor.desc: It uses incredible speed and stealth to attack from the shadows without ever being noticed. Those who threaten the jungle’s tranquility become its next mark.
cobblemon.species.nepixie.name: Nepixie
cobblemon.species.nepixie.desc: Upon birth, it seeks out a pitcher plant and makes a spiritual, symbiotic connection with it for life.
cobblemon.species.neprite.name: Neprite
cobblemon.species.neprite.desc: It wraps its vine around tree branches, where it catches food using its pitcher as it sleeps.
cobblemon.species.nympenthes.name: Nympenthes
cobblemon.species.nympenthes.desc: It creates magic tonics by combining herbs and extracts with the fluid in its pitcher. Those who anger it will get cursed.
cobblemon.species.neprechaun.name: Neprechaun
cobblemon.species.neprechaun.desc: It is considered extraordinary luck to find one in the wild. Because of this, it was hunted to near extinction in its natural habitat.
cobblemon.species.ghoti.name: Ghoti
cobblemon.species.ghoti.desc: Swarms of them float motionless in the deep sea, springing to life with voracious hunger when approached.
cobblemon.species.inferatu.name: Inferatu
cobblemon.species.inferatu.desc: It hypnotizes victims with its luminescent eyes before draining their life force
cobblemon.species.astronotilus.name: Astronotilus
cobblemon.species.astronotilus.desc: Its body is sealed inside an organic suit that protects it from atmospheric pressure. It inquisitively examines things with its tentacles for unknown purposes. We do not yet know where it came from.
cobblemon.species.snotme.name: Snotme
cobblemon.species.snotme.desc: It shapeshifts into other pokemon and even humans to play pranks, but loses its composure and botches the transformation easily.
cobblemon.species.facsimilee.name: Facsimilee
cobblemon.species.facsimilee.desc: It transforms into humans and tries to blend into society, but makes subtle mistakes that give it away. It comes up with complicated schemes to get whatever it wants
cobblemon.species.theftidee.name: Theftidee
cobblemon.species.theftidee.desc: It stays transformed for so long, it may start believing itself to be its disguise. Authorities are still searching for a child who was revealed as a Theftidee one day.
cobblemon.species.lansquid.name: Lansquid
cobblemon.species.lansquid.desc: By jetting water out of its siphon, it can shoot itself like a dart. It may accidentally get stuck in a rock or boat hull if it aims carelessly.
cobblemon.species.calispade.name: Calispade
cobblemon.species.calispade.desc: Not often seen by fishermen due to living at the bottom of the sea, they were once believed to be evil spirits come to bring misfortune.
cobblemon.species.archraken.name: Archraken
cobblemon.species.archraken.desc: It can always be seen gurgling rhythmically, as if chanting in an indecipherable tongue. It is often rumored to have secret, arcane knowledge about the world. A tale goes that a group of lost sailors encountered one and tried to eat it, only for a massive storm to plunge their ship down to the abyss.
cobblemon.species.larvot.name: Larvot
cobblemon.species.larvot.desc: It latches onto the first organism it sees upon hatching and begins draining their energy.
cobblemon.species.rabbot.name: Rabbot
cobblemon.species.rabbot.desc: In the springtime, it leaves brightly-colored eggs scattered around like presents.
cobblemon.species.grunje.name: Grunje
cobblemon.species.grunje.desc: It squats impudently in old buildings and alleyways, but runs away when anyone stronger than it comes by. In large numbers, they are bold enough to steal food from people.
cobblemon.species.grunjerk.name: Grunjerk
cobblemon.species.grunjerk.desc: When a Grunje becomes brave enough to stand up for its friends, it evolves into Grunjerk. Despite its newfound sense of valor and brotherhood, it is still a derelict troublemaker.
cobblemon.species.magboil.name: Magboil
cobblemon.species.magboil.desc: Looking into its eye-like organs as they pulsate causes its thoughts to be transmitted telepathically. However, its mind is so alien that whatever it communicates ranges from cryptic to incomprehensible. It makes consistent reference to “headfriends”, presumed to be the mysterious larvae-like beings visible inside its sacs.
cobblemon.species.docteria.name: Docteria
cobblemon.species.docteria.desc: It feeds on filth and pestilence, storing contagions within its needle-like forelimbs. They were used by pokemon centers many centuries ago, long before various advances in modern medicine and the domestication of Chansey.
cobblemon.species.epimedic.name: Epimedic
cobblemon.species.epimedic.desc: It has a remarkable aptitude for healing, but is no longer used in medical fields due to personality quirks. Often cited are a pervasive desire to experiment, and a categorical refusal to wash its hands.
cobblemon.species.padull.name: Padull
cobblemon.species.padull.desc: It tries to use its nose like an oar when swimming, unaware that this actually impedes its movements. Even when taken aboard a canoe by a trainer, it has limited comprehension of how to paddle effectively.
cobblemon.species.sawface.name: Sawface
cobblemon.species.sawface.desc: The bladed teeth in its snout revolve fast enough to hack and tear through anything in its path. Unlike its blades, its wit tends to be dull.
cobblemon.species.smogout.name: Smogout
cobblemon.species.smogout.desc: It inhabits old buildings, causing dust and cobwebs to accumulate. It is not comfortable until it is surrounded by grime and mildew.
cobblemon.species.miasmog.name: Miasmog
cobblemon.species.miasmog.desc: Legend says it is a restless spirit that vengefully haunts its place of death. It corrodes anything it touches with a mysterious tar.
cobblemon.species.hydura.name: Hydura
cobblemon.species.hydura.desc: It boasts such amazing regenerative ability that even decapitation is a minor inconvenience. Once prey is hit with a venomous bite, it overwhelms them with all of its heads.
cobblemon.species.scyllabyss.name: Scyllabyss
cobblemon.species.scyllabyss.desc: It has an insatiable appetite that causes it to destroy and devour anything that comes near it. It becomes so blinded with hunger that its heads even attack eachother, only to regenerate moments later. Together with Charybyss, they are called “The Disasters”
cobblemon.species.medusting.name: Medusting
cobblemon.species.medusting.desc: It is said that anyone who sees its true face will turn to stone, but the truth is that its tentacles have a mind of their own and attack anything that gets too close with paralytic toxins.
cobblemon.species.charybyss.name: Charybyss
cobblemon.species.charybyss.desc: The undulations of its bell create such powerful currents that tornadoes and whirlpools will form around it. Anything that gets tangled in its body is slowly digested. Together with Scyllabyss, they are called “The Disasters”.
cobblemon.species.nepolyp.name: Nepolyp
cobblemon.species.nepolyp.desc: Each of its traps has its own mind, although whatever they catch will nourish all four.
cobblemon.species.polypitcher.name: Polypitcher
cobblemon.species.polypitcher.desc: Its foremost trap is filled with bouyant gas. Its powerful digestive enzymes may drip from above.
cobblemon.species.polypenthes.name: Polypenthes
cobblemon.species.polypenthes.desc: It brings the stench of decay wherever it floats. Rarely, a trap that breaks off may survive on its own.
cobblemon.species.trogleech.name: Trogleech
cobblemon.species.trogleech.desc: A similar species to Bleech, it has adapted to life inside the darkest caves. Its aerodynamic body allows it to glide down onto targets to suck their blood.
cobblemon.species.troglobite.name: Troglobite
cobblemon.species.troglobite.desc: It holds onto its prey with one mouth while feeding on it using the other. It sometimes switches which mouth does what without even realizing it.
cobblemon.species.troglobeast.name: Troglobeast
cobblemon.species.troglobeast.desc: Both heads believe they are the true one and the other is a fake. If an intruder enters their cavern, the heads will cooperate to tear it apart.
cobblemon.species.flattery.name: Flattery
cobblemon.species.flattery.desc: Believed to have come from outer space, it absorbs electricity from human settlements. When it approaches, machines begin to malfunction.
cobblemon.species.oddcast.name: Oddcast
cobblemon.species.oddcast.desc: It transmits radio waves to and from an unknown location. Attempting to decipher its messages with our current level of technology has proven impossible.
cobblemon.species.pozzombie.name: Pozzombie
cobblemon.species.pozzombie.desc: It comes out at night to rummage through garbage. When in danger, all signs of life vanish from its body only for it to get back on its feet and walk away when scavengers come.
cobblemon.species.barnacorn.name: Barnacorn
cobblemon.species.barnoose.name: Barnoose
cobblemon.species.barnoose.desc: It uses its feathers to sift the ocean for food. If anything tries to move it from its spot, it violently swings its armor-plated head like a flail.
cobblemon.species.feferococo.name: Feferococo
cobblemon.species.feferococo.desc: Kept by wealthy elite as living works of art, their skin is covered in intricate swirling patterns that inspired a whole movement centuries ago. As a result of their upper-class breeding, they tend to be hedonistic and vain.
cobblemon.species.saccarin.name: Saccarin
cobblemon.species.saccarin.desc: Once it attaches to a host, it is able to alter their hormones to transform their body. Since its discovery, it has become an asset for pokemon breeders.
cobblemon.species.woebegong.name: Woebegong
cobblemon.species.woebegong.desc: It hates being seen so it blends into its surroundings and lies motionless when others are nearby. If it gets stepped on, it flies into a frenzy and escapes in tears.
cobblemon.species.rivotter.name: Rivotter
cobblemon.species.jaguatter.name: Jaguatter
cobblemon.species.mabalone.name: Mabalone
cobblemon.species.mollusciron.name: Mollusciron
cobblemon.species.mollusciron.desc: Its shell, made of layers of different hazardous metals, is nearly impervious to damage and it shrugs off even the most brutal attacks like nothing. It makes pilgrimages to lava flows at the bottom of the ocean to reinforce its armor.
cobblemon.species.larvatinum.name: Larvatinum
cobblemon.species.larvatinum.desc: Its “true forme” is tiny and weak, only when it creates a second body out of slime is its inner strength revealed. In this “armed forme”, it is able to protect itself by launching flurries of punches at blinding speed. If the armed forme becomes damaged beyond repair, Larvatinum will use it as a decoy while escaping.
cobblemon.species.cassowar.name: Cassowar
cobblemon.species.casspartan.name: Casspartan
cobblemon.species.ornake.name: Ornake
cobblemon.species.flamboa.name: Flamboa
cobblemon.species.flitch.name: Flitch
cobblemon.species.flitch.desc: Flitch feed on the blood of larger pokemon, leaving an itchy bite. Flitch have been known to carry disease and are believed to have played a part during a well-known pandemic of Malease and Morbosis in ancient times.
cobblemon.species.fitorfly.name: Fitorfly
cobblemon.species.fitorfly.desc: It waits in hiding so it can ambush its prey like an assassin. It is able to take down bug pokemon larger than itself.
cobblemon.species.supafly.name: Supafly
cobblemon.species.supafly.desc: Despite how bulky its hairs make it appear, it is an agile and stealthy predator that uses its proboscis as a dagger. It targets Beedrill hives and will pick them off one by one.
cobblemon.species.borpion.name: Borpion
cobblemon.species.borpion.desc: It is said that mountain climbers who feel a stinging sensation in their legs have been attacked by a Borpion.
cobblemon.species.panorpion.name: Panorpion
cobblemon.species.panorpion.desc: When it takes flight, the sound of its wings is like a plane. Stories tell of it carrying off children, but research shows it greatly prefers scavenging.
cobblemon.species.canibble.name: Canibble
cobblemon.species.canibble.desc: It carries around bones it uses as weapons, but cannot resist the urge to gnaw on them when it gets hungry. When the bones are rendered unusable, it will find new ones.
cobblemon.species.peernut.name: Peernut
cobblemon.species.peernut.desc: The appendage on its head is edible and quickly grows back.
cobblemon.species.embrystic.name: Embrystic
cobblemon.species.embrystic.desc: It spends its days meditating on the unity of all life in the world.
cobblemon.species.shromp.name: Shromp
cobblemon.species.shromp.desc: Despite its nonthreatening appearance, its claws can puncture through solid steel at the speed of a bullet.
cobblemon.species.clobster.name: Clobster
cobblemon.species.clobster.desc: It punches with such speed and force that the air pressure around its fists creates a destructive shock wave.
cobblemon.species.prawnage.name: Prawnage
cobblemon.species.prawnage.desc: It sends messages by bending waves of light into patterns that are invisible to all but its own kind.
cobblemon.species.shrude.name: Shrude
cobblemon.species.shrude.desc: It eats its own weight in food every day, even pilfering food from others for itself. When cornered, it attacks with a venomous bite.
cobblemon.species.radfink.name: Radfink
cobblemon.species.radfink.desc: Infamous for being unruly and antagonistic, it quickly makes a nuisance of itself wherever it goes. It styles its hair with its toxic drool.
cobblemon.species.fluffloat.name: Fluffloat
cobblemon.species.colonoodle.name: Colonoodle
cobblemon.species.tenthereal.name: Tenthereal
cobblemon.species.jelsparc.name: Jelsparc
cobblemon.species.jelsparc.desc: Its tentacles contain special cells that shock whatever touches them. Its bell glows when its power is at maximum.
cobblemon.species.jelightning.name: Jelightning
cobblemon.species.jelightning.desc: Nicknamed the “Stinging Storm”, it discharges electricity into the surrounding atmosphere to alter the weather. Its eye shines like a beacon in the dark.
cobblemon.species.huffalimp.name: Huffalimp
cobblemon.species.huffalimp.desc: The gas it sprays from its trunk distorts the senses and causes strange hallucinations. It stores the gas in its belly, making it move as if floating on the moon.
cobblemon.species.burstank.name: Burstank
cobblemon.species.burstank.desc: Volatile chemicals in its abdomen are combined together to create explosive blasts. It may detonate if it becomes even slightly angered.
cobblemon.species.debutaint.name: Debutaint
cobblemon.species.debutaint.desc: It has a fussy disposition, hating to do anything that might muss up its appearance. The strength of its poison is linked to how vibrant its colors are.
cobblemon.species.promenude.name: Promenude
cobblemon.species.promenude.desc: It prides itself on its primped appearance and impeccable poise, to the point of arrogance. It stays in the shade to avoid drying out and compromising its complexion.
cobblemon.species.glautillion.name: Glautillion
cobblemon.species.glautillion.desc: Supremely vain and showy, Glautillion makes itself the center of attention at all times. It moves with such grace and refinement that it can balance a book on its head even while dancing.
cobblemon.species.lilacorn.name: Lilacorn
cobblemon.species.lilacorn.desc: The flowers growing on its back are said to have mystical properties, causing them to have been hunted nearly to extinction.
cobblemon.species.wisterious.name: Wisterious
cobblemon.species.wisterious.desc: Incredibly rare, it only appears before those who are pure of heart and will abandon those with ill intent. The greatest possible blessing is a special aroma from its flowers which induces feelings of euphoria. Although capable of great power, it abhors violence and is incredibly gentle and graceful.
cobblemon.species.cattermaul.name: Cattermaul
cobblemon.species.katybud.name: Katybud
cobblemon.species.katybud.desc: It blends into its surroundings, moving only when there is no danger. Its arms and legs are covered in sharp spikes.
cobblemon.species.thornydid.name: Thornydid
cobblemon.species.thornydid.desc: The sweet-smelling essence of its flower can be made into a perfume. Trying to take it by force will get you stabbed by its spines.
cobblemon.species.candelaria.name: Candelaria
cobblemon.species.candelaria.desc: The tip of its horn emits a small flame that smells like whatever sap it has eaten.
cobblemon.species.lanternaria.name: Lanternaria
cobblemon.species.lanternaria.desc: Its large, head-shaped horn is full of fire which causes it to glow and release an incense-like scent. Old reports of dragons in the rainforest are believed to be this Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.crestrap.name: Crestrap
cobblemon.species.crestrap.desc: It is able to climb any surface using its sticky fingers. It can detach its tail as a distraction, although regrowing it takes longer with age.
cobblemon.species.sundraco.name: Sundraco
cobblemon.species.sundraco.desc: The sticky bulbs on its tail and fingertips are used to catch insects. It raises the flaps under its arms to absorb sunlight.
cobblemon.species.eelabyss.name: Eelabyss
cobblemon.species.eelabyss.desc: It lives at the bottom of the ocean. In spite of its slender body, it is able to eat prey several times its size using its incredibly elastic jaws.
cobblemon.species.loguts.name: Loguts
cobblemon.species.loguts.desc: It has a strong sense of justice and charges in to oppose evildoers even when it is seriously outmatched.
cobblemon.species.herocust.name: Herocust
cobblemon.species.herocust.desc: it trains every day so that it may protect those in need. It leaps into action when it hears a cry for help.
cobblemon.species.mustmite.name: Mustmite
cobblemon.species.mustmite.desc: They whip up a cloud of dust, pollen and other particulate matter wherever they go, triggering allergic reactions even in people with no record of allergies. When a large number assembles, it can be impossible to see through the filth.
cobblemon.species.dustmighty.name: Dustmighty
cobblemon.species.dustmighty.desc: Even its own nose is affected by the cloud of filth that wafts under it. It commands Mustmites as if they were an extension of itself.
cobblemon.species.aardvolt.name: Aardvolt
cobblemon.species.aardvolt.desc: Static electricity courses through its body, causing its mane and tail to stand on end.
cobblemon.species.catfeine.name: Catfeine
cobblemon.species.catfeine.desc: Coffee was invented after humans observed Catfeine grind and roast certain berries. They are able to brew drinks with effects ranging from HP restoration to stat increases to status healing.
cobblemon.species.kittypillar.name: Kittypillar
cobblemon.species.kittypillar.desc: Its fur is as soft and luxurious as the silk it spins. Having one visit your garden is a sign of great fortune.
cobblemon.species.fuzzilk.name: Fuzzilk
cobblemon.species.fuzzilk.desc: It is wrapped in a luxurious coat of silk, awaiting evolution. Clothing made from this material has been coveted for thousands of years.
cobblemon.species.bombun.name: Bombun
cobblemon.species.bombun.desc: Rarely seen outside of captivity, it lacks wings but makes up for it by jumping with its powerful legs. The fur around its neck is some of the finest in the world.
cobblemon.species.stingray.name: Stingray
cobblemon.species.stingray.desc: It emits beams from its abdomen that hypnotize other pokemon to do its bidding. It lays its egg inside pupating pokemon so they evolve into Stingray instead.
cobblemon.species.suglide.name: Suglide
cobblemon.species.suglide.desc: It uses a cape of fur to fly through the trees. They huddle for warmth during snowstorms.
cobblemon.species.coolugo.name: Coolugo
cobblemon.species.coolugo.desc: Coolugo protects its young from the harsh cold with its thick, blanket-like cape.
cobblemon.species.luxuroe.name: Luxuroe
cobblemon.species.luxuroe.desc: Luxuroe and Aristocarp are domestic species kept by the wealthy elite for their pearl-like eggs. This caviar is a rare delicacy that has different grades of quality; a single egg of the lowest one still being as valuable as a nugget.
cobblemon.species.aristocarp.name: Aristocarp
cobblemon.species.aristocarp.desc: The production and consumption of Aristocarp caviar has become a symbol of the absurd levels of opulence and hedonism held by the upper class.
cobblemon.species.icesight.name: Icesight
cobblemon.species.icestalk.name: Icestalk
cobblemon.species.venigoon.name: Venigoon
cobblemon.species.venigaloot.name: Venigaloot
cobblemon.species.charmix.name: Charmix
cobblemon.species.charmix.desc: It comes in two varieties, the blue “Right Forme” and pink “Left Forme”. When two individuals of opposite orientations meet, they will attempt to interlock their horns. If a perfect fit is attained, they will evolve together into a Charmatch.
cobblemon.species.charmatch.name: Charmatch
cobblemon.species.charmatch.desc: It derives its power from the synergy of the Charmix it evolved from. It is formed from both of them, but is in itself something entirely new.
cobblemon.species.ravolt.name: Ravolt
cobblemon.species.lubub.name: Lubub
cobblemon.species.heartery.name: Heartery
cobblemon.species.ventherm.name: Ventherm
cobblemon.species.ventherm.desc: At the bottom of the ocean, deep within the trenches, there is no light. Life in the abyss is not sustained by the sun, but by undersea vents that spew chemicals.
cobblemon.species.volchemo.name: Volchemo
cobblemon.species.volchemo.desc: Tublip are often found attached to Volchemo, blooming in order to feed off chemicals in its smoke. In exchange they allow Volchemo access to moves such as Ingrain, Synthesis and Giga Drain.
cobblemon.species.tublip.name: Tublip
cobblemon.species.tublip.desc: Tublip, a Pokemon common in the dark trenches. In a world where life is nourished not by sunlight but by sulfur billowing from undersea volcanoes, this Poison-type Pokemon fills a niche normally held by Grass-types. It has a symbiotic relationship with Ventherm.
cobblemon.species.narpoon.name: Narpoon
cobblemon.species.narpoon.desc: Narpoon, a Deep Sea Pokemon that fires barbs from its snout like harpoons. It stretches its arms to capture prey once speared.
cobblemon.species.hantom.name: Hantom
cobblemon.species.spectouch.name: Spectouch
cobblemon.species.jawee.name: Jawee
cobblemon.species.jawee.desc: Its jaws are surprisingly powerful for a creature so small and squishy. Popular with beginner trainers who believe it to be in the best percentage.
cobblemon.species.jawsome.name: Jawsome
cobblemon.species.jawsome.desc: Its strength lies in its jaws. It can retract its head inside its body to bite with its outer jaws.
cobblemon.species.whirlybug.name: Whirlybug
cobblemon.species.whirlybug.desc: Hoping to take flight, it spins the propeller on its head as hard as it can and jumps. However, it always ends up face down in the mud.
cobblemon.species.shellicopter.name: Shellicopter
cobblemon.species.shellicopter.desc: It takes so much pride in its newfound flight that it ignores how uncontrollable it is. When it crashes, its rapidly-spinning blades cause collateral damage.
cobblemon.species.aviatrice.name: Aviatrice
cobblemon.species.aviatrice.desc: It lives in the sky, never setting foot on the ground. By using its balloon to sense atmospheric conditions, it avoids getting caught in bad weather.
cobblemon.species.hagloop.name: Hagloop
cobblemon.species.hagloop.desc: Hagloop’s boneless, gelatinous body can squeeze through the tightest opening. It is one of the first scavengers to arrive when a Wailord carcass falls to the deep sea.
cobblemon.species.nyareis.name: Nyareis
cobblemon.species.eunash.name: Eunash
cobblemon.species.termini.name: Termini
cobblemon.species.termini.desc: It works tirelessly in its colony’s underground labyrinth. Their power lies in numbers.
cobblemon.species.termulch.name: Termulch
cobblemon.species.termulch.desc: Termulch acts as a sentry, guarding the colony with its powerful jaws, stony armor, and a horn that sprays sticky webs. It shreds trees so Termini can harvest the raw materials. Only female Termulch evolve into Termajesty.
cobblemon.species.termajesty.name: Termajesty
cobblemon.species.termajesty.desc: It dwells deep underground at the heart of its colony’s labyrinthine tunnels. Its abdomen houses special Termini that act as its personal servants
cobblemon.species.toxsick.name: Toxsick
cobblemon.species.toxsick.desc: Its body is a crystal made of poison. It uses its DNA to create more of itself from hazardous toxins.
cobblemon.species.sirenatee.name: Sirenatee
cobblemon.species.sirenatee.desc: Its singing can make even a Primeape become calm and peaceful. The sea grass growing on its head is full of nutrients.
cobblemon.species.elegrace.name: Elegrace
cobblemon.species.elegrace.desc: It communicates using dance, creating a rich visual language that varies from region to region.
cobblemon.species.hierophant.name: Hierophant
cobblemon.species.hierophant.desc: It roams the land spreading the knowledge it attained from reaching enlightenment. It seeks to bring peace and understanding to the world.
cobblemon.species.nitpick.name: Nitpick
cobblemon.species.nitpick.desc: It clings to the fur of larger Pokemon so it can suck their blood.
cobblemon.species.cootiepie.name: Cootiepie
cobblemon.species.cootiepie.desc: It uses pheromones to mesmerize other pokemon. Its kiss causes a fever.
cobblemon.species.gurugan.name: Gurugan
cobblemon.species.gurugan.desc: Its body is soft so it shoots sticky webs from its antennae as defense.
cobblemon.species.guruvelt.name: Guruvelt
cobblemon.species.guruvelt.desc: It uses its webs to neutralize electricity and subdue its prey without issue.
cobblemon.species.pierrot.name: Pierrot
cobblemon.species.pierrot.desc: It frequently trips over its own feet and tumbles down hills.
cobblemon.species.icykandji.name: Icykandji
cobblemon.species.iglookandji.name: Iglookandji
cobblemon.species.sparassid.name: Sparassid
cobblemon.species.sparassid.desc: Sparassid’s unusual stature gives it an unusual advantage on other Fighting-type Pokemon in the boxing ring.
cobblemon.species.crickid.name: Crickid
cobblemon.species.grylloket.name: Grylloket
cobblemon.species.coolstroyr.name: Coolstroyr
cobblemon.species.coolstroyr.desc: Coolstroyr is a powerful digger whose craggy exoskeleton withstands the pressure deep within the Earth’s crust. When all three drills spin in unison, not even tempered steel can defend against its advance
cobblemon.species.lorable.name: Lorable
cobblemon.species.lorable.desc: Lorable lives in trees, emerging at night to hunt insects. Despite its cute appearance, it produces a powerful toxin in its horn and should not be allowed near small children.
cobblemon.species.sproutot.name: Sproutot
cobblemon.species.sproutot.desc: It stays underground with the shoot on its head exposed to absorb sunlight.
cobblemon.species.scaregrow.name: Scaregrow
cobblemon.species.scaregrow.desc: It appears when a crop field is neglected for too long. It spreads its roots to suck the life out of plants until the earth is barren.
cobblemon.species.elefin.name: Elefin
cobblemon.species.elefin.desc: It grabs onto things with its trunk to resist currents in its native rivers.
cobblemon.species.makarel.name: Makarel
cobblemon.species.brackish.name: Brackish
cobblemon.species.lagoon.name: Lagoon
cobblemon.species.lagoon.desc: It lives in remote jungles, hiding in the murky water. When its habitat is threatened, it retaliates with superhuman strength.
cobblemon.species.billabong.name: Billabong
cobblemon.species.billabong.desc: Billabong navigates deep, murky swamps with its fleshy barbels. They have historically been sighted in ocean areas, where old sailors mistook them for eldritch monsters.
cobblemon.species.lizava.name: Lizava
cobblemon.species.lizava.desc: It is known to expel powerful jets of steam and soot from its nostrils after emerging from its home in active volcanoes. Unlike Magmar, a pokemon that shares a similar ecological niche, Lizava is capable of living in colder volcanic regions as well as tropical ones.
cobblemon.species.bugbear.name: Bugbear
cobblemon.species.caesoil.name: Caesoil
cobblemon.species.caesoil.desc: Caesoil has underdeveloped eyes so it uses its nose to find its way. It loses its gills and begins to breathe air as it matures.
cobblemon.species.mudragon.name: Mudragon
cobblemon.species.mudragon.desc: Mudragon, an amphibious Pokemon that burrows into the mud. It must stay moist.
cobblemon.species.spyaye.name: Spyaye
cobblemon.species.spyaye.desc: Spy-aye is a shy Pokemon, coming out only at night. It can see wavelengths of light humans cannot, such as infrared and ultraviolet. Rumors say its third eye can read minds and even see when you will die.
cobblemon.species.scryaye.name: Scryaye
cobblemon.species.scryaye.desc: When a Scry-aye looks into someone’s eyes, it can read their thoughts, memories, and even see into their future. It can lock onto a target and see them from miles away. Nothing escapes its sight.
cobblemon.species.ewwgie.name: Ewwgie
cobblemon.species.ewwgie.desc: It begs to be picked up and hugged, but its skin is covered in mucus and unpleasant to the touch.
cobblemon.species.skeezer.name: Skeezer
cobblemon.species.skeezer.desc: Anything it takes a liking to, it covers in its grime. Even the smell of it is enough to viscerally repulse someone.
cobblemon.species.tenrock.name: Tenrock
cobblemon.species.tenrock.desc: Tenrock, a small spiny Pokemon that thrashes around when it hears music it likes. When they congregate, things gets very wild.
cobblemon.species.ratstar.name: Ratstar
cobblemon.species.ratstar.desc: Ratstar is a showy, boisterous Pokemon that always makes itself the center of attention. Its shouts sound like a wailing guitar.
cobblemon.species.polyfreight.name: Polyfreight
cobblemon.species.tuskoar.name: Tuskoar
cobblemon.species.tuskoble.name: Tuskoble
cobblemon.species.tuskoble.desc: Tuskoble is a majestic Pokemon with hide as hard as steel, immortalized centuries ago in medieval heraldry but thought to be mere legend until recently. It has a friendly disposition and appears before those who are pure of heart. It should not be underestimated though, as it fights for justice using its massive tusks.
cobblemon.species.gastare.name: Gastare
cobblemon.species.gastare.desc: Gastare feeds on brainwaves, congregating towards the signals created by telekinesis. A single one is negligible, but en masse they can create a psychic jamming effect that can neutralize even an Alakazam.
cobblemon.species.espergo.name: Espergo
cobblemon.species.espergo.desc: Espergo’s consciousness is so powerful that it has transcended its body, which has become degenerated. It absorbs mental energy to make this astral projection more powerful at the expense of those around it.
cobblemon.species.psyphon.name: Psyphon
cobblemon.species.psyphon.desc: Psyphon’s four bodies are mentally connected, sharing the same thoughts and senses.
cobblemon.species.psydaria.name: Psydaria
cobblemon.species.psydaria.desc: Psydaria’s floats contain additional brains, enhancing its psychic abilities. It lures prey into its toxic tentacles
cobblemon.species.malease.name: Malease
cobblemon.species.malease.desc: One touch from its scythes is enough to transmit a potent toxin.
cobblemon.species.bohole.name: Bohole
cobblemon.species.bohole.desc: Its jovial appearance conceals a malicious disposition towards humans. It uses strange fairy powers to ruin crops and bring misfortune towards anyone who settles in its territory, as well as being a notoriously petty prankster. Folklore often attributes them for child abductions and drownings.
cobblemon.species.peathog.name: Peathog
cobblemon.species.wartbog.name: Wartbog
cobblemon.species.pictog.name: Pictog
cobblemon.species.androck.name: Androck
cobblemon.species.maningauz.name: Maningauz
cobblemon.species.sarcophacoon.name: Sarcophacoon
cobblemon.species.beedazzle.name: Beedazzle
cobblemon.species.wormachine.name: Wormachine
cobblemon.species.wormachine.desc: It builds sandcastles to protect itself. As the castle grows in size, other pokemon may wish to take shelter inside and lend Wormachine their power.
cobblemon.species.denkipede.name: Denkipede
cobblemon.species.denkipede.desc: It dashes for cover when spotted by something larger than itself. It prefers to hide in buildings with electrical appliances.
cobblemon.species.traplure.name: Traplure
cobblemon.species.traplure.desc: It casts its lure out into the water and waits for something to take the bait. This technique works best against prey that Traplure can actually overpower.
cobblemon.species.axelure.name: Axelure
cobblemon.species.axelure.desc: Pokemon in the deep sea sometimes find a small, glowing figure and come closer to play with it, only to get dragged into an Angelure’s jaws.
cobblemon.species.abyspook.name: Abyspook
cobblemon.species.abyssoul.name: Abyssoul
cobblemon.species.catterbrain.name: Catterbrain
cobblemon.species.catterbrain.desc: It feeds on thoughts, causing its victims to forget what they were just doing.
cobblemon.species.twistree.name: Twistree
cobblemon.species.twisbee.name: Twisbee
cobblemon.species.figabee.name: Figabee
cobblemon.species.fumball.name: Fumball
cobblemon.species.fumball.desc: It is prone to tripping, causing it to roll around uncontrollably. Its shell has a sugary taste that varies between individuals.
cobblemon.species.trickytreat.name: Trickytreat
cobblemon.species.trickytreat.desc: The candy balls in its body rattle as it wobbles around. It ejects them and gives them to people to enjoy when it is happy.
cobblemon.species.woodron.name: Woodron
cobblemon.species.woodron.desc: Woodron, called the “soldier of the forest”. It protects its home by harnessing the power of nature itself. Its hidden canons fire seeds like missiles.
cobblemon.species.troytron.name: Troytron
cobblemon.species.troytron.desc: Troytron is powered up by the sun. With the many weapons hidden in its body, it can defeat an entire army in under a day.
cobblemon.species.monstauk.name: Monstauk
cobblemon.species.monstauk.desc: Its presence on a beach is an omen of terrible fortune. If you set out to sea after seeing one, your boat will surely capsize.
cobblemon.species.monstale.name: Monstale
cobblemon.species.monstale.desc: The fog it emits causes sailors to hallucinate. It crashes into their ship with its massive tusks and drags them to the depths
cobblemon.species.caskry.name: Caskry
cobblemon.species.caskry.desc: It is born when a grave falls into neglect. Its mournful sobbing echoes in the night air.
cobblemon.species.mausomber.name: Mausomber
cobblemon.species.mausomber.desc: When people desecrate graveyards, they are drawn into Mausomber never to be seen again.
cobblemon.species.widoweb.name: Widoweb
cobblemon.species.widoweb.desc: The red silk it spins can be woven into luxurious fabric. It is notoriously difficult to cooperate with and often requires some sort of trade for its silk.
cobblemon.species.widowitch.name: Widowitch
cobblemon.species.widowitch.desc: It uses its charms to put male pokemon in a trance. Eventually the victim reaches a point where he would willingly die for her sake….and that sake is always dinner.
cobblemon.species.impelial.name: Impelial
cobblemon.species.impelial.desc: A small trickster that loves pranks and mischief, especially when someone is hurt by it. They are surprisingly loyal companions to users of the dark arts.
cobblemon.species.ashmodeus.name: Ashmodeus
cobblemon.species.ashmodeus.desc: Ashmodeus is a powerful entity mentioned in grimoires and spellbooks; a dangerous and deceitful master of black magic. It can teach humans its secret spells and knowledge, but at a terrible cost.
cobblemon.species.marlequin.name: Marlequin
cobblemon.species.marlequin.desc: The bells on its tassels ring as it dances to music only it seems to hear. Unlike other clown-category Pokemon, it has a listless disposition, seeming almost dissociated from the world around it.
cobblemon.species.kojaku.name: Kojaku
cobblemon.species.kojaku.desc: It is said that looking into its eyespots brings bad luck.
cobblemon.species.fujaku.name: Fujaku
cobblemon.species.fujaku.desc: If it is near someone fated to die soon, its eyes will become fixated on them.
cobblemon.species.vasbar.name: Vasbar
cobblemon.species.vasbar.desc: Vasbar lives in the most extreme environments, such as the bottom of the ocean and active volcanoes. It can even survive the vacuum of space.
cobblemon.species.combatant.name: Combatant
cobblemon.species.sergeant.name: Sergeant
cobblemon.species.militant.name: Militant
cobblemon.species.smogstack.name: Smogstack
cobblemon.species.hazrat.name: Hazrat
cobblemon.species.atomant.name: Atomant
cobblemon.species.mirorim.name: Mirorim
cobblemon.species.mirorim.desc: It uses light to dazzle opponents and can reflect any attack from wherever it came.
cobblemon.species.abstrarts.name: Abstrarts
cobblemon.species.abstrarts.desc: A bizarre being that rumor says can peer into alternate dimensions. Gazing into its mirrors traps you in illusions of your past.
cobblemon.species.petrosaur.name: Petrosaur
cobblemon.species.petrosaur.desc: Petrosaur, the Ore Pokemon revived from the Wing Fossil. It used its rocky crest to slam into prey from above.
cobblemon.species.quartzcoatl.name: Quartzcoatl
cobblemon.species.quartzcoatl.desc: Quartzcoatl ruled the sky millions of years ago, shining with the colors of the rainbow. At least one survived into the age of humans where an ancient civilization revered it as a god.
cobblemon.species.spinotap.name: Spinotap
cobblemon.species.spinotap.desc: Spinotap, an ancient Pokemon. Its prominent crest breaks the water’s surface before it savagely strikes its prey. Its evolved form Spinoscrap is said to have rivaled Tyrantrum.
cobblemon.species.spinoscrap.name: Spinoscrap
cobblemon.species.spinoscrap.desc: Spinoscrap is a Pokemon that ruled the water the same way Tyrantrum ruled the land. It has a cunning, vicious personality and is fond of ambushes.
cobblemon.species.dregion.name: Dregion
cobblemon.species.dregion.desc: Dregion is an ancient pokemon of unknown origin that became fossilized on Earth long ago. It uses the claw on the end of its trunk to manipulate objects and it communicates by flashing its eyes.
cobblemon.species.shalegion.name: Shalegion
cobblemon.species.shalegion.desc: Shalegion is shrouded in mystery, always searching for new data for unknown purposes. It shares a collective mental network with its species, allowing any Shalegion to access all information learned by every other.
cobblemon.species.dessicat.name: Dessicat
cobblemon.species.dessicat.desc: It attacks anyone attempting to plunder its resting place. Those who escape it are plagued with bad luck.
cobblemon.species.mummoth.name: Mummoth
cobblemon.species.mummoth.desc: Archaeologists attempting to claim the riches of an ancient temple incurred its wrath. Although slow and lumbering, it pursues its target relentlessly
cobblemon.species.zomboo.name: Zomboo
cobblemon.species.zomboo.desc: The result of a mishap involving fossil revival technology, it is a dull-witted abomination driven only by hunger. It is also very smelly.
cobblemon.species.icevil.name: Icevil
cobblemon.species.icevil.desc: Icevil, the Frostbite Pokemon. It clamps down on anything that moves in the frozen tundra. If it bites a metal pole, its tongue will get stuck.
cobblemon.species.thycicle.name: Thycicle
cobblemon.species.thycicle.desc: Anything unlucky enough to be trapped in a snowstorm is likely to get ambushed by a Thycicle’s powerful jaws. Only its prehistoric ancestor, Andrymir, is a more dangerous polar predator.
cobblemon.species.andrymir.name: Andrymir
cobblemon.species.andrymir.desc: Andrymir is an ancient ancestor of Thycicle that ruled the ice age thousands of years ago. Anything caught in its double jaws is frozen solid and shattered.
cobblemon.species.vikitten.name: Vikitten
cobblemon.species.vikitten.desc: Vikitten, the Ice Cat Pokemon. It never stays in one spot for long, always in search of adventure. Its thick fur keeps it warm as it travels the tundras with its friends.
cobblemon.species.vikottr.name: Vikottr
cobblemon.species.vikottr.desc: The frozen wasteland is its home. When faced with a powerful foe, it will fearlessly charge into battle and fight until the bitter end.
cobblemon.species.varingpard.name: Varingpard
cobblemon.species.varingpard.desc: It leads hordes of Vikottr in raids, searching for food and battle. When faced with a worthy opponent, it stops holding back and fights savagely.
cobblemon.species.dermug.name: Dermug
cobblemon.species.dermug.desc: It scuttles around museums and taxidermy shops gnawing on the displays. Although they can be trained to eat household dirt, they still go after antiques.
cobblemon.species.necrophagus.name: Necrophagus
cobblemon.species.necrophagus.desc: It stores prey inside its empty shell of a body, slowly draining them of life. Once it has finished, it places the mummified body in an underground tomb.
cobblemon.species.oculyp.name: Oculyp
cobblemon.species.psynapse.name: Psynapse
cobblemon.species.brainowar.name: Brainowar
cobblemon.species.pootzin.name: Pootzin
cobblemon.species.hoatstink.name: Hoatstink
cobblemon.species.ponarian.name: Ponarian
cobblemon.species.ponarian.desc: Ponarian, believed to be among the first Pokemon capable of reproduction. If cut in half, both parts will become a full Ponarian. It has survived for countless eons by adapting its type to match any environment.
cobblemon.species.plakiton.name: Plakiton
cobblemon.species.plakiton.desc: Plakiton have endured for millions of years. Even though its shell is as hard and dense as the Earth’s mantle, it is always changing on the inside.
cobblemon.species.astaron.name: Astaron
cobblemon.species.astaron.desc: Astaron is described in myth as a pokemon that witnessed the birth of the Earth and will witness its demise. It transcends the limits of a single type, channeling its energies to change at will. Ancient civilizations have been ended by its feeding rampages.
cobblemon.species.sharog.name: Sharog
cobblemon.species.sharagged.name: Sharagged
cobblemon.species.sharchaic.name: Sharchaic
cobblemon.species.vaxxine.name: Vaxxine
cobblemon.species.vaxxine.desc: Many Pokemon produce a variety of toxic chemicals for defense and offence, which poses one of the larger threats to trainers and their companions. Even Pokemon not classified as Poison element can surprise you with hazardous secretions. Luckily, modern medicine has developed a number of widely-available and broad-spectrum products that even a 10 year old can apply when need be. With the exception of natural remedies, most commercial status-alleviating products are manufactured in labs and derive
cobblemon.species.prickary.name: Prickary
cobblemon.species.chelomat.name: Chelomat
cobblemon.species.chelomat.desc: Chelomat is a slow-moving, carefree pokemon that camouflages into riverbeds when it lays down flat. It inhales air using its snorkel-like nose and can hold its breath for hours.
cobblemon.species.chelosnap.name: Chelosnap
cobblemon.species.chelosnap.desc: The fringes on Chelosnap’s skin blur its silhouette as it lies underwater, allowing it to hide in plain sight. It stays still for so long, algae grows on its shell. Its jaws can rend a car in half.
cobblemon.species.slipeel.name: Slipeel
cobblemon.species.phonana.name: Phonana
cobblemon.species.phonutree.name: Phonutree
cobblemon.species.tunihag.name: Tunihag
cobblemon.species.tunihag.desc: Tunihag is coated in a layer of slime that regenerates if damaged. It sits in groups all across the sea floor.
cobblemon.species.hagnoz.name: Hagnoz
cobblemon.species.bandiero.name: Bandiero
cobblemon.species.bandiero.desc: It is a troublemaker with a hair-trigger temper, infamous for robbing travelers in the desert. It loves to strike during sandstorms.
cobblemon.species.spinnotaur.name: Spinnotaur
cobblemon.species.spinnotaur.desc: It waits patiently underground until something gets in range of its horns. If it fails to destroy its target in one blow, it becomes agitated and panicked, making it even more dangerous.
cobblemon.species.wetterwaul.name: Wetterwaul
cobblemon.species.crabuddy.name: Crabuddy
cobblemon.species.palnemone.name: Palnemone
cobblemon.species.hermitwin.name: Hermitwin
cobblemon.species.mermegg.name: Mermegg
cobblemon.species.mermegg.desc: In the summer, many will gather on the beach to create rainbows with the lustrous nacre of their shells. If you witness this, you are sure to have good luck.
cobblemon.species.wermaid.name: Wermaid
cobblemon.species.flowerm.name: Flowerm
cobblemon.species.vermenace.name: Vermenace
cobblemon.species.sushef.name: Sushef
cobblemon.species.sushef.desc: It takes pride in creating delicious food for others. It is common to see several working together under the direction of Grillardin.
cobblemon.species.grillardin.name: Grillardin
cobblemon.species.grillardin.desc: Grillardin is a skilled chef able to memorize recipes from all over the world. Even high-class Kalos dishes are within its abilities. It has a stern disposition, but only because it wants its Sushef apprentices to excel.
cobblemon.species.kestrail.name: Kestrail
cobblemon.species.sagittary.name: Sagittary
cobblemon.species.barbaron.name: Barbaron
cobblemon.species.barbaron.desc: It is a merciless creature that even eats the bones of its prey.
cobblemon.species.spidirt.name: Spidirt
cobblemon.species.spidirt.desc: It spends so much time underground that seeing one is considered an omen of luck. Although quick to flee, it will fight tenaciously when cornered.
cobblemon.species.terraintula.name: Terraintula
cobblemon.species.terraintula.desc: It occasionally makes its den in abandoned rural buildings, which may cause conflict with traveling humans. Its hairs sense the slightest movement in the air.
cobblemon.species.tigearth.name: Tigearth
cobblemon.species.tigearth.desc: It is said that a Terraintula who lives for 700 years becomes a Tigearth. Aggressive and crafty, folklore tells of a warrior who stopped Tigearth from preying on villages several times in his travels. The silk it lines its den with is harder than steel.
cobblemon.species.larvade.name: Larvade
cobblemon.species.larvade.desc: It springs forth to grab the first living thing it sees after hatching. It cannot survive without clinging to a host and absorbing its power.
cobblemon.species.invadien.name: Invadien
cobblemon.species.invadien.desc: From the moment it evolves, it lies dormant inside its host and only emerges when ready to evolve once more. It may go unnoticed aside from the host’s appetite becoming ravenous.
cobblemon.species.xenovader.name: Xenovader
cobblemon.species.xenovader.desc: It ferociously subdues prey using its claws and stinger, immobilizing them before laying eggs nearby. If you appear to have outran it, it may simply be tailing you into a populated area.
cobblemon.species.mefowl.name: Mefowl
cobblemon.species.mefowl.desc: It uses its telepathic powers to corrupt people’s minds with anger and despair. It often tells people one head tells the truth and the other lies, but in truth, both heads love lying- especially when it causes harm.
cobblemon.species.liviscous.name: Liviscous
cobblemon.species.liviscous.desc: It contaminates everything it touches with its secretions which cause sneezing and coughing. Even when at rest inside its kettle, built-up slime will suddenly spray out without any warning.
cobblemon.species.punkoil.name: Punkoil
cobblemon.species.punkoil.desc: It emits strange energy wavelengths from its spines that cause nausea and cramping to whoever is in range. It has a habit of pestering people, even and especially those it is close to.
cobblemon.species.feverm.name: Feverm
cobblemon.species.feverm.desc: Coming into contact with its burning hairs causes inflammation and fever. Those rendered delirious with high temperature claim to have seen it floating above them as if taunting them.
cobblemon.species.sinchilla.name: Sinchilla
cobblemon.species.sinchilla.desc: It saps the body heat from whoever it scurries on, causing shivering, chills, and fatigue. Its mini-chillas have their own consciousnesses and link onto each other’s tails so none of them ever get lost.
cobblemon.species.sourpent.name: Sourpent
cobblemon.species.sourpent.desc: It grows a fruit that curses whoever eats it with aches, pains, and chronic conditions. It has innate knowledge of herbalism and tailors each fruit’s effect by absorbing different chemical compounds from nature.
cobblemon.species.perilouse.name: Perilouse
cobblemon.species.perilouse.desc: It pollutes its host's bloodstream as it drinks their blood, also causing irritations and secondary infections in the process. It hates cleanliness and lingers around places that are dirty and disgusting.
cobblemon.species.poxopon.name: Poxopon
cobblemon.species.poxopon.desc: Its mere touch causes people to break out in rashes and blemishes. It views inflicting its curse as a game and will listen to whoever invokes its name to “play” with their enemy.
cobblemon.species.grimongrel.name: Grimongrel
cobblemon.species.grimongrel.desc: Its aura of malice coalesces into deadly diseases. It dwells in the darkness, stewing in its own venom and appearing when nobody wants it to.
cobblemon.species.baiking.name: Baiking
cobblemon.species.baiking.desc: Boisterous and jovial, it travels the world in search of exciting adventures. It leaves a trail of destruction in its wake where anything left standing is contaminated with toxic mold.
cobblemon.species.caulderon.name: Caulderon
cobblemon.species.caulderon.desc: A mythical being said to reside within a dimension at the bottom of a chasm. It captures lost souls and pulls them into its pot to be purified.
cobblemon.species.seraphlea.name: Seraphlea
cobblemon.species.seraphlea.desc: Its wings conceal a void with enormous power. It appears out of nowhere.
cobblemon.species.nirvantis.name: Nirvantis
cobblemon.species.nirvantis.desc: A bug pokemon overcame a life of hardship to attain enlightenment and become Nirvantis. As it has transcended mortal suffering, it inspires those who seek spiritual peace. Through its harmony with the flow of life energy, its movements became like a graceful stream.
cobblemon.species.gargorgon.name: Gargorgon
cobblemon.species.gargorgon.desc: An ancient hero sealed it inside a labyrinth to stop its reign of terror. Each of its heads acts independently to annihilate anything it sees.
cobblemon.species.nitecrawler.name: Nitecrawler
cobblemon.species.nitecrawler.desc: The grudges from countless bugs killed in hatred have coalesced into this pokemon. It rises during the full moon to take revenge, using its crawling tendrils to feed.
cobblemon.species.hallowither.name: Hallowither
cobblemon.species.hallowither.desc: When the souls of the deceased are not escorted to the afterlife by Dusknoir, they become trapped in our world, alone and scared. Hallowither draws in these lost souls to give them shelter, and allows them to gain new life as ghost pokemon. Even when dormant, it controls the very land it rests on.
cobblemon.species.apeiron.name: Apeiron
cobblemon.species.apeiron.desc: Anywhere it settles becomes distorted, everything and everyone becoming one with the spiral. Even so much as gazing upon its shell, its true body, is enough to cause vertigo.
cobblemon.species.kathekon.name: Kathekon
cobblemon.species.olgorkoi.name: Olgorkoi
cobblemon.species.telos.name: Telos
cobblemon.species.telos.desc: It drifts through space, living on a scale incomprehensible to humans. Astronauts landing on its surface encountered a lush yet bizarre ecosystem with a breathable atmosphere.

cobblemon.species.dnarc.name: DNArc
cobblemon.species.snipierce.name: Snipierce
cobblemon.species.snipierce.desc: Rumors have long circulated of a pokemon too stealthy to ever be captured. A summer camp once claimed it made its nest in the nearby woods, but this remains unverified.

cobblemon.species.cragweise.desc: Cragweise climbs trees and scales mountains in order to witness the vast horizon. It takes its time to appreciate the pauses in life; a way to connect with the world. The use of its ocarina has multiple effects.

cobblemon.species.gryago.desc: A fearsome endurer from multiple Ice Ages. Gūryago carries toxins from pre-historic metals and carbon. These toxins can easily break down bone that in return builds up its exo-skeleton.

cobblemon.species.koolisopod.desc: Koolisopod has adapted to the coldest of environments, as it dwells on deep, frozen seabeds. It can pinch and slash through most obstacles and form brine icicles with ravaging power.

cobblemon.species.dokaching.desc: D'oka-ching's body consists of plenty coins. They are nearly impossible to catch due to their constant falling in-and-out of portals. Catching even one of them can corrupt one's soul.
cobblemon.species.oribil.name: Oribil
cobblemon.species.curosubil.name: Curosubil
cobblemon.species.curosubil.desc: Cu'rosubil soar above the beaded spires over certain pagodas; whom works as portals to another world. Their crossed beaks can break any unwanted spirit trying to enter the Astral Planes.
cobblemon.species.otanesu.name: Otanesu

cobblemon.species.umiyomi.name: Umiyomi
cobblemon.species.umiyomi.desc: Despite its calm demeanor, Umi'yomi occasionally appears out of nowhere, wrecking anything unwanted. Its noodle-like tentacles move in synchronisation with 'the small spirits' circling around its head.
cobblemon.species.snorin.name: Snorin
cobblemon.species.snorin.desc: Snorin is in a constant battle between courage and doubt. Half of it is always asleep while its other half is looking for an opportunity to chase its inner dreams.
cobblemon.species.soarinne.name: Soarinne

cobblemon.species.banshugi.name: Banshugi
cobblemon.species.kubaiyu.name: Kubaiyu
cobblemon.species.akiddo.name: Akiddo
cobblemon.species.akiddo.desc: An ancient tale tells about a boy who got corrupted in a realm full of malevolent spirits. A'kiddo's power to eliminate other Pokémon was taken away from it due to its thirst for destruction.
cobblemon.species.qirinity.name: Qirinity
cobblemon.species.qirinity.desc: Qirinity's mane consists of cooled down dragon fire. Its cry can calm down any troubled spirit. A strike with its horn only lands on worthy opponents.
cobblemon.species.kididna.name: Kididna
cobblemon.species.hididna.name: Hididna
cobblemon.species.hididna.desc: Hididna stores electric energy inside its spiny bush-like head. It is never at ease and is always thinking about its next move.
cobblemon.species.wreckidna.name: Wreckidna
cobblemon.species.wreckidna.desc: Their leaf-like quills are sharp and electrifying. There is no doubt that any Wreckidna will wreck anything in its path. While fueled by anger, they sometimes charge their opponents to protect their young. After their destruction, it is said to leave new soil where plants can grow.
cobblemon.species.platykid.name: Platykid
cobblemon.species.platysus.name: Platysus
cobblemon.species.searopod.name: Searopod
cobblemon.species.searopod.desc: Searopod are docile and friendly Pokémon. Don't mistake their kindness for weakness however as they can pack a powerful swing with their long necks along with their beaks. The leaves they gather from the tallest of trees are burnt to a crisp and makes a good meal.
cobblemon.species.bwibble.name: Bwibble
cobblemon.species.sailizard.name: Sailizard
cobblemon.species.dracurrent.name: Dracurrent
cobblemon.species.dracurrent.desc: Dracurrent's ship-like body gives them easy passage across any sea. They can grow incredibly old and are quick to gather knowledge from their journeys. By swimming rapidly in circles they create whirlpools; a similar method to a Pokémon found in Norheim. Their draconic powers grows strong from the raging oceans.
cobblemon.species.cereusaur.name: Cereusaur

cobblemon.species.roccoon.desc: Roccon are vaguely shaped like chairs- or thrones to be specific. Their insides begins to buzz however when sitting on them, causing the victim to have a horrible seizure.

cobblemon.species.terrainiac.desc: An abomination of nature. Terrainiac's attacks are unpredictable and only Ceremonia can calm it down. It devours its young when hungry but it does show signs of remorse when doing so.
cobblemon.species.mastenianwooper.name: MastenianWooper

cobblemon.species.curseed.desc: Curseed holds onto Tauntrunks dry leaves for dear life, hoping to return to life again. Whenever it lands in a water source it may grow once more. It can no longer weep due to its insides being all dried up.

cobblemon.species.serpyre.name: Serpyre
cobblemon.species.serpyre.desc: Serpyre thrives in boiling hot volcanic springs. It can shoot everything from a geiser to a flamethrower from its beak-like mouth.

cobblemon.species.mastenianpsyduck.name: MastenianPsyduck

cobblemon.species.masteniankomala.desc: Ability: Sleepwalker. Always asleep and gains +1 speed each turn.
cobblemon.species.lizphard.name: Lizphard
