cobblemon.species.plasmuff.desc: Plasmuff are tiny bits of floating ectoplasm of sorts -illuminating orbs that are often caught on cameras. Their earmuffs are used to secure their hearing from the loud noises from their evolutions.
cobblemon.species.phanpunk.name: Phanpunk
cobblemon.species.banshriek.name: Banshriek
cobblemon.species.echoplasm.name: Echoplasm
cobblemon.species.leturte.name: Leturte
cobblemon.species.leturte.desc: Leturte gathers ancient pottery from tombs across Mastenia's remote deserts, using it as protective gear. They wander around anxiously as nomadic foot soldiers in the shifting sands, usually all by themselves.
cobblemon.species.morturtle.name: Morturtle
cobblemon.species.morturtle.desc: Morturtle are calm and collected but fearsome in battle. They can projectile massive amounts of sand and rocks from their backs. Their shells are incredibly hard and are decorated with glass-like shards that are forged by leftover sand inside their shells. The shards break often however from their loud shots, leaving splinter around them.
cobblemon.species.chickling.name: Chickling
cobblemon.species.strickhen.name: Strickhen
cobblemon.species.boltbat.name: Boltbat
cobblemon.species.mastenianbreloom.name: MastenianBreloom
cobblemon.species.roladuck.name: Roladuck
cobblemon.species.wandix.name: Wandix
cobblemon.species.steadix.name: Steadix
cobblemon.species.larvicous.name: Larvicous
cobblemon.species.flyterror.name: Flyterror
cobblemon.species.mantism.name: Mantism
cobblemon.species.larvresta.name: Larvresta
cobblemon.species.lunamoth.name: Lunamoth
cobblemon.species.mothumbra.name: Mothumbra
cobblemon.species.heatant.name: Heatant
cobblemon.species.durmor.name: Durmor
cobblemon.species.beetleer.name: Beetleer
cobblemon.species.beetleer.desc: Beetleer is a peculiar Pokémon. What seems to be the body of an insect has been taken over by an unusual gem. The gemstone itself may be associated with Sableye in some way.
cobblemon.species.cryscrawler.name: Cryscrawler
cobblemon.species.esmezra.name: Esmezra
cobblemon.species.gonut.name: Gonut
cobblemon.species.frygirr.name: Frygirr
cobblemon.species.yipbun.name: Yipbun
cobblemon.species.detome.name: Detome
cobblemon.species.rogbaahl.name: Rogbaahl
cobblemon.species.reabuto.name: Reabuto
cobblemon.species.reabuto.desc: Not much is known about Reabuto. But it is said to have hunted down larger prey than itself; and might have been the cause of the extinction of a certain fossil Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.mawvile.name: Mawvile
cobblemon.species.parasight.name: Parasight
cobblemon.species.parasight.desc: Parasight has been taken entirely over by another parasite with psychic properties. Its parasitic relationship shares similarities to another Pokémon. Meanwhile, it also has other traits from a 2nd Pokémon but the link between them has been long lost. Although terrifying, it still remains somewhat obedient.
cobblemon.species.wakkabana.name: Wakkabana
cobblemon.species.wakkabana.desc: Wakkabana hunt in great numbers but are very capable fighters on their own. Native to the region, they gain power from fruits and berries that contains minerals with electrolytes, granting them the power to give off large quantities of electrical charges in return.
cobblemon.species.terrawr.name: Terrawr
cobblemon.species.scurple.name: Scurple
cobblemon.species.scorperor.name: Scorperor
cobblemon.species.ogrean.name: Ogrean
cobblemon.species.ogrean.desc: Ogrean can fly as high as the exosphere where they also shed their exoskeleton. They also gather space-like, electrical energy from certain rays at this altitude. Their buzzing roars appears sinister and harsh.
cobblemon.species.bebushi.name: Bebushi
cobblemon.species.conferocious.name: Conferocious
cobblemon.species.hissmoke.name: Hissmoke
cobblemon.species.hissmoke.desc: When rattling its flowery tail, Hissmoke creates heat. Combined with flora and said heat, smoke appears, luring in prey with a devious smoke signal, calling for aid. Its bite and its tongue are both extremely hot.
cobblemon.species.wulvlacine.name: Wulvlacine
cobblemon.species.terratusk.name: Terratusk
cobblemon.species.mastenianlarvitar.name: MastenianLarvitar
cobblemon.species.mastenianpupitar.name: MastenianPupitar
cobblemon.species.tidaltar.name: Tidaltar
cobblemon.species.palmguana.name: Palmguana
cobblemon.species.ferocice.name: Ferocice
cobblemon.species.turteller.name: Turteller
cobblemon.species.terrosect.name: Terrosect
cobblemon.species.resurexor.name: Resurexor
cobblemon.species.resurexor.desc: Resurexor is believed to come from a different solar system. Legends says that it has the power to resurrect other Pokémon from the ground, usually from an ancient time period. Its intentions are unclear.
cobblemon.species.obspeedian.name: Obspeedian
cobblemon.species.tecthanic.name: Tecthanic
cobblemon.species.paruwha.name: Paruwha
cobblemon.species.rhinplink.name: Rhinplink
cobblemon.species.rhinplink.desc: Its back is covered by rock-like plate. Its horn is like natural fertilizer and can be used to plant any crops.
cobblemon.species.trunkorn.name: Trunkorn
cobblemon.species.trunkorn.desc: The trunk on its horn is known as one of the hardest woods on the world. It willingly lets people harvest its trunk when it overgrows.
cobblemon.species.rhintain.name: Rhintain
cobblemon.species.rhintain.desc: Its massive front legs have a pressure of 130,000-pounds. Even titanium can bend under its pressure.
cobblemon.species.skindling.name: Skindling
cobblemon.species.skindling.desc: Skindling's back is covered with a flammable substance. It sets itself on fire to scare away predators.
cobblemon.species.skingnite.name: Skingnite
cobblemon.species.skingnite.desc: During combat, its body generates a lot of energy and heats up very quickly. To cool down, it uses small geysers located on its back.
cobblemon.species.eruptile.name: Eruptile
cobblemon.species.eruptile.desc: When enraged, it enters a state of overheating. During this state, it randomly releases lava eruptions from his back.
cobblemon.species.dampybara.name: Dampybara
cobblemon.species.dampybara.desc: When its fur is wet it become slippery like oil. It uses that advantage to escape even from the clasped jaws.
cobblemon.species.glovet.name: Glovet
cobblemon.species.glovet.desc: Is increases the weight of its gloves by filling them with water. That water is used to make its punches hit even harder.
cobblemon.species.mortarine.name: Mortarine
cobblemon.species.mortarine.desc: Its big gloves contain pressurized water. During impact all water is rapidly released empowering its blow.
cobblemon.species.petidaw.name: Petidaw
cobblemon.species.petidaw.desc: This little bird loves shiny things. It often steals goods completely unaware.
cobblemon.species.croober.name: Croober
cobblemon.species.croober.desc: Croobers prove they worth through stealing. The more loot one owns the more respect it has among its species.
cobblemon.species.ravendler.name: Ravendler
cobblemon.species.ravendler.desc: It's an average sized bird that likes to steal everything it is interested with, no matter who this thing belongs to. Sometimes convinces other Pokémon to steal for its.
cobblemon.species.chubboink.name: Chubboink
cobblemon.species.chubboink.desc: It covers itself with a layer of mud to protect its skin. Often prefers hiding in tall grass to avoid danger.
cobblemon.species.muchog.name: Muchog
cobblemon.species.muchog.desc: During battle it easily enters a rampaging state, that makes its attacks more likely to miss. Despite of its chaotic behavior it makes a great companion.
cobblemon.species.mikitarianbuneary.name: MikitarianBuneary
cobblemon.species.mikitarianbuneary.desc: It adapted to nightlife style. Under the night cover it sneak to the farmlands to steal crops.
cobblemon.species.mikitarianlopunny.name: MikitarianLopunny
cobblemon.species.mikitarianlopunny.desc: It likes to toy with anyone who wander into the forest at night. It uses any opportunity to steal from humans.
cobblemon.species.furrva.name: Furrva
cobblemon.species.furrva.desc: Its fur is pointy and gives itches when touched, this discourages predators from hunting on it.
cobblemon.species.kocomb.name: Kocomb
cobblemon.species.kocomb.desc: Its shell is covered by sweet substance that a certain Pokémon loves to lick. In exchange for its sweet taste, that Pokémon protects Kocomb from predators.
cobblemon.species.granebee.name: Granebee
cobblemon.species.granebee.desc: In its hive it takes the role of a collector. While gathering nectar it is guarded by Beelitant.
cobblemon.species.beelitant.name: Beelitant
cobblemon.species.beelitant.desc: In its hive it takes the role of a protector. It guards Granebees while they are gathering nectar and helps to transport it.
cobblemon.species.hopidey.name: Hopidey
cobblemon.species.hopidey.desc: Due to its short legs it has a disability to walk properly. Instead of walking it uses jumps to move.
cobblemon.species.raknaleap.name: Raknaleap
cobblemon.species.raknaleap.desc: Its legs act like springs. By pressing its body against the ground, its legs squeeze so tightly that the release of this pressure results in a powerful leap.
cobblemon.species.lilleo.name: Lilleo
cobblemon.species.lilleo.desc: Lilleos disobedience and chaotic nature make it incredibly hard to train. It must see the trainer as an alpha to obey.
cobblemon.species.germeit.name: Germeit
cobblemon.species.germeit.desc: Its mane is rough and jagged. Making physical contact with its fur can easily damage skin and inject various diseases.
cobblemon.species.mikitarianspritzee.des: It emits a scent that confuses those who smell it. There are rumors that Spritzees leads confused victims to Traumatisse's lairs.
cobblemon.species.traumatisse.name: Traumatisse
cobblemon.species.traumatisse.desc: Anyone who finds himself in its lair will slowly lose consciousness. It will do precise surgery that cures any diseases but leave patient with deep trauma.
cobblemon.species.troutle.name: Troutle
cobblemon.species.troutle.desc: In the early stage of its life, it doesn't have any stripe. Basculins will not attack Troutle unless its stripe is visible.
cobblemon.species.basstile.name: Basstile
cobblemon.species.basstile.desc: Basstilles are the leaders of Basculins schools. If a Basculin in its school evolve, then two Basstiles fight for leadership. The loser is banished.
cobblemon.species.cabat.name: Cabat
cobblemon.species.cabat.desc: To remain unseen it hangs motionless on the cave ceiling, during this act it looks completely like stalactite. During mating season it migrate to snowy mountains.
cobblemon.species.femalecabat.name: FemaleCabat
cobblemon.species.femalecabat.desc: Its fur is snow-white, which makes it easy to lost track of it in the snow. During mating season it awaits for migrating males.
cobblemon.species.stalat.name: Stalat
cobblemon.species.stalat.desc: For some reason it evolved without a partner. Sometimes at night you can hear its sad screech.
cobblemon.species.stalass.name: Stalass
cobblemon.species.stalass.desc: For some reason it evolved without a partner. During the mating season, it will reject other males and remain alone forever.
cobblemon.species.packbats.name: Packbats
cobblemon.species.packbats.desc: Cabats evolve into this Pokémon during mating season. They never splits up and always help each other out.
cobblemon.species.femalepackbats.name: FemalePackbats
cobblemon.species.femalepackbats.desc: Cabats evolve into this Pokémon during mating season. They never splits up and always helps each other out.
cobblemon.species.sprousy.name: Sprousy
cobblemon.species.sprousy.desc: Very friendly and playful Pokémon. Sproutsy blooms in the company of people it fully trusts.
cobblemon.species.petalnia.name: Petalnia
cobblemon.species.petalnia.desc: It can be distrustful at first. If a trainer manages to create a strong bond with it, Petalnias will make a loyal companion.
cobblemon.species.floramona.name: Floramona
cobblemon.species.floramona.desc: Only the most trustworthy can befriend a Floramona. Its strength reflect the trust of its trainer.
cobblemon.species.geocko.name: Geocko
cobblemon.species.geocko.desc: Always found in places with a lot of vertical surfaces, such as mountains or caves. This Pokémon sheds its rocky tail onto its predator's head to stun it.
cobblemon.species.grexclub.name: Grexclub
cobblemon.species.grexclub.desc: Grexclub sheds its own tail and uses it like a club. Due to its calm nature, it never attack unless it's necessary.
cobblemon.species.geolidon.name: Geolidon
cobblemon.species.geolidon.desc: Known by its destructive force, Geolidons can create small earthquakes by a single swing of its club into the ground.
cobblemon.species.mikitarianoricorio.des: It confuses its foes by jumping from one leg to another. This Oricorio movement is unpredictable but organized.
cobblemon.species.mikitarianyamask.name: MikitarianYamask
cobblemon.species.mikitarianyamask.desc: The spirit of a person sacrificed in some ritual became this Pokémon. Its carrying a mask that the person was wearing in its last moments.
cobblemon.species.platerigus.name: Platerigus
cobblemon.species.platerigus.desc: This Pokémon has written text on it that no one can read. People say that whoever reads it will know the true date of the beginning of the end of everything.
cobblemon.species.sphertle.name: Sphertle
cobblemon.species.sphertle.desc: When it hides into its shell, it starts to roll uncontrollably. In this state it can easily break through brick walls.
cobblemon.species.wroomtoise.name: Wroomtoise
cobblemon.species.wroomtoise.desc: When it rolls, it can easily travel through any terrain. It leaving behind a trail in the form of a shallow ditch.
cobblemon.species.octolet.name: Octolet
cobblemon.species.octolet.desc: An extremely strange creature with a strong self-awareness. There are rumors that it comes from another planet.
cobblemon.species.octokinepus.name: Octokinepus
cobblemon.species.octokinepus.desc: It never loses focus no matter the situation. Octokinepus psychic powers allows it to invade other creatures minds.
cobblemon.species.mantoon.name: Mantoon
cobblemon.species.mantoon.desc: It can inflate its wings to float on the water surface. People often use Montoon to learn swimming.
cobblemon.species.stormanta.name: Stormanta
cobblemon.species.stormanta.desc: This Pokémon can often be seen riding large waves during storms. People like to use it for extreme surfing.
cobblemon.species.hauntray.name: Hauntray
cobblemon.species.hauntray.desc: When sailing on the sea at night, a small blue light can be observed under the water. This is a school of Hauntrays.
cobblemon.species.phantabys.name: Phantabys
cobblemon.species.phantabys.desc: The light of his lantern attracts souls, which he then devours. The more it consumes, the brighter its light becomes.
cobblemon.species.sneepy.name: Sneepy
cobblemon.species.sneepy.desc: The strong scent of coffee wafts around Sneepy. It's impossible to fall asleep when you're around this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.flambafee.name: Flambafee
cobblemon.species.flambafee.desc: The coffee beans ripening on its body are a delicacy among gourmets. Harvesting these beans is a challenge because Flambafee likes to eat them.
cobblemon.species.homurant.name: Homurant
cobblemon.species.homurant.desc: It stores a very hot substance in its abdomen. To defend its colony from a predator, it increases the pressure in its abdomen and explodes.
cobblemon.species.commant.name: Commant
cobblemon.species.commant.desc: Its body is not very durable. Individuals sneak into the Durants or Homurants colony to steal their eggs and raise them as their own.
cobblemon.species.mikitarianfalinks.name: MikitarianFalinks
cobblemon.species.mikitarianfalinks.desc: The brass, which is the one that stands at the front and issues orders, is the strongest and smartest of the six.
cobblemon.species.goobolt.name: Goobolt
cobblemon.species.goobolt.desc: Goobolt's slime stores electricity well. It is used by humans to create batteries and accumulators.
cobblemon.species.chargoo.name: Chargoo
cobblemon.species.chargoo.desc: It likes to charge itself with electricity by climbing high-voltage poles. When fully charged, the tip of its shell lights up.
cobblemon.species.plasmatina.name: Plasmatina
cobblemon.species.plasmatina.desc: Plasmatina covers its lair with electrically conductive slime. When someone enters its area, it releases a powerful discharge.
cobblemon.species.flampy.name: Flampy
cobblemon.species.flampy.desc: At first glance, it looks safe and friendly. But if someone carelessly approaches it, then it strikes.
cobblemon.species.murasalem.name: Murasalem
cobblemon.species.murasalem.desc: Murasalem is very aggressive by nature. During combat, it attacks madly until it tires out.
cobblemon.species.crishy.name: Crishy
cobblemon.species.crishy.desc: Living in polluted lakes made its body resistant to diseases. Its infected body became its defense system against predators.
cobblemon.species.contamullet.name: Contamullet
cobblemon.species.contamullet.desc: Contamullet body has adapted to diseases to such an extent, that curing them will lead to its death.
cobblemon.species.timpot.name: Timpot
cobblemon.species.timpot.desc: A very timid Pokémon that doesn't like being exposed. Once seen, it runs away and looks for a new hiding place.
cobblemon.species.prankmare.name: Prankmare
cobblemon.species.prankmare.desc: It loves hiding in various objects to scare people and Pokémon. Every successful prank fills it with joy.
cobblemon.species.slidune.name: Slidune
cobblemon.species.slidune.desc: By lying on the sand and wiggling its tail, it can move extremely fast. Slidune live in deserts since a long time ago.
cobblemon.species.duntesert.name: Duntesert
cobblemon.species.duntesert.desc: It can bury itself in sand in the blink of an eye. While in the sand, it moves with extraordinary agility.
cobblemon.species.glyptoblock.name: Glyptoblock
cobblemon.species.glyptoblock.desc: There is a pleasant warmth around Glyptoblock. Other Pokemon like lying in its warm.
cobblemon.species.furnadon.name: Furnadon
cobblemon.species.furnadon.desc: The fiery core placed in its shell never burns out. In self-defense, Furnadon increases the temperature of its shell, burning anyone who touches it.
cobblemon.species.dorewee.name: Dorewee
cobblemon.species.dorewee.desc: A friendly and very lovable Pokémon. Its sounds resemble a squeaky toy.
cobblemon.species.doperami.name: Doperami
cobblemon.species.doperami.desc: When Doperami makes a high-pitched sound, all the glass in the area shatters. There were cases where people lost consciousness from its high pitch.
cobblemon.species.peclay.name: Peclay
cobblemon.species.peclay.desc: Peclay's clay shell protects it from being carried away by a sandstorm. It uses its strong legs to launch itself like a cannonball.
cobblemon.species.tektalon.name: Tektalon
cobblemon.species.tektalon.desc: To increase the power of its kicks, it covers its legs with a clay coating. Some Tektalons create a helmet from clay on their head.
cobblemon.species.munchill.name: Munchill
cobblemon.species.munchill.desc: Munchill lies buried in the snow, waiting to clench its jaws at the first thing that comes by. Once it grabs something in its jaws, it won't let go.
cobblemon.species.crunchill.name: Crunchill
cobblemon.species.crunchill.desc: Its jaws can freeze anything it bites. Crunchill then brutally shatters the frozen object.
cobblemon.species.lediastra.name: Lediastra
cobblemon.species.lediastra.desc: When Lediastra strikes, its fists shine as bright as a star. It can be seen at night when the sky is clear.
cobblemon.species.glanchog.name: Glanchog
cobblemon.species.glanchog.desc: It works great as a home guard Pokémon. It is so focused that it almost never blinks and anyone who looks directly into its eyes will be confused.
cobblemon.species.porygona.name: PorygonA
cobblemon.species.porygona.desc: It's the first prototype of Porygon. Often freezes in place analyzing what to do next and its movement is chaotic.
cobblemon.species.mikitariannoctowl.name: MikitarianNoctowl
cobblemon.species.sufferub.name: Sufferub
cobblemon.species.sufferub.desc: It appeared out of nowhere and quickly spread throughout the forests. It appears to be closely related to Weedle.
cobblemon.species.inhalis.name: Inhalis
cobblemon.species.inhalis.desc: Its cocoon is flexible and very durable, but if something breaks it, Inhalis dies immediately.
cobblemon.species.gasarnet.name: Gasarnet
cobblemon.species.gasarnet.desc: Artificially created Pokémon by a mad scientist. It spreads toxic fumes in its surroundings, which is why it is considered as a biological hazard.
cobblemon.species.lambi.name: Lambi
cobblemon.species.lambi.desc: Its body is covered with a thick layer of wool. This coating allows it to survive in extremely low temperatures.
cobblemon.species.mourin.name: Mourin
cobblemon.species.mourin.desc: It can move extremely agilely on very steep surfaces. keeping up with it in mountainous terrain is almost impossible.
cobblemon.species.keerin.name: Keerin
cobblemon.species.keerin.desc: Legends say that it can be found high in snowy mountains. Travelers describe it as a mysterious creature that walks on a frozen lake during the full moon.
cobblemon.species.flarepent.name: Flarepent
cobblemon.species.flarepent.desc: It wraps around prey and increases its own body temperature. Victims captured like this are cooked alive.
cobblemon.species.singepent.name: Singepent
cobblemon.species.singepent.desc: The black part at the end of its tail keeps heat for long time. Its tail functions like a thermal knife.
cobblemon.species.conflevour.name: Conflevour
cobblemon.species.conflevour.desc: Conflevours adore to stay above the others. Due to its proudness it wants to be perceived as the superior creature.
cobblemon.species.bewilt.name: Bewilt
cobblemon.species.twirleef.name: Twirleef
cobblemon.species.pestrina.name: Pestrina
cobblemon.species.pyroki.name: Pyroki
cobblemon.species.formidet.name: Formidet
cobblemon.species.formillant.name: Formillant
cobblemon.species.micronaut.name: Micronaut
cobblemon.species.divernaut.name: Divernaut
cobblemon.species.tarpress.name: Tarpress
cobblemon.species.kawaiiko.name: Kawaiiko
cobblemon.species.moffluffle.name: Moffluffle
cobblemon.species.hedodan.name: Hedodan
cobblemon.species.noxisekt.name: Noxisekt
cobblemon.species.minicoo.name: Minicoo
cobblemon.species.nimbuzz.name: Nimbuzz
cobblemon.species.shipilla.name: Shipilla
cobblemon.species.koucoon.name: Koucoon
cobblemon.species.brahmbash.name: Brahmbash
cobblemon.species.bramoth.name: Bramoth
cobblemon.species.bumbuzz.name: Bumbuzz
cobblemon.species.kimfoo.name: Kimfoo
cobblemon.species.kamabukee.name: Kamabukee
cobblemon.species.convice.name: Convice
cobblemon.species.collemboo.name: Collemboo
cobblemon.species.glastasma.name: Glastasma
cobblemon.species.lavalux.name: Lavalux
cobblemon.species.lampod.name: Lampod
cobblemon.species.inzallum.name: Inzallum
cobblemon.species.sneacroach.name: Sneacroach
cobblemon.species.stalroach.name: Stalroach
cobblemon.species.polvite.name: Polvite
cobblemon.species.koromite.name: Koromite
cobblemon.species.debribriz.name: Debribriz
cobblemon.species.terremotor.name: Terremotor
cobblemon.species.gomnom.name: Gomnom
cobblemon.species.caramello.name: Caramello
cobblemon.species.goopest.name: Goopest
cobblemon.species.shugatrix.name: Shugatrix
cobblemon.species.sapeeko.name: Sapeeko
cobblemon.species.grobolt.name: Grobolt
cobblemon.species.hydrone.name: Hydrone
cobblemon.species.astronet.name: Astronet
cobblemon.species.terrantula.name: Terrantula
cobblemon.species.geckrow.name: Geckrow
cobblemon.species.geckrow.desc: Geckrow live in humid jungles and constantly climb the large trees. In the morning, they soak up the sunlight from the canopy, but when the day turns too hot, they descend to the floor to cool themselves in mud pools.
cobblemon.species.goanopy.name: Goanopy
cobblemon.species.goanopy.desc: Goanopy spend most of their time resting on the wide bows of tree branches, soaking up the sun, and only descend to hunt for prey. To discourage scavengers, they haul their meals high above the jungle floor before eating them.
cobblemon.species.varanitor.name: Varanitor
cobblemon.species.varanitor.desc: Unlike their earlier evolved forms, Varanitor spend much of their time on the ground resting alongside stream beds and basking in streams of sunlight that reach the floor. If they feel they are not getting enough sunlight, they will uproot and knock over large trees to clear the sky.
cobblemon.species.hissiorite.name: Hissiorite
cobblemon.species.hissiorite.desc: The base of it's neck emits super-heated gas that envelopes its body and causes it to have fewer inches off the ground, similar to a hot air balloon.
cobblemon.species.cobarett.name: Cobarett
cobblemon.species.cobarett.desc: It covers itself in thick, billowing smoke so that it can slide easily through thick brush. The source of the smoke is its molten body temperature.
cobblemon.species.pythonova.name: Pythonova
cobblemon.species.pythonova.desc: It is short tempered and when enraged, the flames on its back burn hotter and its smoke tail becomes thicker and longer.
cobblemon.species.ninoala.name: Ninoala
cobblemon.species.ninoala.desc: Concept, design, front sprite, and type by Feyrah on DeviantArt. Icon by Plouton. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.koaninja.name: Koaninja
cobblemon.species.koaninja.desc: Concept, design, front sprite, and type by Feyrah on DeviantArt. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.anu.name: Anu
cobblemon.species.anu.desc: Concept, design, sprite, type, and dex flavor by Princess-Phoenix Name by Dawn23 This fakemon originates from Princess-Phoenix's 'Project Freemon' on DeviantArt. Evo line: Incomplete
cobblemon.species.merlicun.name: Merlicun
cobblemon.species.merlicun.desc: It isn't considered very useful in any way what so ever. It seems to just want to crawl around and eat leaves.
cobblemon.species.firomenis.name: Firomenis
cobblemon.species.firomenis.desc: It isn't considered very useful in any way what so ever. It seems to just want to crawl around and eat leaves.
cobblemon.species.baoby.name: Baoby
cobblemon.species.baoby.desc: Baoby travel from river to river in search of water to drink and store. The leafy ossicones on its head conceal movable points that act similar to a dowsing rod. Many creatures follow Baoby in droughts.
cobblemon.species.baobaraffe.name: Baobaraffe
cobblemon.species.baobaraffe.desc: Concept, design, sprites, name, and type by Princess-Phoenix This fakemon originates from Princess-Phoenix's 'Project Freemon' on DeviantArt. The original inspiration for this fakemon came from reading an article about how the baobab trees have huge fat trunks because it stores water in them, but due to droughts the trees were collapsing a few years ago. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.nuenflu.name: Nuenflu
cobblemon.species.nuenflu.desc: Nuenflu secretly spreads diseases during the winter months.
cobblemon.species.drashimi.name: Drashimi
cobblemon.species.drashimi.desc: Concept, design, sprites, and type by Princess-Phoenix Name assist credit to Tenrio This fakemon originates from Princess-Phoenix's 'Project Freemon' on DeviantArt. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.tsushimi.name: Tsushimi
cobblemon.species.tsushimi.desc: Concept, design, sprites, and type by Princess-Phoenix Name assist credit to Tenrio This fakemon originates from Princess-Phoenix's 'Project Freemon' on DeviantArt. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.tobishimi.name: Tobishimi
cobblemon.species.tobishimi.desc: Concept, design, sprites, and type by Princess-Phoenix Name assist credit to Tenrio This fakemon originates from Princess-Phoenix's 'Project Freemon' on DeviantArt. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.baulder.name: Baulder
cobblemon.species.baulder.desc: Baulder has lived in the depths of Mythan for almost 7,000 years. It is said that this Pokemon is incredibly smart.
cobblemon.species.dreadrock.name: Dreadrock
cobblemon.species.dreadrock.desc: Dredrock have one of the toughest coats known in Pokemon history, it's sad the weight of 5,000 tons can't even break it.
cobblemon.species.tekagon.name: Tekagon
cobblemon.species.tekagon.desc: Tekagon roam their territory in search of plants to eat. They are blind, but can feel vibrations through the ground from great distances. Tekagon recognize the vibrations their family gives off.
cobblemon.species.nymbi.name: Nymbi
cobblemon.species.nymbi.desc: Concept, Name, Type by Smiley Fakemon Front sprite TheGreatZeKro Icon by Plouton These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.deember.name: Deember
cobblemon.species.deember.desc: Concept, Name, Type by Smiley Fakemon Front sprite TheGreatZeKro These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.lavee.name: Lavee
cobblemon.species.lavee.desc: Lavee was known for its incredibly fast swimming skills in lava, this Pokemon can handle tempatures up to 750,000,000 degrees.
cobblemon.species.lavare.name: Lavare
cobblemon.species.lavare.desc: Lavee was known for its incredibly fast swimming skills in lava, this Pokemon can handle tempatures up to 750,000,000 degrees.
cobblemon.species.lavarator.name: Lavarator
cobblemon.species.lavarator.desc: Lavarator can break through any substance known to man, the pure heat of its blade arms can saw through titanium.
cobblemon.species.efflutal.name: Efflutal
cobblemon.species.efflutal.desc: Concept, Name, Type by Arnik Sprites by Anarlaurendil These designs/sprites are originally created for an abandoned french GBA ROM-hack called 'Pokémon Cristal de Jade', and now features in Pokémon Sacred Phoenix
cobblemon.species.hayog.name: Hayog
cobblemon.species.hayog.desc: Hayog have a strong instinct to build themselves homes, unfortunately they tend to choose flimsy building materials. The hay that grows on its back is very soft and provides Hayog comfort and security.
cobblemon.species.hogouse.name: Hogouse
cobblemon.species.hogouse.desc: Design, name, type, flavour, and sprites by Scotsman333 These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.hogriks.name: Hogriks
cobblemon.species.hogriks.desc: Losing the grass typing on evolution has made Hogriks' body much less susceptible to being blown down. Often found resting near small villages, Hogriks will let small Pokemon take refuge inside its fortified body.
cobblemon.species.webruiser.name: Webruiser
cobblemon.species.webruiser.desc: Webruiser stands on its mandibles and swings at its foes with its legs, its thorax has a fake face to act as a punching bag for enemies. It may look dazed or confused as it stumbles around the battlefield, but this is a tactic to deter its opponents. Its punches are wild but calculated.
cobblemon.species.pilfetch.name: Pilfetch
cobblemon.species.pilfetch.desc: Design, Name, and Sprites by AceTrainerAvery These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.criminalis.name: Criminalis
cobblemon.species.criminalis.desc: Design, Name, and Sprites by AceTrainerAvery These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack.
cobblemon.species.pasturlo.name: Pasturlo
cobblemon.species.pasturlo.desc: Pasturlo tries its best to stay asleep at all times, but gets extremely angry when it is awoken from its slumber.
cobblemon.species.brambull.name: Brambull
cobblemon.species.brambull.desc: A thick cover of leaves coats their wooly mane and covers over their eyes, though they can still see fine.
cobblemon.species.maizotaur.name: Maizotaur
cobblemon.species.maizotaur.desc: The leaves that grow over Maizotaur's shoulders and back occasionally will attract nesting bird Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.minamai.name: Minamai
cobblemon.species.minamai.desc: Design, Name, Front sprite by Rattila Back sprite by KajiAtsui Overworld by Pantastic These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.marelstorm.name: Marelstorm
cobblemon.species.marelstorm.desc: Designed by Rattila Front and Back sprite by KajiAtsui Overworld by Pantastic These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.tormine.name: Tormine
cobblemon.species.tormine.desc: When threatened, Tormine swiftly ignites its coal stores and produces a powerful blast of heat and gas, hot enough to melt metal ore, to ward away its attacker.
cobblemon.species.sunnydra.name: Sunnydra
cobblemon.species.sunnydra.desc: On sunny days, they sit very still with their faces turned to the sun, soaking in the warmth. If disturbed, they become highly aggressive.
cobblemon.species.cryscross.name: Cryscross
cobblemon.species.cryscross.desc: The 4 points of their bodies can be very sharp to the touch. They normally drift around lazily, but large groups of them are sometimes blown through the air, causing many potentially dangerous cuts to anything in their path.
cobblemon.species.wolfman.name: Wolfman
cobblemon.species.wolfman.desc: G/S Betamon Front sprites by PansyGum Overworld Sprite by WolfPP Cry by Skurleton These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.warwolf.name: Warwolf
cobblemon.species.warwolf.desc: G/S Betamon Front sprites and Re-named by PansyGum Overworld Sprite by WolfPP These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.coralya.name: Coralya
cobblemon.species.coralya.desc: Coralya are only said to appear in water that is completely untainted by human kind. Often, reports of Coralya population booms will arise around the same time as Suicune sightings. When it leaves its home, it carries about a gallon of its home water with it, and is known to regularly spend time ridding the water of any impurities it may come into contact with on its travels.
cobblemon.species.dunymph.name: Dunymph
cobblemon.species.dunymph.desc: Designed, typed, and named by Jess Jackdaw Sprited by PansyGum Overworld Sprite by WolfPP These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.dunrago.name: Dunrago
cobblemon.species.dunrago.desc: Designed, typed, and named by Jess Jackdaw Design modified and Sprited by PansyGum Overworld Sprite by WolfPP These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.titaneon.name: Titaneon
cobblemon.species.titaneon.desc: Titaneon came from an anonymous 'leak' of new Eeveelutions that were supposedly going to be in Sword+Shield and has been submitted to the Fakemon Festival Pack by PansyGum. These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack.
cobblemon.species.galeon.name: Galeon
cobblemon.species.trantima.name: Trantima
cobblemon.species.trantima.desc: Designed and sprited by Mechamudskipper This mon is free-to-use via the Fakemon Festival Pack! Please ensure you assign credit properly.
cobblemon.species.gireamer.name: Gireamer
cobblemon.species.gireamer.desc: Designed and Named by Jess Jackdaw Sprited by PansyGum Overworld Sprite by WolfPP These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.nitmarig.name: Nitmarig
cobblemon.species.nitmarig.desc: Designed, typed, and named by Jess Jackdaw Sprited by PansyGum Overworld Sprite by WolfPP These designs/sprites are originally from the Fakemon Festival Pack. Evo line: Complete
cobblemon.species.moosid.name: Moosid
cobblemon.species.moosid.desc: Moosid are rarely involved in the affairs of other Pokémon, preferring to keep to themselves. Notoriously aggressive, a Moosid will pursue any perceived threat or prey relentlessly, until either they fall, or it does.
cobblemon.species.egoelk.name: Egoelk
cobblemon.species.egoelk.desc: Egoelk are eternally calm, rarely seen to react to external provocation unless absolutely necessary. It is said that, if befriended, it is possible to see the future by looking through the space between its horns.
cobblemon.species.suprago.name: Suprago
cobblemon.species.suprago.desc: Suprago are often leaders of their communities. They have high moral values, and can often be found with a gaggle of smaller Pokémon in tow. Peaceful in nature, a Suprago will not attack unless it senses a threat to its charges.
cobblemon.species.timberry.name: Timberry
cobblemon.species.timberry.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.howliage.name: Howliage
cobblemon.species.howliage.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.botanine.name: Botanine
cobblemon.species.botanine.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.saurky.name: Saurky
cobblemon.species.saurky.desc: Occasionally, this Pokemon is distributed as a Starter for new trainers.
cobblemon.species.crestaka.name: Crestaka
cobblemon.species.crestaka.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.avipex.name: Avipex
cobblemon.species.avipex.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.bonfur.name: Bonfur
cobblemon.species.bonfur.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.tindursa.name: Tindursa
cobblemon.species.tindursa.desc: Concept, design, name, type, and sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.sizzly.name: Sizzly
cobblemon.species.sizzly.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.lollybog.name: Lollybog
cobblemon.species.lollybog.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.brewtrid.name: Brewtrid
cobblemon.species.brewtrid.desc: Concept, design, name, type, and sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.forbiddron.name: Forbiddron
cobblemon.species.forbiddron.desc: Concept, design, name, type, and sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.plushion.name: Plushion
cobblemon.species.plushion.desc: Because of its natural padding Plushion is unfazed by drops and falls, but will cry if its bow is torn. It enjoys snuggling next to trainers and will often get underfoot in an attempt to get closer.
cobblemon.species.rocotton.name: Rocotton
cobblemon.species.rocotton.desc: Rocotton spends most of its time constructing its dress in preparation for evolving. Its hardworking nature extends to helping trainers with all manner of domestic activities.
cobblemon.species.tuffettry.name: Tuffettry
cobblemon.species.tuffettry.desc: Tuffettry craves excitement. If it encounters a dreary person it will attempt to cheer them by redecorating in bright colors. It is attracted to shiny, brightly-colored objects and prefers trainers who dress fashionably.
cobblemon.species.raskit.name: Raskit
cobblemon.species.raskit.desc: Concept, design, name, type, and sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.scruffian.name: Scruffian
cobblemon.species.scruffian.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.dynabit.name: Dynabit
cobblemon.species.dynabit.desc: Both its legs can spin independently from its body. It loves running up hills and rolling down them.
cobblemon.species.pompet.name: Pompet
cobblemon.species.pompet.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art. Link to individual post Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.pomprim.name: Pomprim
cobblemon.species.pomprim.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.droopig.name: Droopig
cobblemon.species.droopig.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.hoolihog.name: Hoolihog
cobblemon.species.hoolihog.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.kankwart.name: Kankwart
cobblemon.species.kankwart.desc: The gemstones growing on its body are the result of exposure to an infectious agent. Over time more boils will emerge as more of its body becomes crystallized.
cobblemon.species.kankryst.name: Kankryst
cobblemon.species.kankryst.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.kankersaur.name: Kankersaur
cobblemon.species.kankersaur.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.impurp.name: Impurp
cobblemon.species.impurp.desc: Impurp are mischievous and playful Pokémon that love to prank weary travellers passing through their territories. If they believe their target has a bad sense of humour they will relentlessly taunt them until they are either scared off, or their target vacates their territory.
cobblemon.species.nymfusha.name: Nymfusha
cobblemon.species.nymfusha.desc: Concept, design, name, type, and sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Stats, Dex entry, abilities, and move set by Plouton with input from Mattgcn, DrTapeworm, & Fuzzy Name may be derived from Nymph + Fuchsia Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.smoald.name: Smoald
cobblemon.species.smoald.desc: A haze develops around any stone dais a Smoald has claimed as its own. The smoke it breathes changes scent and color based on what it has last eaten.
cobblemon.species.bombustoad.name: Bombustoad
cobblemon.species.bombustoad.desc: Its many vents allow it to burn fuel very quickly, giving it terrific speed. However, Bombustoad can easily overheat and, if not careful, explode.
cobblemon.species.sligment.name: Sligment
cobblemon.species.sligment.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.viscolor.name: Viscolor
cobblemon.species.viscolor.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.gelescent.name: Gelescent
cobblemon.species.gelescent.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.dripwirt.name: Dripwirt
cobblemon.species.dripwirt.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.pourka.name: Pourka
cobblemon.species.pourka.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.umbreeze.name: Umbreeze
cobblemon.species.umbreeze.desc: Concept, design, name, type, and sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.lumedi.name: Lumedi
cobblemon.species.lumedi.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.lumaxi.name: Lumaxi
cobblemon.species.lumaxi.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.skelleks.name: Skelleks
cobblemon.species.skelleks.desc: Concept, design, name, type, by sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Cry by Dr Tapeworm
cobblemon.species.negagen.name: Negagen
cobblemon.species.negagen.desc: Concept, design, name, type, by sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Cry by Dr Tapeworm
cobblemon.species.sillennium.name: Sillennium
cobblemon.species.sillennium.desc: Concept, design, name, type, by sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Fakeathon 2020: Day 11 - Egypt ; Based on 'ventiform' rocks found in the White Desert.
cobblemon.species.mivota.name: Mivota
cobblemon.species.mivota.desc: Concept, design, name, type, by sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Fakeathon 2020: Day 4 - Mexico ; Based on votive candles
cobblemon.species.beeheave.name: Beeheave
cobblemon.species.hivernor.name: Hivernor
cobblemon.species.hivernor.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.blonk.name: Blonk
cobblemon.species.blonk.desc: A Blonk's long trail shows where it has been, but its movements are so slow they appear not to move at all.
cobblemon.species.colobble.name: Colobble
cobblemon.species.colobble.desc: Colobble pile rocks onto themselves to increase their size and strength, but their piles are fragile and need to be replaced constantly.
cobblemon.species.colobbus.name: Colobbus
cobblemon.species.colobbus.desc: Through force of will it carries the weight of countless rocks, shattering all but the strongest of them to make its body almost as hard as diamond.
cobblemon.species.dialapis.name: Dialapis
cobblemon.species.dialapis.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.chickite.name: Chickite
cobblemon.species.chickite.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.kitiary.name: Kitiary
cobblemon.species.kitiary.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.turbatic.name: Turbatic
cobblemon.species.turbatic.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.mondrog.name: Mondrog
cobblemon.species.mondrog.desc: Mondrog collect and store seeds on their backs which slowly grow into small, unique habitats. The hollows in its body are sometimes used as burrows or collect rainwater.
cobblemon.species.anxiust.name: Anxiust
cobblemon.species.anxiust.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.curiust.name: Curiust
cobblemon.species.curiust.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.dustfully.name: Dustfully
cobblemon.species.embat.name: Embat
cobblemon.species.embat.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.fumbat.name: Fumbat
cobblemon.species.fumbat.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.chimbat.name: Chimbat
cobblemon.species.chimbat.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.crucibat.name: Crucibat
cobblemon.species.crucibat.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.flixtrix.name: Flixtrix
cobblemon.species.flixtrix.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete Submission for: Fakeathon 2020: Day 13 - Madagascar; Based on the aye-aye
cobblemon.species.chartail.name: Chartail
cobblemon.species.chartail.desc: Its head father acts as a compass needle. Seeing one in the wild is considered good luck by travellers.
cobblemon.species.strivane.name: Strivane
cobblemon.species.strivane.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.navigale.name: Navigale
cobblemon.species.navigale.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.rockid.name: Rockid
cobblemon.species.rockid.desc: Rockid love to climb to the highest point in sight. If too many gather in one place their headbutts will harden their rocky horns. More domesticated Rockid tend to see their horns curve due to petting and attention from humans.
cobblemon.species.stubhorn.name: Stubhorn
cobblemon.species.stubhorn.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.oppwold.name: Oppwold
cobblemon.species.oppwold.desc: Its bark is as resilient as iron and for ages people have used it for tools and building materials. A grove of Oppwold can hold back floods and glaciers.
cobblemon.species.triastick.name: Triastick
cobblemon.species.triastick.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.jurasper.name: Jurasper
cobblemon.species.jurasper.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.cretassom.name: Cretassom
cobblemon.species.cretassom.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.juncko.name: Juncko
cobblemon.species.juncko.desc: Juncko likes playing with humans and rummages through their trash, often trying to return garbage it thinks was left behind by accident.
cobblemon.species.scavengila.name: Scavengila
cobblemon.species.scavengila.desc: Scavengila collects human garbage to build a nest which is guards jealously.
cobblemon.species.scalamber.name: Scalamber
cobblemon.species.scalamber.desc: Scalamber are excellent climbers. Normally docile, their single bent spike eventually curves around into their backs, spurring them to run away from an imagined attack. This is thought to be the impetus for their evolution.
cobblemon.species.scragorge.name: Scragorge
cobblemon.species.scragorge.desc: Its tail unrolls and anchors into the ground across crevasses to create a bridge. Its tongue, which is as strong as steel, is able to lift its entire body.
cobblemon.species.vampingo.name: Vampingo
cobblemon.species.vampingo.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete

cobblemon.species.snowly.name: Snowly
cobblemon.species.snowly.desc: Its wings are better suited to protection than flying. In bad weather, it shelters under its wings to stay warm. Its talons grip hard to rocks to keep from being blown away during harsh storms.
cobblemon.species.strunk.name: Strunk
cobblemon.species.strunk.desc: It is it too short to reach taller treetops so it practices stretching its trunk instead.
cobblemon.species.kalaxodon.name: Kalaxodon
cobblemon.species.curlusk.name: Curlusk
cobblemon.species.curlusk.desc: It curls up and uses its spines for protection against predators.

cobblemon.species.synopede.name: Synopede
cobblemon.species.synopede.desc: Legend says that if you happen upon Synopede as they adopt a wishing-like pose you can do the same and have your own wish granted. What they may be wishing for, if that is what they are doing, is unknown.
cobblemon.species.lunapede.name: Lunapede
cobblemon.species.lunapede.desc: Lunapede are energized by particle showers and moonlight. By raising its arms to the night sky it signals that its body is ready to receive these cosmic energies.
cobblemon.species.brayd.name: Brayd
cobblemon.species.brayd.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete

cobblemon.species.majestaur.name: Majestaur
cobblemon.species.majestaur.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.blockodile.name: Blockodile
cobblemon.species.blockodile.desc: To protect itself from direct sunlight it covers its body with dirt and debris from the jungle floor. It can stand still for so long that it looks like an old statue.
cobblemon.species.sanda.name: Sanda
cobblemon.species.sanda.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.dansakoi.name: Dansakoi
cobblemon.species.dansakoi.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.subyss.name: Subyss
cobblemon.species.subyss.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.flooie.name: Flooie
cobblemon.species.flooie.desc: Flooie will never sink, even against the strongest waves and storm. They are, however, not very useful in battles or anywhere else.
cobblemon.species.flobal.name: Flobal
cobblemon.species.flobal.desc: Its body is over 98% water. An ice crystal in its center keeps its temperature at near-freezing.
cobblemon.species.snagatoof.name: Snagatoof
cobblemon.species.snagatoof.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.snagajin.name: Snagajin
cobblemon.species.snagajin.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.burrb.name: Burrb
cobblemon.species.burrb.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.spikonsia.name: Spikonsia
cobblemon.species.spikonsia.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.varmot.name: Varmot
cobblemon.species.varmot.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Inomplete
cobblemon.species.trablur.name: Trablur
cobblemon.species.trablur.desc: Trablur avoid any place that has ever been a dwelling for humans. Some people say they have seen it in the distance while alone in the wilderness, but no tracks have ever been found.
cobblemon.species.vizitid.name: Vizitid
cobblemon.species.vizitid.desc: Vizitid are first noticed from very far away, but often go unrecognized. If one is seen again, on each subsequent viewing it will appear slightly closer, drawing nearer each time it is seen.
cobblemon.species.thissblade.name: Thissblade
cobblemon.species.thissblade.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Fakeathon 2020: Day 8 - UK ; Based on the thistle Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.snoblin.name: Snoblin
cobblemon.species.snoblin.desc: Snome live deep inside mountains and come to the surface at night to scavenge for food. Because they are not used to living with other creatures they inadvertently damage crops and other plant life with their natural icy bodies.
cobblemon.species.froll.name: Froll
cobblemon.species.froll.desc: Froll do not like to leave their lairs even in winter, instead sending out Snome to gather food. A single Froll may sit in the same spot for years at a time, growing ever larger.
cobblemon.species.flyrry.name: Flyrry
cobblemon.species.flyrry.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.wyntry.name: Wyntry
cobblemon.species.wyntry.desc: Concept, design, name, type, sprites, and dex entry by Magiscarf on Deviant Art Originally made for Magiscarf's Calta Dex. Evo Line: Complete
cobblemon.species.gardial.name: Gardial
cobblemon.species.gardial.desc: Travelers respectful of the forest may happen upon campfires made from Gardial's antlers. However, heedless travelers will find their fires repeatedly snuffed out.
cobblemon.species.appalyp.name: Appalyp
cobblemon.species.appalyp.desc: Appalyp bullies other sea creatures into giving it food by threatening to show them its face. However, no one has actually seen what its face looks like.
cobblemon.species.sycoral.name: Sycoral
cobblemon.species.sycoral.desc: Found only on deserted islands, Sycoral are hostile to anyone who sets foot in their territory. They will use countless tricks and curses to repel trespassers.
cobblemon.species.nemesusa.name: Nemesusa
cobblemon.species.nemesusa.desc: Fearsome and powerful, a single Revusa can sink a dozen ships. Those who have looked into its eyes have trouble speaking about their experience.
cobblemon.species.fencival.name: Fencival
cobblemon.species.fencival.desc: It leaps into battle, heedless of the danger, enjoying duels so much it will even delay a fight it could easily win. It will not attack an opponent whose back is turned.
cobblemon.species.enderbird.name: Enderbird
cobblemon.species.enderbird.desc: This Pokemon guards the edges of volcanic lakes, warning away other Pokemon who attempt to navigate across the surface. If its warning is ignored, it will attack.
cobblemon.species.lizquent.name: Lizquent
cobblemon.species.lizquent.desc: With its 'special' fist, it can punch at mach speeds and prefers one hit KOs. Despite the intimidating looks, it has a heart of gold.
cobblemon.species.munchmite.name: Munchmite
cobblemon.species.munchmite.desc: It thrives in swarms, and can often be found lurking around all kinds of forests. It's best not to disturb them, as they are incredibly shy.
cobblemon.species.larbor.name: Larbor
cobblemon.species.anbrosia.name: Anbrosia
cobblemon.species.lavat.name: Lavat
cobblemon.species.flamfluff.name: Flamfluff
cobblemon.species.demolecho.name: Demolecho
cobblemon.species.crubble.name: Crubble
cobblemon.species.aquagator.name: Aquagator
cobblemon.species.ryuvern.name: Ryuvern
cobblemon.species.ryuvern.desc: Ryuvern is incredibly rare, and spotting it is often an omen of things to come. It is said that it can transport itself between this world and a world full of water using the orb it wields.
cobblemon.species.cragrub.name: Cragrub
cobblemon.species.mechoon.name: Mechoon
cobblemon.species.wormor.name: Wormor
cobblemon.species.snuffling.name: Snuffling
cobblemon.species.scarfly.name: Scarfly
cobblemon.species.puffemperor.name: Puffemperor
cobblemon.species.ribbun.name: Ribbun
cobblemon.species.bunnimbus.name: Bunnimbus
cobblemon.species.bunnimbus.desc: Bunnimbus seem to enjoy floating ever so slightly above the ground, both daily and nightly. They can't actually fly, though.
cobblemon.species.cabochomp.name: Cabochomp
cobblemon.species.cabochomp.desc: Alone, it hunts down smaller prey on both land and sea, capable of jumping 12 feet to reach them. In groups, they can take down most Pokémon with ease.
cobblemon.species.geojaws.name: Geojaws
cobblemon.species.geojaws.desc: Its massive stature and powerful attacks make it a threatening Pokémon. It's rather rare, and the threat it poses causes very few to live to tell the tale.
cobblemon.species.kamubarai.name: Kamubarai
cobblemon.species.kamubarai.desc: It has powerful shocking jaws that can break stone with ease. Despite these jaws, it often likes eating soft things such as Watmel Berries.
cobblemon.species.bricklair.name: Bricklair
cobblemon.species.castlossus.name: Castlossus
cobblemon.species.shrimpod.name: Shrimpod
cobblemon.species.ampupoda.name: Ampupoda
cobblemon.species.muffairy.name: Muffairy
cobblemon.species.muffairy.desc: It's very small and pretty weak, but due to them sticking in groups, they aren't often attacked.
cobblemon.species.pastrella.name: Pastrella
cobblemon.species.pastrella.desc: Its sweet demeanor and great power make it a popular Pokémon for trainers, whether for competitive or domestic reasons. It's a very popular mascot for bakeries.
cobblemon.species.oreush.name: Oreush
cobblemon.species.oreush.desc: It resembles a popular snack beloved for its creamy filling. While it does taste good, it rarely lets anyone taste it.
cobblemon.species.cookrush.name: Cookrush
cobblemon.species.cookrush.desc: It is notorious for two things: its eternal rivalry with Pastrella, and its mischievous behaviour of pretending to be a cookie, only to dash straight into the misfortunate Pokémon who stumbles upon it!
cobblemon.species.fruitick.name: Fruitick
cobblemon.species.fruitick.desc: They imitate fruit to be protected by nests of Anbrosia. If they are found out, however, they will promptly be devoured.
cobblemon.species.delicida.name: Delicida
cobblemon.species.delicida.desc: Unlike several of its relatives which suck blood, Delicida's diet consists of nectar. This can prove to be a problem to Pokémon such as Fruitick, although Pokémon like Anbrosia appreciate their assistance in pollinating flowers.
cobblemon.species.perceptoo.name: Perceptoo
cobblemon.species.perceptoo.desc: It can use the blue spot on its forehead to see the future. Judging by how it reacts shortly after, a trainer can somewhat tell whats going to happen.
cobblemon.species.cocadoom.name: Cocadoom
cobblemon.species.cocadoom.desc: The reason Pokémon constantly looks worried is because of what it sees in the future. It is believed to be able to temporarily project these visions onto others, sending them into fits of madness.
cobblemon.species.crabbarrie.name: Crabbarrie
cobblemon.species.crabbarrie.desc: Its carapace is so tough, it doesn't even realize when it's being stepped on! / It rarely moves on its own will, preferring to stay in the mud as it feeds on tiny organisms in the water.
cobblemon.species.caraegis.name: Caraegis
cobblemon.species.caraegis.desc: It refuses to back down from a fight, no matter how tough the opponent is. It's always searching for new opponents to take down. / A combat maniac, it will cut through everything that moves, and has a hard time telling the difference between a friend or foe.
cobblemon.species.slitheroot.name: Slitheroot
cobblemon.species.veilily.name: Veilily
cobblemon.species.veilily.desc: Due to its massive leaves, this Pokémon often devours its prey whole, injecting it with powerful toxins. Seeing a trail of mushrooms and mushroom Pokémon usually indicate you are in its territory.
cobblemon.species.meowtem.name: Meowtem
cobblemon.species.nekomancer.name: Nekomancer
cobblemon.species.nekomancer.desc: Evo Harrowing WailSTAB Ghost - AstonishSTAB Ghost - LickSTAB Ghost - HexSTAB Ghost - Shadow ClawSTAB Ghost - Magic BacklashSTAB Ghost - Night ShadeSTAB Ghost - Confuse Ray Ghost - Curse Ghost - Destiny Bond Ghost - Baby-Doll Eyes Fairy - Charm Fairy - Disarming Voice Fairy - Fairy Wind Fairy - Play Rough Fairy - Moonlight Fairy - Moonblast Fairy - Torment Dark - Flatter Dark - Swagger Normal - Fake Tears Dark - Embargo Dark - Fling Dark - Strident Echo Dark - Snarl Dark - Bite Dark - Thief Dark - Crunch Dark - Fake Out Normal
cobblemon.species.zombark.name: Zombark
cobblemon.species.decaynine.name: Decaynine
cobblemon.species.raggedoll.name: Raggedoll
cobblemon.species.raggedoll.desc: When the tag on its head is pulled, stuffing comes flying out of its seams. This doesn't hurt the Pokemon, fortunately.
cobblemon.species.contamaggot.name: Contamaggot
cobblemon.species.hazardip.name: Hazardip
cobblemon.species.apolalgae.name: Apolalgae
cobblemon.species.apolalgae.desc: Squishy and full of nutrients and water, Apolalgae make a loud wailing noise to deter predators. This usually ends up backfiring, attracting even more.
cobblemon.species.mystisianimpidimp.name: MystisianImpidimp
cobblemon.species.mystisianmorgrem.name: MystisianMorgrem
cobblemon.species.shroomlet.name: Shroomlet
cobblemon.species.moreaper.name: Moreaper
cobblemon.species.moreaper.desc: It will often play pranks on unsuspecting passerby by mimicking the voices of loved ones, giggling creepily when it succeeds. / It is said that the patterns on its cap are victims of its curse. Beware the forest's mushrooms, for you may never return.
cobblemon.species.radarola.name: Radarola
cobblemon.species.radarola.desc: Researchers argue about whether this Pokémon should be considered a Mystian Roggenrola, as genetic studies have been inconclusive. It can emit weak electromagnetic pulses from the appendage on its head.
cobblemon.species.astore.name: Astore
cobblemon.species.astore.desc: Astrore and the other members of its evolutionary line were discovered in a crater. Researchers are unsure of the composition of its body.
cobblemon.species.astrolith.name: Astrolith
cobblemon.species.astrolith.desc: They consume minerals to process them into fuel for flight. They can levitate shortly, and with enough fuel, fly around at speeds of 977km/h. The longest record for an Astrolith's flight duration was 4 hours and 17 minutes. Their limbs are detachable and can easily float around using magnetic force.
cobblemon.species.mystisianabsol.name: MystisianAbsol
cobblemon.species.mystisianabsol.desc: This beautiful Pokémon's scarf shares a resemblance to colorful lights often seen in the night skies. Unlike its Hoennian counterpart, Mystian Absol is the cause of disasters such as avalanches and hailstorms.
cobblemon.species.hitmonbash.name: Hitmonbash
cobblemon.species.hitmonbash.desc: Hitmonbash is the result of a Tyrogue's fighting spirit becoming attuned with the spirits of the afterlife. It will not hesitate to give up everything to protect what's important to it.
cobblemon.species.mugpie.name: Mugpie
cobblemon.species.hederat.name: Hederat
cobblemon.species.hederat.desc: Hederat are often found scurrying around bushes, looking for berries to snack on.
cobblemon.species.geckid.name: Geckid
cobblemon.species.newtint.name: Newtint
cobblemon.species.newtint.desc: It sneaks through alleyways, marking its territory with a spray of poisonous paint from its mouth. The composition varies from individual to individual, and it often causes metal to rust.
cobblemon.species.adhesnail.name: Adhesnail
cobblemon.species.carval.name: Carval
cobblemon.species.carval.desc: It carves into rocks using its powerful horn. These carvings seem to be warnings and ways to communicate. It uses the end of its tail to file down rocks and remove the carvings. Carval fight among each other to sharpen their horns, leading to many carvings on its body, especially around the face.
cobblemon.species.chillowisp.name: Chillowisp
cobblemon.species.bassacre.name: Bassacre
cobblemon.species.rebone.name: Rebone
cobblemon.species.dracaver.name: Dracaver
cobblemon.species.dracaver.desc: Upon evolving, Dracaver's fighting spirit has grown even more. Ghastly Sinew has formed between its bones, strengthening it greatly.
cobblemon.species.calderon.name: Calderon
cobblemon.species.calderon.desc: People should be cautious when handling a Calderon! When tipped over, most of its contents will spill out and begin melting the ground.
cobblemon.species.boilord.name: Boilord
cobblemon.species.boilord.desc: Boilord are always burning internally, its flames reaching 3000 degrees celsius. Some work in tandem with Bubbeldam to create powerful brews.
cobblemon.species.crickute.name: Crickute
cobblemon.species.armorable.name: Armorable
cobblemon.species.treenket.name: Treenket
cobblemon.species.conifella.name: Conifella
cobblemon.species.conifear.name: Conifear
cobblemon.species.conifear.desc: Evo CrunchSTAB Dark - Bramble Up Grass - Branch PokeSTAB Grass - FaceplantSTAB Grass - Forest's Curse Grass - Grass KnotSTAB Grass - Ingrain Grass - Leaf StormSTAB Grass - Leaf TurnSTAB Grass - Leaf TornadoSTAB Grass - LeafageSTAB Grass - Magical LeafSTAB Grass - Wood HammerSTAB Grass - Spiky Shield Grass - Razor LeafSTAB Grass - BiteSTAB Dark - Brutal SwingSTAB Dark - Darkest LariatSTAB Dark - Feint AttackSTAB Dark - Foul PlaySTAB Dark - Knock OffSTAB Dark - Lash OutSTAB Dark - Night SlashSTAB Dark - Parting Shot Dark - Sucker PunchSTAB Dark - Throat ChopSTAB Dark - Stomping Tantrum Ground - Avalanche Ice - Blizzard Ice - Frost Breath Ice - Ice Fang Ice - Ice Hammer Ice - Ice Punch Ice - Ice Blade Ice - Icy Charge Ice
cobblemon.species.pebblig.name: Pebblig
cobblemon.species.pebblig.desc: Pebblet's stone body is inhabited by crystals made of malice. If the crystals are shattered, Pebblet stops moving.
cobblemon.species.boaribble.name: Boaribble
cobblemon.species.boaribble.desc: The darkness of its surroundings caused it to evolve, its crystals growing ever larger. As its inner malice grows, it will crumble under it's own weight and become new Pebblets.
cobblemon.species.acheelys.name: Acheelys
cobblemon.species.acheelys.desc: This Mon has been spotted mostly around ancient ruins. Initially believed to be the spirits of an ancient civilisation, Acheelys are in fact regular Mons that happened to be worshipped as a symbol of speed.
cobblemon.species.detonewt.name: Detonewt
cobblemon.species.detonewt.desc: Detonewt can drop off pieces of its tail to make it explode in a predator's face. They scuttle across the desert sand, singeing the ground in its wake.
cobblemon.species.soulmander.name: Soulmander
cobblemon.species.soulmander.desc: A close relative of Detonewt, assumed to have been extinct for hundreds of years. Latent dragon energy has reawakened it's spirit, and it's soul flame now burns uncontrollably.
cobblemon.species.scoopawn.name: Scoopawn
cobblemon.species.smackream.name: Smackream
cobblemon.species.smackream.desc: To make its signature weapon, it produces sweet liquids that freeze to become harder than steel. It is apparently delicious when melted.
cobblemon.species.barbait.name: Barbait
cobblemon.species.barbait.desc: It hides its hook in the sand, pretending to act weak and defenseless to lure in prey. It can end its victims in 1 carefully placed strike.
cobblemon.species.rustail.name: Rustail
cobblemon.species.rustail.desc: Its body is patterned to blend in with the water. Its jaws and hook are extremely deadly.
cobblemon.species.crimsoni.name: Crimsoni
cobblemon.species.dragift.name: Dragift
cobblemon.species.giftyrant.name: Giftyrant
cobblemon.species.giftyrant.desc: Whatever is contained inside of Giftyrant is a mystery, as it often spews up random items from its mouth.
cobblemon.species.scorpop.name: Scorpop
cobblemon.species.atmosfear.name: Atmosfear
cobblemon.species.atmosfear.desc: This Pokémon seems to be heavily reclusive, only appearing when it feels like its territory is being threatened. Its cloud-like appearance masks a dangerous amount of energy within its body.
cobblemon.species.urchinja.name: Urchinja
cobblemon.species.urchinja.desc: Urchinja have a mysterious ability to retract their spines and 'feet' at will. It is unknown how many they have in total, as a fully spiny Urchinja can wipe out a horde of enemies faster than the eye can see. The spines are actually quite fragile, but Urchinja can use that to its advantage.
cobblemon.species.gatar.name: Gatar
cobblemon.species.oiligator.name: Oiligator
cobblemon.species.colorlish.name: Colorlish
cobblemon.species.colorlish.desc: Colorish's scales have grown over its eyes. Thankfully, it is so dull it often isn't noticed until it bites or rams into others. It hunts using a mystic power.
cobblemon.species.marvelish.name: Marvelish
cobblemon.species.marvelish.desc: Marvelish tends to stand out and is popular among collectors. It fetches for a surprisingly high price as no one seems to have realised that it evolves from Colorlish...
cobblemon.species.topolter.name: Topolter
cobblemon.species.boodini.name: Boodini
cobblemon.species.bookalf.name: Bookalf
cobblemon.species.faebull.name: Faebull
cobblemon.species.drakrash.name: Drakrash
cobblemon.species.drakrash.desc: It is found all over the region causing havoc, only going away once it considers its target destroyed. It breaks things down with its claws and drains energy with the spot at the tip of its tail.
cobblemon.species.staretue.name: Staretue
cobblemon.species.burrawn.name: Burrawn
cobblemon.species.burrawn.desc: Its sturdy claws act like shovels, allowing it to dig into the earth with ease. When predators approach, it will quickly retreat into its burrow or curl up its armored body to protect its soft underside.
cobblemon.species.delvster.name: Delvster
cobblemon.species.delvster.desc: Delvster often collect precious ores and gemstones to decorate their burrows with. They sometimes utilize the leftovers of their molting to reinforce their burrows to prevent them from collapsing.
cobblemon.species.cephouch.name: Cephouch
cobblemon.species.cephouch.desc: These Pokémon came to be when old clothing lost in the ocean were imbued with spiritual energy. Getting their rag-like skin torn releases a pitch-black smoke in the area, allowing it to escape.
cobblemon.species.satchacle.name: Satchacle
cobblemon.species.satchacle.desc: Whatever is inside the old rags has grown upon evolving, causing the bottom to tear open. Now it is able to shoot the dark smoke forward to disorient its prey and escape from predators.
cobblemon.species.kragken.name: Kragken
cobblemon.species.kragken.desc: Kragken lives in the darkest reaches of the ocean, its many eyes glowing ominously in the abyss. It surrounds prey in a cloud of inky smoke before engulfing them in its body to consume them.
cobblemon.species.shocenti.name: Shocenti
cobblemon.species.shocenti.desc: It consumes electricity, so it can often be found in the wild looking for a nest of Charjabug or in the city attacking power lines. Efforts are being made to allow them to consume electricity without harming buildings.
cobblemon.species.escalaze.name: Escalaze
cobblemon.species.escalaze.desc: Despite its bulky appearance, the vents on its back allow it to throw punches at a speed invisible to the naked eye.
cobblemon.species.lamprobe.name: Lamprobe
cobblemon.species.grabbem.name: Grabbem
cobblemon.species.grabbem.desc: It used to be capable of delivering powerful blows in this form, and has devastating counterattacks. Time has weakened its body. Despite this, it is still marginally strong. It rests dormant, still protecting the same areas from thousands of years ago.
cobblemon.species.guardihand.name: Guardihand
cobblemon.species.guardihand.desc: Erosion over time has made its body crumble, although its soul will never waver. It will make sure no intruders pass through the area it is protecting. Even after thousands of years of dormancy, it still remains extremely powerful. Artwork from ancient times depicts it as a protector of an ancient civilisation.
cobblemon.species.drakuleech.name: Drakuleech
cobblemon.species.drakuleech.desc: It lives in dark caves, feasting on the lifeforce of unsuspecting passersby to grow stronger. Those it feasts on are reported to become very sick, looking almost lifeless.
cobblemon.species.nosfernal.name: Nosfernal
cobblemon.species.nosfernal.desc: Despite it's incredibly ominous demeanour, it acts incredibly polite as long as there are no hostilities in the area. It can summon swarms of Drakuleech to aid it in a tough battle.
cobblemon.species.maginner.name: Maginner
cobblemon.species.psyclaw.name: Psyclaw
cobblemon.species.mirawing.name: Mirawing
cobblemon.species.mirawing.desc: Mirawing is the form Psyclaw takes when it fully realises its power for good. They shrink in size to grow wings, and use them to fly and bring light to everyone.
cobblemon.species.magitate.name: Magitate
cobblemon.species.dubsparce.name: Dubsparce
cobblemon.species.dubsparce.desc: A recently discovered evolution to Dunsparce. It is unknown why only Mystian Dunsparce can evolve, or why they are a different color.
cobblemon.species.sparcnidria.name: Sparcnidria
cobblemon.species.sparcnidria.desc: Originally thought to be mere folklore, Sparcnidria lives high up in mountains. As they are highly territorial creatures, not much is known about them. They can blast various sorts of elemental breathes from their three heads.
cobblemon.species.dimshade.name: Dimshade
cobblemon.species.dimshade.desc: Dimwraith like to play pranks to scare people. According to researchers, there are theoretically unlimited ways to evolve Dimwraith, although only a few have been discovered.
cobblemon.species.vertighoul.name: Vertighoul
cobblemon.species.vertighoul.desc: Vertighoul's main source of food is fear, so it gets its meals by terrorising humans and Pokémon. Its preferred strategy is to scare people off steep cliffs and catching them right before they fall.
cobblemon.species.ovizap.name: Ovizap
cobblemon.species.ovizap.desc: Ovizap aren't as good as hunting as their evolutions, so they tend to stick together in a small den. Their eggshell protects them from the elements.
cobblemon.species.zaptor.name: Zaptor
cobblemon.species.zaptor.desc: Zaptor like to hunt in groups, often delegating different roles to other members of the group. Their usual hunting strategy is to chase down prey to the point of exhaustion, shocking them with jolts of electricity to wear them down or paralyse them.
cobblemon.species.lectraptor.name: Lectraptor
cobblemon.species.lectraptor.desc: It builds up electricity in its body constantly. Using this electricity to stimulate its muscles, it becomes even faster. This has an unfortunate side effect of making it unusually hostile while it is hunting.
cobblemon.species.cutezal.name: Cutezal
cobblemon.species.quetsun.name: Quetsun
cobblemon.species.quetsun.desc: It is said that when Quetsun flies overhead, the sun will emit colourful rays of light. When Quetsun flaps its wings, the wind it produces fills the earth with abundant greenery and sprouts of life.
cobblemon.species.vivility.name: Vivility
