cobblemon.species.vivility.desc: It is said that there is a sacred tree that blooms once every several thousand years that gives grace and vitality, and that the resulting blooms will soar as soon as it blooms. This bloom in the sky is Vivility, the Bloom of the Wind.
cobblemon.species.levinity.name: Levinity
cobblemon.species.levinity.desc: Otherwise known as the Roaring Judgement, Levinity cuts through the dark clouds with a cry of thunder. Its lightning is almost vengeful, actively seeking out those who have enraged it.
cobblemon.species.myotitan.name: Myotitan
cobblemon.species.myotitan.desc: A great plague befell this Mon. It now festers within this Mon's thorny roots, violently lashing out at trespassers to the Terrimis Forest.
cobblemon.species.neuregel.name: Neuregel
cobblemon.species.neuregel.desc: With its mind polluted by the corruption, almost all bodies of water near it's resting place have become stagnant. People fear that it may poison the entire water supply of Mystis if left unchecked.
cobblemon.species.prismativern.name: Prismativern
cobblemon.species.prismativern.desc: It clashed with Abyssalvern and disappeared over the horizon, where remnants of its power became the sky. In legends, it is said that during a great moment of crisis, it will wipe the world clean of impurity, beginning the genesis of a new world. The world's fate depends on its people; would they live on through the crisis, or would they perish within a supernova of light?
cobblemon.species.abyssalvern.name: Abyssalvern
cobblemon.species.abyssalvern.desc: It clashed with Prismativern and was banished to the deep abyss of the ocean, where its body became the ocean floor. In legends, it is said that when the world is about to collapse, it will bring about a maelstrom of despair, destroying it entirely. The world's fate depends on its people; could they stop its maelstrom before it swallows them whole, or would it have torn them apart?
cobblemon.species.wyverserk.name: Wyverserk
cobblemon.species.wyverserk.desc: It once went on a rampage that destroyed half of the region, causing unforetold amounts of damage. It is said if you see Wyverserk, a battle will soon unfold.
cobblemon.species.friendemise.name: Friendemise
cobblemon.species.friendemise.desc: The 3 spirits surrounding this mon are individuals it once cared for in life. They have a tight knit bond, and will become anxious if one goes missing.
cobblemon.species.frogoopy.name: Frogoopy
cobblemon.species.frogoopy.desc: The honey it produces from eating flowers attracts many other Bug-type Pokémon. It doesn't mind as long as they don't eat too much, though.
cobblemon.species.staticroak.name: Staticroak
cobblemon.species.staticroak.desc: By being exposed to various forms of electricity, Croagunk has managed to evolve into this form. While it is still somewhat toxic, its toxins are now more built for paralysis.
cobblemon.species.minifing.name: Minifing
cobblemon.species.blokkead.name: Blokkead
cobblemon.species.manacule.name: Manacule
cobblemon.species.manacule.desc: A mon made of pure energy, it absorbs the surrounding area's energy and converts it into magic particles to store in its densely packed body. It is the target of many other mons, as it is sought for these particles.
cobblemon.species.possion.name: Possion
cobblemon.species.bubbeldam.name: Bubbeldam
cobblemon.species.bubbeldam.desc: The cauldron it lives in is constantly heated, although no one knows how. Anything that goes into a Bubbeldam's sludge comes out completely different, if given enough time.
cobblemon.species.sorcehorress.name: Sorcehorress
cobblemon.species.sorcehorress.desc: An experiment gone horribly wrong has turned it into this form. It hides it's face from others, scalding them with boiling poison if they dare look.
cobblemon.species.explodaph.name: Explodaph
cobblemon.species.disasteroid.name: Disasteroid
cobblemon.species.utsuki.name: Utsuki
cobblemon.species.utsuki.desc: Strangely hopping about the land with a mighty 'THUD', this mon has been declared to be an Ultra Beast. It kicks up a sweet smelling cloud of dust as it moves around, obscuring foes before it strikes with a nasty headbutt.
cobblemon.species.faunox.name: Faunox
cobblemon.species.faunox.desc: Faunox spend most of their day grazing in the field. They eat half their body weight a day and absorb the nutrients from the greenery which result in them growing stronger.
cobblemon.species.fauxian.name: Fauxian
cobblemon.species.sylvotaur.name: Sylvotaur
cobblemon.species.mouslit.name: Mouslit
cobblemon.species.ignimus.name: Ignimus
cobblemon.species.necromus.name: Necromus
cobblemon.species.necromus.desc: Evo Wondrous FlameSTAB Fire - Tail Whip Normal - Scratch Normal - Wondrous FlameSTAB Fire - EmberSTAB Fire - Charm Fairy - FlamethrowerSTAB Fire 5 Disarming VoiceSTAB Fairy 9 Baby-Doll Eyes Fairy 13 Fire SpinSTAB Fire 18 Encore Normal 22 Draining KissSTAB Fairy 26 Lucky Chant Normal 30 Firewall Fire 34 FlamethrowerSTAB Fire 38 FlamethrowerSTAB Fire 42 Dazzling GleamSTAB Fairy 48 Fire BlastSTAB Fire 55 MoonblastSTAB Fairy
cobblemon.species.feloam.name: Feloam
cobblemon.species.feloam.desc: Young Feloam play together in the mist where they practice their camouflage.
cobblemon.species.mistiger.name: Mistiger
cobblemon.species.mistiger.desc: Practicing the craft of creating their own mists these Pokemon tend to become more stubborn towards their trainers.
cobblemon.species.torahaze.name: Torahaze
cobblemon.species.torahaze.desc: Torahaze are solitary pokemon that always stay out of sight. They are only sighted in foggy and misty areas. Reaserchers can't conclude if torahaze follows the mist or if it's the other way around.
cobblemon.species.haffy.name: Haffy
cobblemon.species.haffy.desc: Haffy spend most of their time of the day up high in the trees where they stay in their nests. They only leave their nest to eat.
cobblemon.species.baldawk.name: Baldawk
cobblemon.species.stoadent.name: Stoadent
cobblemon.species.stoadent.desc: Stoadent gathers berries and gives them to other pokemon ...
cobblemon.species.amiesel.name: Amiesel
cobblemon.species.amiesel.desc: Amiesel helps out injured Pokémon, whether they're wild or not, and let's them stay at their butrrows to take care of them. sometimes Amiesel even helps out injured trainers.
cobblemon.species.ratamie.name: Ratamie
cobblemon.species.ratamie.desc: Ratamies are never found in the wild Ratamie are known to be their trainers best friend.
cobblemon.species.betterfree.name: Betterfree
cobblemon.species.imicada.name: Imicada
cobblemon.species.imicada.desc: Imcada camouflages themselves as sunkern to blend in within the sunflower fields where they feed upon the flowers.
cobblemon.species.suncada.name: Suncada
cobblemon.species.nodorransunflora.name: NodorranSunflora
cobblemon.species.nodorransunflora.desc: Sunflora have evolved to grow thicker prickly roots to defend themselves from imicada who prey on them.
cobblemon.species.lumiscent.name: Lumiscent
cobblemon.species.lumiscent.desc: Evo Cleansing Light Light - Luminous BlastSTAB Light - Cleansing Light Light - Petal BlizzardSTAB Grass - Moonlight Fairy - Moonblast Fairy 45 Luminous BlastSTAB Light 49 Holy Blessing Light 54 Tail Glow Bug 61 Petal BlizzardSTAB Grass
cobblemon.species.nodorranfoongus.name: NodorranFoongus
cobblemon.species.nodorranamoonguss.name: NodorranAmoonguss
cobblemon.species.koiver.name: Koiver
cobblemon.species.koiver.desc: Koiver live in freshwater rivers and ponds, they are very slow paced and live up to a hundred years. They are popular to use as bait for larger fish.
cobblemon.species.koyshi.name: Koyshi
cobblemon.species.koyshi.desc: Koyshi are known all over Nodorro for their beautifull scales and their incredible taste.
cobblemon.species.rockillo.name: Rockillo
cobblemon.species.rockillo.desc: When in danger Rockillo curls into a ball and rolls away smashing everything on its way into pieces. Rockillo can break through rocks at ease.
cobblemon.species.armarolla.name: Armarolla
cobblemon.species.armodrilla.name: Armodrilla
cobblemon.species.armodrilla.desc: Barrier Psychic Rapid Spin Normal Natural Gift Normal Drain Punch Fighting Zen Headbutt Psychic Head SmashSTAB Rock Hone Claws Dark Shell Smash Normal Play Rough Fairy
cobblemon.species.qualder.name: Qualder
cobblemon.species.hakid.name: Hakid
cobblemon.species.hakid.desc: Needs a idea. Idk, something lumberjack related I guess
cobblemon.species.axolt.name: Axolt
cobblemon.species.axfeller.name: Axfeller
cobblemon.species.webling.name: Webling
cobblemon.species.silkrawl.name: Silkrawl
cobblemon.species.arachnoir.name: Arachnoir
cobblemon.species.arachnoir.desc: Note: custom ability Profitient instead of analitic: Strengthens moves when moving last. If the oponent misses it's move, this pokemon may crit.
cobblemon.species.arachneve.name: Arachneve
cobblemon.species.arachneve.desc: Note: Custom ability Malice; Raises Special Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.trashic.name: Trashic
cobblemon.species.crabbish.name: Crabbish
cobblemon.species.nodorranmagikarp.name: NodorranMagikarp
cobblemon.species.nodorrangyarados.name: NodorranGyarados
cobblemon.species.nodorranteddiursa.name: NodorranTeddiursa
cobblemon.species.nodorranursaring.name: NodorranUrsaring
cobblemon.species.nodorranhoothoot.name: NodorranHoothoot
cobblemon.species.nodorranhoothoot.desc: Hoothoot has a passion for serving people, its often seen in the housekeep of rich families. Hoothoot are extremely loyal and won't leave the mansion even once.
cobblemon.species.nodorrannoctowl.name: NodorranNoctowl
cobblemon.species.nodorrannoctowl.desc: Noctowl live in what once used to be a mansion, where they were left behind by their trainers. There even is a mansion dedicated to Noctowl
cobblemon.species.nodorranhippowdon.name: NodorranHippowdon
cobblemon.species.nodorrancubchoo.name: NodorranCubchoo
cobblemon.species.nodorranbeartic.name: NodorranBeartic
cobblemon.species.nodorranekans.name: NodorranEkans
cobblemon.species.nodorranekans.desc: Ekans are short tempered and can quickly lash out to unsuspecting foes.
cobblemon.species.nodorranarbok.name: NodorranArbok
cobblemon.species.nodorranarbok.desc: Arbok emits a poisonous gas from its glands that cause a searing pain if made contact with.
cobblemon.species.simburn.name: Simburn
cobblemon.species.simburn.desc: Simburn have a big appetite for fighting. Because of this they often attack pokemon that are bigger then themselves.
cobblemon.species.felectroar.name: Felectroar
cobblemon.species.felectroar.desc: Feliroar battle eachtother to show their power over the pack. In addition to their fire tail their teeth gained the ability to charge up electricity, wich they can let go when they bite.
cobblemon.species.kibinusu.name: kibinusu
cobblemon.species.kibinusu.desc: Kibinusu cannot store their electricity well and thus moves constantly to release the electricity.
cobblemon.species.nodorranbonsly.name: NodorranBonsly
cobblemon.species.nodorranbonsly.desc: Bonsly is a good mimic, making it often mistaken for a real rooted carrot. although it can easily be recognized as a fake due to it's curling 'leaves'.
cobblemon.species.nodorransudowoodo.name: NodorranSudowoodo
cobblemon.species.nodorransudowoodo.desc: it buries itself underground leaving only it's head exposed to mimic a bush. It hates water, so if anyone try to water it not knowing it's a fake they will get attacked.
cobblemon.species.nodorrannosepass.name: NodorranNosepass
cobblemon.species.nodorranprobopass.name: NodorranProbopass
cobblemon.species.nodorrankoffing.name: NodorranKoffing
cobblemon.species.nodorranweezing.name: NodorranWeezing
cobblemon.species.choaking.name: Choaking
cobblemon.species.cerojolt.name: Cerojolt
cobblemon.species.cerojolt.desc: Joltceros follow thunderclouds to absorb electricity with their big horn, if it is fully charged it's said that one joltceros can shutdown an entire skyscrayquazar.
cobblemon.species.rostone.name: Rostone
cobblemon.species.electone.name: Electone
cobblemon.species.gravatone.name: Gravatone
cobblemon.species.moistone.name: Moistone
cobblemon.species.aquatone.name: Aquatone
cobblemon.species.meltone.name: Meltone
cobblemon.species.magtone.name: Magtone
cobblemon.species.pastone.name: Pastone
cobblemon.species.mosstone.name: Mosstone
cobblemon.species.runnabun.name: Runnabun
cobblemon.species.crabip.name: Crabip
cobblemon.species.scissorab.name: Scissorab
cobblemon.species.crabruner.name: Crabruner
cobblemon.species.nodorrangastly.name: NodorranGastly
cobblemon.species.nodorranhaunter.name: NodorranHaunter
cobblemon.species.nodorrangengar.name: NodorranGengar
cobblemon.species.snolm.name: Snolm
cobblemon.species.snowder.name: Snowder
cobblemon.species.frauster.name: Frauster
cobblemon.species.scroul.name: Scroul
cobblemon.species.magisbook.name: Magisbook
cobblemon.species.prudexwell.name: Prudexwell
cobblemon.species.nodorranonix.name: NodorranOnix
cobblemon.species.nodorransteelix.name: NodorranSteelix
cobblemon.species.clusk.name: Clusk
cobblemon.species.nimbusk.name: Nimbusk
cobblemon.species.yuheffo.name: Yuheffo
cobblemon.species.yuheffa.name: Yuheffa
cobblemon.species.nodorrandrifblim.name: NodorranDrifblim
cobblemon.species.nodorrandrifloon.name: NodorranDrifloon
cobblemon.species.hatgic.name: Hatgic
cobblemon.species.hoodrikus.name: Hoodrikus
cobblemon.species.puppesite.name: Puppesite
cobblemon.species.akaineko.name: Akaineko
cobblemon.species.cephinky.name: Cephinky
cobblemon.species.inquidy.name: Inquidy
cobblemon.species.krakuid.name: Krakuid
cobblemon.species.sarqua.name: Sarqua
cobblemon.species.sarqua.desc: These small hunters hunt for small fish in the lagunes of the Nodorro region.
cobblemon.species.slifin.name: Slifin
cobblemon.species.slifin.desc: Sharphins live in groups up to 7 individuals. They hunt together on much larger prey such as inquids and even bigger.
cobblemon.species.draquafin.name: Draquafin
cobblemon.species.draquafin.desc: Draquafin mostly rule over the entire sea they claim as their territory, sometimes even named as the king of the sea. their extremly sharp fins can cut through any material known to man.
cobblemon.species.tortanic.name: Tortanic
cobblemon.species.tortanic.desc: Nobody knows how this Pokémon got into the region, nor has anyone ever seen it before. The iceberg on its back is large enough to house a Snolem
cobblemon.species.terranguis.name: Terranguis
cobblemon.species.leviathrus.name: Leviathrus
cobblemon.species.scaelicius.name: Scaelicius
cobblemon.species.nodorranoshawott.name: NodorranOshawott
cobblemon.species.nodorrandewott.name: NodorranDewott
cobblemon.species.nodorransamurott.name: NodorranSamurott
cobblemon.species.nodorranchimchar.name: NodorranChimchar
cobblemon.species.nodorranmonferno.name: NodorranMonferno
cobblemon.species.nodorraninfernape.name: NodorranInfernape
cobblemon.species.kuruhinomi.name: Kuruhinomi
cobblemon.species.kanyonomi.name: Kanyonomi
cobblemon.species.kyokinomi.name: Kyokinomi
cobblemon.species.protagobits.name: Protagobits
cobblemon.species.protagobits.desc: Protagobits is a spirit that took over a dismantled robot. For years protagobits has been studied by scientists to indentify its origin but without any succes
cobblemon.species.geckamp.name: Geckamp
cobblemon.species.geckamp.desc: Geckamp are commonly found skittering around trees in small groups, these small groups actually generate their own small electrical field as they move.
cobblemon.species.gecktricity.name: Gecktricity
cobblemon.species.gecktricity.desc: Gecktricity, much like Geckamp, are excitable and full of energy; unlike their younger selves, Gecktricity have a much better control over their electrical powers.
cobblemon.species.geckolt.name: Geckolt
cobblemon.species.geckolt.desc: These Pokémon are often seen on the forest floors, running at high speeds and generating sparks as they move. Their electrical blasts are deadly, to say the least.
cobblemon.species.avire.name: Avire
cobblemon.species.avire.desc: Avire can be very air-headed at times, and may sometimes walk into trees or bushes on accident.
cobblemon.species.cygnaze.name: Cygnaze
cobblemon.species.cygnaze.desc: Cygnaze have a quiet demeanor, liking to sit alone on shores. But they can be very loud and thrashing when threatened.
cobblemon.species.inphoeno.name: Inphoeno
cobblemon.species.inphoeno.desc: A graceful Pokémon with powerful legs. By infusing their legs with heat, they can increase their kicks' power tenfold.
cobblemon.species.hissicle.name: Hissicle
cobblemon.species.hissicle.desc: Hissicle are patient and calm, and love swim gaudily through cold seas. They have a cold toxin in their body that chills those it bites.
cobblemon.species.viperost.name: Viperost
cobblemon.species.viperost.desc: Viperost are cold killers, they wait patiently in the waters, then bite into their prey, freezing them instantly.
cobblemon.species.kelviper.name: Kelviper
cobblemon.species.kelviper.desc: Slow and bulky, Kelviper hunt in the deepest of waters, but on land, can freeze the ground under them to move and hunt faster.
cobblemon.species.chucheek.name: Chucheek
cobblemon.species.chucheek.desc: Chucheek can use their tails as a fifth limb, hanging from branches and stems as they search for food.
cobblemon.species.mowzumi.name: Mowzumi
cobblemon.species.mowzumi.desc: Mowzumi have tough hairs on their tails, and hang out in groups to protect their young.
cobblemon.species.pripilla.name: Pripilla
cobblemon.species.pripilla.desc: Pripilla's body is covered in a sticky, glue-like substance that it secretes from its mouth. This does mean it often gets stuck on other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.orilepi.name: Orilepi
cobblemon.species.orilepi.desc: Orilepi have an incredible ability to fold leaves into sharp edges, as well as being able to create a papier mache-like substance to reinforce their fragile wings.
cobblemon.species.nymfly.name: Nymfly
cobblemon.species.nymfly.desc: Their thick scales are like metal, to protect their soft fragile bodies. By increasing their internal body temperature, they can shoot small flames like a dragon.
cobblemon.species.drasilis.name: Drasilis
cobblemon.species.drasilis.desc: Statuesque and solid like rock, these Pokémon remain still while their bodies metamorphose inside. They are also surprisingly warm and used as pillows by some.
cobblemon.species.dragoneura.name: Dragoneura
cobblemon.species.dragoneura.desc: Dragoneura have a tough shell and powerful jaws, making them ferocious predators, on top of powerful wings means these Pokémon are a force to reckoned with.
cobblemon.species.buzkin.name: Buzkin
cobblemon.species.buzkin.desc: Buzkin generate a constant static shock, causing their fluffy feathers to be stuck to their heads at all times.
cobblemon.species.electrisk.name: Electrisk
cobblemon.species.electrisk.desc: With a flap of their mighty wings, Electrisk cause the sky to rumble. Those lucky enough to witness an Electrisk fly will see nothing but a blur.
cobblemon.species.pastelianledyba.name: PastelianLedyba
cobblemon.species.pastelianledyba.desc: They are docile and like to fall asleep in groups on dark surfaces. Their star-shaped spots give off a faint glow when in the dark.
cobblemon.species.pastelianledian.name: PastelianLedian
cobblemon.species.pastelianledian.desc: In the day, Ledian will sleep in any dark space, giving off a dim light. At night, however, they are very active, flying through the sky like shooting stars.
cobblemon.species.eleedian.name: Eleedian
cobblemon.species.eleedian.desc: Some believe these Pokémon are fallen stars. Eleedian light up paths at night, guiding lost travellers back home. They have an intense fighting spirit despite their friendly demeanour.
cobblemon.species.hejjikyu.name: Hejjikyu
cobblemon.species.hejjikyu.desc: Sharp grassy quills grow over the shell of Hejjikyu, allowing Hejjikyu to create their own source of energy while remaining still. They appear commonly in the summer inside of hedges and bushes.
cobblemon.species.yapifur.name: Yapifur
cobblemon.species.yapifur.desc: A very common first Pokémon for young trainers, they are easy to train and bond very quickly to their owners.
cobblemon.species.frosfur.name: Frosfur
cobblemon.species.frosfur.desc: Frosfur can generate a spine-chilling breeze by shaking it's fur. Washing this Pokémon can be hard as it freezes the water. It's loyal to the end, and will sit alongside their trainers no matter what happens.
cobblemon.species.blasfur.name: Blasfur
cobblemon.species.blasfur.desc: Loyal and smart, these Pokémon can smell the faintest smell of burning from miles away, making them useful for firefighters. They can detect when a person is ill by their temperature, and will try their best to help them.
cobblemon.species.rascat.name: Rascat
cobblemon.species.rascat.desc: These sly Pokémon sneak around, believing themselves to be invisible, when they are actually very much visible and adorable. Some people believe them to be omens of bad luck, but this is just superstition.
cobblemon.species.panthevil.name: Panthevil
cobblemon.species.pastelianflabebe.name: PastelianFlabebe
cobblemon.species.pastelianfloette.name: PastelianFloette
cobblemon.species.florgae.name: Florgae
cobblemon.species.pasteliangirafarig.des: Girafarig's rear head contains a tiny brain that is too small for thinking. However, the rear head doesn't need to sleep, so it can keep watch over its surroundings 24 hours a day.
cobblemon.species.friylash.name: Friylash
cobblemon.species.majestrill.name: Majestrill
cobblemon.species.pasteliansneasel.name: PastelianSneasel
cobblemon.species.pasteliansneasel.desc: Sneasel scales trees by punching its hooked claws into the bark. This Pokémon seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while the parents are away.
cobblemon.species.pastelianweavile.name: PastelianWeavile
cobblemon.species.pastelianweavile.desc: Weavile on the Pastel Island hunt by themselves, quickly sprinting across the sandy waves.
cobblemon.species.dametal.name: Dametal
cobblemon.species.damaleo.name: Damaleo
cobblemon.species.pasteliangothita.name: PastelianGothita
cobblemon.species.pasteliangothorita.des: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
cobblemon.species.searth.name: Searth
cobblemon.species.titanomaw.name: Titanomaw
cobblemon.species.lunapyon.name: Lunapyon
cobblemon.species.lemish.name: Lemish
cobblemon.species.lemish.desc: Small and weak, Lemish are commonly found in the middle of Sourprion schools, acting as a shield for the young. While swimming, they stay low to the sea bed, blending in to the sand.
cobblemon.species.sourprion.name: Sourprion
cobblemon.species.sourprion.desc: While entirely blind, Sourprion can release a powerful fragrance that can paralyze foes with it's flavour. They can feel their surroundings with special electro-receptors. Male Sourprion have more potent fragrances for attracting mates.
cobblemon.species.pasteliansmeargle.name: PastelianSmeargle
cobblemon.species.pasteliansmeargle.desc: Smeargle are reclusive creatures, spending hours spraying their paint-like fluid onto walls. People sometimes gather to try and decipher the meaning of a Smeargle's paintings.
cobblemon.species.banksund.name: Banksund
cobblemon.species.banksund.desc: Seeing a Banksund is a rare occurance, as such, art done by these master painters are considered high value and are to be protected. It wraps its own tail around its mouth to protect itself from fumes and being identified.
cobblemon.species.pastelianchansey.name: PastelianChansey
cobblemon.species.pastelianchansey.desc: On the Pastel Island, Chansey have grown unusually aggressive, losing their normal nursing tendencies for more violent and rebellious ways. They hold large rocks in their pouches as ammo to throw at mean or rude people.
cobblemon.species.bossey.name: Bossey
cobblemon.species.bossey.desc: Bossey can sense when a person is in danger using their soft fur. No matter how far away, it will run over to protect them. It can pack powerful punches after using heavy rock weights for training.
cobblemon.species.psyeye.name: PsyEye
cobblemon.species.hyprentice.name: Hyprentice
cobblemon.species.hallusage.name: Hallusage
cobblemon.species.giruffle.name: Giruffle
cobblemon.species.sparaffe.name: Sparaffe
cobblemon.species.trojaraffe.name: Trojaraffe
cobblemon.species.dimnewt.name: Dimnewt
cobblemon.species.spimeleon.name: Spimeleon
cobblemon.species.donguana.name: Donguana
cobblemon.species.malloh.name: Malloh
cobblemon.species.marshamie.name: Marshamie
cobblemon.species.mallowisp.name: Mallowisp
cobblemon.species.pasteliankoffing.name: PastelianKoffing
cobblemon.species.pasteliankoffing.desc: Koffing that have acclimated to the harsh cold forests. As the temperature drops, they create more and more icy mist that can obscure large swathes of land.
cobblemon.species.pastelianweezing.name: PastelianWeezing
cobblemon.species.pastelianweezing.desc: The Weezing on The Pastel Island live in colder climates. Each time their bodies expand and contract, they blow out icy mist that glitters like an aurora.
cobblemon.species.leetch.name: Leetch
cobblemon.species.pariahsite.name: Pariahsite
cobblemon.species.haebidon.name: Haebidon
cobblemon.species.rooklite.name: Rooklite
cobblemon.species.militite.name: Militite
cobblemon.species.colossesar.name: Colossesar
cobblemon.species.cubtus.name: Cubtus
cobblemon.species.cubtus.desc: It's fur may look cuddly, but it's littered with many tiny thorns. However, they rather feel like little dull pin-pricks. The only thing that is not completely covered with thorns is the fur ruffle around the neck. It's rather soft.
cobblemon.species.paddorn.name: Paddorn
cobblemon.species.paddorn.desc: It could easily get along without water for several weeks. The less it has drunk, the sharper and harder the thorns are on its body.
cobblemon.species.maanzagaro.name: Maanzagaro
cobblemon.species.maanzagaro.desc: Grizzlash have affection for their friends and fury for their enemies. One fierce punch can lead to major injuries and destruction.
cobblemon.species.flambah.name: Flambah
cobblemon.species.flambah.desc: Its horns are constantly powered with a high heat from the inside, which, if wanted, can reach a temperature of up to 500°. It depends mostly on the mood.
cobblemon.species.ramligh.name: Ramligh
cobblemon.species.ramligh.desc: A lofty Pokémon, mostly because of it's wool's appearance. And because of that they mostly keep distance to water and rain.
cobblemon.species.vulkynamo.name: Vulkynamo
cobblemon.species.vulkynamo.desc: With it's unique hooves it can gallop over any lava or fire. The horns on it's head is charged with high electricity.
cobblemon.species.sharkin.name: Sharkin
cobblemon.species.sharkin.desc: It loves everything that has to do with water and splashes around in it. Sadly it isn't that flexible on land.
cobblemon.species.mawrine.name: Mawrine
cobblemon.species.mawrine.desc: Mawrine can produce an outstanding speed in the water, which is exactly the opposite on land. With it's echolocation, it can find prey underwater pretty quickly.
cobblemon.species.orcanfrak.name: Orcanfrak
cobblemon.species.orcanfrak.desc: The scales have developed into titanium-like metal during evolution. It resists almost every missile.
cobblemon.species.phasmox.name: Phasmox
cobblemon.species.teumixen.name: Teumixen
cobblemon.species.arfruff.name: Arfruff
cobblemon.species.laelupus.name: Laelupus
cobblemon.species.woodpeckit.name: Woodpeckit
cobblemon.species.woodpeckit.desc: Their nests consist mainly of nutshells. These are stuffed then with soft leaves for a comfortable hatching place.
cobblemon.species.peckster.name: Peckster
cobblemon.species.peckster.desc: They take Pidgeot as an idol and want to be like them. They practise their speed each day to get as fast as they are.
cobblemon.species.peckussion.name: Peckussion
cobblemon.species.peckussion.desc: Percudart are often taken as a quick detour for mail because they have an extemely keen sense of orientation. On confrontration, they dive towards you like a dart.
cobblemon.species.inferpillar.name: Inferpillar
cobblemon.species.inferpillar.desc: Once a year there is a hatcling ceremony of their kind, where forests are covered with red silk, where many eggs are hidden, waiting to hatch.
cobblemon.species.flamupet.name: Flamupet
cobblemon.species.flamupet.desc: As they fear the bird-like Pokémon and are not capable of running away from the predators, they tend to hide inside tree trunks until they would evolve.
cobblemon.species.flamothra.name: Flamothra
cobblemon.species.flamothra.desc: Etymology It's a play on the words 'Flame' and 'Mothra,' the latter of which is a reference to the giant moth-like creature from the Godzilla franchise
cobblemon.species.gnaphid.name: Gnaphid
cobblemon.species.locusteror.name: Locusteror
cobblemon.species.punling.name: Punling
cobblemon.species.floretaya.name: Floretaya
cobblemon.species.grandrupe.name: Grandrupe
cobblemon.species.happetite.name: Happetite
cobblemon.species.happetite.desc: Beneath its mask is a mouth that can stretch far, able to gobble down large meals without any effort.
cobblemon.species.serposter.name: Serposter
cobblemon.species.serposter.desc: It's head looks confusingly similar to a berry plant. Serposter uses this as a advantage to ambush prey or foes. Once caught, it is almost impossible to escape.
cobblemon.species.venobat.name: Venobat
cobblemon.species.noseferatu.name: Noseferatu
cobblemon.species.tryprock.name: Tryprock
cobblemon.species.tryprock.desc: Tryprock rarely venture into the open. Preferring the safety of underground environments, they feel most at ease amidst magnetic fields. Tryprock's glowing eye possesses a unique scanning ability, allowing it to detect and track magnetic fields, crucial for navigating the underground. These Pokémon sustain themselves by feeding on minerals found deep within the earth.
cobblemon.species.trypagnet.name: Trypagnet
cobblemon.species.trypagnet.desc: Despite its slow levitation, Trypagnet's increased size and magnetic prowess make it a force to be reckoned with in its underground habitat. These Pokémon are known to form intricate formations, working together to create magnetic fields that aid in navigation and communication across expansive subterranean networks. With its evolved capabilities, Trypagnet becomes a cornerstone of the underground ecosystem, contributing to the delicate balance of magnetic forces that shape its hidden world.
cobblemon.species.trypolisk.name: Trypolisk
cobblemon.species.trypolisk.desc: Its ragged, lengthy structure now houses multiple glowing eyes, each tuned to magnetic frequencies. Legends speak of Trypolisk's ability to decipher the earth's magnetic heartbeat, providing an uncanny sense of impending geological shifts. Trainers who encounter Trypolisk may unknowingly witness its influence, as the very ground seems to respond to the guardian's silent commands.
cobblemon.species.grimlin.name: Grimlin
cobblemon.species.grimlin.desc: Its oversized nose is a keen sensor, allowing it to sniff out potential prey or hidden treasures. Known for its aggressive nature, Grimlin is often spotted ambushing unsuspecting targets, stealing items, or playfully hurling rocks at travelers and reveling in their reactions.
cobblemon.species.grumpelstil.name: Grumpelstil
cobblemon.species.grumpelstil.desc: While they may seem festive, Grumpelstil is far from friendly. These Fire Trolls are notorious for their ambush tactics, lying in wait for unsuspecting prey and leaping out with surprising agility. Grumpelstil fiercely guards its territory, using a combination of intimidating postures and the flare of its fiery crown. Encroaching on its turf is ill-advised, as this Fire Troll Pokémon will not hesitate to defend its home with aggressive attacks. Trainers must exercise caution and respect boundar
cobblemon.species.oozegrim.name: Oozegrim
cobblemon.species.oozegrim.desc: Oozegrim is a master of stealth, often lurking beneath murky waters or hidden in the shadows of bridges. When a potential prey draws near, it pounces with surprising agility, using the element of surprise to overwhelm its target. Travelers are cautioned to exercise vigilance when traversing areas known to be inhabited by Oozegrim.
cobblemon.species.kopiuzu.name: Kopiuzu
cobblemon.species.kopiuzu.desc: They dine heartily on every possible cable to saturate themselves with the electricity. This often causes short circuits.
cobblemon.species.kebuzu.name: Kebuzu
cobblemon.species.purazu.name: Purazu
cobblemon.species.molore.name: Molore
cobblemon.species.molore.desc: Molore is known for its impressive burrowing skills, which it uses to navigate underground tunnels and create its own burrows. Its back is covered in spikey, electrically charged fur that can stun predators, making it difficult for them to attack. Despite its clumsy appearance, Molore is surprisingly quick and nimble when it needs to be, using its sharp claws to dig through soil and rocks.
cobblemon.species.minerolt.name: Minerolt
cobblemon.species.lunuhu.name: Lunuhu
cobblemon.species.oracowl.name: Oracowl
cobblemon.species.oracowl.desc: Human fate is thought to be controlled by oracowls. Bad things seem to happen when an Oracowl is present...
cobblemon.species.plagfowl.name: Plagfowl
cobblemon.species.plagfowl.desc: Plagfowl, a misunderstood Pokémon that is thought to bring misfortune and illness upon people, but is actually very harmless. It often lives alone because of that.
cobblemon.species.misphecy.name: Misphecy
cobblemon.species.piedow.name: Piedow
cobblemon.species.piedow.desc: The coat of Piedoe is very soft, dense and usually colored in a light brown tone. It often headbutts trees to strengthen it's head.
cobblemon.species.ceryneer.name: Ceryneer
cobblemon.species.kabby.name: Kabby
cobblemon.species.kabby.desc: It is covered with a thick layer of fur that defies almost any cold. Even newborns are very tough.
cobblemon.species.avalak.name: Avalak
cobblemon.species.olysosianbuneary.name: OlysosianBuneary
cobblemon.species.olysosianbuneary.desc: Having adapted to the cold harsh environment of the colder regions, they mostly use their frosty fur as a easy defense against their opponents.
cobblemon.species.olysosianlopunny.name: OlysosianLopunny
cobblemon.species.bubby.name: Bubby
cobblemon.species.bubby.desc: They can do almost nothing and are exposed to danger. As a result, they hide in the depths of the ocean.
cobblemon.species.coarsent.name: Coarsent
cobblemon.species.yinyan.name: Yinyan
cobblemon.species.yinyan.desc: To be told to be connected to the spiritual realm of the world. They have become extremely rare and are only found in very specific waters.
cobblemon.species.vivater.name: Vivater
cobblemon.species.vivater.desc: In their magnificent presence they roam the oceans, sing their leaf-shaped arms to move forward.
cobblemon.species.hydrona.name: Hydrona
cobblemon.species.squishid.name: Squishid
cobblemon.species.squishid.desc: Squishid's small size and white coloration help it to blend into the ocean floor, making it difficult to spot by predators. Its unique fins on its head enable it to swim quickly through the water and maneuver with ease. It's red-marked tentacles are often used to attract prey or ward off enemies. Squishid is known for its mischievous behavior and enjoys playing pranks on other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.squidgeist.name: Squidgeist
cobblemon.species.squidgeist.desc: Squidgeist is the evolved form of Squishid. Its small size and white coloration help it blend into the ocean floor, but it has become more aggressive and territorial than its previous form. Its fins have grown longer and sharper, giving it greater speed and maneuverability. Squidgeist's red-marked tentacles are now more pronounced and intimidating, serving as a warning to potential predators. Its ghostly aura and spectral powers make it a fearsome and mysterious creature of the deep.
cobblemon.species.qoxipus.name: Qoxipus
cobblemon.species.qoxipus.desc: The outer layer of its skin is covered with a poisonous liquid coming from devouring the toxic silt of the waters. It wouldn't be wise to touch.
cobblemon.species.plaxista.name: Plaxista
cobblemon.species.lapili.name: Lapili
cobblemon.species.tasmon.name: Tasmon
cobblemon.species.tasmon.desc: Tasmon's small frame allows it to navigate urban environments with ease, darting through dark alleys and narrow streets. This mischievous pup has a penchant for playful deception, often hiding in the shadows and surprising unsuspecting passersby. Its oversized paws may seem clumsy, but they conceal sharp claws that Tasmon employs in its clever antics.
cobblemon.species.casanovil.name: Casanovil
cobblemon.species.casanovil.desc: In moonlit caves, Casanovil's slender silhouette becomes even more elusive. It is said that the echoes of its haunting laughter linger, serving as a warning to those who dare trust too easily in the dark. Casanovil's alluring gaze can captivate even the most resolute trainers. Once ensnared, victims often find themselves drawn into a web of deception, their trust shattered by the Deceitful Devil Pokémon's cunning maneuvers.
cobblemon.species.lavaleon.name: Lavaleon
cobblemon.species.chamelaze.name: Chamelaze
cobblemon.species.lavyrm.name: Lavyrm
cobblemon.species.lavyrm.desc: They have a very slimy layer of mucus around their body, which can get up to over 100°C. In oder to keep the mucus layer, they often swim in volcanoes and magma caverns.
cobblemon.species.maganon.name: Maganon
cobblemon.species.maganon.desc: Volcanon is a master of manipulating heat, often using it to melt rocks to slurp them up or to make nests. Its body is coated with a sticky, lava-like substance that is incredibly hot to the touch, making it dangerous to get too close to. Its eyes are a piercing orange color with fire-like streams emanating from them.
cobblemon.species.eruptinon.name: Eruptinon
cobblemon.species.eruptinon.desc: As Eruptinon grows and matures, it spends more time deep in the heart of volcanoes, basking in the intense heat and absorbing the energy of the molten rock around it. Its rocky skin acts as a natural shield, protecting it from the searing heat of the magma and allowing it to move through the fiery depths with ease. Eruptinon's powerful cannon-like head and fiery eyes strike fear into the hearts of all who dare to challenge it.
cobblemon.species.tortorge.name: Tortorge
cobblemon.species.tortorge.desc: The steel forge atop its shell blazes with the intensity of a forge at full operation, emitting molten steel that can leave scorching burns on its opponents. Despite its fearsome appearance, Tortorge is a gentle giant, utilizing its molten steel attacks only as a last resort.
cobblemon.species.alphayena.name: Alphayena
cobblemon.species.pepstep.name: Pepstep
cobblemon.species.pepstep.desc: Pepstep, the Pepper Lizard Pokemon. Pepstep's tail is reminiscent of a pepper, and it uses it to attract prey. It is said that the more vibrant the colors on its tail, the spicier its fire breath becomes. Its flexible legs allow it to climb even the steepest of cliffs, and its sharp claws make it a formidable opponent in battle. Despite its small size, Pepstep has a fiery spirit and never backs down from a challenge. Pepstep is commonly found in warm, rocky areas, such as deserts or volcanic re
cobblemon.species.devilance.name: Devilance
cobblemon.species.devilance.desc: Devilance, the Firearm Tail Pokemon. Devilance stands upright on its hind legs, ready to strike with its powerful arms and sharp claws. Its horns have grown even larger, and it can launch them like missiles to take down even the toughest opponents. Its fiery breath is hotter than ever, and it can now use its tail as a weapon, delivering powerful blows to its foes. Despite its fierce appearance, Devilance is a loyal companion to those it trusts, and it will go to great lengths to protect its trai
cobblemon.species.twoghast.name: Twoghast
cobblemon.species.twoghast.desc: It has been told that breaking a urn would cause years of misfortune. Souls of Pokemon and Human are apperently trapped inside of it and fused to one Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.forcaken.name: Forcaken
cobblemon.species.olysosianscroul.name: OlysosianScroul
cobblemon.species.olysosianscroul.desc: Scroul is a mischievous and curious Pokémon, known to wander around ancient ruins and libraries in search of ancient scrolls to play with. It often uses its clamps to hold onto and carry multiple scrolls at once, and it has been known to swap the contents of different scrolls just for fun. Despite its playful nature, Scroul can be quite protective of the scrolls it considers its own and will fiercely defend them from anyone who tries to take them away.
cobblemon.species.scrolock.name: Scrolock
cobblemon.species.scrolock.desc: Scrolock is known for its eerie presence, often appearing in dark, abandoned areas where it likes to haunt unsuspecting travelers. It can also use its paper arms to grab onto its opponents and drain their energy, making it a formidable opponent in battle.
cobblemon.species.skarawel.name: Skarawel
cobblemon.species.skarawel.desc: Skarawel, the Golden Beetle Pokémon. Skarawel is often mistaken for jewelry due to its shimmering, golden body. It is found in the deserts and tombs where it nests inside walls. Although it may seem harmless, its swarms can cause significant damage to wooden structures.
cobblemon.species.traplat.name: Traplat
cobblemon.species.traplat.desc: It burrows itself into the ground, leaving only its sturdy trap visible. When a threat approaches, the trap's retractable spikes will shoot up, providing an effective defense mechanism for Traplat. Its preferred habitats are rocky terrains, desert temples, and ruins. Traplat's red marking, which runs along the length of its body, is a warning sign to potential predators that it is not an easy target. In the wild, Traplat can often be found living in desert ruins or underground caverns, where i
cobblemon.species.trapolem.name: Trapolem
cobblemon.species.allnown.name: Allnown
cobblemon.species.allnown.desc: It appeared as the maker of the Unown and stores all their knowledge that they learn outside like an encyclopedia. It uses these to communicate with humans.
cobblemon.species.mageleon.name: Mageleon
cobblemon.species.chereon.name: Chereon
cobblemon.species.rustank.name: Rustank
cobblemon.species.rustank.desc: Its stubborn nature is matched only by its steely resolve, and it is said that nothing can stand in its way when it sets its mind to a task. The rust-colored metal of its body is constantly heated by the coals and firestones it consumes, and its eyes glow yellow from the intense heat. Rustank's ears, tail, and mane are made of pipes that can unleash hot steam or smoke, and it can use the openings on its abdomen and legs to release bursts of scorching heat.
cobblemon.species.steamare.name: Steamare
cobblemon.species.steamare.desc: It is said that this mechanical creature gained sentience after being built by a group of engineers. Steamare is feared by those who cross its path, as it is fiercely protective of the factories it calls home. This Pokémon is known to be very selective about its trainers, only allowing those it trusts to ride on its back. It feeds on coal, firestones, and gasoline to fuel its powerful engine, and it can withstand incredible amounts of heat and pressure.
cobblemon.species.artikit.name: Artikit
cobblemon.species.sabretal.name: Sabretal
cobblemon.species.solsaur.name: Solsaur
cobblemon.species.spinerno.name: Spinerno
cobblemon.species.olysosianskorupi.name: OlysosianSkorupi
cobblemon.species.olysosiandrapion.name: OlysosianDrapion
cobblemon.species.snugub.name: Snugub
cobblemon.species.plushug.name: Plushug
cobblemon.species.draconaut.name: Draconaut
cobblemon.species.draconaut.desc: Draconaut hatchlings are born from comet eggs that crash-land on Earth. They spend their early days floating around in search of food, using their powerful feet and hand flames to propel themselves through the air. Despite their small size, they are highly intelligent and possess a strong connection to the cosmos.
cobblemon.species.nebulazer.name: Nebulazer
cobblemon.species.velocidron.name: Velocidron
cobblemon.species.cupidove.name: Cupidove
cobblemon.species.kismean.name: Kismean
cobblemon.species.kryuu.name: Kryuu
cobblemon.species.kryuu.desc: The body temperature is absolutely frigid. It#s scales are impossible to touch, as it immediately turns unfortunate souls to ice.
cobblemon.species.kryoalis.name: Kryoalis
cobblemon.species.kryoalis.desc: In the stillness of the night, this guardian serpent graces the skies, leaving behind a mesmerizing aurora spectacle that captivates all who witness it. As it soars through the heavens, its scales emit an otherworldly glow, creating an enchanting dance of lights that mirrors the beauty of the northern lights. Many ancient tales speak of Kryoalis guiding lost souls with its soothing glow, ensuring they find their way through the vast, snow-covered landscapes.
cobblemon.species.phyuu.name: Phyuu
cobblemon.species.phyuu.desc: It is always born from the ashes instead from an normal egg. Throughout the life it always carries the ashes around until it evolves.
cobblemon.species.phosos.name: Phosos
cobblemon.species.phosos.desc: Its wings are said to possess the colors of the rainbow, and it is revered for its ability to heal and soothe with its mystical fire. Legends tell of its appearance being an omen of hope during times of crisis, as it descends from the skies to aid those in need.
cobblemon.species.anyuu.name: Anyuu
cobblemon.species.anufelis.name: Anufelis
cobblemon.species.anufelis.desc: Legends speak of Anufelis guiding lost souls to their resting place or even back to life. Trainers brave the treacherous sandstorms of the Infernal Dunes in search of its temple, but few return, and the whereabouts of the Guardian remain a mystery.
cobblemon.species.kaisaos.name: Kaisaos
cobblemon.species.kaisaos.desc: It's core is pulsating with deranged energy, glitching everything around itself into a disorted mess. It's mere presence is a threat to the universe.
cobblemon.species.monokron.name: Monokron
cobblemon.species.monokron.desc: It's energy source streams from it's back. The environment around itself disorts into very simplified geometric shapes. The colours evaporate and everything becomes one.
cobblemon.species.klepeck.name: Klepeck
cobblemon.species.klepeck.desc: It is attracted to shiny objects, often collecting them in its nest. This little trickster is quick-witted and swift in flight, making it a challenge for Trainers to catch. It enjoys taunting other Pokémon and people, showcasing its intelligence by imitating various sounds it hears in its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.magusong.name: Magusong
cobblemon.species.yukibi.name: Yukibi
cobblemon.species.yukiku.name: Yukiku
cobblemon.species.safrion.name: Safrion
cobblemon.species.saffry.name: Saffry
cobblemon.species.nagamufin.name: Nagamufin
cobblemon.species.nagamufin.desc: Legend has it that anyone who gazes directly into its eyes is instantly paralyzed. To avoid this, Nagamufin often keeps its eyes hidden, but it can use them to sense the emotions and intentions of others, allowing it to anticipate and playfully prank them.
cobblemon.species.mediva.name: Mediva
cobblemon.species.ladivy.name: Ladivy
cobblemon.species.terrino.name: Terrino
cobblemon.species.mermana.name: Mermana
cobblemon.species.fabumera.name: Fabumera
cobblemon.species.dideep.name: Dideep
cobblemon.species.searkat.name: Searkat
cobblemon.species.mosaile.name: Mosaile
cobblemon.species.krokoblok.name: Krokoblok
cobblemon.species.mosalegod.name: Mosalegod
cobblemon.species.flufflet.name: Flufflet
cobblemon.species.chrysow.name: Chrysow
cobblemon.species.worrym.name: Worrym
cobblemon.species.sangorko.name: Sangorko
cobblemon.species.olysosianzombark.name: OlysosianZombark
cobblemon.species.olysosianzombark.desc: This is a Olysian entry for Mystis' Zombark's line. Permission by Dylando.
cobblemon.species.serenine.name: Serenine
cobblemon.species.patouette.name: Patouette
cobblemon.species.patouette.desc: The leaves on its head are covered with a silk of its own conception to avoid getting them in its eyes. It shakes them in every direction when it is happy.
cobblemon.species.filignon.name: Filignon
cobblemon.species.filignon.desc: It uses its legs with ease to craft and weave threads in nature. Its works, which are elegant and firm, are worshiped in all of the region's dressmaking salons.
cobblemon.species.aratrap.name: Aratrap
cobblemon.species.aratrap.desc: Thanks to its mastery of threads and psychic powers, it uses its own body to alleviate all beings in the perimiter and absorbs their nightmares during their sleep.
cobblemon.species.capoubou.name: Capoubou
cobblemon.species.capoubou.desc: It can stay awake multiple days without the feeling of exhaustion. Its eyes are always wide open, which scares predators at night.
cobblemon.species.sorcerieu.name: Sorcerieu
cobblemon.species.sorcerieu.desc: It stays cool-headed even in front of an enemy, keeping its torso rounded and its eyes peeled. It doesn't emit a single sound except in case of emergency, which is both frightening and captivating.
cobblemon.species.histeria.name: Histeria
cobblemon.species.histeria.desc: It moves like a shadow, sneaking silently behind its ennemies. Its paralysing glaze can traumatize anyone if it wishes to. Only its singing is able to unfreeze its victims.
cobblemon.species.bullaine.name: Bullaine
cobblemon.species.bullaine.desc: This pokemon is always happy, and bounces nearly all the time! Once launched, the air in the bubbles that covers it makes it jump higher.
cobblemon.species.moumeil.name: Moumeil
cobblemon.species.moumeil.desc: Always sleepy, it sleeps almost constantly. Surprisingly, it seams to defend itself pretty well in its slumber due to the big bubbles that forms around it to parry all incoming enemies attacks.
cobblemon.species.gniage.name: Gniage
cobblemon.species.gniage.desc: It remains on its little cloud at any time, without ever touching the ground. When it floats, the haze floating around it disperses and puts to sleep anyone below it.
cobblemon.species.ishirianralts.name: IshirianRalts
cobblemon.species.ishirianralts.desc: Ralts has the ability to sense the emotions of people. If its Trainer is in a cheerful mood, this Pokémon grows cheerful and joyous in the same way.
cobblemon.species.ishiriankirlia.name: IshirianKirlia
cobblemon.species.ishiriankirlia.desc: Kirlia uses the horns on its head to amplify its psychokinetic power. When the Pokémon uses its power, the air around it becomes distorted, creating mirages of nonexistent scenery.
cobblemon.species.ishiriangardevoir.name: IshirianGardevoir
cobblemon.species.ishiriangardevoir.desc: Gardevoir has the psychokinetic power to distort the dimensions and create a small black hole. This Pokémon will try to protect its Trainer even at the risk of its own life.
cobblemon.species.ishiriangallade.name: IshirianGallade
cobblemon.species.ishiriangallade.desc: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.
cobblemon.species.larsouris.name: Larsouris
cobblemon.species.larsouris.desc: This Pokémon, who doesn't look like a bad guy at first glance, is a real thief. As soon as it sees something valuable, it grabs it and runs away.
cobblemon.species.ratvisseur.name: Ratvisseur
cobblemon.species.ratvisseur.desc: Ratvisseurs are very lonely. They scour the world in search of valuables. If one of these Pokémon bandits steals something from you, you can be sure you'll never see your property again.
cobblemon.species.ishirianonix.name: IshirianOnix
cobblemon.species.ishirianonix.desc: Onix has a magnet in its brain. It acts as a compass so that this Pokémon does not lose direction while it is tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes increasingly rounder and smoother.
cobblemon.species.ishiriansteelix.name: IshirianSteelix
cobblemon.species.ishiriansteelix.desc: Steelix lives even further underground than Onix. This Pokémon is known to dig toward the earth’s core. There are records of this Pokémon reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
cobblemon.species.psylex.name: Psylex
cobblemon.species.psylex.desc: This little Pokémon is able to levitate objects with its psychic force, and thus launch flying rocks if it is attacked. Since it can bring objects to itself, it hardly moves at all.
cobblemon.species.cerebroc.name: Cerebroc
cobblemon.species.cerebroc.desc: The crystals built into the body of this Pokémon give off a light that guides lost travelers into the caves. It levitates its hands made of rock with its psychic powers.
cobblemon.species.hexalith.name: Hexalith
cobblemon.species.hexalith.desc: This Pokémon creates a force field around it with its telekinetic power, allowing it to levitate its five hands without any problem. Its body made of crystals is extremely strong.
cobblemon.species.vampereur.name: Vampereur
cobblemon.species.vampereur.desc: Beside making pranks, Vampereur have a fighting spirit, they give their all to triumph over oppenents.
cobblemon.species.roicula.name: Roicula
cobblemon.species.roicula.desc: Riocula's strength grow at night, it regenerates by sucking the life force out of its prey.
cobblemon.species.scorpyro.name: Scorpyro
cobblemon.species.scorpyro.desc: Scorpyro can survive in different types of climates, except in low-temperature areas. Nevertheless, it is most often found in high temperature climates.
cobblemon.species.mandibrule.name: Mandibrule
cobblemon.species.mandibrule.desc: The venom it secretes at the tip of its tail is burning, though not lethal. It uses its sting only to hunt or to defend itself from a larger enemy.
cobblemon.species.magmurion.name: Magmurion
cobblemon.species.magmurion.desc: As it grows, the shell that protects it is as hard as steel. Its claws have become stronger and its venom more powerful, making it extremely dangerous.
cobblemon.species.ishirianmagikarp.name: IshirianMagikarp
cobblemon.species.ishirianmagikarp.desc: Magikarp is virtually useless in battle as it can only splash around. As a result, it is considered to be weak. However, it is actually a very hardy Pokémon that can survive in any body of water no matter how polluted it is.
cobblemon.species.ishiriangyarados.name: IshirianGyarados
cobblemon.species.ishiriangyarados.desc: Once Gyarados goes on a rampage, its ferociously violent blood doesn’t calm until it has burned everything down. There are records of this Pokémon’s rampages lasting a whole month.
cobblemon.species.corecif.name: Corecif
cobblemon.species.corecif.desc: This Pokémon is very sensitive to variations in the composition and temperature of the water in which it lives, which explains the wide variety of different Corécif that can be found.
cobblemon.species.ecabri.name: Ecabri
cobblemon.species.ecabri.desc: Ecabri usually lives near water. It is capable of storing water, using it against their predators. It can also deliver devastating blows using its hoofs.
cobblemon.species.cabricorne.name: Cabricorne
cobblemon.species.cabricorne.desc: By building up its hind legs, Cabricorne can walk on both legs. Although it still lacks physical training, its front legs can break solid rocks.
cobblemon.species.scaprido.name: Scaprido
cobblemon.species.scaprido.desc: Scaprido trains tirelessly to become ever stronger. It is now able to break steel plates thanks to its strong fists and footwork. Its tail makes it even more formidable underwater.
cobblemon.species.tritus.name: Tritus
cobblemon.species.tritus.desc: The voice of the Tritus is soothing to the passing sailors. Despite its great sweetness, this little Pokémon has an impressive appetite.
cobblemon.species.venursula.name: Venursula
cobblemon.species.venursula.desc: This patient, terrifying Pokémon lurks in the shadows behind its enormous tentacles before capturing its prey. Legend has it that crossing Venursula's gaze will petrify the gazer for life.
cobblemon.species.cocowi.name: Cocowi
cobblemon.species.cocowi.desc: Cocowi are cute little creatures that are very popular with children. They are harmless and love to play all day long.
cobblemon.species.cocoded.name: Cocoded
cobblemon.species.cocoded.desc: Because not all Cocowi can receive love, some are put aside and die of depression. Then they become Cocoded.
cobblemon.species.coxyro.name: Coxyro
cobblemon.species.coxyro.desc: It flies to the rescue of Pokémon in need of help with spectacular speed, almost like a shooting star. Its punches are so powerful it can knock out multiple opponents with a single punch.
cobblemon.species.ishiriansewaddle.name: IshirianSewaddle
cobblemon.species.ishiriansewaddle.desc: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.
cobblemon.species.ishirianswadloon.name: IshirianSwadloon
cobblemon.species.ishirianswadloon.desc: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.
cobblemon.species.ishirianleavanny.name: IshirianLeavanny
cobblemon.species.ishirianleavanny.desc: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.
cobblemon.species.empomdran.name: Empomdran
cobblemon.species.empomdran.desc: Inside this rotten apple lives a Verenin. Despite its condition, it keeps it safe, especially thanks to the rot that drips from it, warding off any curious beings.
cobblemon.species.serpommi.name: Serpommi
cobblemon.species.serpommi.desc: It manages to pass itself off as a fruit tree. Thanks to the Verenin it hosts and their apples, they seduce its preys with their exquisite aromas, who end up falling asleep at the first bite before being devoured.
cobblemon.species.feenin.name: Feenin
cobblemon.species.feenin.desc: This little Pokémon produces a powerful poison which it uses to survive against its predators. It is very distrustful by nature.
cobblemon.species.meigue.name: Meigue
cobblemon.species.meigue.desc: Meigüe is extremely protective towards its trainer. Anyone who messes with its master is in danger of being poisoned.
cobblemon.species.niestajou.name: Niestajou
cobblemon.species.niestajou.desc: Its thick white coat is considered a good omen. It is said that it strenghten the bond of every couple encountering it.
cobblemon.species.junkajou.name: Junkajou
cobblemon.species.junkajou.desc: Junkajou has the ability to provide love and happiness to whoever they meet. They are considered as the embodiment of love at first sight by many couples.
cobblemon.species.kintopia.name: Kintopia
cobblemon.species.kintopia.desc: Kintopia, more than a source of joy, has the ability to bring peace, especially in places where harsh emotions regroup. It is also said to be able to link two soulmates for the rest of their lives.
cobblemon.species.phylo.name: Phylo
cobblemon.species.phylo.desc: Spirited by nature, Phyléo are always under the watchful eye of their mother. They never leave Leoberon's group until their first buds hatch.
cobblemon.species.dandyprawl.name: Dandyprawl
cobblemon.species.dandyprawl.desc: Male Dandylion are sometimes chased out of their group by other Dandylion. So they wander around in search of a group they can join.
cobblemon.species.leoberon.name: Leoberon
cobblemon.species.leoberon.desc: The male Leoberon with the darkest foliage is the leader of the pride. However, it is more often the females that hunt for the group.
cobblemon.species.ishirianninetales.name: IshirianNinetales
cobblemon.species.ishirianninetales.desc: If you can't see all of its tails, it's maybe because one of it is chasing you, so be careful.
cobblemon.species.ishirianlotad.name: IshirianLotad
cobblemon.species.ishirianlotad.desc: This species spends most of their time underwater, observing the world above them without ever going out. It has been noticed that they enjoy when humans rub their leaf, but they usually return into hiding quickly afterwards.
cobblemon.species.ishirianlombre.name: IshirianLombre
cobblemon.species.ishirianlombre.desc: This Pokémon is quite the trickster, taking a liking to spooking others by hiding itself among the seaweed. It's also really territorial, and scares away anyone who approaches its pond.
cobblemon.species.ishirianludicolo.name: IshirianLudicolo
cobblemon.species.ishirianludicolo.desc: It stays in hermit for most of its life, staying at the same place, wailing. Very different from what it once was, it transformed under the influence of a mysterious crystal.
cobblemon.species.serponge.name: Serponge
cobblemon.species.serponge.desc: Its body is capable of soaking up so much water that it can live for months on the surface without touching a drop.
cobblemon.species.reggeponge.name: Reggeponge
cobblemon.species.reggeponge.desc: It loves to dance, and every limb of its body moves in rhythm as if it was in a trance. When it hears music, the sounds reverberate through its body and come out twice as loud through its orifices.
cobblemon.species.ishiriangrowlithe.name: IshirianGrowlithe
cobblemon.species.ishiriangrowlithe.desc: This Pokémon is said to be the lost soul of an ancient warrior. Its will of fighting still reside within this new creature.
cobblemon.species.ishirianarcanine.name: IshirianArcanine
cobblemon.species.ishirianarcanine.desc: People believe that giving this Pokémon a coin brings good luck and fortune, but it was never proven to be true.
cobblemon.species.ishirianlucario.name: IshirianLucario
cobblemon.species.ishirianlucario.desc: Labeled as 'Ishiria's Protector', this Pokémon possesses great psychic abilities.
cobblemon.species.trica.name: Trica
cobblemon.species.trica.desc: This Pokémon made of rock maintains a distorted gravitational force field around it. Anything that passes by it can feel it.
cobblemon.species.distroca.name: Distroca
cobblemon.species.distroca.desc: This Pokémon's powerful electromagnetic field is out of whack. There are many reports of people seeing objects moving on their own when it was just one of those Pokémon that was passing by.
cobblemon.species.elith.name: Elith
cobblemon.species.elith.desc: This colossal Rock Pokémon possesses such a great and controlled electromagnetic force that it can do almost anything it wants with matter. Fortunately, it doesn't care about humans.
cobblemon.species.ishirianshinx.name: IshirianShinx
cobblemon.species.ishirianshinx.desc: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.
cobblemon.species.ishirianluxio.name: IshirianLuxio
cobblemon.species.ishirianluxio.desc: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
cobblemon.species.ishirianluxray.name: IshirianLuxray
cobblemon.species.ishirianluxray.desc: Luxray’s ability to see through objects comes in handy when it’s scouting for danger.
cobblemon.species.ishirianpurrloin.name: IshirianPurrloin
cobblemon.species.ishirianpurrloin.desc: It lives hidden in snowstorms raging thourgh cold areas. It will hide in the fog, scaring off unaware hikers.
cobblemon.species.ishirianliepard.name: IshirianLiepard
cobblemon.species.ishirianliepard.desc: Its always appears for a brief moment after a snowstorm. It likes luring humans and letting them helpless on top of snowy mountains
cobblemon.species.biscorno.name: Biscorno
cobblemon.species.biscorno.desc: Although powerful enough to move tree trunks with its bare hands, it prefers to use its tail as an axe, both to build dams and to get rid of its enemies. They are often seen on construction sites.
cobblemon.species.ishiriansirfetchd.name: IshirianSirfetchd
cobblemon.species.ishiriansirfetchd.desc: He uses the power of darkness to bring peace to those around him. He is despised for his dark side but admired for his presence.
cobblemon.species.rapacier.name: Rapacier
cobblemon.species.rapacier.desc: From an early age, this little Pokémon has to learn how to fly at high altitudes as quickly as possible. The toughness of their training builds their character.
cobblemon.species.ishirianelekid.name: IshirianElekid
cobblemon.species.ishirianelekid.desc: As the power plant it lives in stopped generating energy, it started eating the local steel Pokémon, its body having to adapt to its new diet.
cobblemon.species.ishirianelectabuzz.des: It likes to pick a fight with any nearby Pokémon. It can sometimes be observed curling up into a ball to roll on its victims.
cobblemon.species.ishirianelectivire.des: Its two tails resemble a large jaw, which it uses to tear apart its ennemies.
cobblemon.species.ishirianchikorita.name: IshirianChikorita
cobblemon.species.ishirianchikorita.desc: The sharper its the blade, the more beautiful it looks. People loves to use it as knife or other tools.
cobblemon.species.ishirianbayleef.name: IshirianBayleef
cobblemon.species.ishirianbayleef.desc: It loses its blades each winter, with new ones quickly taking their place, sharper than the ones before. When it feels sick, it can sometimes lose its blades prematurely, in which case they'll only grow back the next winter.
cobblemon.species.ishirianmeganium.name: IshirianMeganium
cobblemon.species.ishirianmeganium.desc: This Pokémon is able to control floating blades, using them to cut through obstacles. Some have been seen controlling more than two, which it seems to have obtained by defeating other Meganium.
cobblemon.species.aracrne.name: Aracrne
cobblemon.species.aracrne.desc: Pyrochnide creates canvases that look harmless, but burn on contact with anyone who touches them, so don't be fooled by its bushy appearance.
cobblemon.species.diablentule.name: Diablentule
cobblemon.species.diablentule.desc: Flamentule waits in the shadow of its gigantic canvas for its poor prey to be trapped there. Then it will come and roast them with its great firepower, only to devour them afterwards.
cobblemon.species.horlactus.name: Horlactus
cobblemon.species.horlactus.desc: It takes pleasure in terrorizing decent people while robbing them of their most precious possession. Its spines are devastating, and it's capable of shooting at any target with them, from any distance.
cobblemon.species.ishirianlitten.name: IshirianLitten
cobblemon.species.ishirianlitten.desc: Its golden eyes pierce the night of the desert. Sighting one while exploring the desert's ruins is a sign of bad luck.
cobblemon.species.ishiriantorracat.name: IshirianTorracat
cobblemon.species.ishiriantorracat.desc: Its horrendous cry seems to gather all the spiritual energy of the lost travellers who never made it out of the desert. An ancient civilization used to worship this mon as a god, leaving Torrakat-shaped totem in their tombs.
cobblemon.species.ishirianincineroar.des: It uses its ability to sneak in the shadows and illusion to lure the looters out of the desert's ruin. It is rumored that once one is spotted by a Incineroar, escape is impossible.
cobblemon.species.debumue.name: Debumue
cobblemon.species.debumue.desc: The lower part of its body is covered with extremely dry skin. This makes it difficult for it to move outside the desert, but its movements in the sand are impressive.
cobblemon.species.momdysis.name: Momdysis
cobblemon.species.momdysis.desc: The dried-out layer of skin has covered its entire body. It is used to it by now and can move around without any problem, but the more time passes, the more it drains it of its energy.
cobblemon.species.serpendsable.name: Serpendsable
cobblemon.species.serpendsable.desc: Having never been able to get rid of its second layer of skin, its vital energy was completely absorbed. Its soul is however still imprisoned within it.
cobblemon.species.moldeon.name: Moldeon
cobblemon.species.moldeon.desc: It struts before its opponents, who dare not approach it because of its fur. When it becomes agitated, its fur emits toxic spores that give a horrible headache to those in proximity.
cobblemon.species.spireon.name: Spireon
cobblemon.species.spireon.desc: It wanders in dark, isolated places. It hides its face at all times, but when it uncovers it, those unlucky enough to meet its gaze are said to find themselves instantly cursed.
cobblemon.species.pugneon.name: Pugneon
cobblemon.species.pugneon.desc: Fiery and feisty, it charges headfirst into any battle. Its agility and strength makes it very hard to hit.
cobblemon.species.wingeon.name: Wingeon
cobblemon.species.wingeon.desc: Its ears, tail and legs are feathered, enabling it to move gracefully through the air. In some parts of the world, it is known as 'the messenger of the sky'.
cobblemon.species.sandeon.name: Sandeon
cobblemon.species.sandeon.desc: It can create huge sandstorms by twirling its tail. Sometimes, in an act of kindness, it might guide lost travelers in the desert.
cobblemon.species.draceon.name: Draceon
cobblemon.species.draceon.desc: A solitary creature, it lives on the highest peaks of the region. The impetuous trainers that dare to approach its habitat often regret it bitterly.
cobblemon.species.lunatronc.name: Lunatronc
cobblemon.species.lunatronc.desc: This variant of Heliatronc, deprived of sunlight, has developed differently from the others and wanders in the night. Having adapted to its environment, Lunatronc does not hesitate to attack its prey with sharp leaves.
cobblemon.species.trembloussin.name: Trembloussin
cobblemon.species.trembloussin.desc: This little Pokémon is only male. As it is still a hatchling, it has difficulties flying, but it is already able to cause powerful tremors... It is also known to be a real glutton.
cobblemon.species.telluricoq.name: Telluricoq
cobblemon.species.telluricoq.desc: Despite its large stature, it learned to fly. If it is trained enough, it can dive from a high altitude and with such strength that it can produce earthquakes.
cobblemon.species.voltoussin.name: Voltoussin
cobblemon.species.voltoussin.desc: This little Pokémon is only female. As it is still a hatchling, it has difficulties flying, but it is already able to cause impressive electric shocks... It is also known to be a real glutton.
cobblemon.species.galinamo.name: Galinamo
cobblemon.species.galinamo.desc: Having grown up, this Pokémon is now able to fly at great speeds. Its electric shocks are more powerful than before, and its speed allows it to zoom past its enemies with ease.
cobblemon.species.bourrbull.name: Bourrbull
cobblemon.species.bourrbull.desc: The power of its jaw is so impressive that it can break anything. He can show great violence if one comes at the attacker, but a simple pat on the head is enough to calm him down.
cobblemon.species.ishirianbudew.name: IshirianBudew
cobblemon.species.ishirianroselia.name: IshirianRoselia
cobblemon.species.ishirianroserade.name: IshirianRoserade
cobblemon.species.ishirianroserade.desc: Evo Secret Sword (N) Fighting Evo Sacred Sword Fighting - EmberSTAB Fire - Growl Normal - Powder SnowSTAB Ice - Absorb Grass 5 Fire SpinSTAB Fire 10 Growth Normal 15 Icy WindSTAB Ice 17 Poison Powder Poison 17 Sleep Powder Grass 21 Mist Ice 25 IncinerateSTAB Fire 28 Freeze-DrySTAB Ice 31 Ingrain (N) Grass 36 Leech Seed (N) Grass 48 Ice BeamSTAB Ice 52 FlamethrowerSTAB Fire 59 Fire BlastSTAB Fire 65 BlizzardSTAB Ice
cobblemon.species.poulpapik.name: Poulpapik
cobblemon.species.poulpapik.desc: This Pokémon is having fun and trains by launching missiles at high speed across the ocean. It learns the distortion of matter from birth in order to hunt alone.
cobblemon.species.krakosmik.name: Krakosmik
cobblemon.species.krakosmik.desc: This Pokémon's propulsion is so fast that it can reach the speed of sound. When it launches a missile, matter around it is altered.
cobblemon.species.ishirianrattata.name: IshirianRattata
cobblemon.species.ishirianrattata.desc: Rattata is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly listens by moving its ears around. It is not picky about where it lives—it will make its nest anywhere.
cobblemon.species.rattaxic.name: Rattaxic
cobblemon.species.rattaxic.desc: Living among the waste causes it to evolve into Rattaxic. Its bite is extremely toxic and it is capable of knocking down even the strongest Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.ishirianmeowth.name: IshirianMeowth
cobblemon.species.cracracha.name: Cracracha
cobblemon.species.cracracha.desc: Evo Iron Head Steel - ScratchSTAB Normal - Growl Normal - Fake OutSTAB Normal 7 Tail Whip Normal 10 BiteSTAB Dark 12 Quick AttackSTAB Normal 15 Hone Claws Dark 19 CovetSTAB Normal 25 Poison Fang Poison 29 CrunchSTAB Dark 32 Sudden StrikeSTAB Dark 33 Shadow Punch Ghost 34 Counter Fighting 36 Glare Normal 39 Night SlashSTAB Dark 41 SlashSTAB Normal 43 Parting Shot Dark 46 Iron Defense Steel 48 Body Press (N) Fighting 52 Extreme SpeedSTAB Normal 55 Bulk Up Fighting
cobblemon.species.domesprit.name: Domesprit
cobblemon.species.domesprit.desc: This little Pokémon loves to help people with their chores, and keeps the house it lives in as tidy as possible. Even if their owner die or leave, they will keep their house in perfect condition.
cobblemon.species.majordme.name: Majordme
cobblemon.species.majordme.desc: Majordâme are often used as butlers, their varied skills makes them appreciated for all kinds of jobs such as gardening or cleaning.
cobblemon.species.pokpalv1.name: PokPalv1
cobblemon.species.pokpalv1.desc: Introducing your newest Virtual Companion, the PokéPal! With a highly customisable interface and design, your PokéPal is entirely unique and personalised!
cobblemon.species.rascaloon.name: Rascaloon
cobblemon.species.rascaloon.desc: Raccute use their adorable looks to lure humans into giving them food. They hold out their hands and wait by houses until they are given a snack.
cobblemon.species.raccowl.name: Raccowl
cobblemon.species.squabbiz.name: Squabbiz
cobblemon.species.executove.name: Executove
cobblemon.species.presigeont.name: Presigeont
cobblemon.species.magpick.name: Magpick
cobblemon.species.magpeist.name: Magpeist
cobblemon.species.magpeist.desc: Magpeist who outrank the rest of its flock don the rarest of jewels and valuables.
cobblemon.species.nappi.name: Nappi
cobblemon.species.nappi.desc: Nappi spend their whole early lives living in fear of just about anything. They hide in dumpsters where they feed on old food scraps.
cobblemon.species.rubbage.name: Rubbage
cobblemon.species.rubbage.desc: When the time comes for a Nappi to evolve, their bodies harden and darken resembling a trash bag. Despite their increased defences they are still incredibly timid and will remain in the dumpster it was born in.
cobblemon.species.buzzero.name: Buzzero
cobblemon.species.buzzero.desc: Buzzero evolve in times of danger, overcoming all of their fears. They are capable of moving at extreme speeds and use their fists to pummel opponents.
cobblemon.species.bulbillar.name: Bulbillar
cobblemon.species.glowva.name: Glowva
cobblemon.species.sectalamp.name: Sectalamp
cobblemon.species.grubbrush.name: Grubbrush
cobblemon.species.pupallet.name: Pupallet
cobblemon.species.beasel.name: Beasel
cobblemon.species.beasel.desc: Beasel use their antennas and hands to paint pictures on each others backs. Art students commonly own Beasel to use as a working canvas.
cobblemon.species.squeebee.name: Squeebee
cobblemon.species.baldy.name: Baldy
cobblemon.species.baldy.desc: Baldy's skin are like rubber, giving them superb defenses. They use their round bodies to bounce around like balls. They are kept at pre-schools because of their extremely high tollerance to childish behaviour.
cobblemon.species.rubbaldy.name: Rubbaldy
cobblemon.species.rubbaldy.desc: Rubbaldy get their name from having skin as thick as rubber, giving them resistance to electricity. They are loved by children due to their playful and bouncy nature. They will always stay with their trainers.
cobblemon.species.stickigum.name: Stickigum
cobblemon.species.stickisticky.name: Stickisticky
cobblemon.species.solseed.name: Solseed
cobblemon.species.suryala.name: Suryala
cobblemon.species.bellchsia.name: Bellchsia
cobblemon.species.fuchsiella.name: Fuchsiella
cobblemon.species.fuchsiadame.name: Fuchsiadame
cobblemon.species.blanfish.name: Blanfish
cobblemon.species.dracolore.name: Dracolore
cobblemon.species.kingulum.name: Kingulum
cobblemon.species.acrown.name: Acrown
cobblemon.species.majestree.name: Majestree
cobblemon.species.timbug.name: Timbug
cobblemon.species.loustache.name: Loustache
cobblemon.species.spoutot.name: Spoutot
cobblemon.species.spoutot.desc: Unable to control its waterflow, it consistently tries to keep balance and not allow its water to spill out. It waits until rain to refill its dish.
cobblemon.species.fountier.name: Fountier
cobblemon.species.fountier.desc: Fountier are able to control their waterflow much easier than before; allowing it to focus harder on battling.
cobblemon.species.fonsdame.name: Fonsdame
cobblemon.species.fonsdame.desc: Fonsdame are among the most beautiful Pokemon in the world. The water that runs through their bodies is said to cause eternal youth. If Fonsdame loses all of its water; it loses its grace.
cobblemon.species.cerforyu.name: Cerforyu
cobblemon.species.pampurr.name: Pampurr
cobblemon.species.pampurr.desc: Pampurr have great pride in their white fluffy coats, they keep it immaculate at all costs. They require a great deal of care and pampering to keep them healthy. The orb on their necks contain a mystical power that is said to bring immense luck to those who polish it.
cobblemon.species.freyurr.name: Freyurr
cobblemon.species.freyurr.desc: Freyurr surround itself with orbs using its psychic energy and fires them at anyone who threatens its trainer. Their fur is incredibly soft and dense.
cobblemon.species.intimeow.name: Intimeow
cobblemon.species.intimeow.desc: Gangs of Intimeow are rampant in darker areas of Orbopolis where they hide in the shadows.
cobblemon.species.necromata.name: Necromata
cobblemon.species.necromata.desc: Spectreow hide in the shadows in dark alleys ready to pounce on unsuspecting prey. They are believed to haunt people who have disowned Pokemon in their past and use their tails to turn them into puppets.
cobblemon.species.caffiend.name: Caffiend
cobblemon.species.caffiend.desc: Caffiend are addicted to caffeine and will go to great expenses to get their hands on it.
cobblemon.species.baristroll.name: Baristroll
cobblemon.species.baristroll.desc: An over indulgence for coffee beans causes Caffiend to evolve. They commonly work alongside humans in cafés where they are rewarded with fresh coffee beans.
cobblemon.species.delistork.name: Delistork
cobblemon.species.delistork.desc: Delistork were once the main source of mail delivery in the city. Their huge beaks are used in the wild for scooping up its food in water, however being domesticated they are used instead to store mail and packages for deliveries.
cobblemon.species.trashlug.name: Trashlug
cobblemon.species.trashcargot.name: Trashcargot
cobblemon.species.chumpost.name: Chumpost
cobblemon.species.chumpost.desc: Chumpost are extremely friendly, they collect green waste like fruit peels and leaves to add to their bodies. Many people in the city keep Chumpost to be more eco-friendly. Despite carrying around decaying waste, they smell closer to grass cuttings than waste.
cobblemon.species.componion.name: Componion
cobblemon.species.componion.desc: Built with love, Componion are made up of huge piles of compost. They collect fruit and vegetable scraps and add them to their bodies for extra nutrients.
cobblemon.species.badbud.name: Badbud
cobblemon.species.thorstle.name: Thorstle
